atk-s0201a:424_17: kadāci ucchedassa gahaṇato virūpaṃ phanditanti vipphanditaṃ.
atk-s0201a:424_23: Iminā diṭṭhisaṃyojanena saṃyutto puthujjano etehi jātiādīhi na parimuccatīti.
atk-s0201a:425_1: Evaṃ chappabhedaṃ diṭṭhāsavaṃ dassetvā yasmā sīlabbataparāmāso kāmāsavādivacaneneva dassito hoti.
atk-s0201a:425_2: Kāmasukhatthañhi bhavasukhabhavavisuddhiatthañca avijjāya abhibhūtā ito bahiddhā samaṇabrāhmaṇā sīlabbatāni parāmasanti,
atk-s0201a:425_3: tasmā taṃ adassetvā diṭṭhiggahaṇena vā tassa gahitattāpi taṃ adassetvāva idāni yo puggalo dassanā pahātabbe āsave pajahati,
atk-s0201a:425_4: taṃ dassetvā tesaṃ āsavānaṃ pahānaṃ dassetuṃ pubbe vā ayoniso manasikaroto puthujjanassa tesaṃ uppattiṃ
atk-s0201a:425_5: dassetvā idāni tabbiparītassa pahānaṃ dassetuṃ sutavā ca kho,
atk-s0201a:426_2: tāva heṭṭhā vuttanayena ca vuttapaccanīkato ca veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:426_3: Paccanīkato ca sabbākārena ariyadhammassa akovidāvinītapaccanīkato ayaṃ “sutavā ariyasāvako ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinīto”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:426_4: Apica kho sikhāpattavipassanato pabhuti yāva gotrabhu,
atk-s0201a:426_5: tāva tadanurūpena atthena ayaṃ ariyasāvakoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:427_1: “So idaṃ dukkhanti yoniso manasi karotī”tiādīsu pana ayaṃ atthavibhāvanā,
atk-s0201a:427_2: so catusaccakammaṭṭhāniko ariyasāvako taṇhāvajjā tebhūmakā khandhā dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0201a:427_5: nirodhasampāpako maggoti evaṃ pubbeva ācariyasantike uggahitacatusaccakammaṭṭhāno aparena samayena vipassanāmaggaṃ
atk-s0201a:427_6: samāruḷho samāno te tebhūmake khandhe idaṃ dukkhanti yoniso manasi karoti,
atk-s0201a:427_7: upāyena pathena samannāharati ceva vipassati ca.
atk-s0201a:427_10: Yā panāyaṃ tasseva dukkhassa samuṭṭhāpikā pabhāvikā taṇhā,
atk-s0201a:427_12: Yasmā pana dukkhañca samudayo ca idaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā nirujjhanti nappavattanti,
atk-s0201a:427_15: Nirodhasampāpakaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti yoniso manasi karoti,
atk-s0201a:427_16: upāyena pathena samannāharati ceva vipassati ca.
atk-s0201a:428_4: āpodhātū”tiādinā nayena sakasantatiyaṃ cattāri bhūtāni tadanusārena upādārūpāni ca pariggahetvā ayaṃ rūpakkhandhoti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0201a:428_5: Taṃ vavatthāpayato uppanne tadārammaṇe cittacetasike dhamme ime cattāro arūpakkhandhāti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0201a:428_7: Te pana saṅkhepato nāmañca rūpañcāti dve bhāgāyeva honti.
atk-s0201a:428_9: Tassa ayaṃ hetu ayaṃ paccayoti avijjābhavataṇhākammāhārādike hetupaccaye vavatthapeti.
atk-s0201a:428_10: Tato tesaṃ paccayānañca paccayuppannadhammānañca yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ vavatthapetvā ime dhammā ahutvā hontīti aniccalakkhaṇaṃ āropeti,
atk-s0201a:428_13: Evaṃ tīṇi lakkhaṇāni āropetvā paṭipāṭiyā vipassanaṃ pavattento sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0201a:429_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe cattāri saccāni ekapaṭivedheneva paṭivijjhati,
atk-s0201a:429_10: sesāni kiccato paṭivijjhati ceva abhisameti ca.
atk-s0201a:429_11: Na hissa tasmiṃ samaye evaṃ hoti –
atk-s0201a:429_14: Apica khvassa ārammaṇaṃ katvā paṭivedhavasena nirodhaṃ sacchikaroto evaṃ taṃ ñāṇaṃ dukkhapariññākiccampi
atk-s0201a:429_16: Tassevaṃ upāyena yoniso manasikaroto tīṇi saṃyojanāni pahīyanti,
atk-s0201a:429_19: “sīlena suddhi vatena suddhī”ti sīlabbatānaṃ parāmasanato sīlabbataparāmāsoti.
atk-s0201a:429_20: Tattha catūsu āsavesu sakkāyadiṭṭhisīlabbataparāmāsā diṭṭhāsavena saṅgahitattā āsavā ceva saṃyojanā ca.
atk-s0201a:429_22: “Dassanā pahātabbā āsavā”ti ettha pariyāpannattā pana āsavāti.
atk-s0201a:430_1: pahātabbā”ti ime sakkāyadiṭṭhiādayo dassanā pahātabbā nāma āsavāti dassento āha.
atk-s0201a:430_2: Atha vā yā ayaṃ channaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ aññatarā diṭṭhi uppajjatīti evaṃ sarūpeneva sakkāyadiṭṭhi vibhattā.
atk-s0201a:430_5: Sā ca yasmā sahajātapahānekaṭṭhehi saddhiṃ pahīyati.
atk-s0201a:430_6: Diṭṭhāsave hi pahīyamāne taṃsahajāto catūsu diṭṭhisampayuttacittesu kāmāsavopi avijjāsavopi pahīyati.
atk-s0201a:430_7: Pahānekaṭṭho pana catūsu diṭṭhivippayuttesu nāgasupaṇṇādisamiddhipatthanāvasena uppajjamāno bhavāsavo.
atk-s0201a:430_10: tathā vicikicchācittasampayutto avijjāsavopīti evaṃ sabbathāpi avasesā tayopi āsavā pahīyanti.
atk-s0201a:430_11: Tasmā bahuvacananiddeso katoti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:431_6: Disvā kattabbakiccaṃ pana na karoti saṃyojanānaṃ appahānato.
atk-s0201a:431_8: Yattha katthaci rājānaṃ disvāpi paṇṇākāraṃ datvā kiccanipphattiyā adiṭṭhattā “ajjāpi rājānaṃ na passāmī”ti vadanto gāmavāsī puriso cettha nidassanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:434_1: Evaṃ dassanena pahātabbe āsave dassetvā idāni tadanantaruddiṭṭhe saṃvarā pahātabbe dassetuṃ,
atk-s0201a:435_0: Nanu ca dassanena bhāvanāyāti imehi dvīhi appahātabbo āsavo nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a:435_1: atha kasmā visuṃ saṃvarādīhi pahātabbe dassetīti.
atk-s0201a:435_2: Saṃvarādīhi pubbabhāge vikkhambhitā āsavā catūhi maggehi samugghātaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0201a:435_3: tasmā tesaṃ maggānaṃ pubbabhāge imehi pañcahākārehi vikkhambhanappahānaṃ dassento evamāha.
atk-s0201a:435_4: Tasmā yo cāyaṃ vutto paṭhamo dassanamaggoyeva,
atk-s0201a:437_0: Paṭisaṅkhā yonisoti hi upāyena pathena paṭisaṅkhāya ñatvā paccavekkhitvāti attho.
atk-s0201a:437_1: Ettha ca asaṃvare ādīnavapaṭisaṅkhā yoniso paṭisaṅkhāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:437_4: tattāya ayosalākāya ādittāya sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya cakkhundriyaṃ sampalimaṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0201a:437_5: na tveva cakkhuviññeyyesu rūpesu anubyañjanaso nimittaggāho”tiādinā ādittapariyāyanayena veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:437_6: Cakkhundriyasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharatīti ettha cakkhumeva indriyaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ,
atk-s0201a:438_0: Tattha kiñcāpi cakkhundriye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā natthi.
atk-s0201a:438_1: Na hi cakkhupasādaṃ nissāya sati vā muṭṭhasaccaṃ vā uppajjati.
atk-s0201a:438_2: Apica yadā rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0201a:438_3: tadā bhavaṅge dvikkhattuṃ uppajjitvā niruddhe kiriyamanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati,
atk-s0201a:438_7: tato kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu voṭṭhabbanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati.
atk-s0201a:439_1: na āvajjanādīnaṃ aññatarasamaye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā atthi.
atk-s0201a:439_2: Javanakkhaṇe pana sace dussīlyaṃ vā muṭṭhasaccaṃ vā aññāṇaṃ vā akkhanti vā kosajjaṃ vā uppajjati,
atk-s0201a:439_4: Evaṃ hontopi so cakkhundriye asaṃvaroti vuccati. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a:439_8: yathā nagare catūsu dvāresu asaṃvutesu kiñcāpi anto gharakoṭṭhakagabbhādayo susaṃvutā,
atk-s0201a:439_9: tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ arakkhitaṃ agopitameva hoti.
atk-s0201a:439_13: tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:440_0: Tasmiṃ pana sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi guttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:440_3: Yathā nagaradvāresu susaṃvutesu kiñcāpi anto gharādayo asaṃvutā,
atk-s0201a:440_4: tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ surakkhitaṃ sugopitameva hoti.
atk-s0201a:440_5: Nagaradvāresu hi pihitesu corānaṃ paveso natthi,
atk-s0201a:440_6: evameva javane sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi suguttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:440_8: Tasmā javanakkhaṇe uppajjamānopi cakkhundriye saṃvaroti vutto.
atk-s0201a:440_12: pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutoti imassa vibhaṅge “iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti…pe…
atk-s0201a:440_14: Taṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā cakkhundriyasaṃvarena saṃvutoti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:441_4: gharadvāre kavāṭaṃ viya saṃvari thakesi pidahīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:441_6: Tathā hi “cakkhundriyasaṃvaraṃ asaṃvutassa viharato saṃvutassa viharato”ti etesu padesu ayameva attho dissati.
atk-s0201a:442_0: Viharatīti evaṃ cakkhundriyasaṃvarasaṃvuto yena kenaci iriyāpathavihārena viharati.
atk-s0201a:442_1: Yañhissātiādimhi yaṃ cakkhundriyasaṃvaraṃ assa bhikkhuno asaṃvutassa athaketvā apidahitvā viharantassāti evamattho veditabbo. Atha vā, ye-
atk-s0201a:443_1: Āsavā vighātapariḷāhāti cattāro āsavā ca aññe ca vighātakarā kilesapariḷāhā vipākapariḷāhā ca.
atk-s0201a:443_2: Cakkhudvāre hi iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ āpāthagataṃ kāmassādavasena assādayato abhinandato kāmāsavo uppajjati,
atk-s0201a:443_3: īdisaṃ aññasmimpi sugatibhave labhissāmīti bhavapatthanāya assādayato bhavāsavo uppajjati,
atk-s0201a:443_4: sattoti vā sattassāti vā gaṇhantassa diṭṭhāsavo uppajjati,
atk-s0201a:443_5: sabbeheva sahajātaṃ aññāṇaṃ avijjāsavoti cattāro āsavā uppajjanti.
atk-s0201a:443_8: Tepi hi asaṃvutasseva viharato uppajjeyyunti vuccanti.
atk-s0201a:445_2: āsavā saṃvarā pahātabbāti ime chasu dvāresu cattāro cattāro katvā catuvīsati āsavā saṃvarena pahātabbāti vuccanti.
atk-s0201a:445_3: Sabbattheva cettha satisaṃvaro eva saṃvaroti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:448_3: Yañhissāti yaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātādīsu vā aññataraṃ assa.
atk-s0201a:448_6: Kevalaṃ panidha aladdhaṃ cīvarādiṃ patthayato laddhaṃ vā assādayato kāmāsavassa uppatti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:448_7: Īdisaṃ aññasmimpi sampattibhave sugatibhave labhissāmīti bhavapatthanāya assādayato bhavāsavassa,
atk-s0201a:448_8: ahaṃ labhāmi na labhāmīti vā mayhaṃ vā idanti attasaññaṃ adhiṭṭhahato diṭṭhāsavassa uppatti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:448_9: Sabbeheva pana sahajāto avijjāsavoti evaṃ catunnaṃ āsavānaṃ uppatti vipākapariḷāhā ca navavedanuppādanatopi veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:449_2: āsavā paṭisevanā pahātabbāti ime ekamekasmiṃ paccaye cattāro cattāro katvā soḷasa āsavā iminā ñāṇasaṃvarasaṅkhātena
atk-s0201a:452_1: Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso khamo hoti sītassāti upāyena pathena paccavekkhitvā khamo hoti sītassa sītaṃ khamati sahati,
atk-s0201a:452_2: na avīrapuriso viya appamattakenapi sītena calati kampati kammaṭṭhānaṃ vijahati.
atk-s0201a:452_3: Apica kho lomasanāgatthero viya anappakenāpi sītena phuṭṭho na calati na kampati,
atk-s0201a:452_5: Thero kira cetiyapabbate piyaṅguguhāyaṃ padhānaghare viharanto antaraṭṭhake himapātasamaye lokantarikaniraye
atk-s0201a:453_0: Kevalañhi yo bhikkhu adhimattampi uṇhaṃ sahati sveva thero viya,
atk-s0201a:453_2: Thero kira gimhasamaye pacchābhattaṃ bahicaṅkame nisīdi.
atk-s0201a:453_7: Thero “uṇhabhayenevamhi āvuso idha nisinno”ti avīcimahānirayaṃ paccavekkhitvā nisīdiyeva.
atk-s0201a:454_0: Yo ca dve tayo vāre bhattaṃ vā pānīyaṃ vā alabhamānopi anamatagge saṃsāre attano pettivisayūpapattiṃ
atk-s0201a:454_2: Adhimattehi ḍaṃsamakasavātātapasamphassehi phuṭṭho cāpi tiracchānūpapattiṃ paccavekkhitvā avedhento kammaṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatiyeva.
atk-s0201a:454_3: Sarīsapasamphassena phuṭṭho cāpi anamatagge saṃsāre sīhabyagghādimukhesu anekavāraṃ parivattitapubbabhāvaṃ
atk-s0201a:454_4: paccavekkhitvā avedhento kammaṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatiyeva padhāniyatthero viya.
atk-s0201a:455_0: Theraṃ kira khaṇḍacelavihāre kaṇikārapadhāniyaghare ariyavaṃsaṃ suṇantaṃ ghoraviso sappo ḍaṃsi.
atk-s0201a:455_1: Thero jānitvāpi pasannacitto nisinno dhammaṃyeva suṇāti.
atk-s0201a:455_3: Thero upasampadamaṇḍalaṃ ādiṃ katvā sīlaṃ paccavekkhitvā parisuddhasīlohamasmīti pītiṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0201a:455_4: Saha pītuppādā visaṃ nivattitvā pathaviṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0201a:455_5: Thero tattheva cittekaggataṃ labhitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0201a:456_0: Yo pana akkosavasena durutte duruttattāyeva ca durāgate api antimavatthusaññite vacanapathe sutvā khantiguṇaṃyeva
atk-s0201a:457_3: Taṃ aññataro mahāthero adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto dīghabhāṇako ariyavaṃsaṃ kathemīti sabbarattiṃ kolāhalaṃ karosītiādīhi akkosi.
atk-s0201a:457_4: Ubhopi ca attano attano vihāraṃ gacchantā gāvutamattaṃ ekapathena agamaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:457_6: Tato yattha dvinnaṃ vihārānaṃ maggo bhijjati,
atk-s0201a:457_7: tattha ṭhatvā dīghabhāṇakatthero taṃ vanditvā “esa, bhante,
atk-s0201a:457_10: Theropi vihāraṃ gantvā pāde pakkhāletvā nisīdi.
atk-s0201a:457_12: sakalagāvutaṃ paribhāsantaṃ na kiñci avocutthā”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:458_0: Yo pana uppannā sārīrikā vedanā dukkhamanaṭṭhena dukkhā,
atk-s0201a:458_8: Evaṃ sabhāvo hoti cittalapabbate padhāniyatthero viya.
atk-s0201a:459_0: Therassa kira rattiṃ padhānena vītināmetvā ṭhitassa udaravāto uppajji.
atk-s0201a:459_1: So taṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto āvattati parivattati.
atk-s0201a:459_7: Thero vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā vipassanto muhuttena anāgāmī hutvā parinibbāyīti.
atk-s0201a:460_4: Sītena phuṭṭhassa uṇhaṃ patthayantassa kāmāsavo uppajjati,
atk-s0201a:460_6: Natthi no sampattibhave sugatibhave sītaṃ vā uṇhaṃ vāti bhavaṃ patthayantassa bhavāsavo.
atk-s0201a:461_1: adhivāsanā pahātabbā”ti ime sītādīsu ekamekassa vasena cattāro cattāro katvā aneke āsavā imāya khantisaṃvarasaṅkhātāya
atk-s0201a:461_3: Ettha ca yasmā ayaṃ khanti sītādidhamme adhivāseti,
atk-s0201a:464_1: Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso caṇḍaṃ hatthiṃ parivajjetīti ahaṃ samaṇoti caṇḍassa hatthissa āsanne na ṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:464_2: Tatonidānañhi maraṇampi siyā maraṇamattampi dukkhanti evaṃ upāyena pathena paccayena paccavekkhitvā caṇḍaṃ hatthiṃ parivajjeti paṭikkamati.
atk-s0201a:464_17: Anāsaneti ettha pana ayuttaṃ āsanaṃ anāsanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:464_19: Agocareti etthapi ca ayutto gocaro agocaro,
atk-s0201a:464_26: Te hi ekakammaṃ ekuddeso samasikkhatāti imaṃ brahmaṃ samānaṃ caranti,
atk-s0201a:464_30: adhimucceyyuṃ “addhā ayamāyasmā akāsi vā karissati vā”ti.
atk-s0201a:465_3: Hatthiādinidānena dukkhena phuṭṭhassa sukhaṃ patthayato kāmāsavo uppajjati.
atk-s0201a:465_4: Natthi no sampattibhave sugatibhave īdisaṃ dukkhanti bhavaṃ patthentassa bhavāsavo.
atk-s0201a:466_1: parivajjanā pahātabbāti ime hatthiādīsu ekekassa vasena cattāro cattāro katvā aneke āsavā iminā sīlasaṃvarasaṅkhātena
atk-s0201a:469_1: Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetīti “iti pāyaṃ vitakko akusalo,
atk-s0201a:469_4: so ca kho attabyābādhāya saṃvattatī”tiādinā nayena yoniso kāmavitakke ādīnavaṃ paccavekkhitvā tasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:469_5: tasmiṃ ārammaṇe uppannaṃ jātamabhinibbattaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāseti,
atk-s0201a:471_0: Kiṃ kacavaraṃ viya piṭakenāti? Na hi, apica kho naṃ vinodeti tudati vijjhati nīharati.
atk-s0201a:472_0: Kiṃ balibaddaṃ viya patodenāti? Na hi,
atk-s0201a:472_1: atha kho naṃ byantīkaroti vigatantaṃ karoti.
atk-s0201a:473_1: Anabhāvaṃ gametīti anu anu abhāvaṃ gameti,
atk-s0201a:474_0: Ettha ca kāmavitakkoti “yo kāmapaṭisaṃyutto takko vitakko micchāsaṅkappo”ti vibhaṅge vutto.
atk-s0201a:474_4: Sakiṃ vā uppanne vinodetvā dutiyavāre ajjhupekkhitā na hoti,
atk-s0201a:474_8: Dhammeti teyeva kāmavitakkādayo sabbepi vā nava mahāvitakke.
atk-s0201a:474_10: Avasesā “ñātivitakko janapadavitakko amaravitakko parānuddayatāpaṭisaṃyutto vitakko lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṃyutto
atk-s0201a:476_1: vinodanā pahātabbāti ime kāmavitakkādivasena vuttappakārā āsavā iminā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vitakke ādīnavapaccavekkhaṇasahitena
atk-s0201a:479_1: Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvetīti abhāvanāya ādīnavaṃ,
atk-s0201a:479_2: bhāvanāya ca ānisaṃsaṃ upāyena pathena paccavekkhitvā satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti,
atk-s0201a:479_4: Ettha ca kiñcāpi ime uparimaggattayasamayasambhūtā lokuttarabojjhaṅgā eva adhippetā,
atk-s0201a:479_5: tathāpi ādikammikānaṃ bojjhaṅgesu asammohatthaṃ lokiyalokuttaramissakena nesaṃ nayena atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāmi.
atk-s0201a:479_6: Idha pana lokiyanayaṃ pahāya lokuttaranayo eva gahetabbo.
atk-s0201a:479_7: Tattha satisambojjhaṅgantiādinā nayena vuttānaṃ sattannaṃ ādipadānaṃyeva tāva –
atk-s0201a:482_4: rañño bhaṇḍāgāriko rañño sāpateyyaṃ apilāpeti, ettakaṃ, mahārāja, hiraññaṃ,
atk-s0201a:482_11: Kiccavaseneva hissa etaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ therena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:482_15: Tattha bodhiyā bodhissa vā aṅgoti bojjhaṅgo.
atk-s0201a:483_9: Yathāha “satta bojjhaṅge bhāvetvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho”ti.
atk-s0201a:484_0: Yopesa yathāvuttappakārāya etāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvako “bodhī”ti vuccati,
atk-s0201a:484_3: Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā “bujjhanakassa puggalassa aṅgāti vā bojjhaṅgā”ti.
atk-s0201a:484_13: Evaṃ tāva ekassa ādipadassa atthato lakkhaṇādīhi ca vinicchayo viññātabbo.
atk-s0201a:485_29: Evaṃ sesapadānampi atthato lakkhaṇādīhi ca vinicchayo viññātabbo.
atk-s0201a:486_2: sabbatthikaṃ vadāmī”ti vacanato sabbesaṃ sesabojjhaṅgānaṃ upakārakattā satisambojjhaṅgova paṭhamaṃ vutto.
atk-s0201a:486_3: Tato paraṃ “so tathā sato viharanto taṃ dhammaṃ paññāya pavicinatī”tiādinā nayena sesabojjhaṅgānaṃ pubbāpariyavacane payojanaṃ sutteyeva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:487_0: Anūnādhikatoti kasmā pana bhagavatā satteva bojjhaṅgā vuttā anūnā anadhikāti.
atk-s0201a:487_2: Ettha hi tayo bojjhaṅgā līnassa paṭipakkhā. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a:487_22: Evaṃ līnuddhaccapaṭipakkhato sabbatthikato ca satteva bojjhaṅgā vuttā anūnā anadhikāti,
atk-s0201a:488_0: Evaṃ tāva “satisambojjhaṅga”ntiādinā nayena vuttānaṃ sattannaṃ ādipadānaṃyeva atthavaṇṇanaṃ ñatvā idāni bhāveti vivekanissitantiādīsu evaṃ ñātabbā.
atk-s0201a:488_2: attano cittasantāne punappunaṃ janeti abhinibbattetīti attho.
atk-s0201a:488_6: Tassa nānattaṃ “ariyadhamme avinīto”ti ettha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:489_0: Vivekanissitanti tadaṅgavivekanissitaṃ samucchedavivekanissitaṃ nissaraṇavivekanissitañca satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvetīti ayamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:489_1: Tathā hi ayaṃ bojjhaṅgabhāvanānuyutto yogī vipassanākkhaṇe kiccato tadaṅgavivekanissitaṃ,
atk-s0201a:489_6: te hi na kevalaṃ balavavipassanāmaggaphalakkhaṇesu eva bojjhaṅge uddharanti,
atk-s0201a:489_9: Tasmā tesaṃ matena etesaṃ jhānānaṃ pavattikkhaṇe kiccato eva vikkhambhanavivekanissitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:490_0: Kevalañhettha vossaggo duvidho pariccāgavossaggo ca pakkhandanavossaggo cāti.
atk-s0201a:490_6: Tathā hi ayaṃ satisambojjhaṅgo yathāvuttena pakārena kilese pariccajati,
atk-s0201a:490_8: Vossaggapariṇāminti iminā pana sakalena vacanena vossaggattaṃ pariṇamantaṃ pariṇatañca paripaccantaṃ paripakkañcāti.
atk-s0201a:490_9: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “ayañhi bojjhaṅgabhāvanānuyutto bhikkhu yathā satisambojjhaṅgo kilesapariccāgavossaggattaṃ
atk-s0201a:491_0: Idha pana nibbānaṃyeva sabbasaṅkhatehi vivittattā viveko,
atk-s0201a:491_4: tasmā satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattiyā vivekanissitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:491_6: Tañca kho ariyamaggakkhaṇuppattiyā kilesānaṃ samucchedato pariccāgabhāvena ca nibbānapakkhandanabhāvena
atk-s0201a:491_7: ca pariṇataṃ paripakkanti ayameva attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:492_2: Āsavuppattiyaṃ panettha imesaṃ uparimaggattayasampayuttānaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ abhāvitattā ye uppajjeyyuṃ kāmāsavo bhavāsavo avijjāsavoti tayo āsavā,
atk-s0201a:492_3: bhāvayato evaṃsa te āsavā na hontīti ayaṃ nayo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:493_1: bhāvanā pahātabbāti ime tayo āsavā imāya maggattayasampayuttāya bojjhaṅgabhāvanāya pahātabbāti vuccantīti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:494_1: Idāni imehi sattahākārehi pahīnāsavaṃ bhikkhuṃ thomento āsavappahāne cassa ānisaṃsaṃ dassento eteheva
atk-s0201a:494_2: ca kāraṇehi āsavappahāne sattānaṃ ussukkaṃ janento yato kho,
atk-s0201a:494_8: Ye āsavā dassanā pahātabbāti ye āsavā dassanena pahātabbā,
atk-s0201a:495_4: Vivattayi saṃyojananti dasavidhampi saṃyojanaṃ parivattayi nimmalamakāsi.
atk-s0201a:495_9: Tena diṭṭho pana so tāvadeva pahīyati diṭṭhavisena diṭṭhasattānaṃ jīvitaṃ viya.
atk-s0201a:496_0: Antamakāsi dukkhassāti evaṃ arahattamaggena sammā mānassa diṭṭhattā pahīnattā ca ye ime “kāyabandhanassa anto jīrati.
atk-s0201a:496_6: “esevanto dukkhassa sabbapaccayasaṅkhayā”ti evaṃ vuttakoṭanto cāti evaṃ cattāro antā,
atk-s0201a:496_7: tesu sabbasseva vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṃ catutthakoṭisaṅkhātaṃ antimakoṭisaṅkhātaṃ antamakāsi paricchedaṃ parivaṭumaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0201a:497_2: Bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti idaṃ dukkhassa antakiriyāpariyosānaṃ bhagavato bhāsitaṃ sukathitaṃ sulapitaṃ,
atk-s0201a:497_3: evametaṃ bhagavā evametaṃ sugatāti matthakena sampaṭicchantā abbhanumodiṃsūti.
atk-s0201a:498_1: taṃ pubbe vuttattā ca suviññeyyattā ca na vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:503_3: tasmā taṃ dassetvā vassa apubbapadavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma.
atk-s0201a:503_8: Sabbadisāsu yamakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvā mahoghaṃ viya sabbapāramiyo ekasmiṃ attabhāve vipākaṃ dassāmāti
atk-s0201a:503_16: Sakaṭasatehipi paccaye āharitvā okāsaṃ alabhamānā samantā gāvutappamāṇampi sakaṭadhurena sakaṭadhuramāhaccatiṭṭhanti ceva anubandhanti ca.
atk-s0201a:503_18: Sabbaṃ khandhake tesu tesu suttesu ca āgatanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:504_1: “tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hoti garukato mānito pūjito apacito lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṃ,
atk-s0201a:504_5: etarahi saṅgho vā gaṇo vā loke uppanno, nāhaṃ, cunda,
atk-s0201a:505_0: Svāyaṃ bhagavato ca bhikkhusaṅghassa ca uppanno lābhasakkāro ekato hutvā dvinnaṃ mahānadīnaṃ udakamiva appameyyo ahosi.
atk-s0201a:505_2: Pacchābhattampi telamadhuphāṇitādīsu āhaṭesu gaṇḍiṃyeva paharitvā “amhākaṃ ācariyassa detha,
atk-s0201a:505_4: Sā ca nesaṃ pavatti bhagavatopi pākaṭā ahosi.
atk-s0201a:505_5: Tato bhagavā ananucchavikanti dhammasaṃvegaṃ uppādetvā cintesi –
atk-s0201a:506_3: Sā sikkhākāmānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ sikkhāpadapaññatti viya bhavissati nagaradvāre ṭhapitasabbakāyikaādāso viya ca,
atk-s0201a:506_4: yathā hi nagaradvāre ṭhapite sabbakāyike ādāse cattāro vaṇṇā attano chāyaṃ disvā vajjaṃ pahāya niddosā honti,
atk-s0201a:506_5: evameva sikkhākāmā kulaputtā payogamaṇḍanena attānaṃ maṇḍetukāmā imaṃ sabbakāyikādāsūpamaṃ desanaṃ āvajjitvā
atk-s0201a:506_6: āmisadāyādapaṭipadaṃ vajjetvā dhammadāyādapaṭipadaṃ pūrentā khippameva jātijarāmaraṇassa antaṃ karissantī”ti.
atk-s0201a:507_8: tassa mā paṭiggāhakā bhavathāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:507_15: Maggaphalanibbānabhedo hi navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo nippariyāyadhammo nibbattitadhammo,
atk-s0201a:507_16: na yena kenaci pariyāyena kāraṇena vā lesena vā dhammo.
atk-s0201a:507_24: evaṃ karonto anupubbena nippariyāyadhammaṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ paṭilabhati,
atk-s0201a:507_27: na aññena pariyāyena kāraṇena vā lesena vā āmisaṃ.
atk-s0201a:507_30: idhekacco vaṭṭaṃ patthento sampattibhavaṃ icchamāno dānaṃ deti…pe…
atk-s0201a:508_1: Bhagavatā hi kathitattā bhikkhū maggaphalanibbānāni adhigacchanti.
atk-s0201a:508_2: Vuttampi cetaṃ “so hi brāhmaṇa bhagavā anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā,
atk-s0201a:508_6: Maggānugā ca pana etarahi sāvakā viharanti pacchā samannāgatā”ti ca –
atk-s0201a:508_9: passaṃ passati cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa dātā dhammassāmī tathāgato”ti ca.
atk-s0201a:508_11: Bhagavatā hi kathitattā evaṃ jānanti “vivaṭṭaṃ patthetvā dānaṃ dento…pe…
atk-s0201a:508_12: samāpattiyo nibbattento anukkamena amataṃ nibbānaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti.
atk-s0201a:508_14: Bhagavatā hi anuññātattāyeva bhikkhūhi jīvakavatthuṃ ādiṃ katvā paṇītacīvaraṃ laddhaṃ.
atk-s0201a:509_5: saṅghabhattaṃ uddesabhattaṃ nimantanaṃ salākabhattaṃ pakkhikaṃ uposathikaṃ pāṭipadika”nti evaṃ anuññātattāyeva paṇītabhojanaṃ laddhaṃ.
atk-s0201a:509_10: pañca leṇānī”ti evaṃ bhagavatā anuññātattāyeva vihāro aḍḍhayogo pāsādo hammiyaṃ guhāti imāni senāsanāni labhiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:509_18: phāṇita”nti evamādinā nayena anuññātattā nānābhesajjāni labhiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:510_3: samāpattiyo nibbattetvā anukkamena pariyāyāmisaṃ dibbasampattiṃ manussasampattiṃ paṭilabhatī”ti. Tadeva,
atk-s0201a:510_4: yasmā nippariyāyadhammopi pariyāyadhammopi nippariyāyāmisampi pariyāyāmisampi bhagavatoyeva santakaṃ,
atk-s0201a:510_5: tasmā tattha attano sāmibhāvaṃ dassento āha –
atk-s0201a:511_2: Yañca kho etaṃ mayhameva santakaṃ āmisaṃ,
atk-s0201a:511_6: Yo hi jinasāsane pabbajitvā paccayaparamo viharati catūsu taṇhuppādesu sandissamāno nikkhittadhuro dhammānudhammappaṭipattiyaṃ,
atk-s0201a:511_9: Yo pana anuññātapaccayesu appicchatādīni nissāya paṭisaṅkhā sevamāno paṭipattiparamo viharati catūsu ariyavaṃsesu sandissamāno,
atk-s0201a:512_1: bhavissati vā anāgatamaddhānaṃ “kiṃ nu kho bhagavā sāvakānaṃ alābhatthiko evamāhā”ti,
atk-s0201a:512_2: tesaṃ atipaṇītalābhatthiko ahaṃ evaṃ vadāmīti dassetumāha atthi me tumhesu…pe…
atk-s0201a:513_1: atthi me tumhesu anukampā anuddayā hitesitā,
atk-s0201a:513_2: kena nu kho kāraṇena kena upāyena sāvakā dhammadāyādā assu dhammakoṭṭhāsasāmino,
atk-s0201a:513_5: passati kira bhagavā āmisagarukānaṃ āmise upakkhalitānaṃ atītakāle tāva kapilassa bhikkhuno,
atk-s0201a:513_9: Tasmā tesaṃ apāyā parimuttiṃ sabbaguṇasampattiñca icchanto āha –
atk-s0201a:513_10: “atthi me tumhesu anukampā kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ,
atk-s0201a:513_12: Paccayagaruko ca catuparisantare kūṭakahāpaṇo viya nibbutaṅgāro viya ca nittejo nippabho hoti.
atk-s0201a:513_13: Tato vivattitacitto dhammagaruko tejavā sīhova abhibhuyyacārī,
atk-s0201a:514_2: mā āmisadāyādā”ti idaṃ anukampāya paṇītataraṃ lābhaṃ icchantena vuttaṃ,
atk-s0201a:514_3: no alābhatthikenāti sāvetvā idāni imassa ovādassa akaraṇe ādīnavaṃ dassento āha “tumhe ca me,
atk-s0201a:514_6: Tattha tumhepi tena ādiyā bhaveyyāthāti tumhepi tena āmisadāyādabhāvena no dhammadāyādabhāvena ādiyā bhaveyyātha.
atk-s0201a:514_8: viññūhi gārayhā bhaveyyāthāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kinti?
atk-s0201a:515_0: Ahampi tena ādiyo bhaveyyanti ahampi tena tumhākaṃ āmisadāyādabhāvena no dhammadāyādabhāvena gārayho bhaveyyaṃ. Kinti? Āmisa…pe… dāyādāti.
atk-s0201a:515_5: tattha viññū maṃ garahissanti “kathañhi nāma sabbaññū samāno attano sāvake dhammadāyāde no āmisadāyāde kātuṃ na sakkotī”ti.
atk-s0201a:515_6: Seyyathāpi nāma anākappasampanne bhikkhū disvā ācariyupajjhāye garahanti “kassime saddhivihārikā,
atk-s0201a:515_8: seyyathā vā pana kulakumārake vā kulakumārikāyo vā dussīle pāpadhamme disvā mātāpitaro garahanti “kassime puttā,
atk-s0201a:515_10: evameva maṃ viññū garahissanti “kathañhi nāma sabbaññū samāno attano sāvake dhammadāyāde no āmisadāyāde kātuṃ na sakkotī”ti.
atk-s0201a:516_0: Evaṃ imassa ovādassa akaraṇe ādīnavaṃ dassetvā karaṇe ānisaṃsaṃ dassento tumhe ca metiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:516_1: Tattha ahampi tena na ādiyo bhaveyyanti seyyathāpi nāma vattaparipūrake daharabhikkhū uddesaparipucchāsampanne
atk-s0201a:516_7: paṭibalo vata ovadituṃ anusāsitu”nti ācariyupajjhāyā na ādiyā na gārayhā bhavanti,
atk-s0201a:516_8: evameva ahampi tena tumhākaṃ dhammadāyādabhāvena no āmisadāyādabhāvena kassa sāvakā nālakapaṭipadaṃ tuvaṭṭakapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0201a:516_9: candūpamapaṭipadaṃ rathavinītapaṭipadaṃ mahāgosiṅgasālapaṭipadaṃ mahāsuññatapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannā catupaccayasantosabhāvanārāmaariyavaṃsesu
atk-s0201a:516_10: sakkhibhūtā paccayagedhato vivattamānasā abbhā muttacandasamā viharantīti;
atk-s0201a:516_12: asakkhi vata sāvake āmisadāyādapaṭipadaṃ chaḍḍāpetvā dhammadāyādapaṭipattipūrake kātu”nti viññūnaṃ na ādiyo na gārayho bhaveyyanti.
atk-s0201a:516_13: Evamimasmiṃ pade adhippāyaṃ ñatvā sesaṃ kaṇhapakkhe vuttanayapaccanīkena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:516_14: Evaṃ imassa ovādassa karaṇe ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā idāni taṃ ovādaṃ niyyātento āha –
atk-s0201a:517_1: Evamimaṃ ovādaṃ niyyātetvā idāni tassā dhammadāyādapaṭipattiyā paripūrakāriṃ thometuṃ idhāhaṃ,
atk-s0201a:517_3: Bhagavato hi thomanaṃ sutvāpi hontiyeva tadatthāya paṭipajjitāro.
atk-s0201a:518_4: yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā paṭikkhittabhojano tittovāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:518_5: Catubbidhā hi pavāraṇā vassaṃvuṭṭhapavāraṇā paccayapavāraṇā anatirittapavāraṇā yāvadatthapavāraṇāti. Tattha,
atk-s0201a:518_7: vassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretu”nti ayaṃ vassaṃvuṭṭhapavāraṇā.
atk-s0201a:518_9: saṅghaṃ catumāsaṃ bhesajjena pavāretu”nti ca “aññatra punapavāraṇāya aññatra niccapavāraṇāyā”ti ca ayaṃ paccayapavāraṇā.
atk-s0201a:518_15: “Paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresī”ti ayaṃ yāvadatthapavāraṇā.
atk-s0201a:519_10: Ettha ca purimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pacchimāni sādhakāni.
atk-s0201a:520_10: Jighacchādubbalyaparetāti jighacchāya ca dubbalyena ca paretā phuṭṭhā anugatā ca aṭṭhapi dasapi divasāni.
atk-s0201a:520_11: Tattha keci jighacchitāpi na dubbalā honti,
atk-s0201a:520_13: Ime pana na tādisāti dassetuṃ ubhayamāha.
atk-s0201a:521_1: yasmiṃ ṭhāne piṇḍapātajjhottharaṇena vinassanadhammāni tiṇāni natthi,
atk-s0201a:521_4: yattha sakaṭenapi chaḍḍite piṇḍapāte tiṇāni na vinassanti,
atk-s0201a:522_0: Appāṇaketi nippāṇake piṇḍapātajjhottharaṇena maritabbapāṇakarahite vā mahāudakakkhandhe.
atk-s0201a:522_1: Parittodake eva hi bhattapakkhepena āḷulite sukhumapāṇakā maranti,
atk-s0201a:523_1: Yo imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ suṭṭhu sutavā punappunaṃ āvajjeti ca,
atk-s0201a:523_4: saddo kesohāraṇepi dissati “kāpaṭiko māṇavo daharo vuttasiro”tiādīsu.
atk-s0201a:523_14: sabbaliṅgavibhattivacanesu tādisova tattha tattha atthato pariṇāmetabbo.
atk-s0201a:523_19: Evanti yathā idāni imaṃ khaṇaṃ vītināmemi,
atk-s0201a:524_0: So taṃ piṇḍapātanti so taṃ sadevakena lokena sirasā sampaṭicchitabbarūpaṃ sugatātirittampi piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0201a:524_1: abhuñjitvā dhammadāyādabhāvaṃ ākaṅkhamāno ādittasīsūpamaṃ paccavekkhitvā teneva jighacchādubbalyena evaṃ
atk-s0201a:525_0: Atha dutiyassāti imasmiṃ pana vāre esa saṅkhepo,
atk-s0201a:525_4: pabbajitena kho vāḷamigākule araññe bhesajjaṃ viya pañcakāmaguṇavāḷākule gāme piṇḍapātopi dukkhaṃ pariyesituṃ.
atk-s0201a:525_5: Ayaṃ pana piṇḍapāto iti pariyesanādīnavavimutto ca sugatātiritto cāti ubhato sujātakhattiyakumāro viya hoti,
atk-s0201a:525_6: yehi ca pañcahi kāraṇehi piṇḍapāto na paribhuñjitabbo hoti.
atk-s0201a:525_8: puggalaṃ garahitvā na paribhuñjitabbo hoti “alajjipuggalassa santako”ti.
atk-s0201a:525_10: Sāmikānukampāya na paribhuñjitabbo hoti “piṇḍapātasāmiko bhikkhu jighacchito”ti.
atk-s0201a:525_11: So dhāto tasseva antevāsikādīsu anukampāya na paribhuñjitabbo hoti “antevāsikā aññe vā tappaṭibaddhā jighacchitā”ti,
atk-s0201a:525_13: apica kho assaddhatāya na paribhuñjitabbo hoti “piṇḍapātasāmiko bhikkhu assaddho”ti.
atk-s0201a:525_20: bhagavā tesaṃ aggoti evaṃ cintetvā ca so taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā…pe…
atk-s0201a:525_23: sopi bhuñjitabbakameva piṇḍapātaṃ na bhutto hoti.
atk-s0201a:526_5: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti yadipi so bhikkhu evaṃ bhuñjitabbameva bhuñjitvā kātabbameva kareyya.
atk-s0201a:526_6: Atha kho asuyeva me purimo bhikkhūti yo purimo bhikkhu tampi piṇḍapātaṃ paṭikkhipitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a:526_7: soyeva mama dvīsu sūresu sūrataro viya dvīsu paṇḍitesu paṇḍitataro viya ca pujjataro ca pāsaṃsataro ca,
atk-s0201a:526_8: dutiyabhikkhuto atirekena pūjanīyo ca pasaṃsanīyo cāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:527_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ kāraṇena sādhento taṃ kissa hetūtiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:527_3: kasmā so bhikkhu bhagavato pujjataro ca pāsaṃsataro cāti?
atk-s0201a:527_4: Tañhi tassāti yasmā taṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkhipanaṃ tassa bhikkhuno dīgharattaṃ appicchatāya…pe…
atk-s0201a:527_6: Tassa hi sace aparena samayena paccayesu atricchatā vā pāpicchatā vā mahicchatā vā uppajjissati.
atk-s0201a:527_7: Tato naṃ iminā piṇḍapātapaṭikkhepaṅkusena nivāressati “are tvaṃ sugatātirittampi piṇḍapātaṃ paṭikkhipitvā
atk-s0201a:527_9: Esa nayo asantuṭṭhiyā asaṃlekhassa cuppannassa nivāraṇe.
atk-s0201a:527_10: Evaṃ tāvassa appicchatāya santuṭṭhiyā saṃlekhāya saṃvattissati.
atk-s0201a:528_1: idhekacco attanopi upaṭṭhākānampi dubbharo hoti dupposo.
atk-s0201a:528_2: Ekacco attanopi upaṭṭhākānampi subharo hoti suposo. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0201a:528_3: Yo hi ambilādīni laddhā anambilādīni pariyesati,
atk-s0201a:528_4: aññassa ghare laddhaṃ aññassa ghare chaḍḍento sabbaṃ gāmaṃ vicaritvā rittapattova vihāraṃ pavisitvā nipajjati,
atk-s0201a:528_6: Yo pana sālimaṃsodanādīnaṃ patte pūretvā dinnepi dummukhabhāvaṃ anattamanabhāvameva ca dasseti,
atk-s0201a:528_7: tesaṃ vā sammukhāva taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ “kiṃ tumhehi dinna”nti apasādento sāmaṇeragahaṭṭhādīnampi deti,
atk-s0201a:528_9: Etaṃ disvā manussā dūrato parivajjanti dubbharo bhikkhu na sakkā positunti.
atk-s0201a:528_10: Yo pana yaṃkiñci lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā laddhā tuṭṭhacittova bhuñjitvā vihāraṃ gantvā attano kammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a:528_12: Yo ca paresampi appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā dānaṃ ahīḷetvā attamano vippasannamukho hutvā tesaṃ sammukhāva paribhuñjitvā yāti,
atk-s0201a:528_14: Etaṃ disvā manussā ativiya vissatthā honti –
atk-s0201a:528_16: mayameva naṃ posissāmā”ti paṭiññaṃ katvā posenti.
atk-s0201a:529_0: Tattha sace aparena samayena assa attano vā upaṭṭhākānaṃ vā dubbharatānayena cittaṃ uppajjissati.
atk-s0201a:529_2: “are tvaṃ sugatātirittampi piṇḍapātaṃ paṭikkhipitvā īdisaṃ cittaṃ uppādesī”ti evaṃ paccavekkhamāno,
atk-s0201a:529_6: “are tvaṃ nāma tadā sugatātirittampi piṇḍapātaṃ paṭikkhipitvā tathā jighacchādubbalyaparetopi samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0201a:529_11: Evamassime pañca guṇā paripūrā dasa kathāvatthūni paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a:530_1: Atra hi pāḷiyaṃyeva appicchatāsantuṭṭhitāvīriyārambhavasena tīṇi āgatāni,
atk-s0201a:530_6: kathā abhisallekhikā cetovinīvaraṇasappāyā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0201a:530_9: Evaṃ ime pañca guṇā paripūrā dasa kathāvatthūni paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a:530_10: Dasa kathāvatthūni paripūrāni tisso sikkhā paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a:531_1: Etesu hi appicchakathā santosakathā asaṃsaggakathā sīlakathāti imā catasso kathā adhisīlasikkhāsaṅgahitāyeva.
atk-s0201a:531_2: Pavivekakathā vīriyārambhakathā samādhikathāti imā tisso adhicittasikkhasaṅgahitā.
atk-s0201a:531_3: Paññākathā vimuttikathā vimuttiñāṇadassanakathāti imā tisso adhipaññāsikkhāsaṅgahitāti.
atk-s0201a:531_4: Evaṃ dasa kathāvatthūni paripūrāni tisso sikkhā paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a:531_5: Tisso sikkhā paripūrā pañca asekkhadhammakkhandhe paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a:532_1: Paripūrā hi adhisīlasikkhā asekkho sīlakkhandhoyeva hoti,
atk-s0201a:532_4: vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhā evāti evaṃ tisso sikkhā paripūrā pañca asekkhadhammakkhandhe paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a:532_5: Pañca dhammakkhandhā paripūrā amataṃ nibbānaṃ paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a:532_6: Seyyathāpi uparipabbate pāvussako mahāmegho abhivuṭṭho pabbatakandarasarasākhā paripūreti.
atk-s0201a:532_12: evameva tassa bhikkhuno ime pañca guṇā paripūrā dasa kathāvatthuni ādiṃ katvā yāva amataṃ nibbānaṃ paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a:532_13: Evamayaṃ bhikkhu dhammadāyādapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno paramadhammadāyādaṃ labhatīti etamatthaṃ sampassamāno bhagavā “taṃ kissa hetu tañhi tassa,
atk-s0201a:533_0: Evaṃ tassa bhikkhuno pujjatarapāsaṃsatarabhāvaṃ kāraṇena sādhetvā idāni te bhikkhū tathattāya sanniyojento tasmā tiha me bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:533_2: yasmā yo taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0201a:534_0: Idamavoca bhagavāti idaṃ nidānapariyosānato pabhuti yāva no āmisadāyādāti suttappadesaṃ bhagavā avoca.
atk-s0201a:534_1: Idaṃ vatvāna sugatoti idañca suttappadesaṃ vatvāva sobhanāya paṭipadāya gatattā sugatoti saṅkhaṃ pattoyeva bhagavā.
atk-s0201a:534_2: Uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisī paññattavarabuddhāsanato uṭṭhahitvā vihāraṃ attano mahāgandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi asambhinnāya eva parisāya.
atk-s0201a:535_0: Buddhā kira apariniṭṭhitāya desanāya vihāraṃ pavisantā dvīhi kāraṇehi pavisanti puggalathomanatthaṃ vā dhammathomanatthaṃ vā.
atk-s0201a:535_4: dhammapaṭiggāhakā bhikkhū uggahetvā ānandaṃ vā kaccānaṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā pucchissanti,
atk-s0201a:535_11: ahampi naṃ evameva byākareyyanti evaṃ te puggale thomessāmi,
atk-s0201a:535_12: tato tesu gāravaṃ janetvā bhikkhū upasaṅkamissanti,
atk-s0201a:535_13: tepi bhikkhū atthe ca dhamme ca niyojessanti,
atk-s0201a:535_14: te tehi niyojitā tisso sikkhā paripūrentā dukkhassantaṃ karissantī”ti.
atk-s0201a:536_2: “mayi vihāraṃ paviṭṭhe tameva āmisadāyādaṃ garahanto dhammadāyādañca thomento imissaṃyeva parisati nisinno sāriputto dhammaṃ desessati,
atk-s0201a:536_3: evaṃ dvinnampi amhākaṃ ekajjhāsayāya matiyā desitā ayaṃ desanā aggā ca garukā ca bhavissati pāsāṇacchattasadisā.
atk-s0201a:536_4: Caturoghanittharaṇaṭṭhena titthe ṭhapitā nāvā viya maggagamanaṭṭhena catuyuttaājaññaratho viya ca bhavissati.
atk-s0201a:536_5: Yathā ca ‘evaṃ karontassa ayaṃ daṇḍo’ti parisati āṇaṃ ṭhapetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pāsādaṃ āruḷhe rājini tattheva
atk-s0201a:536_6: nisinno senāpati taṃ raññā ṭhapitaṃ āṇaṃ pavatteti;
atk-s0201a:536_7: evampi mayā ṭhapitaṃ desanaṃ imissaṃyeva parisati nisinno sāriputto thometvā desessati,
atk-s0201a:536_8: evaṃ dvinnampi amhākaṃ matiyā desitā ayaṃ desanā balavatarā majjhanhikasūriyo viya pajjalissatī”ti.
atk-s0201a:537_0: Īdisesu ca ṭhānesu bhagavā nisinnāsaneyeva antarahito cittagatiyā vihāraṃ pavisatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:537_3: sā ekavāraṃ bhinnā puna dussannipātā bhaveyyāti bhagavā cittagatiyā eva pāvisi.
atk-s0201a:538_1: Evaṃ paviṭṭhe pana bhagavati bhagavato adhippāyānurūpaṃ taṃ dhammaṃ thometukāmo tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto…pe…etadavoca.
atk-s0201a:538_9: bhikkhaveti ettha pana buddhā bhagavanto sāvake ālapantā bhikkhaveti ālapanti.
atk-s0201a:538_10: Sāvakā pana buddhehi sadisā mā homāti āvusoti paṭhamaṃ vatvā pacchā bhikkhaveti bhaṇanti.
atk-s0201a:538_11: Buddhehi ca ālapito bhikkhusaṅgho bhadanteti paṭivacanaṃ deti,
atk-s0201a:539_7: Vivekaṃ nānusikkhantīti tiṇṇaṃ vivekānaṃ aññatarampi nānusikkhanti,
atk-s0201a:539_8: āmisadāyādāva hontīti imamatthaṃ āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū pucchi.
atk-s0201a:540_0: Evaṃ vutte tamatthaṃ sotukāmā bhikkhū dūratopi khotiādimāhaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:540_1: Tattha dūratopīti tiroraṭṭhatopi tirojanapadatopi anekayojanagaṇanatopīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:540_4: Āyasmantaṃyeva sāriputtaṃ paṭibhātūti āyasmatoyeva sāriputtassa bhāgo hotu,
atk-s0201a:540_5: āyasmā pana sāriputto attano bhāgaṃ katvā vibhajatūti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:540_7: amhākaṃ pana savanaṃ bhāgoti ayamettha adhippāyo,
atk-s0201a:540_12: Tato nesaṃ kathetukāmo thero tena hītiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:541_1: āmisadāyādaṃ garahantena bhagavatā “tumhepi tena ādiyā bhaveyyāthā”ti ekenevākārena vuttamatthaṃ tīhi ākārehi dassento āyasmā sāriputto etadavoca –
atk-s0201a:541_5: satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī”ti.
atk-s0201a:542_0: Ettāvatā yañca bhagavā āmisadāyādapaṭipadaṃ garahanto “tumhepi tena ādiyā bhaveyyāthā”ti āha,
atk-s0201a:542_1: yañca attanā pucchaṃ pucchi “kittāvatā nu kho…pe…
atk-s0201a:542_4: So ca kho bhagavato ādiyabhāvaṃ anāmasitvāva.
atk-s0201a:542_5: Bhagavatoyeva hi yuttaṃ sāvake anuggaṇhantassa “ahampi tena ādiyo bhavissāmī”ti vattuṃ,
atk-s0201a:543_1: satthu pavivittassāti satthuno tīhi vivekehi accantapavivittassa.
atk-s0201a:543_4: Yadi pana tividhaṃ vivekaṃ sandhāya vadeyya,
atk-s0201a:543_9: “bāhulikā”tiādinā upadhivivekañca dassetīti evamettha saṅkhepato attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:544_1: ye parato “tatrāvuso lobho ca pāpako”tiādinā nayena vakkhati.
atk-s0201a:544_6: Okkamane pubbaṅgamāti ettha okkamanaṃ vuccanti avagamanaṭṭhena pañca nīvaraṇāni,
atk-s0201a:544_11: ettāvatā upadhivivekaṃ na paripūrentīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:545_0: Ettāvatā aniyameneva vatvā idāni desanaṃ niyamento “tatrāvuso”tiādimāha. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a:545_1: Sāvakā “tīhi ṭhānehī”ti evañhi aniyametvāva vuccamāne “kampi maññe bhaṇati,
atk-s0201a:545_3: “Therā navā majjhimā”ti evaṃ pana niyametvā vuccamāne amhe bhaṇatīti ādaraṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a:545_4: Yathā raññā “amaccehi nagaravīthiyo sodhetabbā”ti vuttepi “kena nu kho sodhetabbā”ti maññamānā na sodhenti,
atk-s0201a:545_5: attano attano gharadvāraṃ sodhetabbanti pana bheriyā nikkhantāya sabbe muhuttena sodhenti ca alaṅkaronti ca,
atk-s0201a:546_4: “Kiṃ panāyasmā devānamindo kammaṃ katvā imaṃ ṭhānaṃ patto”tiādīsu hi issariye dissati.
atk-s0201a:546_9: Kāraṇañhi yasmā tattha phalaṃ tiṭṭhati tadāyattavuttibhāvena,
atk-s0201a:547_0: Iminā paṭhamena ṭhānena therā bhikkhū gārayhāti ettha gārayhāti garahitabbā.
atk-s0201a:547_1: Therā nāma samānā araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni na upenti,
atk-s0201a:547_5: navamajjhimakāle kīdisā ahesunti evaṃ ninditabbā honti,
atk-s0201a:547_7: Dutiyena ṭhānenāti etthāpi ime nāma āvuso therāpi samānā yesaṃ dhammānaṃ satthā pahānamāha,
atk-s0201a:547_9: accharāsaṅghātamattampi ekamantaṃ nisīditvā cittekaggataṃ na labhanti,
atk-s0201a:547_10: navamajjhimakāle kīdisā ahesunti evaṃ ninditabbā honti,
atk-s0201a:547_11: imaṃ nindaṃ āvuso labhantīti dassetīti evaṃ yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0201a:547_15: navamajjhimakāle kīdisā ahesunti evaṃ ninditabbā honti,
atk-s0201a:548_1: Majjhimāti pañcavasse upādāya yāva nava vassā vuccanti.
atk-s0201a:548_3: Yathā ca tattha navamajjhimakāle kīdisā ahesunti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0201a:549_1: Imasmiñca kaṇhapakkhe vuttapaccanīkanayena sukkapakkhe attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:549_3: Ime vata therāpi samānā yojanaparamparāya araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni sevanti,
atk-s0201a:549_5: evaṃ jiṇṇasarīrāpi āraddhavīriyā paccayadāyakānaṃ pasādaṃ janenti,
atk-s0201a:549_6: navamajjhimakāle kīdisā ahesunti iminā paṭhamena ṭhānena therā pāsaṃsā bhavanti,
atk-s0201a:549_9: ayampi mahāthero saddhivihārikaantevāsikaparivārito hutvā nisīdituṃ yuttakālepi īdisepi vaye vattamāne bhattakiccaṃ katvā paviṭṭho sāyaṃ nikkhamati,
atk-s0201a:549_14: sabbathāpi cittavivekaṃ pūretīti iminā dutiyena ṭhānena therā bhikkhū pāsaṃsā bhavanti,
atk-s0201a:549_16: Yasmiṃ kāle therassa paṭṭadukūlakoseyyādīni sukhasamphassāni lahucīvarādīni yuttāni,
atk-s0201a:549_17: tasmimpi nāma kāle ayaṃ mahāthero paṃsukūlāni dhāreti,
atk-s0201a:549_18: asithilaṃ sāsanaṃ gahetvā vigatanīvaraṇo phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā upadhivivekaṃ paripūrayamāno viharati,
atk-s0201a:549_19: navamajjhimakāle kīdiso ahosīti iminā tatiyena ṭhānena therā pāsaṃsā bhavanti,
atk-s0201a:550_6: te ca dhamme na pajahantī”ti evaṃ pahātabbadhammā vuttā.
atk-s0201a:552_1: “satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī”tiādinā nayena vuttadesanāyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:552_3: doso ca pāpakoti ime dve dhammā pāpakā lāmakā,
atk-s0201a:552_7: Tesu lobho āmisadāyādassa paccayānaṃ lābhe hoti,
atk-s0201a:553_0: Idāni tesaṃ pahānūpāyaṃ dassento lobhassa ca pahānāyātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:553_2: tassa pana pāpakassa lobhassa ca dosassa ca pahānāya.
atk-s0201a:553_3: Atthi majjhimā paṭipadāti maggaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:553_5: doso eko antoti ete dve ante na upeti,
atk-s0201a:554_1: Sā hi saccānaṃ dassanāya saṃvattati dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhenāti cakkhukaraṇī.
atk-s0201a:554_7: Maggoyeva hi maggatthāya saṃvattati maggena kātabbakiccakaraṇato.
atk-s0201a:554_8: Nibbānaṃ nāma appaccayaṃ tassa pana sacchikiriyāya paccakkhakammāya saṃvattanato nibbānāya saṃvattatīti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:555_0: Idāni taṃ majjhimaṃ paṭipadaṃ sarūpato dassetukāmo “katamā ca sā”ti pucchitvā “ayamevā”tiādinā nayena vissajjeti.
atk-s0201a:556_5: Aripahānāya saṃvattatītipi ariyena desitotipi ariyabhāvappaṭilābhāya saṃvattatītipi ariyo.
atk-s0201a:556_13: tassa katamo so iti ceti attho,
atk-s0201a:557_8: Nibbacanampi nesaṃ sammā passatīti sammādiṭṭhīti eteneva nayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:558_0: Tattha sammādiṭṭhi uppajjamānā micchādiṭṭhiṃ tappaccanīyakilese ca avijjañca pajahati,
atk-s0201a:563_0: Sammāvāyāmo micchāvāyāmaṃ tappaccanīyakilese ca kosajjañca pajahati,
atk-s0201a:565_0: Sammāsamādhi micchāsamādhiṃ tappaccanīyakilese ca uddhaccañca pajahati,
atk-s0201a:566_3: yvāyaṃ cattāropi lokuttaramagge ekato katvā kathito “aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”,
atk-s0201a:567_0: Evaṃ pahātabbadhammesu lobhadose tappahānupāyañca dassetvā idāni aññepi pahātabbadhamme tesaṃ pahānupāyañca dassento tatrāvuso,
atk-s0201a:573_5: sativippavāsapaccupaṭṭhānoti evaṃ imesaṃ dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇādīni veditabbāni.
atk-s0201a:573_7: vitthāro pana “tattha katamo kodho”tiādinā vibhaṅge vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:574_0: Visesato cettha āmisadāyādo attanā alabhanto aññassa lābhino kujjhati,
atk-s0201a:574_3: So evaṃ kuddho upanayhanto ca santepi aññassa lābhino guṇe makkheti,
atk-s0201a:574_6: evaṃ makkhī paḷāsī tassa lābhasakkārādīsu kiṃ imassa imināti issati padussati,
atk-s0201a:574_11: Lābhahetu kho pana attano santepi dose paṭicchādeti,
atk-s0201a:574_15: So evaṃ paṭipanno sace yathādhippāyaṃ lābhaṃ labhati,
atk-s0201a:574_19: Sace pana naṃ koci kiñci vadati “nayidaṃ evaṃ kātabba”nti,
atk-s0201a:574_20: tena sāraddhacitto hoti bhākuṭikamukho “ko me tva”nti pasayha bhāṇī,
atk-s0201a:574_22: Tato thambhena “ahameva seyyo”ti attānaṃ maññanto mānī hoti.
atk-s0201a:574_25: So tehi mānātimānehi jātimadādianekarūpaṃ madaṃ janeti.
atk-s0201a:575_0: Evaṃ āmisadāyādo aparimutto hoti imehi pāpakehi dhammehi aññehi ca evarūpehi.
atk-s0201a:575_2: Pahānupāyo pāṭhato ca atthato ca sabbattha nibbisesoyeva.
atk-s0201a:576_0: Ñāṇaparicayapāṭavatthaṃ panettha ayaṃ bhedo ca kamo ca bhāvanānayo ca veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:576_2: ayañhi majjhimā paṭipadā kadāci ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti,
atk-s0201a:576_4: Ayañhi lokuttarapaṭhamajjhānavasena uppajjamāno aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti,
atk-s0201a:577_14: Tasmā iminā kamena etāni aṅgāni vuttānīti evamettha kamo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:578_2: Idhekacco paṭhamaṃ upacārasamādhiṃ vā appanāsamādhiṃ vā uppādeti,
atk-s0201a:578_4: so tañca taṃsampayutte ca dhamme aniccādīhi vipassati,
atk-s0201a:578_9: Tassa samathapubbaṅgamaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati,
atk-s0201a:578_10: so taṃ maggaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti,
atk-s0201a:578_11: tassa taṃ maggaṃ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saṃyojanāni pahīyanti,
atk-s0201a:579_0: Idha panekacco vuttappakāraṃ samathaṃ anuppādetvāva pañcupādānakkhandhe aniccādīhi vipassati,
atk-s0201a:579_2: Tassa vipassanāpāripūriyā tattha jātānaṃ dhammānaṃ vossaggārammaṇato uppajjati cittassa ekaggatā,
atk-s0201a:579_6: Tassa vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṃ samathaṃ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati,
atk-s0201a:580_0: Samathapubbaṅgamaṃ pana vipassanaṃ bhāvayatopi vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṃ samathaṃ bhāvayatopi lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe samathavipassanā yuganaddhāva honti.
atk-s0201a:584_5: bhagavato sāvatthiyaṃ vihāre avicchinneyevāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:585_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti yenāti bhummatthe karaṇavacanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:585_3: Yena vā kāraṇena bhagavā devamanussehi upasaṅkamitabbo,
atk-s0201a:585_4: tena kāraṇena upasaṅkamīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:586_2: Atha vā evaṃ gato tato āsannataraṃ ṭhānaṃ bhagavato samīpasaṅkhātaṃ gantvātipi vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:586_3: Bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodīti yathā khamanīyādīni pucchanto bhagavā tena,
atk-s0201a:586_4: evaṃ sopi bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosi,
atk-s0201a:586_5: sītodakaṃ viya uṇhodakena sammoditaṃ ekībhāvaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:586_10: kacci bhoto gotamassa gotamasāvakānañca appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāro”tiādikāya kathāya sammodi,
atk-s0201a:586_11: taṃ pītipāmojjasaṅkhātasammodajananato sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato ca sammodanīyaṃ,
atk-s0201a:586_12: atthabyañjanamadhuratāya sucirampi kālaṃ sāretuṃ nirantaraṃ pavattetuṃ araharūpato saritabbabhāvato ca sārāṇīyaṃ.
atk-s0201a:586_16: atthaparisuddhatāya sāraṇīyanti evaṃ anekehi pariyāyehi sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā pariyosāpetvā niṭṭhāpetvā yenatthena āgato,
atk-s0201a:587_2: Tasmā yathā nisinno ekamantaṃ nisinno hoti,
atk-s0201a:587_6: Paṇḍitā hi purisā garuṭṭhāniyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āsanakusalatāya ekamantaṃ nisīdanti,
atk-s0201a:588_0: Kathaṃ nisinno pana ekamantaṃ nisinno hotīti.
atk-s0201a:588_3: atidūraṃ accāsannaṃ uparivātaṃ unnatapadesaṃ atisammukhaṃ atipacchāti.
atk-s0201a:588_4: Atidūre nisinno hi sace kathetukāmo hoti,
atk-s0201a:588_13: Tasmā ayampi ete cha nisajjadose vajjetvā nisīdi,
atk-s0201a:589_2: Tattha “tena kho pana samayena raṭṭhapālo nāma kulaputto tasmiṃyeva thullakoṭṭhike aggakulassa putto”ti evaṃ āgatā uccākulappasutā jātikulaputtā nāma.
atk-s0201a:589_3: “Ye te kulaputtā saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā”ti evaṃ āgatā pana yattha katthaci kule pasutāpi ācārasampannā ācārakulaputtā nāma.
atk-s0201a:590_8: evaṃ sabbathāpi anagāriyasaṅkhātaṃ pabbajjaṃ bhikkhubhāvaṃ vā upagatāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:590_11: Bhavaṃ tesaṃ gotamo samādapetāti te kulaputte bhavaṃ gotamo adhisīlādīni gāhetā sikkhāpetā.
atk-s0201a:590_15: tepi tandiṭṭhikā honti taṃkhantikā taṃrucikāti attho.
atk-s0201a:591_1: Esa kira pubbe aneke kulaputte agāramajjhe vasante devaputte viya pañcahi kāmaguṇehi paricāriyamāne anto ca bahi ca susaṃvihitārakkhe disvā,
atk-s0201a:591_2: te aparena samayena bhagavato madhurarasaṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā saddhāya gharā nikkhamma pabbajitvā ghāsacchādanaparamatāya
atk-s0201a:591_3: santuṭṭhe āraññakesu senāsanesu kenaci arakkhiyamānepi anussaṅkitāparisaṅkite haṭṭhapahaṭṭhe udaggudagge addasa,
atk-s0201a:591_4: disvā ca imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ “ayaṃ phāsuvihāro kaṃ nissāya uppanno”ti cintento “samaṇaṃ gotama”nti bhagavati pasādaṃ alattha.
atk-s0201a:591_5: So taṃ pasādaṃ nivedetuṃ bhagavato santikaṃ āgato,
atk-s0201a:592_0: Athassa bhagavā taṃ vacanaṃ sampaṭicchanto abbhanumodanto ca evametaṃ brāhmaṇātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:592_1: Vacanasampaṭicchanānumodanatthoyeva hi ettha ayaṃ evanti nipāto.
atk-s0201a:592_8: na sakkā appesakkhehi ajjhogāhitunti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:592_12: tathāpi yantaṃ “pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti āraññikaṅganipphādakaṃ senāsanaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0201a:593_8: Ettha ca pariyantānanti imamekaṃ pariyāyaṃ ṭhapetvā sesapariyāyehi vanapatthāni veditabbānī.
atk-s0201a:593_14: Kāyaviveke katepi tattha cittaṃ abhiramāpetuṃ dukkaraṃ.
atk-s0201a:593_16: Haranti maññeti haranti viya ghasanti viya.
atk-s0201a:593_18: Samādhiṃ alabhamānassāti upacārasamādhiṃ vā appanāsamādhiṃ vā alabhantassa.
atk-s0201a:593_20: Īdisassa bhikkhuno tiṇapaṇṇamigādisaddehi vividhehi ca bhiṃsanakehi vanāni cittaṃ vikkhipanti maññeti,
atk-s0201a:593_21: sabbaṃ brāhmaṇo saddhāpabbajitānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ araññavāse vimhito āha.
atk-s0201a:595_1: Athassa bhagavā purimanayeneva “evametaṃ brāhmaṇā”tiādīhi taṃ taṃ vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā abbhanumoditvā
atk-s0201a:595_2: ca yasmā soḷasasu ṭhānesu ārammaṇapariggaharahitānaṃyeva tādisāni senāsanāni durabhisambhavāni,
atk-s0201a:595_4: attanā ca bodhisatto samāno tādiso ahosi,
atk-s0201a:595_5: tasmā attano tādisānaṃ senāsanānaṃ durabhisambhavataṃ dassetuṃ,
atk-s0201a:596_3: Bodhisattasseva satoti bujjhanakasattasseva sammāsambodhiṃ adhigantuṃ arahasattasseva sato,
atk-s0201a:596_5: Dīpaṅkarassa hi bhagavato pādamūle aṭṭhadhammasamodhānena abhinīhārasamiddhito pabhuti tathāgato bodhiyā
atk-s0201a:596_6: satto laggo “pattabbā mayā esā”ti tadadhigamāya parakkamaṃ amuñcantoyeva āgato,
atk-s0201a:596_8: Tassa mayhanti tassa evaṃ bodhisattasseva sato mayhaṃ.
atk-s0201a:596_9: Ye kho keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vāti ye keci pabbajjūpagatā vā bhovādino vā.
atk-s0201a:597_1: Aparisuddhakāyakammantasandosahetūti aparisuddhassa kāyakammantasaṅkhātassa attano dosassa hetu,
atk-s0201a:597_13: idāni anubandhitvā anayabyasanaṃ āpādeyyu”nti araññaṃ pavisitvā gacchantare vā gumbantare vā nisīdanti.
atk-s0201a:597_14: Te “appamattakampi tiṇasaddaṃ vā paṇṇasaddaṃ vā sutvā,
atk-s0201a:597_16: āgantvā parehi parivāritā viya baddhā vadhitā viya ca honti.
atk-s0201a:597_17: Evaṃ taṃ bhayabheravaṃ attani samāropanaṭṭhena avhāyanti pakkosanti.
atk-s0201a:598_1: paṭisevāmīti ahaṃ kho pana aparisuddhakāyakammanto hutvā araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni na paṭisevāmi.
atk-s0201a:598_2: Ye hi voti ettha voti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0201a:598_3: Ariyā vuccanti buddhā ca buddhasāvakā ca.
atk-s0201a:598_5: Tesamahaṃ aññataroti tesaṃ ahampi eko aññataro.
atk-s0201a:598_6: Bodhisatto hi gahaṭṭhopi pabbajitopi parisuddhakāyakammantova hoti.
atk-s0201a:598_11: atirekaṃ sotthibhāvaṃ atirekena vā sotthibhāvamāpajjinti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:601_3: vacīkammantavāre tāva aparisuddhavacīkammantāti aparisuddhena musāvādādinā vacīkammantena samannāgatā.
atk-s0201a:601_6: pisuṇavācāya mittabhedaṃ katvā pharusavācāya paresaṃ parisamajjhe mammāni tuditvā niratthakavācāya parasattānaṃ
atk-s0201a:601_10: idāni anubandhitvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpeyyu”nti araññaṃ pavisitvā gacchantare vā gumbantare vā nisīdanti.
atk-s0201a:601_11: Te “appamattakampi tiṇasaddaṃ vā paṇṇasaddaṃ vā sutvā idānimhā naṭṭhā”ti tasanti vittasanti āgantvā parehi
atk-s0201a:601_12: parivāritā viya baddhā vadhitā viya ca honti.
atk-s0201a:601_13: Evaṃ taṃ bhayabheravaṃ attani samāropanaṭṭhena avhāyanti,
atk-s0201a:602_0: Manokammantavāre aparisuddhamanokammantāti aparisuddhena abhijjhādinā manokammantena samannāgatā.
atk-s0201a:602_2: Te paresaṃ rakkhitagopitesu bhaṇḍesu abhijjhāvisamalobhaṃ uppādetvā parassa kujjhitvā parasatte micchādassanaṃ gāhāpetvā mayaṃ ayuttamakamhā…pe…
atk-s0201a:603_0: Ājīvavāre aparisuddhājīvāti aparisuddhena vejjakammadūtakammavaḍḍhipayogādinā ekavīsatianesanabhedena ājīvena samannāgatā.
atk-s0201a:603_3: “sāsanasodhakā kira tepiṭakā bhikkhū sāsanaṃ sodhetuṃ nikkhantā,
atk-s0201a:603_4: ajja vā sve vā idhāgamissantī”ti araññaṃ pavisitvā gacchantare vā…pe…
atk-s0201a:603_6: Te hi āgantvā parivāretvā gahitā viya odātavatthanivāsitā viya ca hontīti.
atk-s0201a:604_1: Ito paraṃ abhijjhālūtiādīsu kiñcāpi abhijjhābyāpādā manokammantena saṅgahitā tathāpi nīvaraṇavasena puna vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:604_6: tesaṃ avavatthitārammaṇānaṃ araññe viharantānaṃ divā diṭṭhaṃ rattiṃ bhayabheravaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti –
atk-s0201a:604_8: rajjuṃ vā lataṃ vā disvā sappasaññino honti,
atk-s0201a:604_10: thalaṃ vā pabbataṃ vā disvā hatthisaññino sappādīhi anayabyasanaṃ āpāditā viya hontī”ti.
atk-s0201a:605_5: abhadrakena paresaṃ anatthajanakena cittasaṅkappena samannāgatāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:605_7: Bhayabheravāvhāyanaṃ ito pabhuti abhijjhāluvāre vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:605_10: Na kho panāhaṃ byāpannacittoti ettha pana mettacitto ahaṃ hitacittoti dasseti,
atk-s0201a:605_12: Evaṃ sabbattha vuttadosapaṭipakkhavasena bodhisattassa guṇā vaṇṇetabbā.
atk-s0201a:606_1: Thinamiddhapariyuṭṭhitāti cittagelaññabhūtena thinena sesanāmakāyagelaññabhūtena middhena ca pariyuṭṭhitā,
atk-s0201a:607_2: uddhaccena hi ekārammaṇe cittaṃ vipphandati dhajayaṭṭhiyaṃ vātena paṭākā viya.
atk-s0201a:608_1: Kaṅkhī vicikicchīti ettha ekamevidaṃ pañcamaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:608_2: Kiṃ nu kho idanti ārammaṇaṃ kaṅkhanato kaṅkhā,
atk-s0201a:609_1: Attukkaṃsanakā paravambhīti ye attānaṃ ukkaṃsenti ukkhipanti,
atk-s0201a:609_7: Te parehi “asuko ca kira asuko ca attānaṃ ukkaṃsenti,
atk-s0201a:609_10: gaṇhatha ne”ti anubaddhā palāyitvā araññaṃ pavisitvā gacchantare vā gumbantare vāti kāyakammantasadisaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:610_3: gāmadārakā viya bhayabahulā asūrā kātarāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:611_4: paccayā eva hi paṇītapaṇītā sundarasundarā ca abhisaṅkharitvā katā sakkārāti vuccanti.
atk-s0201a:611_5: Yā ca parehi attano gāravakiriyā pupphādīhi vā pūjā.
atk-s0201a:612_0: Eko kira piyagāmiko nāma bhikkhu samādinnadhutaṅgānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ lābhaṃ disvā “ahampi dhutaṅgaṃ samādiyitvā
atk-s0201a:612_1: lābhaṃ uppādemī”ti cintetvā sosānikaṅgaṃ samādāya susāne vasati.
atk-s0201a:612_2: Athekadivasaṃ eko kammamutto jaraggavo divā gocare caritvā rattiṃ tasmiṃ susāne pupphagumbe sīsaṃ katvā romanthayamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:612_3: Piyagāmiko rattiṃ caṅkamanā nikkhanto tassa hanusaddaṃ sutvā cintesi “addhā maṃ lābhagiddho esa susāne vasatīti ñatvā devarājā viheṭhetuṃ āgato”ti,
atk-s0201a:612_4: so jaraggavassa purato añjaliṃ paggahetvā “sappurisa devarāja ajja me ekarattiṃ khama,
atk-s0201a:612_5: sve paṭṭhāya na evaṃ karissāmī”ti namassamāno sabbarattiṃ yācanto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:612_6: Tato sūriye uṭṭhite taṃ disvā kattarayaṭṭhiyā paharitvā palāpesi “sabbarattiṃ maṃ bhiṃsāpesī”ti.
atk-s0201a:614_5: Duvidhā hi sati paññāsampayuttā paññāvippayuttā ca.
atk-s0201a:614_10: dubbalāya satiyā satikiccābhāvatoti etamatthaṃ dīpetuṃ “asampajānā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:614_11: Te evaṃ muṭṭhassatī asampajānā ārammaṇavavatthānamattampi kātuṃ na sakkontīti sabbaṃ pubbasadisameva.
atk-s0201a:615_3: Samādhivirahena laddhokāsena uddhaccena tesaṃ samādhivirahānaṃ cittaṃ nānārammaṇesu paribbhamati,
atk-s0201a:615_4: vanamakkaṭo viya vanasākhāsu uddhaccena ekārammaṇe vipphandati.
atk-s0201a:615_5: Pubbe vuttanayenena te evaṃ asamāhitā vibbhantacittā ārammaṇavavatthānamattampi kātuṃ na sakkontīti sabbaṃ pubbasadisameva.
atk-s0201a:616_16: Te duppaññā eḷamūgā ārammaṇavavatthānamattampi kātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0201a:616_17: Tesaṃ avavatthitārammaṇānaṃ araññe viharantānaṃ divā diṭṭhaṃ rattiṃ bhayabheravaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti “te ākulacittā appamattakenapi tasanti vittasanti,
atk-s0201a:616_18: rajjuṃ vā lataṃ vā disvā sappasaññino honti,
atk-s0201a:616_20: thalaṃ vā pabbataṃ vā disvā hatthisaññino sappādīhi anayavyasanaṃ āpāditā viya hontī”ti.
atk-s0201a:616_21: Evaṃ taṃ bhayabheravaṃ attani samāropanaṭṭhena avhāyanti pakkosanti.
atk-s0201a:616_22: Paññāsampannohamasmīti ettha paññāsampannoti paññāya sampanno samannāgato,
atk-s0201a:616_25: apica kho pana imesu soḷasasu ṭhānesu ārammaṇavavatthānapaññāyāti attho.
atk-s0201a:620_2: Bodhisatto kira imāni soḷasārammaṇāni pariggaṇhanto ca bhayabheravaṃ adisvā bhayabheravaṃ nāma evarūpāsu rattīsu evarūpe senāsane ca paññāyati,
atk-s0201a:620_4: etamatthaṃ bhagavā idāni brāhmaṇassa dassento tassa mayhantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:621_0: Tattha yā tāti ubhayametaṃ rattīnaṃyeva uddesaniddesavacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:621_2: Tasmā abhiññātāti candapāripūriyā candaparikkhayenāti evamādīhi lakkhaṇehi ñātāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:622_0: Cātuddasīti pakkhassa paṭhamadivasato pabhuti catuddasannaṃ pūraṇī ekā ratti.
atk-s0201a:622_3: Etā tisso tisso katvā cha rattiyo,
atk-s0201a:622_4: tasmā sabbattha pakkhavacanaṃ yojetabbaṃ “pakkhassa cātuddasī pakkhassa pañcadasī pakkhassa aṭṭhamī”ti.
atk-s0201a:622_7: Buddhe kira bhagavati anuppannepi uppajjitvā aparinibbutepi pañcamī anabhilakkhitāyeva,
atk-s0201a:622_8: parinibbute pana dhammasaṅgāhakattherā cintesuṃ “dhammassavanaṃ cirena hotī”ti.
atk-s0201a:623_6: Lokiyā hi dibbādhivatthāti vā maññamānā tesuyeva vā dibbasaññino hutvā ārāmavanarukkhe cittīkaronti, pūjenti,
atk-s0201a:623_12: Appeva nāma passeyyanti api nāma taṃ bhayabheravaṃ passeyyameva.
atk-s0201a:623_14: “etadahosi yaṃnūnāha”nti evaṃ cintitakālato paṭṭhāya aññena kālena.
atk-s0201a:624_0: Tattha ca me brāhmaṇa viharatoti tathārūpesu senāsanesu yaṃ yaṃ manussānaṃ āyācanaupahārakaraṇārahaṃ
atk-s0201a:624_3: yaṃ divāpi passantānaṃ hadayaṃ maññe phalati,
atk-s0201a:624_4: taṃ ṭhānaṃ sandhāyāha “tattha ca me, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0201a:624_6: Mago vā āgacchatīti siṅgāni vā khurāni vā koṭṭento gokaṇṇakhaggadīpivarāhādibhedo mago vā āgacchati,
atk-s0201a:626_0: Magarāja namo tyatthu, api kiñci labhāmase”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:627_0: Moro vā kaṭṭhaṃ pātetīti moro vā sukkhakaṭṭhaṃ rukkhato cāletvā pāteti.
atk-s0201a:627_2: tena yo koci pakkhīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:627_3: Atha vā moro vāti vā saddena añño vā koci pakkhīti.
atk-s0201a:627_5: Vāto vā paṇṇakasaṭaṃ eretīti vāto vā paṇṇakacavaraṃ ghaṭṭeti.
atk-s0201a:627_6: Etaṃ nūna taṃ bhayabheravaṃ āgacchatīti yametaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0201a:627_8: Ito pabhuti ca ārammaṇameva bhayabheravanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:627_9: Parittassa ca adhimattassa ca bhayassa ārammaṇattā sukhārammaṇaṃ rūpaṃ sukhamiva.
atk-s0201a:627_10: Kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ aññadatthu bhayapaṭikaṅkhī viharāmīti ahaṃ kho kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ekaṃseneva bhayaṃ ākaṅkhamāno icchamāno hutvā viharāmi.
atk-s0201a:628_0: Yathābhūtaṃ yathābhūtassāti yena yena iriyāpathena bhūtassa bhavitassa sato vattamānassa samaṅgībhūtassa vā.
atk-s0201a:628_2: Tathābhūtaṃ tathābhūto vāti tena teneva iriyāpathena bhūto bhavito santo vattamāno samaṅgībhūto vāti attho.
atk-s0201a:628_4: paṭivinemīti bodhisattassa kira caṅkamantassa tasmiṃ magasiṅgakhurasaddādibhede bhayabheravārammaṇe āgate neva mahāsatto tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a:628_6: atha kho caṅkamantova parivīmaṃsanto parivicinanto bhayabheravaṃ na passati,
atk-s0201a:628_9: na bhayabheravanti tato tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā sayati vā.
atk-s0201a:628_12: Ito parañca iriyāpathapaṭipāṭiyā avatvā āsannapaṭipāṭiyā iriyāpathā vuttāti veditabbā,
atk-s0201a:628_13: caṅkamantassa hi bhayabherave āgate na ṭhito na nisinno na nipanno ṭhitassāpi āgate na caṅkamīti evaṃ tassa āsannapaṭipāṭiyā vuttāti.
atk-s0201a:631_1: Evaṃ bhiṃsanakesupi ṭhānesu attano bhayabheravābhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni jhāyīnaṃ sammohaṭṭhānesu attano asammohavihāraṃ dassetuṃ santi kho pana,
atk-s0201a:632_7: Idhekacco odātakasiṇalābhī divā parikammaṃ katvā divā samāpanno divāyeva vuṭṭhahāmīti manasikāraṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0201a:632_8: no ca kho addhānaparicchede kusalo hoti.
atk-s0201a:632_10: Odātakasiṇapharaṇavasena cassa visadaṃ hoti vibhūtaṃ suvibhūtaṃ. So,
atk-s0201a:632_11: divā vuṭṭhahāmīti uppāditamanasikāratāya odātakasiṇapharaṇavisadavibhūtatāya ca rattiṃyeva samānaṃ divāti sañjānāti.
atk-s0201a:632_12: Idha panekacco nīlakasiṇalābhī rattiṃ parikammaṃ katvā rattiṃ samāpanno rattiṃyeva vuṭṭhahāmīti manasikāraṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0201a:632_13: no ca kho addhānaparicchede kusalo hoti.
atk-s0201a:632_16: So rattiṃ vuṭṭhahāmīti uppāditamanasikāratāya nīlakasiṇapharaṇāvisadāvibhūtatāya ca divāyeva samānaṃ rattīti sañjānāti.
atk-s0201a:633_0: Sakuṇarutato pana idhekacco antosenāsane nisinno hoti.
atk-s0201a:633_1: Atha divā ravanakasakuṇā kākādayo candālokena divāti maññamānā rattiṃ ravanti,
atk-s0201a:633_3: So tesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā rattiṃyeva samānaṃ divāti sañjānāti.
atk-s0201a:633_4: Idha panekacco pabbatantare gambhīrāya ghanavanappaṭicchannāya giriguhāya sattāhavaddalikāya vattamānāya antarahitasūriyāloke kāle nisinno hoti.
atk-s0201a:633_5: Atha rattiṃ ravanakasakuṇā ulūkādayo majjhanhikasamayepi tattha tattha samandhakāre nilīnā rattisaññāya vā aññehi vā kāraṇehi ravanti.
atk-s0201a:633_6: So tesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā divāyeva samānaṃ rattīti sañjānāti.
atk-s0201a:634_1: sañjānāmīti pākaṭo bodhisattassa rattindivaparicchedo sattāhavaddalepi candimasūriyesu adissamānesupi jānātiyeva “ettakaṃ purebhattakālo gato,
atk-s0201a:634_7: Anacchariyañcetaṃ yaṃ pūritapāramī bodhisatto evaṃ jānāti.
atk-s0201a:634_8: Padesañāṇe ṭhitānaṃ sāvakānampi hi rattindivaparicchedo pākaṭo hoti.
atk-s0201a:635_0: Kalyāṇiyamahāvihāre kira godattatthero dvaṅgulakāle bhattaṃ gahetvā aṅgulakāle bhuñjati.
atk-s0201a:635_1: Sūriye adissamānepi pātoyeva senāsanaṃ pavisitvā tāya velāya nikkhamati.
atk-s0201a:635_2: Ekadivasaṃ ārāmikā “sve therassa nikkhamanakāle passāmā”ti bhattaṃ sampādetvā kālatthambhamūle nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:635_4: Tato pabhuti kira sūriye adissamānepi therassa nikkhamanasaññāya eva bheriṃ ākoṭenti.
atk-s0201a:636_4: Atha nikkhante paṭhame yāme there muggaraṃ gahetvā ṭhitamatteyeva ekaṃ dve vāre paharanteyeva vā yāmayantaṃ patati,
atk-s0201a:636_5: evaṃ tīsu yāmesu samaṇadhammaṃ katvā thero pātoyeva gāmaṃ pavisitvā piṇḍapātaṃ ādāya vihāraṃ āgantvā
atk-s0201a:636_6: bhojanavelāya pattaṃ gahetvā divā vihāraṭṭhānaṃ gantvā samaṇadhammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0201a:636_7: Bhikkhū kālatthambhaṃ disvā therassa adisvā āgamanatthāya pesenti.
atk-s0201a:636_8: So bhikkhu theraṃ divā vihāraṭṭhānā nikkhamantameva vā antarāmagge vā passati.
atk-s0201a:636_9: Evaṃ padesañāṇe ṭhitānaṃ sāvakānampi rattindivaparicchedo pākaṭo hoti,
atk-s0201a:637_1: vadeyyāti ettha pana “yaṃ kho taṃ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0201a:637_3: sukhāya devamanussāna”nti vacanaṃ vadamāno koci sammā vadeyya,
atk-s0201a:637_6: Mameva taṃ vacanaṃ vadamāno sammā vadeyya,
atk-s0201a:637_8: na vitathavādī assāti evaṃ padasambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:638_7: mettākaruṇāsampattiyā mātāpitaro viya lokassa rakkhitā gopayitāti.
atk-s0201a:638_8: Atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānanti idha devamanussaggahaṇena ca bhabbapuggalaveneyyasatteyeva gahetvā
atk-s0201a:638_9: tesaṃ nibbānamaggaphalādhigamāya attano uppattiṃ dassetīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:638_10: Atthāyāti hi vutte paramatthatthāya nibbānāyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:638_11: Hitāyāti vutte taṃ sampāpakamaggatthāyāti vuttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:638_12: nibbānasampāpakamaggato hi uttari hitaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:638_15: Vuttañcetaṃ “ayaṃ samādhi paccuppannasukho ceva āyatiñca sukhavipāko”ti.
atk-s0201a:641_1: Evaṃ bhagavā buddhaguṇapaṭilābhāvasānaṃ attano asammohavihāraṃ brāhmaṇassa dassetvā idāni yāya paṭipadāya taṃ koṭippattaṃ asammohavihāraṃ adhigato,
atk-s0201a:641_2: taṃ pubbabhāgato pabhuti dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ kho pana me brāhmaṇātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:642_0: Keci panāhu “imaṃ asammohavihāraṃ sutvā brāhmaṇassa cittamevaṃ uppannaṃ ‘kāya nu kho paṭipadāya imaṃ patto’ti,
atk-s0201a:642_1: tassa cittamaññāya imāyāhaṃ paṭipadāya imaṃ uttamaṃ asammohavihāraṃ pattoti dassento evamāhā”ti.
atk-s0201a:643_0: Tattha āraddhaṃ kho pana me, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0201a:643_2: na mayā ayaṃ uttamo asammohavihāro kusītena muṭṭhassatinā sāraddhakāyena vikkhittacittena vā adhigato,
atk-s0201a:643_3: apica kho tadadhigamāya āraddhaṃ kho pana me vīriyaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0201a:643_4: bodhimaṇḍe nisinnena mayā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ āraddhaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0201a:644_0: Upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhāti na kevalañca vīriyameva,
atk-s0201a:644_3: Passaddho kāyoti kāyacittappassaddhisambhavena kāyopi me passaddho ahosi.
atk-s0201a:644_4: Tattha yasmā nāmakāye passaddhe rūpakāyopi passaddhoyeva hoti,
atk-s0201a:644_5: tasmā nāmakāyo rūpakāyoti avisesetvāva passaddho kāyoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:644_6: Asāraddhoti so ca kho passaddhattāyeva asāraddho,
atk-s0201a:644_8: Samāhitaṃ cittaṃ ekagganti cittampi me sammā āhitaṃ suṭṭhu ṭhapitaṃ appitaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0201a:644_9: Samāhitattā eva ca ekaggaṃ acalaṃ nipphandananti,
atk-s0201a:645_0: Idāni imāya paṭipadāya adhigataṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ ādiṃ katvā vijjāttayapariyosānaṃ visesaṃ dassento so kho ahantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:645_2: catutthajjhānaṃ upasampajja vihāsinti ettha tāva yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0201a:645_7: Kiṃ katvā pana bhagavā imāni jhānāni upasampajja vihāsīti,
atk-s0201a:646_0: Imāni ca pana cattāri jhānāni kesañci cittekaggatatthāni honti,
atk-s0201a:646_6: Te hi samāpajjitvā ekaggacittā sukhaṃ divasaṃ viharissāmāti iccevaṃ kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattenti.
atk-s0201a:646_7: Sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ samāpattito vuṭṭhāya samāhitena cittena vipassissāmāti nibbattentānaṃ vipassanāpādakāni honti.
atk-s0201a:646_8: Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya “ekopi hutvā
atk-s0201a:646_9: bahudhā hotī”ti vuttanayā abhiññāyo patthentā nibbattenti,
atk-s0201a:646_11: Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā sattāhaṃ acittā hutvā diṭṭheva dhamme
atk-s0201a:646_12: nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ patvā sukhaṃ viharissāmāti nibbattenti,
atk-s0201a:646_14: Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhānā brahmaloke uppajjissāmāti nibbattenti,
atk-s0201a:647_1: taṃ tassa vipassanāpādakañceva ahosi abhiññāpādakañca sabbakiccasādhakañca,
atk-s0201a:650_2: tesaṃ ekadesaṃ dassento so evaṃ samāhite cittetiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:650_3: Tattha dvinnaṃ vijjānaṃ anupadavaṇṇanā ceva bhāvanānayo ca visuddhimagge vitthārito.
atk-s0201a:650_7: Ayaṃ kho me brāhmaṇāti ayañca appanāvāro tattha anāgatoti ayameva viseso.
atk-s0201a:650_10: Abhininnāmesinti ca vacanato soti ettha so ahanti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:651_0: Yasmā cidaṃ bhagavato vasena pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ āgataṃ,
atk-s0201a:651_1: tasmā “so tato cuto idhūpapanno”ti ettha evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:651_2: Ettha hi so tato cutoti paṭinivattantassa paccavekkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:651_5: Tatrāpāsiṃ evaṃnāmoti tatrāpi tusitabhavane setaketu nāma devaputto ahosiṃ.
atk-s0201a:651_12: So tato cutoti so ahaṃ tato tusitabhavanato cuto.
atk-s0201a:651_13: Idhūpapannoti idha mahāmāyāya deviyā kucchimhi nibbatto.
atk-s0201a:652_0: Ayaṃ kho me brāhmaṇātiādīsu meti mayā.
atk-s0201a:652_4: Avijjāti tasseva pubbenivāsassa aviditakaraṇaṭṭhena tappaṭicchādako moho vuccati.
atk-s0201a:652_7: Ettha ca vijjā adhigatāti ayaṃ attho,
atk-s0201a:652_9: Yojanā panettha ayaṃ kho me vijjā adhigatā,
atk-s0201a:653_4: Kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya pahitattassa,
atk-s0201a:653_6: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “yathā appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avijjā vihaññeyya,
atk-s0201a:653_14: Etassa me padhānānuyogassa anurūpameva phalaṃ laddha”nti.
atk-s0201a:656_1: Cutūpapātakathāyaṃ yasmā idha bhagavato vasena pāḷi āgatā,
atk-s0201a:657_3: Yasmā ca pūritapāramīnaṃ mahāsattānaṃ parikammakiccaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:657_4: Te hi citte abhininnāmitamatteyeva anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussaranti,
atk-s0201a:657_6: Tasmā yo tattha parikammaṃ ādiṃ katvā bhāvanānayo vutto,
atk-s0201a:660_1: Tatiyavijjāya so evaṃ samāhite citteti vipassanāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:660_3: Arahattamaggo hi āsavavināsanato āsavānaṃ khayoti vuccati,
atk-s0201a:660_8: na ito bhiyyo”ti sabbampi dukkhasaccaṃ sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ jāniṃ paṭivijjhiṃ.
atk-s0201a:660_9: Tassa ca dukkhassa nibbattikaṃ taṇhaṃ ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti.
atk-s0201a:660_11: taṃ tesaṃ appavattiṃ nibbānaṃ ayaṃ dukkhanirodhoti.
atk-s0201a:660_12: Tassa sampāpakaṃ ariyamaggaṃ ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0201a:661_0: Evaṃ sarūpato saccāni dassetvā idāni kilesavasena pariyāyato dassento ime āsavātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:661_1: Tassa me evaṃ jānato evaṃ passatoti tassa mayhaṃ evaṃ jānantassa evaṃ passantassa.
atk-s0201a:661_7: Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇanti iminā paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a:661_9: tena hi ñāṇena bhagavā paccavekkhanto “khīṇā jātī”tiādīni abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0201a:661_18: Yā pana maggassa abhāvitattā uppajjeyya ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu ekacatupañcakkhandhabhedā jāti,
atk-s0201a:661_19: sā maggassa bhāvitattā anuppādadhammataṃ āpajjanena khīṇā,
atk-s0201a:661_20: taṃ so maggabhāvanāya pahīnakilese paccavekkhitvā “kilesābhāve vijjamānampi kammaṃ āyatiṃ appaṭisandhikaṃ hotī”ti jānanto abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0201a:662_3: puthujjanakalyāṇakena hi saddhiṃ sattasekkhā brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasanti nāma,
atk-s0201a:662_5: Tasmā bhagavā attano brahmacariyavāsaṃ paccavekkhanto “vusitaṃ brahmacariya”nti abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0201a:662_6: Kataṃ karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanāvasena soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitanti attho.
atk-s0201a:662_9: Tasmā bhagavā attano karaṇīyaṃ paccavekkhanto “kataṃ karaṇīya”nti abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0201a:663_0: Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti idāni puna itthabhāvāya evaṃsoḷasakiccabhāvāya,
atk-s0201a:663_1: kilesakkhayāya vā maggabhāvanākiccaṃ me natthīti abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0201a:663_2: Atha vā itthattāyāti itthabhāvato imasmā evaṃpakārā idāni vattamānakkhandhasantānā aparaṃ khandhasantānaṃ mayhaṃ natthi.
atk-s0201a:663_3: Ime pana pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakā rukkhā viya.
atk-s0201a:663_4: Te carimakaviññāṇanirodhena anupādāno viya jātavedo nibbāyissantīti abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0201a:664_0: Idāni evaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇapariggahitaṃ āsavānaṃ khayañāṇādhigamaṃ brāhmaṇassa dassento,
atk-s0201a:664_7: āsavakkhayena sakalalokiyalokuttaraguṇanti evaṃ tīhi vijjāhi sabbepi sabbaññuguṇe saṅgahetvā pakāsento attano asammohavihāraṃ brāhmaṇassa dassesi.
atk-s0201a:667_4: atthi nu khvassa aññampi kiñci karaṇīya”nti.
atk-s0201a:667_5: Athassa bhagavā ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā iminā ajjhāsayānusandhinā,
atk-s0201a:667_7: Tattha siyā kho pana te, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0201a:667_10: Na kho panetaṃ brāhmaṇa evaṃ daṭṭhabbanti etaṃ kho pana, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0201a:667_11: tayā mayhaṃ pantasenāsanapaṭisevanaṃ avītarāgāditāyāti evaṃ na daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:667_12: Evaṃ pantasenāsanapaṭisevane akāraṇaṃ paṭikkhipitvā kāraṇaṃ dassento dve kho ahantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:667_16: dve atthe dve kāraṇāni sampassamānoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:667_17: Attano ca diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāranti ettha diṭṭhadhammo nāma ayaṃ paccakkho attabhāvo.
atk-s0201a:667_19: ekakassa hi araññe antamaso uccārapassāvakiccaṃ upādāya sabbeva iriyāpathā phāsukā honti,
atk-s0201a:667_21: Pacchimañca janataṃ anukampamānoti kathaṃ araññavāsena pacchimā janatā anukampitā hoti?
atk-s0201a:667_22: Saddhāpabbajitā hi kulaputtā bhagavato araññavāsaṃ disvā bhagavāpi nāma araññasenāsanāni na muñcati,
atk-s0201a:667_23: yassa nevatthi pariññātabbaṃ na pahātabbaṃ na bhāvetabbaṃ na sacchikātabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:667_24: kimaṅgaṃ pana mayanti cintetvā tattha vasitabbameva maññissanti.
atk-s0201a:670_4: Yathā taṃ arahatā sammāsambuddhenāti yathā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho anukampeyya,
atk-s0201a:671_0: Evañca pana vatvā puna taṃ bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ abbhanumodamāno bhagavantaṃ etadavoca abhikkantaṃ,
atk-s0201a:671_8: “Ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”tiādīsu sundare.
atk-s0201a:672_0: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
atk-s0201a:676_0: Hāse soke pasāde ca, kare āmeḍitaṃ budho”ti. –
atk-s0201a:677_0: Iminā ca lakkhaṇena idha pasādavasena pasaṃsāvasena cāyaṃ dvikkhattuṃ vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:678_6: abhikkantaṃ yadidaṃ bhoto gotamassa dhammadesanaṃ āgamma mama pasādoti.
atk-s0201a:678_7: Bhagavatoyeva vā vacanaṃ dve dve atthe sandhāya thometi –
atk-s0201a:679_0: Tato parampi catūhi upamāhi desanaṃyeva thometi.
atk-s0201a:679_7: Maggaṃ ācikkheyyāti hatthe gahetvā “esa maggo”ti vadeyya.
atk-s0201a:680_2: evaṃ saddhammavimukhaṃ asaddhamme patitaṃ maṃ asaddhammā vuṭṭhāpentena,
atk-s0201a:680_4: Evaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānato pabhuti micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchannaṃ sāsanaṃ vivarantena,
atk-s0201a:680_8: evaṃ mohandhakāre nimuggassa me buddhādiratanarūpāni apassato tappaṭicchādakamohandhakāraviddhaṃsakadesanāpajjotadhāraṇena
atk-s0201a:680_9: mayhaṃ bhotā gotamena etehi pariyāyehi pakāsitattā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsitoti.
atk-s0201a:683_0: Evaṃ desanaṃ thometvā imāya desanāya ratanattayapasannacitto pasannākāraṃ karonto esāhantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:683_2: Bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmīti bhavaṃ me gotamo saraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a:683_4: hitassa ca vidhātāti iminā adhippāyena bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ gacchāmi, bhajāmi, sevāmi,
atk-s0201a:683_12: Dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañcāti ettha pana adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodhe yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne ca apāyesu apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo,
atk-s0201a:683_17: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti vitthāro.
atk-s0201a:686_3: Appaṭikūlaṃ madhuramimaṃ paguṇaṃ suvibhattanti piṭakattayena vibhattā sabbadhammakkhandhāti.
atk-s0201a:688_0: Aṭṭha ca puggala dhammadasā te, saṅghamimaṃ saraṇatthamupehī”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:689_0: Bhikkhūnaṃ saṅgho bhikkhusaṅgho. Ettāvatā brāhmaṇo tīṇi saraṇagamanāni paṭivedesi.
atk-s0201a:692_9: saraṇagatānaṃ teneva saraṇagamanena bhayaṃ santāsaṃ dukkhaṃ duggatiparikilesaṃ hanati vināsetīti attho,
atk-s0201a:693_0: Atha vā hite pavattanena ahitā ca nivattanena sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsati buddho.
atk-s0201a:693_6: vuttappakārena cittuppādena etāni me tīṇi saraṇāni saraṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a:693_8: Evaṃ tāva saraṇaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ yo ca saraṇaṃ gacchatīti idaṃ tayaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:694_0: Saraṇagamanappabhede pana duvidhaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ lokuttaraṃ lokiyañca.
atk-s0201a:694_1: Tattha lokuttaraṃ diṭṭhasaccānaṃ maggakkhaṇe saraṇagamanupakkilesasamucchedena ārammaṇato nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvā kiccato sakalepi ratanattaye ijjhati.
atk-s0201a:694_2: Lokiyaṃ puthujjanānaṃ saraṇagamanupakkilesavikkhambhanena ārammaṇato buddhādiguṇārammaṇaṃ hutvā ijjhati,
atk-s0201a:694_4: saddhāmūlikā ca sammādiṭṭhi dasasu puññakiriyavatthūsu diṭṭhijukammanti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:695_0: Tayidaṃ catudhā pavattati attasanniyyātanena tapparāyaṇatāya sissabhāvūpagamanena paṇipātenāti.
atk-s0201a:695_1: Tattha attasanniyyātanaṃ nāma “ajja ādiṃ katvā ahaṃ attānaṃ buddhassa niyyātemi,
atk-s0201a:695_4: Tapparāyaṇatā nāma “ajja ādiṃ katvā ahaṃ buddhaparāyaṇo,
atk-s0201a:695_6: saṅghaparāyaṇo iti maṃ dhārethā”ti evaṃ tapparāyaṇabhāvo.
atk-s0201a:695_7: Sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ nāma “ajja ādiṃ katvā ahaṃ buddhassa antevāsiko,
atk-s0201a:695_10: Paṇipāto nāma “ajja ādiṃ katvā ahaṃ abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānaañjalikammasāmīcikammaṃ buddhādīnaṃyeva tiṇṇaṃ vatthūnaṃ karomi,
atk-s0201a:695_11: iti maṃ dhārethā”ti evaṃ buddhādīsu paramanipaccakāro.
atk-s0201a:695_12: Imesañhi catunnaṃ ākārānaṃ aññatarampi karontena gahitaṃyeva hoti saraṇagamanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:696_7: buddho me saraṇaṃ leṇaṃ tāṇanti evampi attasanniyyātanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:696_10: sammāsambuddhañca vatāhaṃ passeyyaṃ bhagavantameva passeyya”nti evampi mahākassapassa saraṇagamanaṃ viya sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:697_0: “So ahaṃ vicarissāmi, gāmā gāmaṃ purā puraṃ;
atk-s0201a:699_0: Evampi āḷavakādīnaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ viya tapparāyaṇatā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:699_1: “Atha kho brahmāyu brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavato pādāni mukhena ca paricumbati,
atk-s0201a:700_5: tasmā yo sākiyo vā koliyo vā “buddho amhākaṃ ñātako”ti vandati,
atk-s0201a:700_10: Yo vā bodhisattakāle bhagavato santike kiñci uggahitaṃ saramāno buddhakāle vā –
atk-s0201a:704_0: Evaṃ gahitasaraṇassa ca upāsakassa vā upāsikāya vā aññatitthiyesu pabbajitampi ñātiṃ “ñātako me aya”nti vandato saraṇagamanaṃ na bhijjati,
atk-s0201a:704_3: so hi raṭṭhapūjitattā avandiyamāno anatthampi kareyyāti.
atk-s0201a:704_4: Tathā yaṃkiñci sippaṃ sikkhāpakaṃ titthiyaṃ “ācariyo me aya”nti vandatopi na bhijjatīti evaṃ saraṇagamanappabhedo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:705_0: Ettha ca lokuttarassa saraṇagamanassa cattāri sāmaññaphalāni vipākaphalaṃ,
atk-s0201a:706_0: “Yo ca buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato;
atk-s0201a:710_0: Etaṃ kho saraṇaṃ khemaṃ, etaṃ saraṇamuttamaṃ;
atk-s0201a:712_0: Apica niccato anupagamanādivasena petassa ānisaṃsaphalaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:712_5: yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato upagaccheyya,
atk-s0201a:713_0: Lokiyassa pana saraṇagamanassa bhavasampadāpi bhogasampadāpi phalameva. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0201a:718_0: Aparampi vuttaṃ “atha kho sakko devānamindo asītiyā devatāsahassehi saddhiṃ yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno,
atk-s0201a:718_2: ekamantaṃ ṭhitaṃ kho sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno etadavoca ‘sādhu kho devānaminda buddhaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:718_3: buddhaṃ saraṇagamanahetu kho devānaminda evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī’ti.
atk-s0201a:718_4: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti dibbena āyunā dibbena vaṇṇena sukhena yasena ādhipateyyena dibbehi
atk-s0201a:719_0: Tattha lokiyasaraṇagamanaṃ tīsu vatthūsu aññāṇasaṃsayamicchāñāṇādīhi saṃkilissati,
atk-s0201a:719_4: Lokiyassa ca saraṇagamanassa duvidho bhedo sāvajjo anavajjo ca.
atk-s0201a:719_10: Bhavantarepi hi ariyasāvako aññasatthāraṃ na uddisatīti evaṃ saraṇagamanassa saṃkileso ca bhedo ca veditabboti.
atk-s0201a:719_11: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretūti maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo “upāsako aya”nti evaṃ dhāretu,
atk-s0201a:723_0: Tattha ko upāsakoti yo koci tisaraṇagato gahaṭṭho.
atk-s0201a:723_2: “yato kho mahānāma upāsako buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti,
atk-s0201a:724_1: So hi buddhaṃ upāsatīti upāsako. Dhammaṃ,
atk-s0201a:725_1: Yathāha “yato kho mahānāma upāsako pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti adinnādānā,
atk-s0201a:725_4: Ettāvatā kho mahānāma upāsako sīlavā hotī”ti.
atk-s0201a:726_0: Ko ājīvoti pañca micchāvaṇijjā pahāya dhammena samena jīvitakappanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:727_0: Kā vipattīti yā tasseva sīlassa ca ājīvassa ca vipatti,
atk-s0201a:727_2: Apica yāya esa caṇḍālo ceva hoti malañca patikuṭṭho ca.
atk-s0201a:727_4: Te ca atthato assaddhiyādayo pañca dhammā honti.
atk-s0201a:727_7: dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakacaṇḍālo ca hoti upāsakamalañca upāsakapatikuṭṭho ca.
atk-s0201a:727_13: ito ca bahiddhā dakkhiṇeyyaṃ pariyesati tattha ca pubbakāraṃ karotī”ti.
atk-s0201a:728_0: Kā sampattīti yā cassa sīlasampadā ca ājīvasampadā ca,
atk-s0201a:728_2: Ye cassa ratanabhāvādikarā saddhādayo pañca dhammā.
atk-s0201a:728_5: dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakaratanañca hoti upāsakapadumañca upāsakapuṇḍarīkañca.
atk-s0201a:729_0: Ajjataggeti ettha ayaṃ aggasaddo ādikoṭikoṭṭhāsaseṭṭhesu dissati.
atk-s0201a:729_3: āvarāmi dvāraṃ nigaṇṭhānaṃ nigaṇṭhīna”ntiādīsu hi ādimhi dissati.
atk-s0201a:729_9: vihāraggena vā pariveṇaggena vā bhājetu”ntiādīsu koṭṭhāse. “Yāvatā,
atk-s0201a:730_3: Anaññasatthukaṃ tīhi saraṇagamanehi saraṇaṃ gataṃ upāsakaṃ kappiyakārakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu jānātu.
atk-s0201a:730_4: Ahañhi sacepi me tikhiṇena asinā sīsaṃ chindeyya,
atk-s0201a:730_5: neva buddhaṃ “na buddho”ti vā dhammaṃ “na dhammo”ti vā,
atk-s0201a:730_7: Evaṃ attasanniyyātanena saraṇaṃ gantvā catūhi ca paccayehi pavāretvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmīti.
atk-s0201a:735_6: Tasmā ito paraṃ ettakampi avatvā apubbapadavaṇṇanaṃyeva karissāma.
atk-s0201a:736_2: Ettāvatā ca puggalavādī mahātheroti na gahetabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:736_4: so buddhassa bhagavato desanaṃ avilomentoyeva deseti.
atk-s0201a:738_2: Tattha puggalo satto itthī puriso khattiyo brāhmaṇo devo māroti evarūpā sammutidesanā.
atk-s0201a:738_4: khandhā dhātū āyatanāni satipaṭṭhānāti evarūpā paramatthadesanā.
atk-s0201a:739_0: Tattha bhagavā ye sammutivasena desanaṃ sutvā atthaṃ paṭivijjhitvā mohaṃ pahāya visesaṃ adhigantuṃ samatthā,
atk-s0201a:739_2: Ye pana paramatthavasena desanaṃ sutvā atthaṃ paṭivijjhitvā mohaṃ pahāya visesamadhigantuṃ samatthā,
atk-s0201a:739_5: yathā hi desabhāsākusalo tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ atthasaṃvaṇṇanako ācariyo ye damiḷabhāsāya vutte atthaṃ jānanti,
atk-s0201a:739_9: Evaṃ te māṇavakā chekaṃ byattaṃ ācariyamāgamma khippameva sippaṃ uggaṇhanti.
atk-s0201a:739_11: Tayo vedā viya kathetabbabhāvena ṭhitāni tīṇi piṭakāni.
atk-s0201a:739_14: Ācariyassa damiḷabhāsādiācikkhanaṃ viya bhagavato sammutiparamatthavasena desanā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:746_0: Apica aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā puggalakathaṃ katheti –
atk-s0201a:746_9: “Khandhadhātuāyatanāni hirīyanti ottappantī”ti hi vutte mahājano na jānāti,
atk-s0201a:746_11: paṭisattu hoti “kimidaṃ khandhadhātuāyatanāni hirīyanti ottappanti nāmā”ti.
atk-s0201a:746_12: “Itthī hirīyati ottappati puriso khattiyo brāhmaṇo devo māro”ti vutte pana jānāti,
atk-s0201a:747_0: “Khandhā kammassakā dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo.
