atk-s0201a:974_2: Sā panāyaṃ virati kosallappavattiyā kusalanti vuttā.
atk-s0201a:974_3: Kucchitasayanato vā kusanti laddhavohāraṃ dussīlyaṃ lunātītipi kusalaṃ.
atk-s0201a:974_4: Katamañcāvuso kusalanti imassa pana pañhassa ananurūpattā kusalāti na vuttā.
atk-s0201a:975_1: evaṃ imesampi kusalakammapathānaṃ dhammato koṭṭhāsato ārammaṇato vedanāto mūlatoti pañcahākārehi vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:976_0: Tattha dhammatoti etesu hi paṭipāṭiyā satta cetanāpi vaṭṭanti,
atk-s0201a:977_2: Ante tayo kammapathā ceva mūlāni ca.
atk-s0201a:977_3: Anabhijjhā hi mūlaṃ patvā alobho kusalamūlaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:978_2: Yathā pana nibbānārammaṇo ariyamaggo kilese pajahati,
atk-s0201a:978_3: evaṃ jīvitindriyādiārammaṇāpete kammapathā pāṇātipātādīni dussīlyāni pajahantīti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:979_2: Kusalaṃ patvā hi dukkhavedanā nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:980_0: Mūlatoti paṭipāṭiyā satta kammapathā ñāṇasampayuttacittena viramantassa alobhaadosaamohavasena timūlā honti.
atk-s0201a:980_4: Alobho pana attanāva attano mūlaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0201a:981_4: imesañca pāṇātipātā veramaṇīādīnaṃ kusalānaṃ kesañci sampayuttappabhāvakaṭṭhena kesañci upanissayapaccayaṭṭhena mūlanti kusalamūlaṃ.
atk-s0201a:982_0: Idāni sabbampi taṃ saṅkhepena ca vitthārena ca desitamatthaṃ nigamento yato kho āvusotiādiappanāvāramāha.
atk-s0201a:982_1: Tattha evaṃ akusalaṃ pajānātīti evaṃ yathāniddiṭṭhadasākusalakammapathavasena akusalaṃ pajānāti.
atk-s0201a:982_3: Ettāvatā ekena nayena catusaccakammaṭṭhānikassa yāva arahattā niyyānaṃ kathitaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0201a:982_4: Ettha hi ṭhapetvā abhijjhaṃ dasa akusalakammapathā ca kusalakammapathā ca dukkhasaccaṃ.
atk-s0201a:982_5: Abhijjhā ca lobho akusalamūlañcāti ime dve dhammā nippariyāyena samudayasaccaṃ.
atk-s0201a:982_9: Dukkhaṃ parijānanto samudayaṃ pajahamāno nirodhaṃ pajānanto ariyamaggo maggasaccanti iti dve saccāni sarūpena vuttāni,
atk-s0201a:983_0: So sabbaso rāgānusayaṃ pahāyāti so evaṃ akusalādīni pajānanto sabbākārena rāgānusayaṃ pajahitvā.
atk-s0201a:983_1: Paṭighānusayaṃ paṭivinodetvāti paṭighānusayañca sabbākāreneva nīharitvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:983_3: Asmīti diṭṭhimānānusayaṃ samūhanitvāti pañcasu khandhesu kañci dhammaṃ anavakārīkaritvā “asmī”ti iminā
atk-s0201a:984_0: Tattha diṭṭhimānānusayanti diṭṭhisadisaṃ mānānusayanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:984_1: Ayañhi mānānusayo asmīti pavattattā diṭṭhisadiso hoti,
atk-s0201a:984_3: Imañca asmimānaṃ vitthārato viññātukāmena khandhiyavagge khemakasuttaṃ oloketabbanti.
atk-s0201a:985_1: Vijjaṃ uppādetvāti tassā avijjāya samugghāṭikaṃ arahattamaggavijjaṃ uppādetvā.
atk-s0201a:985_3: Diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotīti asmiṃyeva attabhāve vaṭṭadukkhassa paricchedakaro hoti.
atk-s0201a:988_2: āgato imaṃ saddhammanti evaṃ āyasmato sāriputtassa kusalākusalamukhena catusaccadesanaṃ sutvā taṃ āyasmato
atk-s0201a:988_3: sāriputtassa bhāsitaṃ “sādhāvuso”ti iminā vacanena te bhikkhū abhinanditvā imasseva vacanassa samuṭṭhāpakena
atk-s0201a:988_4: cittena anumoditvā vacasā sampaṭicchitvā cetasā sampiyāyitvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:988_5: Idāni yasmā thero nānappakārena catusaccadesanaṃ desetuṃ paṭibalo,
atk-s0201a:988_8: pahoti cattāri ariyasaccāni vitthārena ācikkhituṃ desetu”nti yasmā vā uttarimpi desetukāmova hutvā “ettāvatāpi kho”ti avaca,
atk-s0201a:988_9: tasmā aparenapi nayena saccadesanaṃ sotukāmā te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ uttariṃ pañhaṃ apucchiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:988_10: Tena sayameva pucchitvā vissajjitapañhato uttariṃ siyā kho panāvuso,
atk-s0201a:988_11: aññopi pariyāyo bhaveyya aññampi kāraṇanti iminā nayena aññaṃ atirekaṃ pañhaṃ pucchiṃsu,
atk-s0201a:988_12: purimapañhassa vā uparibhāge pucchiṃsūti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:989_0: Bhūtānaṃ vā sattānantiādīsu bhūtāti sañjātā, nibbattā.
atk-s0201a:989_1: Sambhavesīnanti ye sambhavaṃ jātiṃ nibbattiṃ esanti gavesanti.
atk-s0201a:989_2: Tattha catūsu yonīsu aṇḍajajalābujā sattā yāva aṇḍakosaṃ vatthikosañca na bhindanti,
atk-s0201a:989_4: Aṇḍakosaṃ vatthikosañca bhinditvā bahi nikkhantā bhūtā nāma.
atk-s0201a:989_5: Saṃsedajā opapātikā ca paṭhamacittakkhaṇe sambhavesino nāma.
atk-s0201a:989_8: yāva te tato aññaṃ na pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0201a:990_1: ye bhūtāyeva na puna bhavissantīti saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0201a:990_4: Appahīnabhavasaṃyojanattā āyatimpi sambhavaṃ esantānaṃ sekkhaputhujjanānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:990_5: Evaṃ sabbathāpi imehi dvīhi padehi sabbasatte pariyādiyati.
atk-s0201a:991_4: Atha vā ṭhitiyāti tassa tassa sattassa uppannadhammānaṃ anuppabandhavasena avicchedāya.
atk-s0201a:991_6: Ubhopi cetāni bhūtānaṃ ṭhitiyā ceva anuggahāya ca.
atk-s0201a:991_7: Sambhavesīnaṃ vā ṭhitiyā ceva anuggahāya cāti evaṃ ubhayattha daṭṭhabbāni.
atk-s0201a:991_8: Kabaḷīkāro āhāroti kabaḷaṃ katvā ajjhoharitabbato kabaḷīkāro āhāro,
atk-s0201a:991_10: Oḷāriko vā sukhumo vāti vatthuoḷārikatāya oḷāriko,
atk-s0201a:991_12: Sabhāvena pana sukhumarūpapariyāpannattā kabaḷīkāro āhāro sukhumova hoti.
atk-s0201a:991_13: Sāpi cassa vatthuto oḷārikatā sukhumatā ca upādāyupādāya veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:992_0: Kumbhīlānañhi āhāraṃ upādāya morānaṃ āhāro sukhumo.
atk-s0201a:992_4: Morānaṃ pana āhāraṃ upādāya taracchānaṃ āhāro sukhumo.
atk-s0201a:992_5: Te kira tivassachaḍḍitāni visāṇāni ceva aṭṭhīni ca khādanti.
atk-s0201a:992_6: Tāni ca nesaṃ kheḷena temitamatteneva kandamūlaṃ viya mudukāni honti.
atk-s0201a:992_7: Taracchānampi āhāraṃ upādāya hatthīnaṃ āhāro sukhumo.
atk-s0201a:993_0: Ettha ca oḷārike vatthusmiṃ ojā parittā hoti dubbalā,
atk-s0201a:993_2: Tathā hi ekapattapūrampi yāguṃ pīvato muhutteneva jighacchito hoti,
atk-s0201a:993_4: Sappiṃ pana pasaṭamattaṃ pivitvā divasaṃ abhottukāmo hoti.
atk-s0201a:993_9: Dve pana ekato hutvā parissamañceva vinodenti pālenti cāti.
atk-s0201a:994_1: Etesu catūsu āhāresu dutiyo āhāroti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:994_3: Tasmā iminā nāma kāraṇena dutiyo vā tatiyo vāti idamettha na gavesitabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:995_2: atha kasmā aññesupi sattānaṃ paccayesu vijjamānesu imeyeva cattāro vuttāti? Vuccate,
atk-s0201a:995_4: Visesapaccayo hi kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṃ sattānaṃ rūpakāyassa kabaḷīkāro āhāro.
atk-s0201a:998_1: Kabaḷīkārāhāro tāva mukhe ṭhapitamattoyeva aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0201a:998_2: Dantavicuṇṇitaṃ pana ajjhohariyamānaṃ ekekaṃ sitthaṃ aṭṭhaṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpetiyeva.
atk-s0201a:999_0: Phassāhāro pana sukhavedaniyo phasso uppajjamāno sukhavedanaṃ āharati,
atk-s0201a:999_2: adukkhamasukhavedaniyo adukkhamasukhanti evaṃ sabbathāpi phassāhāro tisso vedanā āharati.
atk-s0201a:1000_2: Evaṃ sabbathāpi manosañcetanāhāro tayo bhave āharati.
atk-s0201a:1001_0: Viññāṇāhāro pana ye ca paṭisandhikkhaṇe taṃsampayuttakā tayo khandhā,
atk-s0201a:1002_0: Ettha ca manosañcetanāhāro tayo bhave āharatīti sāsavā kusalākusalacetanāva vuttā.
atk-s0201a:1002_2: Avisesena pana taṃsampayuttataṃsamuṭṭhānadhammānaṃ āharaṇato pete āhārāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:1003_0: Etesu catūsu āhāresu kabaḷīkārāhāro upatthambhento āhārakiccaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0201a:1004_1: Kabaḷīkārāhāro hi upatthambhentoyeva kāyaṭṭhapanena sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā hoti.
atk-s0201a:1004_2: Kammajanitopi hi ayaṃ kāyo kabaḷīkārāhārena upatthambhito dasapi vassāni vassasatampi yāva āyuparimāṇaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a:1004_4: Yathā mātuyā janitopi dārako dhātiyā thaññādīni pāyetvā posiyamānova ciraṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a:1005_0: “Yathā mahārāja gehe patante aññena dārunā upatthambhenti,
atk-s0201a:1005_1: aññena dārunā upatthambhitaṃ santaṃ evaṃ taṃ gehaṃ na patati,
atk-s0201a:1005_2: evameva kho mahārāja ayaṃ kāyo āhāraṭṭhitiko,
atk-s0201a:1006_0: Evaṃ kabaḷīkāro āhāro upatthambhento āhārakiccaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0201a:1006_1: Evaṃ sādhentopi ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro dvinnaṃ rūpasantatīnaṃ paccayo hoti āhārasamuṭṭhānassa ca upādinnassa ca.
atk-s0201a:1007_0: Phasso pana sukhādivatthubhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ phusantoyeva sukhādivedanāpavattanena sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā hoti.
atk-s0201a:1007_1: Manosañcetanā kusalākusalakammavasena āyūhamānāyeva bhavamūlanipphādanato sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā hoti.
atk-s0201a:1007_2: Viññāṇaṃ vijānantameva nāmarūpappavattanena sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā hoti.
atk-s0201a:1008_0: Evaṃ upatthambhanādivasena āhārakiccaṃ sādhayamānesu panetesu cattāri bhayāni daṭṭhabbāni.
atk-s0201a:1008_7: Kabaḷīkārāhāre hi nikantiṃ katvā sītādīnaṃ purekkhatā sattā āhāratthāya muddāgaṇanādikammāni karontā anappakaṃ dukkhaṃ nigacchanti.
atk-s0201a:1008_8: Ekacce ca imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvāpi vejjakammādikāya anesanāya āhāraṃ pariyesantā diṭṭhepi dhamme gārayhā honti.
atk-s0201a:1008_9: Samparāyepi tassa saṅghāṭipi ādittā sampajjalitātiādinā lakkhaṇasaṃyutte vuttanayena samaṇapetā honti.
atk-s0201a:1008_10: Imināva tāva kāraṇena kabaḷīkārāhāre nikantiyeva bhayanti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:1009_0: Phassaṃ upagacchantāpi phassassādino paresaṃ rakkhitagopitesu dārādīsu bhaṇḍesu aparajjhanti.
atk-s0201a:1009_1: Te saha bhaṇḍena bhaṇḍasāmikā gahetvā khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ vā chinditvā saṅkārakūṭesu chaḍḍenti.
atk-s0201a:1009_3: Tato ne rājā vividhā kammakāraṇā kārāpeti.
atk-s0201a:1009_4: Kāyassa ca bhedā duggati nesaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā hoti.
atk-s0201a:1009_5: Iti phassassādamūlakaṃ diṭṭhadhammikampi samparāyikampi bhayaṃ sabbamāgatameva hoti.
atk-s0201a:1009_6: Iminā kāraṇena phassāhāre upagamanameva bhayanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1010_0: Kusalākusalakammāyūhaneneva pana tammūlakaṃ tīsu bhavesu bhayaṃ sabbamāgataṃyeva hoti.
atk-s0201a:1010_1: Iminā kāraṇena manosañcetanāhāre āyūhanameva bhayanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1011_1: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne paṭisandhināmarūpaṃ gahetvāva nibbattati,
atk-s0201a:1011_4: iminā kāraṇena viññāṇāhāre abhinipātoyeva bhayanti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:1012_0: Evaṃ sabhayesu pana imesu āhāresu sammāsambuddho kabaḷīkārāhāre nikantipariyādānatthaṃ “seyyathāpi,
atk-s0201a:1013_1: dve kira jāyampatikā puttaṃ gahetvā parittena pātheyyena yojanasatikaṃ kantāramaggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:1013_2: Tesaṃ paññāsa yojanāni gantvā pātheyyaṃ niṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:1013_4: Tato puriso bhariyaṃ āha “bhadde ito samantā paññāsa yojanāni gāmo vā nigamo vā natthi,
atk-s0201a:1013_5: tasmā yaṃ taṃ purisena kātabbaṃ bahumpi kasigorakkhādikammaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1013_6: na dāni sakkā taṃ mayā kātuṃ,
atk-s0201a:1013_7: ehi maṃ māretvā upaḍḍhamaṃsaṃ khāditvā upaḍḍhaṃ pātheyyaṃ katvā puttena saddhiṃ kantāraṃ nittharāhī”ti.
atk-s0201a:1013_8: Sāpi āha “sāmi mayā dāni yaṃ taṃ itthiyā kātabbaṃ bahumpi suttakantanādikammaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1013_10: ehi maṃ māretvā upaḍḍhamaṃsaṃ khāditvā upaḍḍhaṃ pātheyyaṃ katvā puttena saddhiṃ kantāraṃ nittharāhī”ti.
atk-s0201a:1013_11: Tato so taṃ āha “bhadde mātugāmamaraṇena dvinnaṃ maraṇaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0201a:1013_12: Na hi mando kumāro mātaraṃ vinā jīvituṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:1013_15: handa dāni puttakaṃ māretvā maṃsaṃ gahetvā kantāraṃ nittharāmā”ti.
atk-s0201a:1014_0: Tato mātā puttamāha “tāta pitu santikaṃ gacchāhī”ti.
atk-s0201a:1014_2: Athassa pitā “mayā puttakaṃ posessāmīti kasigorakkhādīhi anappakaṃ dukkhamanubhūtaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1014_4: tvaṃyeva tava puttakaṃ mārehī”ti vatvā “tāta mātusantikameva gacchāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:1014_6: Athassa mātāpi “mayā puttaṃ patthentiyā govatakukkuravatadevatāyācanādīhipi tāva anappakaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhūtaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1014_8: Na sakkāhaṃ puttaṃ māretu”nti vatvā “tāta pitusantikaṃyeva gacchāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:1014_9: Evaṃ so dvinnaṃ antarā gacchantoyeva mato.
atk-s0201a:1014_10: Te taṃ disvā paridevitvā pubbe vuttanayeneva maṃsāni gahetvā khādantā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:1014_11: Tesaṃ so puttamaṃsāhāro navahi kāraṇehi paṭikulattā neva davāya hoti,
atk-s0201a:1014_12: na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya,
atk-s0201a:1015_1: Sajātimaṃsatāya ñātimaṃsatāya puttamaṃsatāya piyaputtamaṃsatāya taruṇamaṃsatāya āmakamaṃsatāya agorasamaṃsatāya aloṇatāya adhūpitatāyāti.
atk-s0201a:1015_2: Tasmā yo bhikkhu kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ evaṃ puttamaṃsasadisaṃ passati,
atk-s0201a:1016_0: Niccammagāvūpamāyaṃ pana yathā sā gāvī gīvato yāva khurā,
atk-s0201a:1016_1: tāva cammaṃ uddāletvā muttā yaṃ yadeva nissāya tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a:1016_3: evaṃ phassopi yaṃ yadeva vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ vā nissāya tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a:1016_5: Tasmā yo bhikkhu phassāhāraṃ evaṃ niccammagāvisadisaṃ passati,
atk-s0201a:1017_2: Yathā nānābāhāsu gahetvā tattha upakaḍḍhakā dve purisā,
atk-s0201a:1017_4: Tasmā yo bhikkhu manosañcetanāhāraṃ evaṃ aṅgārakāsūpakaḍḍhakapurisasadisaṃ passati,
atk-s0201a:1018_0: Sattisatāhatūpamāyaṃ pana yena so puriso pubbaṇhasamaye sattisatena haññati,
atk-s0201a:1018_1: tamassa sarīre vaṇamukhasataṃ katvā antarā aṭṭhatvā vinivijjhitvā aparabhāgeyeva patati,
atk-s0201a:1018_3: evamassa patitokāse apatitvā apatitvā gatāhi sattīhi sabbasarīraṃ chiddāvachiddameva hoti,
atk-s0201a:1018_4: tassa ekavaṇamukhepi uppannassa dukkhassa pamāṇaṃ natthi,
atk-s0201a:1018_8: Vaṇamukhesu dukkhavedanuppādo viya jātesu khandhesu vaṭṭamūlakanānāvidhadukkhuppādo.
atk-s0201a:1018_11: Tassa sattighātehi uppannavaṇamukhāni viya viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1018_12: Vaṇamukhapaccayā tassa purisassa kakkhaḷadukkhuppādo viya nāmarūpapaccayā viññāṇassa dvattiṃsakammakāraṇaaṭṭhanavutirogādivasena
atk-s0201a:1018_14: Tasmā yo bhikkhu viññāṇāhāraṃ evaṃ sattisatāhatasadisaṃ passati.
atk-s0201a:1019_0: So evaṃ imesu āhāresu nikantiṃ pariyādiyanto cattāropi āhāre parijānāti,
atk-s0201a:1019_1: yesu pariññātesu sabbampi pariññātaṃ vatthu pariññātameva hoti.
atk-s0201a:1020_2: āhāre pariññāte pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo pariññāto hoti.
atk-s0201a:1020_3: Pañcakāmaguṇike rāge pariññāte natthi taṃ saṃyojanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1020_4: yena saṃyojanena saṃyutto ariyasāvako puna imaṃ lokaṃ āgaccheyya. Phasse,
atk-s0201a:1020_6: āhāre pariññāte tisso vedanā pariññātā honti.
atk-s0201a:1020_7: Tīsu vedanāsu pariññātāsu ariyasāvakassa natthi kiñci uttarikaraṇīyanti vadāmi.
atk-s0201a:1020_10: āhāre pariññāte tisso taṇhā pariññātā honti.
atk-s0201a:1020_11: Tīsu taṇhāsu pariññātāsu ariyasāvakassa natthi kiñci uttarikaraṇīyanti vadāmi. Viññāṇe,
atk-s0201a:1020_14: Nāmarūpe pariññāte ariyasāvakassa natthi kiñci uttarikaraṇīyanti vadāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a:1021_0: Taṇhāsamudayā āhārasamudayoti purimataṇhāsamudayā paṭisandhikānaṃ āhārānaṃ samudayo nibbatto hotīti attho. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0201a:1021_1: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe hi tisantativasena uppannasamatiṃsarūpabbhantare jātā ojā atthi.
atk-s0201a:1021_3: Paṭisandhicittasampayuttā pana phassacetanā sayañca cittaṃ viññāṇanti ime taṇhāpaccayā nibbattā upādinnakaphassamanosañcetanā viññāṇāhārāti.
atk-s0201a:1021_4: Evaṃ tāva purimataṇhāsamudayā paṭisandhikānaṃ āhārānaṃ samudayo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:1021_5: Yasmā panidha upādinnakāpi anupādinnakāpi āhārā missetvā kathitā,
atk-s0201a:1021_6: tasmā anupādinnakānampi evaṃ taṇhāsamudayā āhārasamudayo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:1021_9: Lobhasahagatacittasampayuttā pana phassacetanā sayañca cittaṃ viññāṇanti ime taṇhāpaccayā nibbattā anupādinnakaphassamanosañcetanā viññāṇāhārāti.
atk-s0201a:1022_0: Taṇhānirodhā āhāranirodhoti imissā upādinnakānañca anupādinnakānañca āhārānaṃ paccayabhūtāya taṇhāya nirodhena āhāranirodho paññāyati.
atk-s0201a:1022_7: Sabbavāresu ca “ettāvatāpi kho āvuso”ti idaṃ desanāniyyātanaṃ tattha tattha desitadhammavasena yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1022_8: Tassa idha tāva ayaṃ yojanā ettāvatāpīti imāya āhāradesanāya vuttamanasikārappaṭivedhavasenāpīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:1025_1: Idāni “sādhāvuso”ti purimanayeneva therassa bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā te bhikkhū uttarimpi pañhaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:1025_2: Thero ca nesaṃ aññenapi pariyāyena byākāsi.
atk-s0201a:1025_4: Tasmā ito paraṃ evarūpāni vacanāni anāmasitvā yena yena pariyāyena byākaroti,
atk-s0201a:1025_6: Imassa pana vārassa saṅkhepadesanāyaṃ dukkhañca pajānātīti ettha dukkhanti dukkhasaccaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1028_2: Tattha jarāmaraṇavāre tāva tesaṃ tesanti ayaṃ saṅkhepato anekesaṃ sattānaṃ sādhāraṇaniddesoti ñātabbo.
atk-s0201a:1028_4: yā somadattassa jarāti evañhi divasampi kathentassa neva sattā pariyādānaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0201a:1028_5: Imehi pana dvīhi padehi na koci satto apariyādinno hoti.
atk-s0201a:1028_6: Tasmā vuttaṃ “ayaṃ saṅkhepato anekesaṃ sattānaṃ sādhāraṇaniddeso”ti.
atk-s0201a:1029_0: Tamhi tamhīti ayaṃ gatijātivasena anekesaṃ nikāyānaṃ sādhāraṇaniddeso.
atk-s0201a:1029_6: Ayañhi jarāti iminā padena sabhāvato dīpitā,
atk-s0201a:1029_12: Valittacatāti iminā maṃsaṃ milāpetvā tace valittabhāvakaraṇakiccato dīpitā.
atk-s0201a:1029_13: Tenassā ime khaṇḍiccantiādayo tayo kālātikkame kiccaniddesā.
atk-s0201a:1029_14: Tehi imesaṃ vikārānaṃ dassanavasena pākaṭībhūtā pākaṭajarā dassitā.
atk-s0201a:1029_15: Yatheva hi udakassa vā aggino vā vātassa vā tiṇarukkhādīnaṃ sambhaggapalibhaggatāya vā jhāmatāya vā gatamaggo pākaṭo hoti,
atk-s0201a:1029_16: na ca so gatamaggo tāneva udakādīni,
atk-s0201a:1029_17: evameva jarāya dantādīsu khaṇḍiccādivasena gatamaggo pākaṭo,
atk-s0201a:1030_0: Āyuno saṃhāni indriyānaṃ paripākoti imehi pana padehi kālātikkameyeva abhibyattatāya āyukkhayacakkhādiindriyaparipākasaññitāya pakatiyā dīpitā.
atk-s0201a:1031_0: Tattha yasmā jaraṃ pattassa āyu hāyati,
atk-s0201a:1031_2: Yasmā ca daharakāle suppasannāni sukhumampi attano visayaṃ sukheneva gaṇhanasamatthāni cakkhādīni indriyāni
atk-s0201a:1031_3: jaraṃ pattassa paripakkāni āluḷitāni avisadāni oḷārikampi attano visayaṃ gahetuṃ asamatthāni honti,
atk-s0201a:1031_5: Sā panāyaṃ evaṃ niddiṭṭhā sabbāpi jarā pākaṭā paṭicchannāti duvidhā hoti.
atk-s0201a:1032_0: Tattha dantādīsu khaṇḍabhāvādidassanato rūpadhammesu jarā pākaṭajarā nāma.
atk-s0201a:1032_1: Arūpadhammesu pana tādisassa vikārassa adassanato paṭicchannajarā nāma.
atk-s0201a:1032_4: taṃ cakkhunā disvā manodvārena cintetvā “ime dantā jarāya pahaṭā”ti jaraṃ jānāti udakaṭṭhāne baddhāni
atk-s0201a:1032_5: gosīsādīni oloketvā heṭṭhā udakassa atthibhāvaṃ jānanaṃ viya.
atk-s0201a:1032_6: Puna avīci savīcīti evampi duvidhā hoti.
atk-s0201a:1032_7: Tattha maṇikanakarajatapavāḷasūriyādīnaṃ mandadasakādīsu pāṇīnaṃ viya pupphaphalapallavādīsu ca apāṇīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:1032_8: viya antarantarā vaṇṇavisesādīnaṃ duviññeyyattā jarā avīcijarā nāma,
atk-s0201a:1032_10: Tato aññesu pana yathāvuttesu antarantarā vaṇṇavisesādīnaṃ suviññeyyattā jarā savīcijarā nāmāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:1033_2: Cuti cavanatātiādīsu pana cutīti cavanakavasena vuccati,
atk-s0201a:1033_6: Antaradhānanti ghaṭasseva bhinnassa bhinnānaṃ cutikkhandhānaṃ yena kenaci pariyāyena ṭhānābhāvaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1035_5: Atha vā yasmā ca cātumahārājikādīsu khandhā bhijjanteva,
atk-s0201a:1035_9: Ettha ca kaḷevarassa nikkhepakāraṇato maraṇaṃ kaḷevarassa nikkhepoti vuttanti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:1036_1: Idaṃ vuccatāvusoti idaṃ ubhayampi ekato katvā jarāmaraṇanti kathīyati.
atk-s0201a:1039_7: Te hi aṇḍakosañca vatthikosañca okkamantā pavisantā viya paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti.
atk-s0201a:1040_1: Khandhāyeva hi paramatthato pātubhavanti, na satto.
atk-s0201a:1040_2: Tattha ca khandhānanti ekavokārabhave ekassa catuvokārabhave catunnaṃ pañcavokārabhave pañcannampi gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1040_4: Āyatanānanti ettha tatra tatra uppajjamānāyatanavaseneva saṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:1040_6: Pātubhavantāneva hi tāni paṭiladdhāni nāma honti.
atk-s0201a:1040_7: Ayaṃ vuccatāvuso jātīti iminā padena vohārato paramatthato ca desitāya jātiyā nigamanaṃ karotīti.
atk-s0201a:1040_8: Bhavasamudayāti ettha pana jātiyā paccayabhūto kammabhavo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:1043_1: Bhavavāre kāmabhavoti kammabhavo ca upapattibhavo ca.
atk-s0201a:1043_3: Tañhi upapattibhavassa kāraṇattā “sukho buddhānamuppādo dukkho pāpassa uccayo”tiādīni viya phalavohārena bhavoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1043_4: Upapattibhavo nāma tena kammena nibbattaṃ upādinnakhandhapañcakaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1043_5: Tañhi tattha bhavatīti katvā bhavoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1043_6: Evaṃ sabbathāpi idaṃ kammañca upapatti ca ubhayampetamidha “kāmabhavo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1043_8: Upādānasamudayāti ettha pana upādānaṃ kusalakammabhavassa upanissayavaseneva paccayo hoti.
atk-s0201a:1046_3: Kāmo ca so upādānañcāti vā kāmupādānaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1047_0: Tathā diṭṭhi ca sā upādānañcāti diṭṭhupādānaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1047_9: Vitthārato panetaṃ “tattha katamaṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ natthi dinna”nti vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1048_3: Gosīlagovatādīni hi evaṃ suddhīti abhinivesato sayameva upādānāni ayamettha saṅkhepo.
atk-s0201a:1048_5: ito bahiddhā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sīlena suddhī”ti vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1049_5: Attavādamattameva vā attāti upādiyati etenāti attavādupādānaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1049_9: idha assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī”ti vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1050_0: Taṇhāsamudayāti ettha taṇhā kāmupādānassa upanissayavasena anantarasamanantaranatthivigatāsevanavasena vā paccayo.
atk-s0201a:1053_2: dhammataṇhāti evaṃ cakkhudvārādīsu javanavīthiyaṃ pavattāya taṇhāya “seṭṭhiputto brāhmaṇaputto”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0201a:1053_6: Sā kāmarāgabhāvena rūpaṃ assādentī pavattamānā kāmataṇhā.
atk-s0201a:1053_7: Sassatadiṭṭhisahagatarāgabhāvena rūpaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassatanti evaṃ assādentī pavattamānā bhavataṇhā.
atk-s0201a:1053_8: Ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatarāgabhāvena rūpaṃ ucchijjati vinassati pecca na bhavissatīti evaṃ assādentī pavattamānā vibhavataṇhāti evaṃ tividhā hoti.
atk-s0201a:1053_10: tathā saddataṇhādayopīti etāni aṭṭhārasa taṇhāvicaritāni honti.
atk-s0201a:1053_19: ‘iminā itthasmī’ti hotī”ti vā evamādinā bāhirarūpādinissitāni aṭṭhārasāti chattiṃsa.
atk-s0201a:1053_23: Puna saṅgahe karīyamāne rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu chaḷeva taṇhākāyā tissoyeva kāmataṇhādayo hontīti evaṃ –
atk-s0201a:1056_0: Vedanāsamudayāti ettha pana vedanāti vipākavedanā adhippetā.
atk-s0201a:1056_1: Sā kathaṃ chasu dvāresu taṇhāya paccayo hotīti ce?
atk-s0201a:1056_3: Sukhāya hi vedanāya assādanena sattā vedanaṃ mamāyantā vedanāya taṇhaṃ uppādetvā vedanārāgarattā hutvā cakkhudvāre iṭṭhameva rūpaṃ patthenti,
atk-s0201a:1056_6: Tathā sotadvārādīsu iṭṭhe ca saddādayo patthenti,
atk-s0201a:1056_13: Yathā puttasinehena puttaṃ mamāyantā dhātiyā sakkāraṃ karonti,
atk-s0201a:1056_14: sappāyasappikhīrādīniyeva naṃ pāyenti ceva bhojenti ca.
atk-s0201a:1059_3: manosamphassajā vedanāti etaṃ “cakkhusamphassajā vedanā atthi kusalā,
atk-s0201a:1059_5: atthi abyākatā”ti evaṃ vibhaṅge āgatattā cakkhudvārādīsu pavattānaṃ kusalākusalābyākatavedanānaṃ “sāriputto,
atk-s0201a:1059_6: mantāṇiputto”ti evamādīsu mātito nāmaṃ viya mātisadisavatthuto nāmaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1059_7: Vacanattho panettha cakkhusamphassahetu jātā vedanā cakkhusamphassajā vedanāti.
atk-s0201a:1059_12: tisso manoviññāṇadhātuyoti etāhi sampayuttavasena vedanā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:1060_0: Phassasamudayāti ettha pana pañcadvāre pañcavatthukavedanānaṃ sahajātacakkhusamphassādisamudayā samudayo hoti.
atk-s0201a:1060_2: Manodvāre tadārammaṇavedanānaṃ advārikānañca paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivedanānaṃ sahajātamanosamphassasamudayā samudayo hotīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:1063_4: kāyasamphassoti ettāvatā ca kusalākusalavipākā pañcavatthukā dasa samphassā vuttā honti.
atk-s0201a:1063_6: Saḷāyatanasamudayāti channaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ āyatanānaṃ samudayena imassa chabbidhassāpi samphassassa samudayo hotīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:1066_2: taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge khandhaniddese ceva āyatananiddese ca vuttanayameva.
atk-s0201a:1066_3: Nāmarūpasamudayāti ettha pana yaṃ nāmaṃ yañca rūpaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1066_4: yañca nāmarūpaṃ yassa āyatanassa paccayo hoti,
atk-s0201a:1066_5: tassa vasena visuddhimagge paṭiccasamuppādaniddese vuttanayena nāmarūpasamudayā saḷāyatanasamudayo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:1069_7: ime pana tayo sabbadubbalesupi cittesu santi.
atk-s0201a:1069_9: Cattāri ca mahābhūtānīti ettha cattārīti gaṇanaparicchedo.
atk-s0201a:1069_11: Yena pana kāraṇena tāni mahābhūtānīti vuccanti,
atk-s0201a:1070_0: Catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyāti ettha pana catunnanti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1070_7: Tena catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ samūhaṃ upādāya pavattamānaṃ rūpanti ayamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:1070_8: Evaṃ sabbatthāpi yāni cattāri pathavīādīni mahābhūtāni,
atk-s0201a:1070_9: yañca catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya vattamānaṃ cakkhāyatanādibhedena abhidhammapāḷiyameva vuttaṃ tevīsatividhaṃ rūpaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1070_11: Viññāṇasamudayāti ettha pana yaṃ viññāṇaṃ yassa nāmassa yassa ca rūpassa yassa ca nāmarūpassa paccayo hoti,
atk-s0201a:1070_12: tassa vasena visuddhimagge paṭiccasamuppādaniddese vuttanayeneva viññāṇasamudayā nāmarūpasamudayo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:1073_6: Saṅkhārasamudayāti ettha pana yo saṅkhāro yassa viññāṇassa paccayo hoti,
atk-s0201a:1076_6: vacīdvāre vacanabhedavasena pavattānaṃ vīsatiyā eva vacīsañcetanānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1076_8: kāyavacīdvāre copanaṃ akatvā raho nisīditvā cintayantassa pavattānaṃ lokiyakusalākusalavasena ekūnatiṃsamanosañcetanānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1076_9: Avijjāsamudayāti ettha pana kusalānaṃ upanissayavasena akusalānaṃ sahajātādivasenāpi avijjāpaccayo hotīti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:1079_4: Tattha catūhi kāraṇehi dukkhe aññāṇaṃ veditabbaṃ antogadhato vatthuto ārammaṇato paṭicchādanato ca.
atk-s0201a:1079_5: Tathā hi taṃ dukkhasaccapariyāpannattā dukkhe antogadhaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1080_0: Samudaye aññāṇaṃ tīhi kāraṇehi veditabbaṃ vatthuto ārammaṇato paṭicchādanato ca.
atk-s0201a:1080_1: Nirodhe paṭipadāyañca aññāṇaṃ ekeneva kāraṇena veditabbaṃ paṭicchādanato.
atk-s0201a:1080_2: Nirodhapaṭipadāya hi paṭicchādakameva aññāṇaṃ tesaṃ yāthāvalakkhaṇappaṭivedhanivāraṇena,
atk-s0201a:1080_12: Purimaṃ pana vañcaniyaṭṭhena sabhāvalakkhaṇassa duddasattā gambhīraṃ,
atk-s0201a:1081_0: Apica dukkheti ettāvatā saṅgahato vatthuto ārammaṇato kiccato ca avijjā dīpitā.
atk-s0201a:1081_1: Dukkhasamudayeti ettāvatā vatthuto ārammaṇato kiccato ca.
atk-s0201a:1081_3: Avisesato pana aññāṇanti etena sabhāvato niddiṭṭhāti ñātabbā.
atk-s0201a:1081_4: Āsavasamudayāti ettha pana kāmāsavabhavāsavā sahajātādivasena avijjāya paccayā honti.
atk-s0201a:1084_1: Āsavavāre avijjāsamudayāti ettha avijjā kāmāsavabhavāsavānaṃ sahajātādivasena paccayo hoti.
atk-s0201a:1084_4: Pubbuppannā avijjāyevassa aparāparuppannassa avijjāsavassa upanissayapaccayo hoti.
atk-s0201a:1084_6: Ayaṃ vāro yā esā paṭiccasamuppādapadesu jeṭṭhikā avijjā,
atk-s0201a:1084_8: Evaṃ vuttena vārena saṃsārassa anamataggatā sādhitā hoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0201a:1084_11: Evaṃ āsavā avijjāya avijjāpi āsavānaṃ paccayoti katvā pubbakoṭi na paññāyati avijjāya,
atk-s0201a:1084_12: tassā apaññāyanato saṃsārassa anamataggatā siddhā hotīti.
atk-s0201a:1085_0: Evaṃ sabbepime imasmiṃ sutte kammapathavāro āhāravāro dukkhavāro jarā- maraṇa- jāti- bhava- upādāna- taṇhā- vedanā- phassa-
atk-s0201a:1086_0: Tesu ekekassa vārassa saṅkhepavitthāravasena dvidhā vibhattā dvattiṃsaṭṭhānāni honti.
atk-s0201a:1086_1: Iti imasmiṃ sutte imesu dvattiṃsaṭṭhānesu cattāri saccāni kathitāni.
atk-s0201a:1086_2: Etesaṃyeva vitthāravasena vuttesu soḷasasu ṭhānesu arahattaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1086_3: Therassa pana matena dvattiṃsāyapi ṭhānesu cattāri saccāni cattāro ca maggā kathitāti.
atk-s0201a:1086_4: Iti sakalepi pañcamahānikāyasaṅgahite buddhavacane natthi taṃ suttaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1086_5: yattha dvattiṃsakkhattuṃ cattāri saccāni dvattiṃsakkhattuñca arahattaṃ pakāsitaṃ aññatra imamhā sammādiṭṭhisuttāti.
atk-s0201a:1087_0: Idamavocāyasmā sāriputtoti idaṃ dvattiṃsāya catusaccapariyāyehi dvattiṃsāya arahattapariyāyehīti catusaṭṭhiyā
atk-s0201a:1087_1: kāraṇehi alaṅkaritvā sammādiṭṭhisuttaṃ āyasmā sāriputto avoca,
atk-s0201a:1087_2: attamanā te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
atk-s0201a:1092_2: Tattha kurūsu viharatīti kurunāmakā jānapadino rājakumārā,
atk-s0201a:1092_3: tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīsaddena kurūti vuccati,
atk-s0201a:1092_6: mandhātukāle tīsu dīpesu manussā jambudīpo nāma buddhapaccekabuddhamahāsāvakacakkavattipabhutīnaṃ uttamapurisānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1092_7: uppattibhūmi uttamadīpo atiramaṇīyoti sutvā raññā mandhātucakkavattinā cakkaratanaṃ purakkhatvā cattāro
atk-s0201a:1097_1: Cattāro mahārājāno “mandhātumahārājā āgato”ti sutvāva “mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo rājā na sakkā yuddhena paṭibāhitu”nti sakarajjaṃ niyyātesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:1097_7: tattha sakkassa devarañño ime cattāro mahārājāno paricārakā dovārikabhūmiyaṃ tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0201a:1097_16: tassa heṭṭhā saṭṭhiyojanāyāmā paṇṇāsayojanavitthatā pañcadasayojanubbedhā jayasumanapupphavaṇṇā paṇḍukambalasilā,
atk-s0201a:1097_17: yassā mudutāya sakkassa nisīdato upaḍḍhakāyo anupavisatī”ti.
atk-s0201a:1098_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā tattha gantukāmo cakkaratanaṃ abbhukkiri.
atk-s0201a:1098_1: Taṃ ākāse patiṭṭhāsi saddhiṃ caturaṅginiyā senāya.
atk-s0201a:1098_2: Atha dvinnaṃ devalokānaṃ vemajjhato cakkaratanaṃ otaritvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāsi saddhiṃ pariṇāyakaratanappamukhāya caturaṅginiyā senāya.
atk-s0201a:1098_4: Sakko “mandhātā āgato”ti sutvāva tassa paccuggamanaṃ katvā –
atk-s0201a:1098_5: “svāgataṃ te, mahārāja, sakaṃ te, mahārāja. Anusāsa,
atk-s0201a:1098_6: mahārājā”ti vatvā saddhiṃ nāṭakehi rajjaṃ dvebhāge katvā ekaṃ bhāgamadāsi.
atk-s0201a:1099_0: Tassa kira sakkena saddhiṃ paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ nisinnassa akkhinimisamattena nānattaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0201a:1099_1: Taṃ asallakkhentā devā sakkassa ca tassa ca nānatte muyhanti.
atk-s0201a:1099_2: So tattha dibbasampattiṃ anubhavamāno yāva chattiṃsa sakkā uppajjitvā cutā,
atk-s0201a:1099_3: tāva rajjaṃ kāretvā atittoyeva kāmehi tato cavitvā attano uyyāne patiṭṭhito vātātapena phuṭṭhagatto kālamakāsi.
atk-s0201a:1100_0: Cakkaratane pana pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhite pariṇāyakaratanaṃ suvaṇṇapaṭṭe mandhātuupāhanaṃ likhāpetvā idaṃ mandhāturajjanti rajjamanusāsi.
atk-s0201a:1100_1: Tepi tīhi dīpehi āgatamanussā puna gantuṃ asakkontā pariṇāyakaratanaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “deva mayaṃ rañño ānubhāvena āgatā,
atk-s0201a:1100_5: Tattha pubbavidehato āgatamanussehi āvasitapadeso tāyeva purimasaññāya videharaṭṭhanti nāmaṃ labhi.
atk-s0201a:1100_6: Aparagoyānato āgatamanussehi āvasitapadeso aparantajanapadoti nāmaṃ labhi.
atk-s0201a:1100_7: Uttarakuruto āgatamanussehi āvasitapadeso kururaṭṭhanti nāmaṃ labhīti.
atk-s0201a:1100_8: Bahuke pana gāmanigamādayo upādāya bahuvacanena voharīyati.
atk-s0201a:1101_6: Tassa kira pāde khāṇukena viddhaṭṭhāne vaṇo ruhanto cittadārusadiso hutvā ruhi,
atk-s0201a:1101_8: So ca tasmiṃ okāse damito porisādabhāvato paṭisedhito. Kena?
atk-s0201a:1101_13: Tadā hi mahāsattena kammāsapādo damito. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a:1106_2: Kururaṭṭhavāsīnaṃ kira kuruvattadhammo tasmiṃ kammāso jāto,
atk-s0201a:1106_3: tasmā taṃ ṭhānaṃ kammāso ettha dhammo jātoti kammāsadhammanti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:1106_7: Bhagavato kira tasmiṃ nigame vasanokāso koci vihāro nāhosi.
atk-s0201a:1106_8: Nigamato pana apakkamma aññatarasmiṃ udakasampanne ramaṇīye bhūmibhāge mahāvanasaṇḍo ahosi.
atk-s0201a:1106_11: tasmā evamettha attho veditabbo “kurūsu viharati kammāsadhammaṃ nāma kurūnaṃ nigamo,
atk-s0201a:1108_5: Kururaṭṭhavāsino kira bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upāsakā upāsikāyo utupaccayādisampannattā tassa raṭṭhassa sappāyautupaccayasevanena
atk-s0201a:1108_7: Te cittasarīrakallatāya anuggahitapaññābalā gambhīrakathaṃ pariggahetuṃ samatthā honti.
atk-s0201a:1108_8: Tena tesaṃ bhagavā imaṃ gambhīradesanāpaṭiggahaṇasamatthataṃ sampassanto ekavīsatiyā ṭhānesu kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1108_9: arahatte pakkhipitvā idaṃ gambhīratthaṃ satipaṭṭhānasuttaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0201a:1108_10: Yathā hi puriso suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakaṃ labhitvā tattha nānāpupphāni pakkhipeyya,
atk-s0201a:1108_11: suvaṇṇamañjūsaṃ vā pana labhitvā sattaratanāni pakkhipeyya,
atk-s0201a:1108_12: evaṃ bhagavā kururaṭṭhavāsiparisaṃ labhitvā gambhīradesanaṃ desesi.
atk-s0201a:1108_13: Tenevettha aññānipi gambhīratthāni dīghanikāye mahānidānaṃ mahāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ imasmiṃ majjhimanikāye sāropamaṃ
atk-s0201a:1108_14: rukkhūpamaṃ raṭṭhapālaṃ māgaṇḍiyaṃ āneñjasappāyanti aññānipi suttāni desesi.
atk-s0201a:1109_0: Apica tasmiṃ janapade catasso parisā pakatiyāva satipaṭṭhānabhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti,
atk-s0201a:1109_3: Sace kāci itthī “amma tvaṃ kataraṃ satipaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ manasikarosī”ti pucchitā “na kiñcī”ti vadati.
atk-s0201a:1109_6: Atha naṃ “mā dāni puna evamakāsī”ti ovaditvā aññataraṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhāpenti.
atk-s0201a:1109_7: Yā pana “ahaṃ asukaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaromī”ti vadati.
atk-s0201a:1109_8: Tassā “sādhu sādhū”ti sādhukāraṃ datvā “tava jīvitaṃ sujīvitaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1109_14: eko kira naṭako suvapotakaṃ gahetvā sikkhāpento vicarati.
atk-s0201a:1109_15: So bhikkhunupassayaṃ upanissāya vasitvā gamanakāle suvapotakaṃ pamussitvā gato.
atk-s0201a:1109_18: Taṃ ekadivasaṃ purato nisinnaṃ disvā mahātherī āha –
atk-s0201a:1113_1: pabbajitānaṃ santike vasantena nāma vissaṭṭhaattabhāvena bhavituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0201a:1113_3: tvaṃ pana aññaṃ na sakkhissasi “aṭṭhi aṭṭhī”ti sajjhāyaṃ karohīti.
atk-s0201a:1113_4: So theriyā ovāde ṭhatvā “aṭṭhi aṭṭhī”ti sajjhāyanto carati.
atk-s0201a:1114_0: Taṃ ekadivasaṃ pātova toraṇagge nisīditvā bālātapaṃ tapamānaṃ eko sakuṇo nakhapañjarena aggahesi.
atk-s0201a:1114_3: mocema na”nti leḍḍuādīni gahetvā anubandhitvā mocesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:1114_4: Taṃ ānetvā purato ṭhapitaṃ therī āha –
atk-s0201a:1116_2: katarasmimpi ṭhāne vippakirissatī”ti evaṃ ayye aṭṭhipuñjameva cintesinti.
atk-s0201a:1117_4: tasmā nesaṃ bhagavā satipaṭṭhānabuddhimeva janento idaṃ suttaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0201a:1120_0: Nāvā uttarasetū ca, kullo ca bhisisaṅkamo”ti. –
atk-s0201a:1121_17: evaṃ santepi bhagavatova so ayano tena uppāditattā.
atk-s0201a:1121_30: Pubbabhāge nānāmukhabhāvanānayappavattopi aparabhāge ekaṃ nibbānameva gacchatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:1126_0: Keci pana “na pāraṃ diguṇaṃ yantī”ti gāthānayena yasmā ekavāraṃ nibbānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0201a:1126_3: Imassa hi atthassa sakiṃ ayanoti iminā byañjanena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1126_4: Yadi pana ekaṃ ayanamassa ekā gati pavattīti evamatthaṃ yojetvā vucceyya,
atk-s0201a:1126_6: attho pana ubhayathāpi na yujjati. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a:1127_0: Pubbepi ca imasmiṃ pade mahātherānaṃ sākacchā ahosiyeva.
atk-s0201a:1127_5: Ācariye punappunaṃ bhaṇante appaṭibāhitvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0201a:1127_9: ko nu kho ettha nicchayo”ti suttantaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya parivattento “yo hi koci,
atk-s0201a:1127_11: ime cattāro satipaṭṭhāne evaṃ bhāveyya satta vassānī”ti imasmiṃ ṭhāne sallakkhesi,
atk-s0201a:1127_12: lokuttaramaggo uppajjitvā satta vassāni tiṭṭhamāno nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a:1127_14: cūḷanāgena diṭṭho pubbabhāgamaggova labbhatīti ñatvā aṭṭhamiyaṃ dhammassavane saṅghuṭṭhe agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:1128_4: Tena dhammāsane nisīditvā vījaniṃ gahetvā pubbagāthāsu vuttāsu therassa āsanapiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhitassa etadahosi “raho nisīditvā na vakkhāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a:1128_6: na attano rucimeva ucchubhāraṃ viya evaṃ ukkhipitvā vicaranti,
atk-s0201a:1128_10: So ācariyassa viya saddoti dhammaṃ ṭhapetvā “kiṃ bhante”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:1128_11: Āvuso cūḷanāga mayā vutto missakamaggo na labbhati,
atk-s0201a:1129_0: Thero cintesi “amhākaṃ ācariyo sabbapariyattiko tepiṭako sutabuddho,
atk-s0201a:1129_1: evarūpassapi nāma bhikkhuno ayaṃ pañho āluḷeti,
atk-s0201a:1129_2: anāgate mama bhātikā imaṃ pañhaṃ āluḷessantīti suttaṃ gahetvā imaṃ pañhaṃ niccalaṃ karissāmī”ti paṭisambhidāmaggato
atk-s0201a:1136_2: Sattānaṃ visuddhiyāti rāgādīhi malehi abhijjhāvisamalobhādīhi ca upakkilesehi kiliṭṭhacittānaṃ sattānaṃ visuddhatthāya.
atk-s0201a:1136_3: Tathā hi imināva maggena ito satasahassakappādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ upari ekasmiññeva kappe
atk-s0201a:1136_4: nibbatte taṇhaṅkaramedhaṅkarasaraṇaṅkaradīpaṅkaranāmake buddhe ādiṃ katvā sakyamunipariyosānā aneke sammāsambuddhā
atk-s0201a:1136_5: anekasatā paccekabuddhā gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā ariyasāvakā cāti ime sattā sabbe cittamalaṃ pavāhetvā
atk-s0201a:1140_0: Citte suddhe visujjhanti, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā.
atk-s0201a:1142_0: Sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyāti sokassa ca paridevassa ca samatikkamāya,
atk-s0201a:1142_2: Ayañhi maggo bhāvito santatimahāmattādīnaṃ viya sokasamatikkamāya,
atk-s0201a:1142_3: paṭācārādīnaṃ viya ca paridevasamatikkamāya ca saṃvattati.
atk-s0201a:1143_0: “Yaṃ pubbe taṃ visodhehi, pacchā te māhu kiñcanaṃ;
atk-s0201a:1144_0: Majjhe ce no gahessasi, upasanto carissasī”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:1145_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patto.
atk-s0201a:1147_0: “Na santi puttā tāṇāya, na pitā nāpi bandhavā;
atk-s0201a:1149_1: Yasmā pana kāyavedanācittadhammesu kañci dhammaṃ anāmasitvā bhāvanā nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a:1149_2: tasmā tepi imināva maggena sokaparideve samatikkantāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:1150_0: Dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāyāti kāyikadukkhassa ca cetasikadomanassassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ atthaṅgamāya,
atk-s0201a:1150_2: Ayañhi maggo bhāvito tissattherādīnaṃ viya dukkhassa,
atk-s0201a:1150_3: sakkādīnaṃ viya ca domanassassa atthaṅgamāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0201a:1151_1: sāvatthiyaṃ kira tisso nāma kuṭumbikaputto cattālīsa hiraññakoṭiyo pahāya pabbajitvā agāmake araññe viharati.
atk-s0201a:1151_2: Tassa kaniṭṭhabhātubhariyā “gacchatha naṃ jīvitā voropethā”ti pañcasate core pesesi.
atk-s0201a:1151_6: Pāṭibhogaṃ me upāsakā gahetvā ajjekarattiṃ jīvitaṃ dethāti. Ko te, samaṇa,
atk-s0201a:1151_8: Thero mahantaṃ pāsāṇaṃ gahetvā dve ūruṭṭhīni bhinditvā “vaṭṭati upāsakā pāṭibhogo”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:1151_9: Te apakkamitvā caṅkamanasīse aggiṃ katvā nipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:1151_10: Therassa vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā sīlaṃ paccavekkhato parisuddhaṃ sīlaṃ nissāya pītipāmojjaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0201a:1151_11: Tato anukkamena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento tiyāmarattiṃ samaṇadhammaṃ katvā aruṇuggamane arahattaṃ patto imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0201a:1156_0: Aparepi tiṃsa bhikkhū bhagavato santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññavihāre vassaṃ upagantvā “āvuso,
atk-s0201a:1156_2: na aññamaññassa santikaṃ āgantabba”nti vatvā vihariṃsu.
atk-s0201a:1156_3: Tesaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ katvā paccūsasamaye pacalāyantānaṃ eko byaggho āgantvā ekekaṃ bhikkhuṃ gahetvā gacchati.
atk-s0201a:1156_4: Na koci “maṃ byaggho gaṇhī”ti vācampi nicchāresi.
atk-s0201a:1156_5: Evaṃ pañcasu dasasu bhikkhūsu khāditesu uposathadivase “itare, āvuso,
atk-s0201a:1157_0: Atha aññataraṃ daharabhikkhuṃ purimanayeneva byaggho gaṇhi.
atk-s0201a:1157_3: Bhikkhū kattaradaṇḍe ca ukkāyo ca gahetvā mocessāmāti anubandhiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:1157_4: Byaggho bhikkhūnaṃ agatiṃ chinnataṭaṭṭhānaṃ āruyha taṃ bhikkhuṃ pādaṅguṭṭhakato paṭṭhāya khādituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a:1157_8: bhikkhūnaṃ viseso nāma evarūpe ṭhāne paññāyatī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:1157_9: So byagghamukhe nipannova taṃ vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento yāva gopphakā khāditasamaye sotāpanno hutvā,
atk-s0201a:1157_12: hadayarūpe akhāditeyeva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0201a:1161_0: Kāmaṃ khādatu maṃ byaggho, bhakkho kāyo amittānaṃ;
atk-s0201a:1163_0: Aparopi pītamallatthero nāma gihikāle tīsu rajjesu paṭākaṃ gahetvā tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ āgamma rājānaṃ disvā
atk-s0201a:1163_5: taṃ vo pahīnaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti natumhākavaggaṃ sutvā cintesi “neva kira rūpaṃ attano,
atk-s0201a:1163_7: So taṃyeva aṅkusaṃ katvā nikkhamitvā mahāvihāraṃ gantvā pabbajjaṃ yācitvā pabbajito upasampanno dvemātikā
atk-s0201a:1163_8: paguṇaṃ katvā tiṃsa bhikkhū gahetvā gabalavāliyaaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā samaṇadhammamakāsi.
atk-s0201a:1163_10: Tamenaṃ rattiṃ eko migaluddako migoti maññamāno sattiyā pahari.
atk-s0201a:1163_12: So taṃ sattiṃ harāpetvā pahāramukhāni tiṇavaṭṭiyā pūrāpetvā pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ attānaṃ nisīdāpetvā okāsaṃ
atk-s0201a:1163_13: kāretvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā ukkāsitasaddena āgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0201a:1165_0: Na tumhākamidaṃ rūpaṃ, taṃ jaheyyātha bhikkhavo.
atk-s0201a:1168_2: addhā te muddhamatthake hatthaṃ pasāretvā sīsaṃ parāmaseyyā”ti.
atk-s0201a:1168_3: Ettāvatā ayaṃ maggo tissattherādīnaṃ viya dukkhassa atthaṅgamāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0201a:1169_0: Sakko pana devānamindo attano pañcavidhaṃ pubbanimittaṃ disvā maraṇabhayasantajjito domanassajāto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0201a:1169_1: So upekkhāpañhavissajjanāvasāne asītisahassāhi devatāhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:1169_2: Sā cassa upapatti puna pākatikāva ahosi.
atk-s0201a:1170_1: tattha pañcasatā accharāyo rukkhato pupphāni ocinantiyo cavitvā niraye upapannā.
atk-s0201a:1170_2: So “kiṃ imā cirāyantī”ti upadhārento tāsaṃ niraye nibbattabhāvaṃ disvā “kittakaṃ nu kho mama āyū”ti upaparikkhanto
atk-s0201a:1170_3: attanopi āyuparikkhayaṃ viditvā tattheva niraye nibbattanabhāvaṃ disvā bhīto ativiya domanassajāto hutvā
atk-s0201a:1170_4: “imaṃ me domanassaṃ satthā vinayissati na añño”ti avasesā pañcasatā accharāyo gahetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0201a:1173_0: Sace atthi anutrastaṃ, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:1177_0: So desanāpariyosāne pañcahi accharāsatehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya taṃ sampattiṃ thāvaraṃ katvā devalokameva agamāsīti.
atk-s0201a:1177_1: Evamayaṃ maggo bhāvito sakkādīnaṃ viya domanassassa atthaṅgamāya saṃvattatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:1178_0: Ñāyassa adhigamāyāti ñāyo vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo,
atk-s0201a:1178_3: Ayañhi pubbabhāge lokiyo satipaṭṭhānamaggo bhāvito lokuttarassa maggassa adhigamāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0201a:1178_5: Nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyāti taṇhāvānavirahitattā nibbānanti laddhanāmassa amatassa sacchikiriyāya,
atk-s0201a:1178_7: Ayañhi maggo bhāvito anupubbena nibbānasacchikiriyaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0201a:1179_0: Tattha kiñcāpi “sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”ti vutte sokasamatikkamādīni atthato siddhāneva honti,
atk-s0201a:1179_1: ṭhapetvā pana sāsanayuttikovide aññesaṃ na pākaṭāni,
atk-s0201a:1179_2: na ca bhagavā paṭhamaṃ sāsanayuttikovidaṃ janaṃ katvā pacchā dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0201a:1179_3: Tena teneva pana suttena taṃ taṃ atthaṃ ñāpeti.
atk-s0201a:1179_4: Tasmā idha yaṃ yaṃ atthaṃ ekāyanamaggo sādheti,
atk-s0201a:1179_5: taṃ taṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassento “sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:1179_6: Yasmā vā yā sattānaṃ visuddhi ekāyanamaggena saṃvattati,
atk-s0201a:1179_11: Tasmā imampi kamaṃ dassento “sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”ti vatvā “sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:1180_3: desessāmi ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāsessāmi,
atk-s0201a:1180_4: yadidaṃ chachakkānī”ti chachakkadesanāya aṭṭhahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi,
atk-s0201a:1180_7: ariyavaṃsā aggaññā rattaññā vaṃsaññā porāṇā asaṃkiṇṇā asaṃkiṇṇapubbā na saṃkīyanti,
atk-s0201a:1180_9: appaṭikuṭṭhā samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhī”ti navahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi,
atk-s0201a:1180_10: evaṃ imassapi ekāyanamaggassa sattānaṃ visuddhiyātiādīhi sattahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0201a:1181_2: Vaṇṇabhāsanañhi sutvā te bhikkhū “ayaṃ kira maggo hadayasantāpabhūtaṃ sokaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1181_6: visuddhiṃ ñāyaṃ nibbānanti tayo visese āvahatī”ti ussāhajātā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbaṃ dhāretabbaṃ vācetabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1181_8: Iti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi,
atk-s0201a:1182_0: Yathā hi satasahassagghanikapaṇḍukambalavāṇijena kambalaṃ gaṇhathāti ugghositepi asukakambaloti na tāva manussā jānanti.
atk-s0201a:1182_1: Kesakambalavālakambalādayopi hi duggandhā kharasamphassā kambalātveva vuccanti.
atk-s0201a:1182_2: Yadā pana tena gandhārako rattakambalo sukhumo ujjalo sukhasamphassoti ugghositaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:1182_9: maggo”ti vuttepi asukamaggoti na tāva pākaṭo hoti.
atk-s0201a:1182_11: “Sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”tiādimhi pana vutte “ayaṃ kira maggo cattāro upaddave hanati,
atk-s0201a:1182_12: tayo visese āvahatī”ti ussāhajātā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbaṃ dhāretabbaṃ vācetabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1182_13: imañca maggaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ maññissantīti vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanto “sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:1183_3: tena na tato heṭṭhā na uddhanti satipaṭṭhānaparicchedaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0201a:1183_5: tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatāpi, satipi.
atk-s0201a:1183_12: Āhārasamudayā kāyasamudayo”tiādīsu hi satigocaro satipaṭṭhānanti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:1183_24: yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsitumarahatī”ti etthāpi tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatā “satipaṭṭhāna”nti vuttā.
atk-s0201a:1183_30: “Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrentī”tiādīsu pana satiyeva “satipaṭṭhāna”nti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:1183_37: Iti sati ca sā paṭṭhānañcātipi satipaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1184_6: Catassopi hi etā satiyo maggaṭṭhena ekattaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0201a:1184_10: Catassopi cetā aparabhāge kāyādīsu ārammaṇesu kiccaṃ sādhayamānā nibbānaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0201a:1184_13: Evañca sati vacanānusandhinā sānusandhikāva desanā hoti,
atk-s0201a:1184_21: Yadidaṃ sattabojjhaṅgā”tiādīsu viya hi yathā mārasenappamaddanoti ca sattabojjhaṅgāti ca atthato ekaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1184_23: Evaṃ ekāyanamaggoti ca cattāro satipaṭṭhānāti ca atthato ekaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1185_0: Kasmā pana bhagavatā cattārova satipaṭṭhānā vuttā anūnā anadhikāti?
atk-s0201a:1185_2: Taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritasamathayānikavipassanāyānikesu hi mandatikkhavasena dvedhā dvedhā pavattesu veneyyesu
atk-s0201a:1185_7: Samathayānikassa ca mandassa akicchena adhigantabbanimittaṃ paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ visuddhimaggo,
atk-s0201a:1186_3: tesaṃ tattha asubhabhāvadassanena tassa vipallāsassa pahānatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1186_4: Sukhaṃ niccaṃ attāti gahitesupi ca vedanādīsu vedanā dukkhā,
atk-s0201a:1186_8: tesaṃ tattha dukkhādibhāvadassanena tesaṃ vipallāsānaṃ pahānatthaṃ sesāni tīṇi vuttānīti evaṃ subhasukhaniccaattabhāvavipallāsapahānatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:1186_9: vā cattārova vuttā anūnā anadhikāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:1187_1: atha kho caturoghayogāsavaganthaupādānaagatipahānatthampi catubbidhāhārapariññatthañca cattārova vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:1188_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana saraṇavasena ceva ekattasamosaraṇavasena ca ekameva satipaṭṭhānaṃ ārammaṇavasena cattāroti etadeva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1188_1: Yathā hi catudvāre nagare pācīnato āgacchantā pācīnadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pācīnadvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-s0201a:1188_2: dakkhiṇato pacchimato uttarato āgacchantā uttaradisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā uttaradvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-s0201a:1189_0: Yathā pācīnato āgacchantā pācīnadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pācīnadvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-s0201a:1189_1: evaṃ kāyānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā cuddasavidhena kāyānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā kāyānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena
atk-s0201a:1190_0: Yathā dakkhiṇato āgacchantā dakkhiṇadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇadvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-s0201a:1190_1: evaṃ vedanānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā navavidhena vedanānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā vedanānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena
atk-s0201a:1191_0: Yathā pacchimato āgacchantā pacchimadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pacchimadvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-s0201a:1191_1: evaṃ cittānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā soḷasavidhena cittānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā cittānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena
atk-s0201a:1192_0: Yathā uttarato āgacchantā uttaradisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā uttaradvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-s0201a:1192_1: evaṃ dhammānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā pañcavidhena dhammānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā dhammānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena
atk-s0201a:1193_0: Evaṃ saraṇavasena ceva ekattasamosaraṇavasena ca ekameva satipaṭṭhānaṃ ārammaṇavasena cattārova vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:1194_7: Bhagavato hi anusāsaniṃ sampaṭicchantesu bhikkhu seṭṭho,
atk-s0201a:1194_10: Tasmiṃ gahite pana sesā gahitāva honti rājagamanādīsu rājaggahaṇena sesaparisā viya.
atk-s0201a:1194_12: so bhikkhu nāma hotīti paṭipattiyā bhikkhubhāvadassanatopi “bhikkhū”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:1194_13: Paṭipannako hi devo vā hotu manusso vā,
atk-s0201a:1198_0: So brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhū”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:1199_1: Rūpakāyo hi idha aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ kesādīnañca dhammānaṃ samūhaṭṭhena hatthikāyarathakāyādayo viya kāyoti adhippeto.
atk-s0201a:1200_0: “Kāye”ti ca vatvāpi puna “kāyānupassī”ti dutiyaṃ kāyaggahaṇaṃ asammissato vavatthānaghanavinibbhogādidassanatthaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1200_3: atha kho kāyānupassīyevāti kāyasaṅkhāte vatthusmiṃ kāyānupassanākārasseva dassanena asammissato vavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:1200_10: kadalikkhandhapattavaṭṭivinibbhujanako viya rittamuṭṭhiviniveṭhako viya ca bhūtupādāyasamūhānupassīyevāti
atk-s0201a:1200_11: nānappakārato samūhavaseneva kāyasaṅkhātassa vatthuno dassanena ghanavinibbhogo dassito hoti.
atk-s0201a:1200_12: Na hettha yathāvuttasamūhavinimutto kāyo vā itthī vā puriso vā añño vā koci dhammo dissati,
atk-s0201a:1200_13: yathāvuttadhammasamūhamatteyeva pana tathā tathā sattā micchābhinivesaṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a:1201_0: “Yaṃ passati na taṃ diṭṭhaṃ, yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ taṃ na passati;
atk-s0201a:1202_0: Apassaṃ bajjhate mūḷho, bajjhamāno na muccatī”ti. –
atk-s0201a:1203_6: na evaṃ aniccadukkhānattaasubhabhūteyeva imasmiṃ kāye niccasukhaattasubhabhāvānupassī,
atk-s0201a:1203_11: so satova assasatī”tiādinā nayena assāsapassāsādicuṇṇikajātaaṭṭhikapariyosāno kāyo vutto,
atk-s0201a:1203_12: yo ca “idhekacco pathavikāyaṃ aniccato anupassati āpokāyaṃ tejokāyaṃ vāyokāyaṃ kesakāyaṃ lomakāyaṃ chavikāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:1203_13: cammakāyaṃ maṃsakāyaṃ ruhirakāyaṃ nahārukāyaṃ aṭṭhikāyaṃ aṭṭhimiñjakāya”nti paṭisambhidāyaṃ kāyo vutto,
atk-s0201a:1203_14: tassa sabbassa imasmiṃyeva kāye anupassanato “kāye kāyānupassī”ti evampi attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:1204_0: Atha vā kāye ahanti vā mamanti vā evaṃ gahetabbassa yassa kassaci ananupassanato tassa tasseva pana kesālomādikassa
atk-s0201a:1204_1: nānādhammasamūhassa anupassanato kāye kesādidhammasamūhasaṅkhātakāyānupassīti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:1204_3: no niccato”tiādinā nayena paṭisambhidāyaṃ āgatanayassa sabbasseva aniccalakkhaṇādino ākārasamūhasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0201a:1205_0: Tathā hi ayaṃ kāye kāyānupassanāpaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno bhikkhu imaṃ kāyaṃ aniccānupassanādīnaṃ sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena aniccato anupassati,
atk-s0201a:1205_14: So taṃ aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahati,
atk-s0201a:1206_1: Ātāpīti tīsu bhavesu kilese ātāpetīti ātāpo,
atk-s0201a:1206_6: Ayaṃ pana yasmā satiyā ārammaṇaṃ pariggahetvā paññāya anupassati,
atk-s0201a:1206_7: na hi sativirahitassa anupassanā nāma atthi.
atk-s0201a:1206_11: Tasmā ettha “kāye kāyānupassī viharatī”ti ettāvatā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānakammaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:1206_12: Atha vā yasmā anātāpino antosaṅkhepo antarāyakaro hoti,
atk-s0201a:1206_14: muṭṭhassati upāyāpariccāge anupāyāpariggahe ca asamattho hoti,
atk-s0201a:1206_16: tasmā yesaṃ dhammānaṃ ānubhāvena taṃ sampajjati.
atk-s0201a:1206_17: Tesaṃ dassanatthaṃ “ātāpī sampajāno satimāti idaṃ vutta”nti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1207_0: Iti kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ sampayogaṅgañcassa dassetvā idāni pahānaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1207_1: Tattha vineyyāti tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena vā vinayitvā.
atk-s0201a:1207_3: Kāyo hi idha lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti adhippeto.
atk-s0201a:1207_4: Yasmā panassa na kāyamatteyeva abhijjhādomanassaṃ pahīyati,
atk-s0201a:1207_7: Lokasaṅkhātattā vā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ atthuddhāranayenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1207_11: tasmiṃ loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ vineyyāti evaṃ sambandho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:1208_5: domanassavinayena ca kāye bhūtānaṃ asubhāsukhabhāvādīnaṃ apanayanassa ca pahānaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1208_6: Tena yogāvacarassa yogānubhāvo yogasamatthatā ca dīpitā hoti.
atk-s0201a:1208_8: yadidaṃ anurodhavirodhavippamutto aratiratisaho abhūtapakkhepabhūtāpanayanavirahito ca hoti.
atk-s0201a:1208_9: Anurodhavirodhavippamutto cesa aratiratisaho abhūtaṃ apakkhipanto bhūtañca anapanento yogasamattho hotīti.
atk-s0201a:1209_0: Aparo nayo “kāye kāyānupassī”ti ettha anupassanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1210_4: Imāya anupassanāya upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno sampanno samannāgato.
atk-s0201a:1211_0: Viharatīti iriyati vattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati viharati. Tena vuccati viharatīti.
atk-s0201a:1215_0: Vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti tattha katamo loko?
atk-s0201a:1215_5: Yo rāgo sārāgo anunayo anurodho nandī nandīrāgo cittassa sārāgo,
atk-s0201a:1215_13: Iti ayañca abhijjhā idañca domanassaṃ imamhi loke vinītā honti paṭivinītā santā vūpasantā samitā vūpasamitā
atk-s0201a:1215_14: atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā appitā byappitā sositā visositā byantīkatā,
atk-s0201a:1215_15: tena vuccati vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti evametesaṃ padānamattho vutto.
atk-s0201a:1215_16: Tena saha ayaṃ aṭṭhakathānayo yathā saṃsandati,
atk-s0201a:1216_2: vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti ettha pana vedanānupassīti evamādīsu vedanādīnaṃ puna vacane payojanaṃ kāyānupassanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1216_5: dhammesu dhammānupassīti ettha pana vedanāti tisso vedanā,
atk-s0201a:1219_0: Sa ve sammaddaso bhikkhu, upasanto carissatī”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:1220_4: Yathāha “sukhā vedanā ṭhitisukhā vipariṇāmadukkhā”ti sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1220_9: Dhammā salakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇānaṃ suññatadhammassa aniccādisattānupassanānaṃ niddesavāre āgatasantāsantādibhedānañca vasena anupassitabbā.
atk-s0201a:1220_11: Kāmañcettha yassa kāyasaṅkhāte loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ pahīnaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1220_14: Yato vā ekattha pahīnaṃ sesesupi pahīnaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:1220_15: Tenevassa tattha pahānadassanatthampi evaṃ vuttanti veditabbanti.
atk-s0201a:1223_1: Idāni seyyathāpi nāma cheko vilīvakārako thūlakilañjasaṇhakilañjacaṅkoṭakapeḷāpuṭādīni upakaraṇāni kattukāmo
atk-s0201a:1223_2: ekaṃ mahāveṇuṃ labhitvā catudhā bhinditvā tato ekekaṃ veṇukhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā phāletvā taṃ taṃ upakaraṇaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0201a:1223_3: evameva bhagavā satipaṭṭhānadesanāya sattānaṃ anekappakāravisesādhigamaṃ kattukāmo ekameva sammāsatiṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā.
atk-s0201a:1223_6: bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharatī”tiādinā nayena ārammaṇavasena catudhā bhinditvā tato ekekaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1223_7: gahetvā vibhajanto “kathañca bhikkhave”tiādinā nayena niddesavāraṃ vattumāraddho.
atk-s0201a:1224_3: kena ca pakārena bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharatīti?
atk-s0201a:1224_10: saddo sabbappakārakāyānupassanānibbattakassa puggalassa sannissayabhūtasāsanaparidīpano aññasāsanassa tathābhāvapaṭisedhano ca.
atk-s0201a:1225_2: Imassa hi bhikkhuno dīgharattaṃ rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu anuvisaṭaṃ cittaṃ kammaṭṭhānavīthiṃ otarituṃ na icchati,
atk-s0201a:1225_4: tasmā seyyathāpi nāma gopo kūṭadhenuyā sabbaṃ khīraṃ pivitvā vaḍḍhitaṃ kūṭavacchaṃ dametukāmo dhenuto
atk-s0201a:1225_5: apanetvā ekamante mahantaṃ thambhaṃ nikhaṇitvā tattha yottena bandheyya.
atk-s0201a:1225_6: Athassa so vaccho ito cito ca vipphanditvā palāyituṃ asakkonto tameva thambhaṃ upanisīdeyya vā upanipajjeyya vā,
atk-s0201a:1225_7: evameva imināpi bhikkhunā dīgharattaṃ rūpārammaṇādirasapānavaḍḍhitaṃ duṭṭhacittaṃ dametukāmena rūpādiārammaṇato
atk-s0201a:1225_8: apanetvā araññaṃ vā rukkhamūlaṃ vā suññāgāraṃ vā pavesetvā tattha satipaṭṭhānārammaṇatthambhe satiyottena
atk-s0201a:1225_10: Evamassa taṃ cittaṃ ito cito ca vipphanditvāpi pubbe āciṇṇārammaṇaṃ alabhamānaṃ satiyottaṃ chinditvā
atk-s0201a:1225_11: palāyituṃ asakkontaṃ tamevārammaṇaṃ upacārappanāvasena upanisīdati ceva upanipajjati ca.
atk-s0201a:1226_0: “Yathā thambhe nibandheyya, vacchaṃ damaṃ naro idha;
atk-s0201a:1229_0: Apica yasmā idaṃ kāyānupassanāya muddhabhūtaṃ sabbabuddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ visesādhigamadiṭṭhadhammasukhavihārapadaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1229_1: ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ itthipurisahatthiassādisaddasamākulaṃ gāmantaṃ apariccajitvā na sukaraṃ sampādetuṃ,
atk-s0201a:1229_3: Agāmake pana araññe sukaraṃ yogāvacarena idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggahetvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā
atk-s0201a:1229_4: tadeva jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasitvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ.
atk-s0201a:1230_1: So yathā vatthuvijjācariyo nagarabhūmiṃ passitvā suṭṭhu upaparikkhitvā “ettha nagaraṃ māpethā”ti upadisati,
atk-s0201a:1230_2: sotthinā ca nagare niṭṭhite rājakulato mahāsakkāraṃ labhati,
atk-s0201a:1230_3: evameva yogāvacarassa anurūpaṃ senāsanaṃ upaparikkhitvā “ettha kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjitabba”nti upadisati.
atk-s0201a:1230_4: Tato tattha kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjantena yoginā anukkamena arahatte patte “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā”ti mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ labhati.
atk-s0201a:1231_1: Yathā hi mahādīpirājā araññe tiṇagahanaṃ vā vanagahanaṃ vā pabbatagahanaṃ vā nissāya nilīyitvā vanamahiṃsagokaṇṇasūkarādayo mige gaṇhāti,
atk-s0201a:1231_2: evameva ayaṃ araññādīsu kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjanto bhikkhu yathākkamena cattāro magge ceva cattāri ariyaphalāni ca gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a:1235_0: Tenassa parakkamajavayoggabhūmiṃ araññasenāsanaṃ dassento bhagavā “araññagato vā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:1235_1: Ito paraṃ imasmiṃ tāva ānāpānapabbe yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0201a:1236_0: Tassa pana imesaṃ “dīghaṃ vā assasanto dīghaṃ assasāmīti pajānāti…pe…
atk-s0201a:1236_1: passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ passasissāmīti sikkhatī”ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ vasena sikkhato assāsapassāsanimitte cattāri jhānāni uppajjanti.
atk-s0201a:1236_2: So jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā assāsapassāse vā pariggaṇhāti jhānaṅgāni vā.
atk-s0201a:1236_6: karajakāyo nāma cattāri mahābhūtāni upādārūpañcā”ti evaṃ rūpaṃ pariggaṇhāti,
atk-s0201a:1236_7: tato tadārammaṇe phassapañcamake nāmanti evaṃ nāmarūpaṃ pariggahetvā tassa paccayaṃ pariyesanto avijjādipaṭiccasamuppādaṃ
atk-s0201a:1236_9: añño satto vā puggalo vā natthī”ti vitiṇṇakaṅkho sappaccayanāmarūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento anukkamena arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0201a:1236_10: Idaṃ ekassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā niyyānamukhaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1237_3: karajakāyo rūpa”nti nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā tassa paccayaṃ pariyesanto avijjādipaccayākāraṃ disvā “paccayapaccayuppannadhammamattamevetaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1237_4: añño satto vā puggalo vā natthī”ti vitiṇṇakaṅkho sappaccayanāmarūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento anukkamena arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0201a:1237_5: idaṃ ekassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā niyyānamukhaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1238_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ attano vā assāsapassāsakāye kāyānupassī viharati.
atk-s0201a:1238_4: Etenassa paguṇakammaṭṭhānaṃ aṭṭhapetvā aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇakālo kathito.
atk-s0201a:1238_5: Ekasmiṃ kāle panidaṃ ubhayaṃ na labbhati.
atk-s0201a:1239_0: Samudayadhammānupassī vāti yathā nāma kammārabhastañca gaggaranāḷiñca tajjañca vāyāmaṃ paṭicca vāto aparāparaṃ sañcarati,
atk-s0201a:1239_1: evaṃ bhikkhuno karajakāyañca nāsāpuṭañca cittañca paṭicca assāsapassāsakāyo aparāparaṃ sañcarati.
atk-s0201a:1239_3: te passanto “samudayadhammānupassī vā kāyasmiṃ viharatī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:1239_4: Vayadhammānupassī vāti yathā bhastāya apanītāya gaggaranāḷiyā bhinnāya tajje ca vāyāme asati so vāto nappavattati,
atk-s0201a:1239_5: evameva kāye bhinne nāsāpuṭe viddhaste citte ca niruddhe assāsapassāsakāyo nāma nappavattatīti kāyādinirodhā
atk-s0201a:1239_6: assāsapassāsanirodhoti evaṃ passanto “vayadhammānupassī vā kāyasmiṃ viharatī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:1239_9: Atthi kāyoti vā panassāti kāyova atthi, na satto,
atk-s0201a:1239_12: na attaniyaṃ, nāhaṃ, na mama, na koci,
atk-s0201a:1239_13: na kassacīti evamassa sati paccupaṭṭhitā hoti.
atk-s0201a:1240_4: Atha kho yāvadeva ñāṇamattāya aparāparaṃ uttaruttari ñāṇapamāṇatthāya ceva satipamāṇatthāya ca,
atk-s0201a:1240_6: Anissito ca viharatīti taṇhānissayadiṭṭhinissayānaṃ vasena anissito viharati.
atk-s0201a:1240_7: Na ca kiñci loke upādiyatīti lokasmiṃ kiñci rūpaṃ vā…pe…
atk-s0201a:1240_8: viññāṇaṃ vā “ayaṃ me attā vā attaniyaṃ vā”ti na gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a:1240_10: Iminā pana padena bhagavā ānāpānapabbadesanaṃ niyyātetvā dasseti.
atk-s0201a:1241_4: Evaṃ catusaccavasena ussakkitvā nibbutiṃ pāpuṇātīti idamekassa assāsapassāsavasena abhiniviṭṭhassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā niyyānamukhanti.
atk-s0201a:1244_1: Evaṃ assāsapassāsavasena kāyānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni iriyāpathavasena vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:1244_3: Na panetaṃ evarūpaṃ jānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1244_6: kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā vā na hoti.
atk-s0201a:1244_7: Imassa pana bhikkhuno jānanaṃ sattūpaladdhiṃ pajahati,
atk-s0201a:1244_12: kiṃ kāraṇā gacchatī”ti evaṃ sampajānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1245_0: Tattha ko gacchatīti na koci satto vā puggalo vā gacchati.
atk-s0201a:1245_1: Kassa gamananti na kassaci sattassa vā puggalassa vā gamanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1245_3: Tasmā esa evaṃ pajānāti “gacchāmī”ti cittaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0201a:1245_6: cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena sakalakāyassa purato abhinīhāro gamananti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:1246_3: cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena sakalakāyassa koṭito paṭṭhāya ussitabhāvo ṭhānanti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:1246_7: cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena heṭṭhimakāyassa samiñjanaṃ uparimakāyassa ussitabhāvo nisajjāti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:1246_11: cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena sakalasarīrassa tiriyato pasāraṇaṃ sayananti vuccatīti.
atk-s0201a:1247_0: Tassa evaṃ pajānato evaṃ hoti “satto gacchati satto tiṭṭhatī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:1247_1: Atthi pana koci satto gacchanto vā ṭhito vā natthi.
atk-s0201a:1247_2: Yathā pana “sakaṭaṃ gacchati sakaṭaṃ tiṭṭhatī”ti vuccati,
atk-s0201a:1247_3: na ca kiñci sakaṭaṃ nāma gacchantaṃ vā tiṭṭhantaṃ vā atthi.
atk-s0201a:1247_4: Cattāro pana goṇe yojetvā chekamhi sārathimhi pājente “sakaṭaṃ gacchati sakaṭaṃ tiṭṭhatī”ti vohāramattameva hoti,
atk-s0201a:1247_8: Gacchāmi tiṭṭhāmīti citte uppanne vāyodhātu viññattiṃ janayamānā uppajjati,
atk-s0201a:1249_0: Yathā yāti tathā kāyo, yāti vātāhato ayaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1252_0: Ko nāma ettha so satto, yo vinā hetupaccaye;
atk-s0201a:1253_0: Attano ānubhāvena, tiṭṭhe vā yadi vā vaje”ti.
atk-s0201a:1254_0: Tasmā evaṃ hetupaccayavaseneva pavattāni gamanādīni sallakkhento esa gacchanto vā gacchāmīti pajānāti, ṭhito vā,
atk-s0201a:1255_0: Yathā yathā vā panassa kāyo paṇihito hoti,
atk-s0201a:1255_3: yena yena vā ākārena tassa kāyo ṭhito hoti,
atk-s0201a:1256_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ attano vā catuiriyāpathapariggaṇhanena kāye kāyānupassī viharati.
atk-s0201a:1256_3: kālena parassa catuiriyāpathapariggaṇhanena kāye kāyānupassī viharati.
atk-s0201a:1256_4: Samudayadhammānupassī vātiādīsu pana “avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo”tiādinā nayena pañcahākārehi rūpakkhandhassa samudayo ca vayo ca nīharitabbo.
atk-s0201a:1257_4: Evaṃ catusaccavasena ussakkitvā nibbutiṃ pāpuṇātīti idamekassa catūiriyāpathapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā niyyānamukhanti.
atk-s0201a:1260_1: Evaṃ iriyāpathavasena kāyānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni catusampajaññavasena vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:1260_2: Tattha abhikkante paṭikkanteti ettha tāva abhikkantaṃ vuccati gamanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1260_5: Gamane tāva purato kāyaṃ abhiharanto abhikkamati nāma.
atk-s0201a:1260_7: Ṭhānepi ṭhitakova kāyaṃ purato onāmento abhikkamati nāma.
atk-s0201a:1260_9: Nisajjāyapi nisinnakova āsanassa purimaaṅgābhimukho saṃsaranto abhikkamati nāma.
atk-s0201a:1261_4: Tattha sātthakasampajaññaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ asammohasampajaññanti catubbidhaṃ sampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1261_5: Tattha abhikkamanacitte uppanne cittavaseneva agantvā “kiṃ nu me ettha gatena attho atthi natthī”ti atthānatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:1261_8: Cetiyaṃ vā bodhiṃ vā disvāpi hi buddhārammaṇaṃ saṅghadassanena saṅghārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ uppādetvā tadeva khayavayato sammasanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0201a:1261_9: There disvā tesaṃ ovāde patiṭṭhāya asubhaṃ disvā tattha paṭhamajjhānaṃ uppādetvā tadeva khayavayato sammasanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0201a:1262_0: Tasmiṃ pana gamane sappāyāsappāyaṃ pariggaṇhitvā sappāyapariggahaṇaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1262_3: Sace pana cetiyassa mahāpūjāya dasadvādasayojanantare parisā sannipatanti.
atk-s0201a:1262_4: Attano vibhavānurūpaṃ itthiyopi purisāpi alaṅkatappaṭiyattā cittakammarūpakāni viya sañcaranti.
atk-s0201a:1262_14: Sace pana antogāme mahāmaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā sabbarattiṃ dhammassavanaṃ kārentesu manussesu vuttappakāreneva janasannipāto ceva antarāyo ca hoti,
atk-s0201a:1263_2: eko kira daharabhikkhu sāmaṇeraṃ gahetvā dantakaṭṭhatthāya gato.
atk-s0201a:1263_3: Sāmaṇero maggā okkamitvā purato gacchanto asubhaṃ disvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā tadeva pādakaṃ katvā
atk-s0201a:1263_4: saṅkhāre sammasanto tīṇi phalāni sacchikatvā uparimaggatthāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:1263_6: So “mayā pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bhikkhunā saddhiṃ dve kathā nāma na kathitapubbā.
atk-s0201a:1263_10: iminā tāva maggena gantvā mayā ṭhitokāse muhuttaṃ puratthābhimukho ṭhatvā olokethā”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:1263_11: So tathā katvā tena pattavisesameva pāpuṇi.
atk-s0201a:1263_12: Evaṃ ekaṃ asubhaṃ dvinnaṃ janānaṃ atthāya jāyati.
atk-s0201a:1263_13: Evaṃ sātthampi panetaṃ purisassa mātugāmāsubhaṃ asappāyaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1263_14: Mātugāmassa ca purisāsubhaṃ sabhāgameva sappāyanti evaṃ sappāyapariggahaṇaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:1264_0: Evaṃ pariggahitasātthasappāyassa pana aṭṭhatiṃsāya kammaṭṭhānesu attano cittarucitakammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0201a:1264_1: gocaraṃ uggahetvā bhikkhācāragocare taṃ gahetvā gamanaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:1265_0: Tattha yo bhikkhu divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetvā tathā rattiyā
atk-s0201a:1265_1: paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ majjhime yāme seyyaṃ kappetvā pacchimayāmepi nisajjācaṅkamehi vītināmetvā pageva cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇavattaṃ
atk-s0201a:1265_2: katvā bodhirukkhe udakaṃ abhisiñcitvā pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā ācariyupajjhāyavattādīni
atk-s0201a:1265_4: So sarīraparikammaṃ katvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā dve tayo pallaṅke usumaṃ gāhāpento kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjitvā
atk-s0201a:1265_5: bhikkhācāravelāya uṭṭhahitvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva pattacīvaramādāya senāsanato nikkhamitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1265_6: manasikarontova cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā sace buddhānussatikammaṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:1265_9: sopānapādamūle ṭhatvā hatthena gahitabhaṇḍaṃ viya taṃ ṭhapetvā buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ gahetvā cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ āruyha mahantaṃ cetiyaṃ ce,
atk-s0201a:1265_10: tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1265_12: tatheva padakkhiṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vanditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1265_13: Cetiyaṃ vanditvā bodhiyaṅgaṇaṃ pattenāpi buddhassa bhagavato sammukhā viya nipaccakāraṃ dassetvā bodhi vanditabbo.
atk-s0201a:1265_14: So evaṃ cetiyañca bodhiñca vanditvā paṭisāmitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā paṭisāmitabhaṇḍakaṃ hatthena gaṇhanto viya
atk-s0201a:1265_15: nikkhittakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gāmasamīpe kammaṭṭhānasīseneva cīvaraṃ pārupitvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati.
atk-s0201a:1266_0: Atha naṃ manussā disvā “ayyo no āgato”ti paccuggantvā pattaṃ gahetvā āsanasālāyaṃ vā gehe vā nisīdāpetvā yāguṃ datvā yāva bhattaṃ na niṭṭhāti,
atk-s0201a:1266_1: tāva pāde dhovitvā telena makkhetvā purato nisīditvā pañhaṃ vā pucchanti,
atk-s0201a:1266_4: janasaṅgahatthaṃ dhammakathā nāma kātabbāyevāti aṭṭhakathācariyā vadanti.
atk-s0201a:1266_6: Tasmā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva dhammaṃ kathetvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva āhāraṃ paribhuñjitvā anumodanaṃ katvā
atk-s0201a:1266_7: nivattiyamānehipi manussehi anugatova gāmato nikkhamitvā tattheva nivattetvā maggaṃ paṭipajjati.
atk-s0201a:1266_8: Atha naṃ puretaraṃ nikkhamitvā bahigāme katabhattakiccā sāmaṇeradaharabhikkhū disvā paccuggantvā pattacīvaramassa gaṇhanti.
atk-s0201a:1267_0: Porāṇā bhikkhū kira “na amhākaṃ upajjhāyo ācariyo”ti mukhaṃ ulloketvā vattaṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a:1267_3: ete manussā tumhākaṃ kiṃ honti mātupakkhato sambandhā pitipakkhato”ti.
atk-s0201a:1267_11: edisā nāma amhākaṃ upakārino natthīti tesaṃ guṇe kathento gacchati,
atk-s0201a:1268_0: Yassa pana pageva vuttappakāraṃ vattapaṭipattiṃ karontassa kammajatejo pajjalati,
atk-s0201a:1268_4: so pageva pattacīvaramādāya vegasāva cetiyaṃ vanditvā gorūpānaṃ nikkhamanavelāyameva gāmaṃ yāgubhikkhāya
atk-s0201a:1268_5: pavisitvā yāguṃ labhitvā āsanasālaṃ gantvā pivati.
atk-s0201a:1268_6: Athassa dvattikkhattuṃ ajjhoharaṇamatteneva kammajatejo upādinnakaṃ muñcitvā anupādinnakaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a:1268_7: Ghaṭasatena nhāto viya tejodhātupariḷāhanibbāpanaṃ patvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena yāguṃ paribhuñjitvā pattañca
atk-s0201a:1268_8: mukhañca dhovitvā antarābhatte kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikatvā avasesaṭṭhāne piṇḍāya caritvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena
atk-s0201a:1268_9: āhāraṃ paribhuñjitvā tato paṭṭhāya poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ upaṭṭhahamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva āgacchati,
atk-s0201a:1268_11: Edisā ca bhikkhū yāguṃ pivitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā buddhasāsane arahattaṃ pattā nāma gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā,
atk-s0201a:1268_12: sīhaḷadīpeyeva tesu tesu gāmesu āsanasālāyaṃ na taṃ āsanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0201a:1269_1: sabbavattāni bhinditvā pañcavidhacetokhilavinibandhacitto viharanto “kammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthī”tipi saññaṃ
atk-s0201a:1269_2: akatvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā ananulomikena gihisaṃsaggena saṃsaṭṭho caritvā ca bhuñjitvā ca tuccho
atk-s0201a:1269_4: ayaṃ vuccati neva harati na paccāharatīti.
atk-s0201a:1270_0: Yo panāyaṃ harati ca paccāharati cāti vutto,
atk-s0201a:1270_2: Attakāmā hi kulaputtā sāsane pabbajitvā dasapi vīsampi tiṃsampi cattālīsampi paññāsampi satampi ekato vasantā katikavattaṃ katvā viharanti, āvuso,
atk-s0201a:1270_3: tumhe na iṇaṭṭhā na bhayaṭṭā na jīvikāpakatā pabbajitā,
atk-s0201a:1270_5: tasmā gamane uppannakilesaṃ gamaneyeva niggaṇhatha, ṭhāne,
atk-s0201a:1270_8: Te evaṃ katikavattaṃ katvā bhikkhācāraṃ gacchantā aḍḍhausabhausabhaaḍḍhagāvutagāvutantaresu pāsāṇā honti.
atk-s0201a:1270_15: ananucchavikaṃ te eta”nti attānaṃ paṭicodetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā tattheva ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati.
atk-s0201a:1270_17: Athassa pacchato āgacchantopi nisīdatīti soyeva nayo.
atk-s0201a:1270_18: Ariyabhūmiṃ okkamituṃ asakkontopi taṃ kilesaṃ vikkhambhetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontova gacchati.
atk-s0201a:1270_21: paṭinivattetvā purimapadesaṃ yeva eti āḷindakavāsī mahāphussadevatthero viya.
atk-s0201a:1271_0: So kira ekūnavīsativassāni gatapaccāgatikavattaṃ pūrento eva vihāsi.
atk-s0201a:1271_1: Manussāpi sudaṃ antarāmagge kasantā ca vapantā ca maddantā ca kammāni ca karontā theraṃ tathāgacchantaṃ
atk-s0201a:1271_3: Kiṃ nu kho maggamūḷho udāhu kiñci pamuṭṭho”ti samullapanti.
atk-s0201a:1271_4: So taṃ anādiyitvā kammaṭṭhānayuttacitteneva samaṇadhammaṃ karonto vīsativassabbhantare arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0201a:1271_5: Arahattappattadivaseyevassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ adhivatthā devatā aṅgulīhi dīpaṃ ujjāletvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:1271_6: Cattāropi mahārājāno sakko ca devānamindo brahmā ca sahampati upaṭṭhānaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:1271_7: Tañca obhāsaṃ disvā vanavāsīmahātissatthero taṃ dutiyadivase pucchi “rattibhāge āyasmato santike obhāso ahosi,
atk-s0201a:1271_9: Thero vikkhepaṃ karonto “obhāso nāma dīpobhāsopi hoti maṇiobhāsopī”ti evamādimāha.
atk-s0201a:1271_10: Tato paṭicchādetha tumheti nibaddho āmāti paṭijānitvā ārocesi kālavallimaṇḍapavāsī mahānāgatthero viya ca.
atk-s0201a:1272_0: Sopi kira gatapaccāgatikavattaṃ pūrento paṭhamaṃ tāva bhagavato mahāpadhānaṃ pūjessāmīti satta vassāni ṭhānacaṅkamanameva adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:1272_1: Puna soḷasa vassāni gatapaccāgatikavattaṃ pūretvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0201a:1272_2: So kammaṭṭhānayutteneva cittena pādaṃ uddharanto viyuttena uddhate paṭinivattanto gāmassa samīpaṃ gantvā
atk-s0201a:1272_3: “gāvī nu pabbajito nū”ti āsaṅkanīyapadese ṭhatvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā kacchakantarato udakena pattaṃ dhovitvā
atk-s0201a:1272_6: Mā me bhikkhaṃ dātuṃ vandituṃ vā āgate manusse dīghāyukā hothāti vacanamattenāpi kammaṭṭhānavikkhepo ahosīti. Ajja, bhante,
atk-s0201a:1272_7: katimīti divasaṃ vā bhikkhugaṇanaṃ vā pañhe vā pucchito pana udakaṃ gilitvā ārocesi.
atk-s0201a:1272_9: nikkhamanavelāya gāmadvāre niṭṭhubhitvāva yāti kalambatitthavihāre vassūpagatapaññāsabhikkhū viya.
atk-s0201a:1273_0: Te kira āsāḷhīpuṇṇamāyaṃ katikavattaṃ akaṃsu “arahattaṃ appatvā aññamaññaṃ na ālapissāmā”ti.
atk-s0201a:1273_1: Gāmañca piṇḍāya pavisantā udakagaṇḍūsaṃ katvā pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:1273_6: Evañca cintesuṃ “kiṃ nu kho ete amhehiyeva saddhiṃ na sallapanti,
atk-s0201a:1273_10: etha ne aññamaññaṃ khamāpessāmā”ti sabbe vihāraṃ gantvā paññāsāya bhikkhusu dvepi bhikkhū ekokāse nāddasaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:1273_12: so āha “na bho kalahakārakānaṃ okāso īdiso hoti,
atk-s0201a:1273_17: tepi bhikkhū antotemāseyeva arahattaṃ patvā mahāpavāraṇāya visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāresuṃ.
atk-s0201a:1274_0: Evaṃ kālavallimaṇḍapavāsī mahānāgatthero viya kalambatitthavihāre vassūpagatabhikkhū viya ca kammaṭṭhānayutteneva
atk-s0201a:1274_1: cittena pādaṃ uddharanto gāmasamīpaṃ patvā udakagaṇḍūsaṃ katvā vīthiyo sallakkhetvā yattha surāsoṇḍadhuttādayo
atk-s0201a:1274_4: Tattha ca piṇḍāya caramāno na turitaturito viya javena gacchati.
atk-s0201a:1274_5: Na hi javena piṇḍapātiyadhutaṅgaṃ nāma kiñci atthi.
atk-s0201a:1274_6: Visamabhūmibhāgappattaṃ pana udakasakaṭaṃ viya niccalo hutvā gacchati.
atk-s0201a:1274_7: Anugharaṃ paviṭṭho ca taṃ dātukāmaṃ vā adātukāmaṃ vā sallakkhetuṃ tadanurūpaṃ kālaṃ āgamento bhikkhaṃ
atk-s0201a:1274_8: gahetvā antogāme vā bahigāme vā vihārameva vā āgantvā yathāphāsuke patirūpe okāse nisīditvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1274_9: manasikaronto āhāre paṭikūlasaññaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā akkhabbhañjanavaṇalepanaputtamaṃsūpamāvasena naṃ paccavekkhanto
atk-s0201a:1274_11: neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya.
atk-s0201a:1274_12: Bhuttāvī ca udakakiccaṃ katvā muhuttaṃ bhattakilamathaṃ paṭippassambhetvā yathā purebhattaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1274_16: ayaṃ vuccati harati ca paccāharati cāti.
atk-s0201a:1275_0: Idaṃ pana haraṇapaccāharaṇasaṅkhātaṃ gatapaccāgatikavattaṃ pūrento yadi upanissayasampanno hoti.
atk-s0201a:1275_13: atha buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāve khippābhiñño vā hoti seyyathāpi thero bāhiyo dārucīriyo,
atk-s0201a:1275_19: dhammakathiko vā seyyathāpi thero puṇṇo mantāṇiputto,
atk-s0201a:1275_22: sikkhākāmo vā seyyathāpi thero rāhulo buddhaputtoti.
atk-s0201a:1275_23: Iti imasmiṃ catukke yvāyaṃ harati ca paccāharati ca,
atk-s0201a:1276_2: idha bhikkhu abhikkamanto vā paṭikkamanto vā yathā andhaputhujjanā abhikkamādīsu “attā abhikkamati,
atk-s0201a:1276_5: Tathā asammuyhanto “abhikkamāmī”ti citte uppajjamāne teneva cittena saddhiṃ cittasamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu viññattiṃ janayamānā uppajjati,
atk-s0201a:1276_6: iti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasena ayaṃ kāyasammato aṭṭhisaṅghāto abhikkamati,
atk-s0201a:1276_7: tassevaṃ abhikkamato ekekapāduddharaṇe pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā,
atk-s0201a:1276_13: Tattha uddharaṇe pavattā rūpārūpadhammā atiharaṇaṃ na pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0201a:1276_18: Tattha tattheva pabbaṃ pabbaṃ sandhi sandhi odhi odhi hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilāni viya paṭapaṭāyantā bhijjanti.
atk-s0201a:1277_0: Aññaṃ uppajjate cittaṃ, aññaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati;
atk-s0201a:1280_0: Niṭṭhito abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hotīti padassa attho;
atk-s0201a:1281_0: Ālokite vilokiteti ettha pana ālokitaṃ nāma purato pekkhanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1281_2: Aññānipi heṭṭhā upari pacchato pekkhanavasena olokitaullokitāpalokitāni nāma honti,
atk-s0201a:1281_5: iminā vā mukhena sabbānipi tāni gahitānevāti.
atk-s0201a:1282_0: Tattha “ālokessāmī”ti citte uppanne cittavaseneva anoloketvā atthapariggahaṇaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1282_1: Taṃ āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1282_5: sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā nando puratthimaṃ disaṃ āloketi,
atk-s0201a:1282_6: evaṃ me puratthimaṃ disaṃ ālokayato na abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyunti iti so tattha sampajāno hoti, sace,
atk-s0201a:1282_12: sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvā nando anudisaṃ āloketi.
atk-s0201a:1283_0: Apica idhāpi pubbe vuttacetiyadassanādivaseneva sātthakatā ca sappāyatā ca veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:1283_3: kasiṇādikammaṭṭhānikehi vā pana kammaṭṭhānasīseneva ālokanavilokanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1283_4: Abbhantare attā nāma āloketā vā viloketā vā natthi,
atk-s0201a:1283_5: ālokessāmīti pana citte uppajjamāne teneva cittena saddhiṃ cittasamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu viññattiṃ janayamānā uppajjati.
atk-s0201a:1283_6: Iti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravaseneva heṭṭhimaṃ akkhidalaṃ adho sīdati,
atk-s0201a:1287_0: Tattha bhavaṅgaṃ upapattibhavassa aṅgakiccaṃ sādhayamānaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0201a:1287_8: ayaṃ puriso”ti rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena ālokitavilokitaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0201a:1287_11: Etesu pana yuddhamaṇḍale yodhesu viya heṭṭhupariyavasena bhijjitvā patitesu “ayaṃ itthī,
atk-s0201a:1288_0: Cakkhudvāre pana rūpe āpāthagate bhavaṅgacalanato uddhaṃ sakakiccaṃ nipphādanavasena āvajjanādīsu uppajjitvā niruddhesu avasāne javanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0201a:1288_1: Taṃ pubbe uppannānaṃ āvajjanādīnaṃ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āgantukapuriso viya hoti.
atk-s0201a:1288_2: Tassa yathā paragehe kiñci yācituṃ paviṭṭhassa āgantukapurisassa gehasāmikesu tuṇhīmāsinesu āṇākaraṇaṃ na yuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1288_3: Evaṃ āvajjanādīnaṃ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āvajjanādīsupi arajjantesu adussantesu amuyhantesu ca rajjanadussanamuyhanaṃ
atk-s0201a:1289_0: Yāni pana tāni cakkhudvāre voṭṭhabbapanapariyosānāni cittāni uppajjanti,
atk-s0201a:1289_1: tāni saddhiṃ sampayuttadhammehi tattha tattheva bhijjanti,
atk-s0201a:1289_2: aññamaññaṃ na passantīti ittarāni tāvakālikāni honti.
atk-s0201a:1289_3: Tattha yathā ekasmiṃ ghare sabbesu mānusakesu matesu avasesassa ekassa taṅkhaṇeññeva maraṇadhammassa na yuttā naccagītādīsu abhirati nāma,
atk-s0201a:1289_4: evameva ekadvāre sasampayuttesu āvajjanādīsu tattha tattheva matesu avasesassa taṅkhaṇeññeva maraṇadhammassa
atk-s0201a:1289_5: javanassāpi rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena abhirati nāma na yuttāti evaṃ tāvakālikabhāvavasena asammohasampajaññaṃ
atk-s0201a:1290_1: Ettha hi cakkhu ceva rūpañca rūpakkhandho,
atk-s0201a:1290_6: Evametesaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0201a:1290_13: Evametesaṃ catunnaṃ āyatanānaṃ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0201a:1290_20: Evametāsaṃ catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0201a:1291_1: Tattha cittavaseneva samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ akatvā hatthapādānaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇapaccayā atthānatthaṃ pariggahetvā atthapariggahaṇaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1291_2: Tattha hatthapāde aticiraṃ samiñjetvā pasāretvā eva vā ṭhitassa khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjanti,
atk-s0201a:1291_6: Kāle samiñjentassa kāle pasārentassa pana tā vedanā na uppajjanti,
atk-s0201a:1292_0: Atthe pana satipi sappāyāsappāyaṃ pariggaṇhitvā sappāyapariggahaṇaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1292_4: Tatreko daharo hatthaṃ pasārento kāyasaṃsaggaṃ patvā teneva kāraṇena gihī jāto.
atk-s0201a:1292_5: Aparopi bhikkhu pādaṃ pasārento aggimhi pasāresi,
atk-s0201a:1292_11: Tasmā evarūpe asappāye apasāretvā sappāye pasāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1293_1: mahāthero kira divāṭṭhāne nisinno antevāsikehi saddhiṃ kathayamāno sahasā hatthaṃ samiñjetvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā saṇikaṃ samiñjesi.
atk-s0201a:1293_2: Taṃ antevāsikā pucchiṃsu “kasmā bhante sahasā hatthaṃ samiñjetvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā saṇikaṃ samiñjayitthā”ti.
atk-s0201a:1293_5: na me kammaṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā hattho samiñjitapubbo,
atk-s0201a:1293_6: idāni pana tumhehi saddhiṃ kathayamānena kammaṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā samiñjito,
atk-s0201a:1293_7: tasmā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā samiñjesinti. Sādhu, bhante,
atk-s0201a:1294_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci samiñjento vā pasārento vā natthi.
atk-s0201a:1294_2: samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ hotīti evaṃ parijānanaṃ panettha asammohasampajaññanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1295_0: Saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇeti ettha saṅghāṭicīvarānaṃ nivāsanapārupanavasena pattassa bhikkhāpaṭiggahaṇādivasena paribhogo dhāraṇaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:1295_1: Tattha saṅghāṭicīvaradhāraṇe tāva nivāsetvā pārupitvā ca piṇḍāya carato āmisalābho “sītassa paṭighātāyā”tiādinā
atk-s0201a:1295_2: nayena bhagavatā vuttappakāroyeva ca attho attho nāma.
atk-s0201a:1296_0: Uṇhapakatikassa pana dubbalassa ca cīvaraṃ sukhumaṃ sappāyaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1296_6: Tādisañhi araññe ekakassa nivāsantarāyakaraṃ jīvitantarāyakaraṃ vāpi hoti.
atk-s0201a:1297_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci cīvaraṃ pārupanto natthi.
atk-s0201a:1297_6: dhātuyova dhātusamūhaṃ paṭicchādenti paṭapilotikāya potthakarūpapaṭicchādane viya.
atk-s0201a:1297_7: Tasmā neva sundaraṃ cīvaraṃ labhitvā somanassaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1297_9: Nāgavammikacetiyarukkhādīsu hi keci mālāgandhadhūmavatthādīhi sakkāraṃ karonti,
atk-s0201a:1297_11: na te nāgavammikarukkhādayo somanassaṃ vā domanassaṃ vā karonti;
atk-s0201a:1297_12: evameva neva sundaraṃ cīvaraṃ labhitvā somanassaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1297_13: na asundaraṃ labhitvā domanassanti evaṃ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasena panettha asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1298_0: Pattadhāraṇepi pattaṃ sahasāva aggahetvā imaṃ gahetvā piṇḍāya caramāno bhikkhaṃ labhissāmīti evaṃ pattagahaṇapaccayā
atk-s0201a:1299_4: Maṇivaṇṇapatto pana lobhanīyo cīvare vuttanayeneva asappāyo.
atk-s0201a:1299_5: Nimittakammādivasena laddho pana yañcassa sevamānassa akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti,
atk-s0201a:1300_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci pattaṃ gaṇhanto natthi.
atk-s0201a:1300_6: Dhātuyova dhātusamūhaṃ gaṇhanti saṇḍāsena aggivaṇṇapattaggahaṇe viyāti evaṃ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1301_0: Apica yathā chinnahatthapāde vaṇamukhehi paggharitapubbalohitakimikule nīlamakkhikasamparikiṇṇe anāthasālāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:1301_1: nipanne anāthamanusse disvā dayālukā purisā tesaṃ vaṇapaṭṭacoḷakāni ceva kapālādīhi ca bhesajjāni upanāmenti.
atk-s0201a:1301_6: na te tattha sumanā vā dummanā vā honti.
