atk-s0201a:1875_22: Tasmā ānisaṃsaṃ dassento ime pañca guṇe dassesi.
atk-s0201a:1875_23: Anusāsanī karaṇīyāti punappunaṃ sāsane kattabbaṃ nāhosi.
atk-s0201a:1876_0: Idāni nesaṃ subbacabhāvadīpikaṃ upamaṃ āharanto seyyathāpītiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:1876_2: “Subhūmyaṃ sukhette vihatakhāṇuke bījāni patiṭṭhapeyyā”ti ettha pana maṇḍabhūmi subhūmīti āgatā.
atk-s0201a:1876_5: Odhastapatodoti yathā rathaṃ abhiruhitvā ṭhitena sakkā hoti gaṇhituṃ,
atk-s0201a:1877_0: Evameva khoti yathā hi so yoggācariyo yena yena maggena gamanaṃ icchati,
atk-s0201a:1877_4: Rathaṃ pesetvā assā neva vāretabbā na vijjhitabbā honti.
atk-s0201a:1877_5: Kevalaṃ tesaṃ same bhūmibhāge khuresu nimittaṃ ṭhapetvā gamanameva passitabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:1877_6: Evaṃ mayhampi tesu bhikkhūsu punappunaṃ vattabbaṃ nāhosi.
atk-s0201a:1877_7: Idaṃ karotha idaṃ mā karothāti satuppādanamattameva kattabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:1877_10: Tasmāti yasmā subbacā yuttayānapaṭibhāgā hutvā satuppādanamatteneva pajahiṃsu,
atk-s0201a:1877_14: Visodheyyāti elaṇḍe ceva aññā ca valliyo chinditvā bahi nīharaṇena sodheyya.
atk-s0201a:1877_16: Sammā parihareyyāti mariyādaṃ bandhitvā udakāsiñcanenapi kālenakālaṃ mūlamūle khaṇanenapi valligumbādicchedanenapi
atk-s0201a:1878_16: taṃ taṃ bhindati vā chiddaṃ vā karoti,
atk-s0201a:1879_0: Divā uṭṭhāsīti pātova kattabbāni dhenuduhanādikammāni akatvā ussūre uṭṭhitā.
atk-s0201a:1879_2: Kiṃ je divā uṭṭhāsīti kiṃ te kiñci aphāsukaṃ atthi,
atk-s0201a:1879_4: No vata re kiñcīti are yadi te na kiñci aphāsukaṃ atthi,
atk-s0201a:1879_7: atha kasmā pāpi dāsi divā uṭṭhāsīti kupitā anattamanā bhākuṭimakāsi.
atk-s0201a:1879_9: Anattamanavācanti are pāpi dāsi attano pamāṇaṃ na jānāsi;
atk-s0201a:1879_11: idāni taṃ sikkhāpessāmītiādīni vadamānā kupitavacanaṃ nicchāresi.
atk-s0201a:1880_9: sakadāgāmī anāgāmī arahā nu khoti vattabbataṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0201a:1881_0: Atha bhikkhu soratoti veditabboti atha adhivāsanakkhantiyaṃ ṭhito bhikkhu soratoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:1881_2: parikkhārahetūti yo etāni cīvarādīni paṇītapaṇītāni labhanto pādaparikammapiṭṭhiparikammādīni ekavacaneneva karoti.
atk-s0201a:1881_5: Dhammaññeva sakkarontoti dhammaṃyeva sakkāraṃ sukatakāraṃ karonto.
atk-s0201a:1881_9: Apacāyamānoti dhammaṃyeva apacāyamāno apacitiṃ nīcavuttiṃ dassento.
atk-s0201a:1882_1: Evaṃ akkhantiyā dosaṃ dassetvā idāni ye adhivāsenti,
atk-s0201a:1882_2: te evaṃ adhivāsentīti pañca vacanapathe dassento pañcime,
atk-s0201a:1882_14: Tadārammaṇañcāti kathaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ karoti?
atk-s0201a:1882_15: Pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgataṃ puggalaṃ mettacittassa ārammaṇaṃ katvā puna tasseva mettacittassa avasesasatte
atk-s0201a:1882_16: ārammaṇaṃ karonto sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ karoti nāma.
atk-s0201a:1882_26: Pharitvā viharissāmāti evarūpena mettāsahagatena cetasā tañca puggalaṃ sabbañca lokaṃ tassa cittassa ārammaṇaṃ katvā adhimuccitvā viharissāma.
atk-s0201a:1883_4: Vikireyyāti pacchiyā paṃsuṃ uddharitvā bījāni viya vikireyya.
atk-s0201a:1883_6: Apathaviṃ kareyyāti evaṃ kāyena ca vācāya ca payogaṃ katvāpi sakkuṇeyya apathaviṃ kātunti?
atk-s0201a:1883_7: Gambhīrāti bahalattena dviyojanasatasahassāni cattāri ca nahutāni gambhīrā.
atk-s0201a:1883_11: Kudālapiṭakaṃ gahetvā āgatapuriso viya pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalo.
atk-s0201a:1883_12: Yathā so kudālapiṭakena mahāpathaviṃ apathaviṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:1883_13: evaṃ vo pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalo mettacittassa aññathattaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissatīti.
atk-s0201a:1884_4: dvinnaṃ kaṭṭhānaṃ vā dvinnaṃ rukkhānaṃ vā dvinnaṃ seyyānaṃ vā dvinnaṃ selānaṃ vā antaraṃ paricchinnākāsarūpanti āgataṃ,
atk-s0201a:1884_13: Tulikapañcamā cattāro raṅgajātā viya pañca vacanapathā,
atk-s0201a:1884_14: tulikapañcame raṅge gahetvā āgatapuriso viya pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalo.
atk-s0201a:1884_15: Yathā so tulikapañcamehi raṅgehi ākāse rūpapātubhāvaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:1884_16: evaṃ vo pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalo mettacittassa aññathattaṃ katvā dosuppattiṃ dassetuṃ na sakkhissatīti.
atk-s0201a:1885_2: Gambhīrā appameyyāti imissā gaṅgāya gambhīraṭṭhānaṃ gāvutampi atthi,
atk-s0201a:1885_8: Etena payogena parivattetvā uddhane udakaṃ viya tāpetuṃ asakkuṇeyyato.
atk-s0201a:1885_9: Ṭhitodakaṃ pana kenaci upāyena aṅgulamattaṃ vā aḍḍhaṅgulamattaṃ vā evaṃ tāpetuṃ sakkā bhaveyya,
atk-s0201a:1885_13: tiṇukkaṃ ādāya āgatapuriso viya pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalo.
atk-s0201a:1885_14: Yathā so ādittāya tiṇukkāya gaṅgaṃ tāpetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:1885_15: evaṃ vo pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalo mettacittassa aññathattaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissatīti.
atk-s0201a:1886_3: Suparimadditāti anto ca bahi ca samantato suparimadditā.
atk-s0201a:1886_8: kaṭṭhakaṭhalaṃ ādāya āgatapuriso viya pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalo.
atk-s0201a:1886_9: Yathā so kaṭṭhena vā kaṭhalena vā biḷārabhastaṃ sarasaraṃ bharabharaṃ saddaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:1886_10: evaṃ vo pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalo mettacittassa aññathattaṃ katvā dosānugatabhāvaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissatīti.
atk-s0201a:1887_3: Yo mano padūseyyāti yo bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā mano padūseyya,
atk-s0201a:1887_5: Na me so tena sāsanakaroti so tena anadhivāsanena mayhaṃ ovādakaro na hoti.
atk-s0201a:1888_1: Aṇuṃ vā thūlaṃ vāti appasāvajjaṃ vā mahāsāvajjaṃ vā.
atk-s0201a:1888_2: Yaṃ tumhe nādhivāseyyāthāti yo tumhehi adhivāsetabbo na bhaveyyāti attho. No hetaṃ, bhanteti, bhante,
atk-s0201a:1888_3: anadhivāsetabbaṃ nāma vacanapathaṃ na passāmāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0201a:1888_4: Dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyāti iti bhagavā arahattena kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto yathānusandhinā desanaṃ niṭṭhapesīti.
atk-s0201a:1892_15: te pana yāva ariye na khamāpenti, tāvadeva,
atk-s0201a:1892_17: Sañcicca vītikkantā satta āpattikkhandhā āṇāvītikkamantarāyikā nāma.
atk-s0201a:1893_0: Tatrāyaṃ bhikkhu bahussuto dhammakathiko sesantarāyike jānāti,
atk-s0201a:1893_1: vinaye pana akovidattā paṇṇattivītikkamantarāyike na jānāti,
atk-s0201a:1893_3: ime āgārikā pañca kāmaguṇe paribhuñjantā sotāpannāpi sakadāgāminopi anāgāminopi honti.
atk-s0201a:1893_10: Evaṃ rasena rasaṃ saṃsandetvā sacchandarāgaparibhogañca nicchandarāgaparibhogañca ekaṃ katvā thūlavākehi saddhiṃ atisukhumasuttaṃ upanento viya,
atk-s0201a:1893_13: “kiṃ bhagavatā mahāsamuddaṃ bandhantena viya mahatā ussāhena paṭhamapārājikaṃ paññattaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1893_14: natthi ettha doso”ti sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ paṭivirujjhanto vesārajjañāṇaṃ paṭibāhanto ariyamagge
atk-s0201a:1893_15: khāṇukaṇṭakādīni pakkhipanto methunadhamme doso natthīti jinassa āṇācakke pahāraṃ adāsi. Tenāha –
atk-s0201a:1894_0: Evaṃ byā khoti evaṃ viya kho.
atk-s0201a:1894_4: Kena kāraṇena evaṃ vadasīti kāraṇaṃ pucchantā samanubhāsanti nāma.
atk-s0201a:1894_17: Abhinivissa voharatīti adhiṭṭhahitvā voharati dīpeti vā.
atk-s0201a:1895_1: Yato kho te bhikkhūti yadā te bhikkhū.
atk-s0201a:1895_3: bhagavatāti idaṃ esa attano ajjhāsayena natthīti vattukāmopi bhagavato ānubhāvena sampaṭicchati,
atk-s0201a:1895_4: buddhānaṃ kira sammukhā dve kathā kathetuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:1896_1: Kassa kho nāma tvaṃ moghapurisāti tvaṃ moghapurisa kassa khattiyassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā vessassa vā suddassa
atk-s0201a:1896_2: vā gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā devassa vā manussassa vā mayā evaṃ dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāsi.
atk-s0201a:1896_3: Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesīti ayaṃ pāṭiyekko anusandhi.
atk-s0201a:1896_6: na kho pana moghapurisāti vuttamattakena maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo na hoti.
atk-s0201a:1896_11: Thero aparabhāge ghaṭento vāyamanto cha abhiññā sacchākāsi.
atk-s0201a:1896_12: Ahampi tathārūpaṃ vīriyaṃ paggaṇhitvā maggaphalāni nibbattessāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a:1896_13: Athassa bhagavā bandhanā pavuttassa paṇḍupalāsassa viya aviruḷhibhāvaṃ dassento imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a:1897_3: ayaṃ ariṭṭho evaṃladdhiko sabbaññutaññāṇena paṭivirujjhitvā vesārajjañāṇaṃ paṭibāhitvā tathāgatassa āṇācakke
atk-s0201a:1897_4: pahāraṃ dadamāno api nu imasmiṃ dhammavinaye usmīkatopi?
atk-s0201a:1897_5: Yathā nibbutepi mahante aggikkhandhe khajjupanakamattāpi aggipapaṭikā hotiyeva,
atk-s0201a:1897_7: Kiṃ nu kho evaṃ imassa appamattikāpi ñāṇusmā atthi,
atk-s0201a:1897_8: yaṃ nissāya vāyamanto maggaphalāni nibbatteyyāti? No hetaṃ, bhanteti, bhante,
atk-s0201a:1897_10: Maggaphalānaṃ paccayasamatthāya ñāṇusmāya usmīkatabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipantā vadanti.
atk-s0201a:1897_13: Appaṭibhānoti kiñci paṭibhānaṃ apassanto bhinnapaṭibhāno evarūpampi nāma niyyānikasāsanaṃ labhitvā aviruḷhidhammo
atk-s0201a:1897_14: kiramhi samugghātitapaccayo jātoti attano abhabbataṃ paccavekkhanto pādaṅguṭṭhakena bhūmiṃ khaṇamāno nisīdi.
atk-s0201a:1898_3: na kho pana buddhā saupanissayānaṃyeva dhammaṃ desenti,
atk-s0201a:1898_5: ahaṃ satthu santikā sugatovādaṃ labhitvā attano sampattūpagaṃ kusalaṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a:1898_10: mama santikā tuyhaṃ sugatovādo nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a:1899_1: Atha kho bhagavāti ayampi pāṭiyekko anusandhi.
atk-s0201a:1899_4: Sace hi parisagatānaṃ kassaci evaṃ bhaveyya –
atk-s0201a:1899_5: “ayaṃ ariṭṭho bhagavatā akathitaṃ kathetuṃ kiṃ sakkhissati,
atk-s0201a:1899_6: kacci nu kho parisamajjhe bhagavatā kathāya samāraddhāya sahasā kathita”nti.
atk-s0201a:1899_7: Evaṃ kathitaṃ pana na ariṭṭhova suṇāti,
atk-s0201a:1899_10: mampi evaṃ niggaṇheyyāti sutvāpi tuṇhībhāvaṃ āpajjeyyā”ti.
atk-s0201a:1899_15: Parisāya pana laddhisodhaneneva ariṭṭho gaṇato nissārito nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:1900_0: Idāni ariṭṭhassa laddhiṃ pakāsento so vata,
atk-s0201a:1900_5: so vata kilesakāmehi ceva kilesakāmasampayuttehi saññāvitakkehi ca aññatra,
atk-s0201a:1901_1: Evaṃ bhagavā ayaṃ ariṭṭho yathā nāma rajako sugandhānipi duggandhānipi jiṇṇānipi navānipi suddhānipi asuddhānipi vatthāni ekato bhaṇḍikaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a:1901_2: evameva bhikkhūnaṃ nicchandarāgapaṇītacīvarādiparibhogañca anibaddhasīlānaṃ gahaṭṭhānaṃ antarāyakaraṃ
atk-s0201a:1901_3: sacchandarāgaparibhogañca nibaddhasīlānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āvaraṇakaraṃ sacchandarāgaparibhogañca sabbaṃ ekasadisaṃ
atk-s0201a:1901_4: karotīti ariṭṭhassa laddhiṃ pakāsetvā idāni duggahitāya pariyattiyā dosaṃ dassento idha,
atk-s0201a:1901_10: aññampi ca suttanāmakaṃ tathāgatavacanaṃ suttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1901_15: yañca aññampi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi asaṅgahitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1901_20: suttanipāte nosuttanāmikā suddhikagāthā ca gāthāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:1901_26: acchariyā abbhutā dhammā ānande”tiādinayappavattā sabbepi acchariyaabbhutadhammappaṭisaṃyuttā suttantā abbhutadhammanti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:1902_0: Atthaṃ na upaparikkhantīti atthatthaṃ kāraṇatthaṃ na passanti na pariggaṇhanti.
atk-s0201a:1902_2: Na nijjhānaṃ khamantīti na upaṭṭhahanti na āpāthaṃ āgacchanti,
atk-s0201a:1902_3: imasmiṃ ṭhāne sīlaṃ samādhi vipassanā maggo phalaṃ vaṭṭaṃ vivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti evaṃ jānituṃ na sakkā hontīti attho.
atk-s0201a:1902_4: Te upārambhānisaṃsā cevāti te paresaṃ vāde dosāropanānisaṃsā hutvā pariyāpuṇantīti attho.
atk-s0201a:1902_6: parehi sakavāde dose āropite taṃ dosaṃ evaṃ mocessāmāti imināva kāraṇena pariyāpuṇantīti attho.
atk-s0201a:1902_7: Tañcassa atthaṃ nānubhontīti yassa ca maggassa vā phalassa vā atthāya kulaputtā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti,
atk-s0201a:1902_8: tañcassa dhammassa atthaṃ ete duggahitaggāhino nānubhonti.
atk-s0201a:1902_9: Apica parassa vāde upārambhaṃ āropetuṃ attano vādaṃ mocetuṃ asakkontāpi tañca atthaṃ nānubhontiyeva.
atk-s0201a:1903_3: taṃ tassa alaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ atthīti alagaddo.
atk-s0201a:1903_7: ekacce kulaputtā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇantīti nittharaṇapariyattivasena uggaṇhanti.
atk-s0201a:1903_8: Tisso hi pariyattiyo alagaddapariyatti nittharaṇapariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyattīti.
atk-s0201a:1904_0: Tattha yo buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā evaṃ cīvarādīni vā labhissāmi,
atk-s0201a:1904_1: catuparisamajjhe vā maṃ jānissantīti lābhasakkārahetu pariyāpuṇāti,
atk-s0201a:1904_3: Evaṃ pariyāpuṇato hi buddhavacanaṃ apariyāpuṇitvā niddokkamanaṃ varataraṃ.
atk-s0201a:1905_0: Yo pana buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā sīlassa āgataṭṭhāne sīlaṃ pūretvā samādhissa āgataṭṭhāne samādhigabbhaṃ
atk-s0201a:1905_1: gaṇhāpetvā vipassanāya āgataṭṭhāne vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā maggaphalānaṃ āgataṭṭhāne maggaṃ bhāvessāmi
atk-s0201a:1905_3: tassa sā pariyatti nittharaṇapariyatti nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:1906_1: Tassa hi apariññātaṃ appahīnaṃ abhāvitaṃ asacchikataṃ vā natthi.
atk-s0201a:1906_2: So hi pariññātakkhandho pahīnakileso bhāvitamaggo sacchikataphalo,
atk-s0201a:1906_3: tasmā buddhavacanaṃ pariyāpuṇanto tantidhārako paveṇipālako vaṃsānurakkhakova hutvā uggaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a:1906_4: Itissa sā pariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:1907_0: Yo pana puthujjano chātabhayādīsu ganthadharesu ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasituṃ asakkontesu sayaṃ bhikkhācārena
atk-s0201a:1907_8: Puthujjanassa hi pariyatti nāma alagaddā vā hoti nittharaṇā vā,
atk-s0201a:1908_0: Nijjhānaṃ khamantīti sīlādīnaṃ āgataṭṭhānesu idha sīlaṃ kathitaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1908_7: Tañcassa atthaṃ anubhontīti yesaṃ maggaphalānaṃ atthāya pariyāpuṇanti.
atk-s0201a:1908_8: Suggahitapariyattiṃ nissāya maggaṃ bhāvetvā phalaṃ sacchikarontā tañcassa dhammassa atthaṃ anubhavanti.
atk-s0201a:1908_9: Paravāde upārambhaṃ āropetuṃ sakkontāpi sakavāde āropitaṃ dosaṃ icchiticchitaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā mocetuṃ sakkontāpi anubhontiyeva.
atk-s0201a:1908_10: Dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattantīti sīlādīnaṃ āgataṭṭhāne sīlādīni pūrentānampi,
atk-s0201a:1908_13: arahattaṃ patvā parisamajjhe dhammaṃ desetvā dhammadesanāya pasannehi upanīte cattāro paccaye paribhuñjantānampi
atk-s0201a:1909_0: Evaṃ suggahite buddhavacane ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā idāni tattheva niyojento tasmā tiha,
atk-s0201a:1909_2: Tattha tasmāti yasmā duggahitapariyatti duggahitaalagaddo viya dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattati,
atk-s0201a:1909_3: suggahitapariyatti suggahitaalagaddo viya dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati,
atk-s0201a:1909_5: Tathā naṃ dhāreyyāthāti tatheva naṃ dhāreyyātha,
atk-s0201a:1909_7: Ye vā panāssu viyattā bhikkhūti ye vā pana aññe sāriputtamoggallānamahākassapamahākaccānādikā byattā paṇḍitā bhikkhū assu,
atk-s0201a:1909_9: Ariṭṭhena viya pana mama sāsane na kalalaṃ vā kacavaraṃ vā pakkhipitabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1910_3: Udakaṇṇavanti yañhi udakaṃ gambhīraṃ na puthulaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1910_8: Tasmā mahantaṃ udakaṇṇavanti mahantaṃ puthulaṃ gambhīraṃ udakanti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0201a:1910_9: Sāsaṅkaṃ nāma yattha corānaṃ nivutthokāso dissati.
atk-s0201a:1910_13: Sappaṭibhayaṃ nāma yattha corehi manussā hatā dissanti,
atk-s0201a:1910_17: Kullaṃ bandhitvāti kullo nāma taraṇatthāya kalāpaṃ katvā baddho.
atk-s0201a:1910_18: Pattharitvā baddhā pana padaracāṭiādayo uḷumpoti vuccanti.
atk-s0201a:1910_22: Dhammāpi vo pahātabbāti ettha dhammāti samathavipassanā.
atk-s0201a:1910_25: Samathe chandarāgaṃ kattha pajahāpesi? “Iti kho, udāyi,
atk-s0201a:1910_28: taṃ saṃyojanaṃ aṇuṃ vā thūlaṃ vā,
atk-s0201a:1910_29: yassāhaṃ no pahānaṃ vadāmī”ti ettha samathe chandarāgaṃ pajahāpesi.
atk-s0201a:1910_32: diṭṭhiṃ evaṃ parisuddhaṃ evaṃ pariyodātaṃ na allīyetha na kelāyetha na dhanāyethā”ti ettha vipassanāya chandarāgaṃ pajahāpesi.
atk-s0201a:1910_33: Idha pana ubhayattha pajahāpento “dhammāpi vo pahātabbā,
atk-s0201a:1911_2: ahaṃ evarūpesu santappaṇītesu dhammesu chandarāgappahānaṃ vadāmi,
atk-s0201a:1911_3: kiṃ pana imasmiṃ asaddhamme gāmadhamme vasaladhamme duṭṭhulle odakantike,
atk-s0201a:1911_4: yattha ayaṃ ariṭṭho moghapuriso niddosasaññī pañcasu kāmaguṇesu chandarāgaṃ nālaṃ antarāyāyāti vadati.
atk-s0201a:1911_5: Ariṭṭhena viya na tumhehi mayhaṃ sāsane kalalaṃ vā kacavaraṃ vā pakkhipitabbanti evaṃ bhagavā imināpi ovādena ariṭṭhaṃyeva niggaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a:1912_1: Idāni yo pañcasu khandhesu tividhaggāhavasena ahaṃ mamanti gaṇhāti,
atk-s0201a:1912_2: so mayhaṃ sāsane ayaṃ ariṭṭho viya kalalaṃ kacavaraṃ pakkhipatīti dassento chayimāni,
atk-s0201a:1912_7: Rūpaṃ etaṃ mamātiādīsu etaṃ mamāti taṇhāggāho.
atk-s0201a:1912_18: Pattanti pariyesitvā vā apariyesitvā vā pattaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1912_19: Pariyesitanti pattaṃ vā appattaṃ vā pariyesitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1913_0: Atha vā pariyesitvā pattampi apariyesitvā pattampi pattaṭṭhena pattaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:1913_3: Sabbaṃ vā etaṃ manasā anuvicaritattā manasānuvicaritaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:1913_6: Yampi taṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhānanti yampi etaṃ so lokotiādinā nayena pavattaṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1914_0: So loko so attāti yā esā “rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”tiādinā nayena pavattā diṭṭhi loko ca attā cāti gaṇhāti,
atk-s0201a:1914_2: So pecca bhavissāmīti so ahaṃ paralokaṃ gantvā nicco bhavissāmi,
atk-s0201a:1914_5: Tampi etaṃ mamāti tampi dassanaṃ etaṃ mama,
atk-s0201a:1914_9: Vipassanāya paṭivipassanākāle viya pacchimadiṭṭhiyā purimadiṭṭhiggahaṇakāle evaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:1915_0: Sukkapakkhe rūpaṃ netaṃ mamāti rūpe taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāhā paṭikkhittā.
atk-s0201a:1915_2: Samanupassatīti imassa pana padassa taṇhāsamanupassanā mānasamanupassanā diṭṭhisamanupassanā ñāṇasamanupassanāti catasso samanupassanāti attho.
atk-s0201a:1915_5: Asati na paritassatīti avijjamāne bhayaparitassanāya taṇhāparitassanāya vā na paritassati.
atk-s0201a:1915_6: Iminā bhagavā ajjhattakkhandhavināse aparitassamānaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ dassento desanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0201a:1916_1: Evaṃ vutte aññataro bhikkhūti evaṃ bhagavatā vutte aññataro anusandhikusalo bhikkhu –
atk-s0201a:1916_2: “bhagavatā ajjhattakkhandhavināse aparitassantaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ dassetvā desanā niṭṭhāpitā,
atk-s0201a:1916_3: ajjhattaṃ aparitassante kho pana sati ajjhattaṃ paritassakena bahiddhā parikkhāravināse paritassakena aparitassakena cāpi bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1916_4: Iti imehi catūhi kāraṇehi ayaṃ pañho pucchitabbo”ti cintetvā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā añjaliṃ paggayha bhagavantaṃ etadavoca.
atk-s0201a:1916_6: Ahu vata meti ahosi vata me bhaddakaṃ yānaṃ vāhanaṃ hiraññaṃ suvaṇṇanti attho.
atk-s0201a:1916_7: Taṃ vata me natthīti taṃ vata idāni mayhaṃ natthi,
atk-s0201a:1916_12: Siyā vata meti bhaveyya vata mayhaṃ yānaṃ vāhanaṃ hiraññaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ sāli vīhi yavo godhumo.
atk-s0201a:1916_13: Taṃ vatāhaṃ na labhāmīti tamahaṃ alabhamāno tadanucchavikaṃ kammaṃ akatvā nisinnattā idāni na labhāmīti socati,
atk-s0201a:1917_0: Aparitassanāvāre na evaṃ hotīti yehi kilesehi evaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0201a:1917_9: Tadeva ca āgamma khandhūpadhi kilesūpadhi abhisaṅkhārūpadhi,
atk-s0201a:1917_15: iti sabbeheva imehi padehi nibbānassa sacchikiriyatthāya dhammaṃ desentassāti ayamattho dīpito.
atk-s0201a:1917_16: Tassevaṃ hotīti tassa diṭṭhigatikassa ucchijjissāmi nāmassu,
atk-s0201a:1917_19: Diṭṭhigatikassa hi tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā suññatāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ katvā desiyamānaṃ dhammaṃ suṇantassa tāso uppajjati.
atk-s0201a:1918_1: Ettāvatā bahiddhāparikkhāravināse tassanakassa ca notassanakassa ca ajjhattakkhandhavināse tassanakassa
atk-s0201a:1918_2: ca notassanakassa cāti imesaṃ vasena catukkoṭikā suññatā kathitā.
atk-s0201a:1918_3: Idāni bahiddhā parikkhāraṃ pariggahaṃ nāma katvā,
atk-s0201a:1918_5: sakkāyadiṭṭhipamukhā dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo diṭṭhinissayaṃ nāma katvā tikoṭikaṃ suññataṃ dassetuṃ taṃ,
atk-s0201a:1919_1: Evaṃ tikoṭikaṃ suññataṃ dassetvā idāni ajjhattakkhandhe attāti bahiddhā parikkhāre attaniyanti katvā dvikoṭikaṃ dassento attani vā,
atk-s0201a:1919_6: attani vā sati idaṃ me parikkhārajātaṃ attaniyanti assa,
atk-s0201a:1919_7: attaniyeva vā parikkhāre sati ayaṃ me attā imassa parikkhārassa sāmīti,
atk-s0201a:1920_0: Idāni ime pañcakkhandhe aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti evaṃ tiparivaṭṭavasena aggaṇhanto ayaṃ ariṭṭho viya
atk-s0201a:1920_1: mayhaṃ sāsane kalalaṃ kacavaraṃ pakkhipatīti dassento taṃ kiṃ maññatha,
atk-s0201a:1920_7: Uppādavayavattito vipariṇāmatāvakālikaniccapaṭikkhepaṭṭhena vāti catūhi kāraṇehi aniccaṃ. Dukkhaṃ, bhanteti, bhante,
atk-s0201a:1920_11: Kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ etaṃ mama,
atk-s0201a:1920_13: eso me attāti yuttaṃ nu kho taṃ imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāhānaṃ vasena ahaṃ mamāti evaṃ gahetuṃ. No hetaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1920_14: bhanteti iminā te bhikkhū avasavattanākārena rūpaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0201a:1921_0: Bhagavā hi katthaci aniccavasena anattattaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0201a:1921_6: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati,
atk-s0201a:1921_7: attā me uppajjati ca veti cāti iccassa evamāgataṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:1921_8: tasmā taṃ na upapajjati cakkhu attāti yo vadeyya,
atk-s0201a:1921_9: iti cakkhu anattā”ti imasmiñhi chachakkasutte aniccavasena anattataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a:1921_14: labbhetha ca rūpe ‘evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu,
atk-s0201a:1921_20: na ca labbhati rūpe ‘evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu,
atk-s0201a:1921_21: evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī”’ti imasmiṃ anattalakkhaṇasutte dukkhavasena anattataṃ dasseti. “Rūpaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1921_27: na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabba”nti imasmiṃ arahattasutte ubhayavasena anattataṃ dasseti. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a:1922_0: Paribhogabhājanādīsu hi bhinnesu aho aniccanti vadanti,
atk-s0201a:1922_2: Sarīre gaṇḍapiḷakādīsu vā uṭṭhitāsu kaṇṭakena vā viddhā aho dukkhanti vadanti,
atk-s0201a:1922_3: aho anattāti pana vattā nāma natthi. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a:1922_4: Idañhi anattalakkhaṇaṃ nāma avibhūtaṃ duddasaṃ duppaññāpanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1922_5: Tena taṃ bhagavā aniccavasena vā dukkhavasena vā ubhayavasena vā dasseti.
atk-s0201a:1923_3: yasmā etarahi aññadāpi rūpaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā,
atk-s0201a:1925_6: pacchā nibbāne ñāṇa”nti evaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti vuttā.
atk-s0201a:1925_9: paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhatthaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti evaṃ paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhīti vuttā.
atk-s0201a:1925_12: nissāya atammayataṃ āgamma yāyaṃ upekkhā nānattā nānattasitā,
atk-s0201a:1925_13: taṃ abhinivajjetvā yāyaṃ upekkhā ekattā ekattasitā,
atk-s0201a:1925_14: taṃ nissāya taṃ āgamma evametissā pahānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:1925_15: evametissā samatikkamo hotī”ti evaṃ tammayatāpariyādānanti vuttā.
atk-s0201a:1925_19: ime dhammā ekatthā byañjanameva nāna”nti evaṃ tīhi nāmehi vuttā.
atk-s0201a:1925_21: anulomaṃ vodānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti evaṃ dvīhi nāmehi vuttā.
atk-s0201a:1925_22: Imasmiṃ pana alagaddasutte nibbindatīti nibbidānāmena āgatā.
atk-s0201a:1926_0: Nibbidā virajjatīti ettha virāgoti maggo virāgā vimuccatīti ettha virāgena maggena vimuccatīti phalaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1926_1: Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hotīti idha paccavekkhaṇā kathitā.
atk-s0201a:1927_0: Evaṃ vimuttacittaṃ mahākhīṇāsavaṃ dassetvā idāni tassa yathābhūtehi pañcahi kāraṇehi nāmaṃ gaṇhanto ayaṃ vuccati,
atk-s0201a:1927_6: samūlaṃ vā tālaṃ uddharitvā tālassa vatthu viya katā,
atk-s0201a:1927_7: yathā tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ puna so tālo na paññāyati,
atk-s0201a:1927_10: Jātisaṃsārotiādīsu jāyanavasena ceva saṃsaraṇavasena ca evaṃ laddhanāmānaṃ punabbhavakhandhānaṃ paccayo kammābhisaṅkhāro.
atk-s0201a:1927_11: So hi punappunaṃ uppattikaraṇavasena parikkhipitvā ṭhitattā parikkhāti vuccati,
atk-s0201a:1927_12: tenesa tassā saṃkiṇṇattā vikiṇṇattā saṃkiṇṇaparikkhoti vutto.
atk-s0201a:1927_15: Tenesa tassā abbūḷhattā luñcitvā chaḍḍitattā abbūḷhesikoti vutto.
atk-s0201a:1927_17: Etāni hi kavāṭaṃ viya nagaradvāraṃ cittaṃ pidahitvā ṭhitattā aggaḷāti vuccanti.
atk-s0201a:1927_18: Tenesa tesaṃ nirākatattā bhinnattā niraggaḷoti vutto.
atk-s0201a:1927_22: Apica idha mānabhārasseva oropitattā pannabhāroti adhippeto.
atk-s0201a:1927_23: Visaṃyuttoti catūhi yogehi sabbakilesehi ca visaṃyutto.
atk-s0201a:1927_24: Idha pana mānasaṃyogeneva visaṃyuttattā visaṃyuttoti adhippeto.
atk-s0201a:1927_25: Asmimānoti rūpe asmīti māno, vedanāya… saññāya…
atk-s0201a:1928_0: Ettāvatā bhagavatā maggena kilese khepetvā nirodhasayanavaragatassa nibbānārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā viharato khīṇāsavassa kālo dassito.
atk-s0201a:1928_1: Yathā hi dve nagarāni ekaṃ coranagaraṃ,
atk-s0201a:1928_6: coranagaraṃ anagaraṃ karissāmī”ti sannāhaṃ katvā khaggaṃ gahetvā coranagaraṃ upasaṅkamitvā nagaradvāre
atk-s0201a:1928_7: ussāpite esikatthambhe khaggena chinditvā sadvārabāhakaṃ kavāṭaṃ chinditvā palighaṃ ukkhipitvā pākāraṃ
atk-s0201a:1928_8: bhindanto parikkhaṃ saṃkiritvā nagarasobhanatthāya ussite dhaje pātetvā nagaraṃ agginā jhāpetvā khemanagaraṃ
atk-s0201a:1928_9: pavisitvā pāsādaṃ abhiruyha ñātigaṇaparivuto surasabhojanaṃ bhuñjeyya,
atk-s0201a:1928_16: So mahāyodho viya sannāhaṃ sīlasannāhaṃ katvā,
atk-s0201a:1928_17: paññākhaggaṃ gahetvā khaggena esikatthambhe viya arahattamaggena taṇhesikaṃ luñcitvā,
atk-s0201a:1928_18: so yodho sadvārabāhakaṃ nagarakavāṭaṃ viya pañcorambhāgiyasaṃyojanaggaḷaṃ ugghāṭetvā,
atk-s0201a:1928_21: so yodho pākāraṃ bhindanto parikkhaṃ viya kammābhisaṅkhāraṃ bhindanto jātisaṃsāraparikkhaṃ saṃkiritvā,
atk-s0201a:1928_22: so yodho nagarasobhanatthāya ussāpite dhaje viya mānaddhaje pātetvā sakkāyanagaraṃ jhāpetvā,
atk-s0201a:1928_23: so yodho khemanagare uparipāsāde surasabhojanaṃ viya kilesanibbānaṃ nagaraṃ pavisitvā amatanirodhārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:1929_1: Idāni evaṃ vimuttacittassa khīṇāsavassa parehi anadhigamanīyaviññāṇataṃ dassento evaṃ vimuttacittaṃ khotiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:1929_7: Tathāgatoti hi satte gahite asaṃvijjamānoti attho vaṭṭati,
atk-s0201a:1930_2: ahaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme dharamānakaṃyeva khīṇāsavaṃ tathāgato satto puggaloti na paññapemi.
atk-s0201a:1930_3: Appaṭisandhikaṃ pana parinibbutaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ sattoti vā puggaloti vā kiṃ paññapessāmi?
atk-s0201a:1930_5: Na hi paramatthato satto nāma koci atthi,
atk-s0201a:1930_6: tassa avijjamānassa idaṃ nissitaṃ viññāṇanti anvesantāpi kiṃ adhigacchissanti?
atk-s0201a:1930_10: ahaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme dharamānakaṃyeva khīṇāsavaṃ viññāṇavasena indādīhi avindiyaṃ vadāmi.
atk-s0201a:1930_11: Na hi saindā devā sabrahmakā sapajāpatikā anvesantāpi khīṇāsavassa vipassanācittaṃ vā maggacittaṃ vā phalacittaṃ vā,
atk-s0201a:1930_12: idaṃ nāma ārammaṇaṃ nissāya vattatīti jānituṃ sakkonti.
atk-s0201a:1931_13: Yathā cāhaṃ na vadāmīti yena vā kāraṇena ahaṃ sattavināsaṃ na paññapemi.
atk-s0201a:1931_17: tathā maṃ te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā “venayiko samaṇo gotamo”ti vadantā sattavināsako samaṇo gotamoti ca,
atk-s0201a:1931_18: “sato sattassa ucchedaṃ vināsaṃ vibhavaṃ paññapetī”ti vadantā sattavināsaṃ paññapetīti ca asatā tucchā musā abhūtena abbhācikkhantīti.
atk-s0201a:1932_3: dukkhassa ca nirodhanti dhammacakkaṃ appavattetvā bodhimaṇḍe viharantopi dhammacakkappavattanato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0201a:1932_5: Ettha hi dukkhaggahaṇena tassa mūlabhūto samudayo,
atk-s0201a:1932_6: nirodhaggahaṇena taṃsampāpako maggo gahitova hotīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:1932_11: Rosenti vihesentīti rosessāma vihesessāmāti adhippāyena ghaṭṭenti dukkhāpenti.
atk-s0201a:1933_6: Yaṃ kho idaṃ pubbe pariññātanti idaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ pubbe bodhimaṇḍe tīhi pariññāhi pariññātaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1933_9: Tatrāpi tathāgatassa ime sakkārā mayi karīyantīti vā ahaṃ ete anubhavāmīti vā na hoti.
atk-s0201a:1933_10: Pubbe pariññātakkhandhapañcakaṃyeva ete sakkāre anubhotīti ettakameva hotīti.
atk-s0201a:1933_11: Tasmāti yasmā saccāni paṭivijjhituṃ asamatthā tathāgatampi akkosanti, tasmā.
atk-s0201a:1934_3: yaṃ na tumhākanti yasmā attaniyepi chandarāgappahānaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati,
atk-s0201a:1934_6: Yathāpaccayaṃ vā kareyyāti yathā yathā iccheyya tathā tathā kareyya.
atk-s0201a:1934_9: etaṃ tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāsaṃ amhākaṃ neva attā na amhākaṃ rūpaṃ na viññāṇanti vadanti.
atk-s0201a:1934_10: Attaniyaṃ vāti amhākaṃ cīvarādiparikkhāropi na hotīti attho.
atk-s0201a:1934_13: yaṃ na tumhākaṃ taṃ pajahathāti bhagavā,
atk-s0201a:1935_1: Evaṃ svākkhātoti ettha tiparivaṭṭato paṭṭhāya yāva imaṃ ṭhānaṃ āharitumpi vaṭṭati,
atk-s0201a:1935_2: paṭilomena pemamattakena saggaparāyaṇato paṭṭhāya yāva imaṃ ṭhānaṃ āharitumpi vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a:1935_5: Chinnapilotikoti pilotikā vuccati chinnaṃ bhinnaṃ tattha tattha sibbitaṃ gaṇṭhikataṃ jiṇṇaṃ vatthaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1935_7: aṭṭhahatthaṃ vā navahatthaṃ vā ahatasāṭakaṃ nivattho,
atk-s0201a:1935_12: Imasmiñca sāsane samaṇakacavaraṃ nāma patiṭṭhātuṃ na labhati.
atk-s0201a:1941_0: Iti samaṇakacavarassa chinnattāpi ayaṃ dhammo chinnapilotiko nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:1941_1: Vaṭṭaṃ tesaṃ natthi paññāpanāyāti tesaṃ vaṭṭaṃ apaññattibhāvaṃ gataṃ nippaññattikaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1941_2: Evarūpo mahākhīṇāsavo evaṃ svākkhāte sāsaneyeva uppajjati.
atk-s0201a:1942_0: Tattha dhammānusārino saddhānusārinoti ime dve sotāpattimaggaṭṭhā honti. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a:1942_2: Yassa puggalassa sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa paññindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:1942_8: Yassa puggalassa sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:1942_13: Yesaṃ mayi saddhāmattaṃ pemamattanti iminā yesaṃ añño ariyadhammo natthi,
atk-s0201a:1942_16: Vipassakabhikkhūnañhi evaṃ vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nisinnānaṃ dasabale ekā saddhā ekaṃ pemaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0201a:1942_17: Tāya saddhāya tena pemena hatthe gahetvā sagge ṭhapitā viya honti,
atk-s0201a:1942_19: Porāṇakattherā pana evarūpaṃ bhikkhuṃ cūḷasotāpannoti vadanti.
atk-s0201a:1946_6: idaṃ phalaṃ vā khādanīyaṃ vā kassapassa dethā”ti vutte,
atk-s0201a:1946_7: katarassa kassapassāti kumārakassapassāti evaṃ gahitanāmattā tato paṭṭhāya vuḍḍhakālepi “kumārakassapo” tveva vuccati.
atk-s0201a:1947_0: Thero kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle seṭṭhiputto ahosi.
atk-s0201a:1947_1: Athekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ citrakathiṃ ekaṃ attano sāvakaṃ ṭhānantare ṭhapentaṃ disvā bhagavato sattāhaṃ dānaṃ datvā,
atk-s0201a:1947_2: “ahampi bhagavā anāgate ekassa buddhassa ayaṃ thero viya citrakathī sāvako bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ katvā
atk-s0201a:1947_3: puññāni karonto kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0201a:1948_0: Tadā kira parinibbutassa bhagavato sāsane osakkante pañca bhikkhū nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā pabbataṃ abhiruyha samaṇadhammaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:1948_3: Itare tayo visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkontā devaloke nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:1948_4: Tesaṃ ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devesu ca manussesu ca sampattiṃ anubhontānaṃ eko takkasilāyaṃ rājakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0201a:1948_5: pukkusāti nāma rājā hutvā bhagavantaṃ uddissa pabbajitvā rājagahaṃ gacchanto kumbhakārasālāyaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0201a:1948_7: Eko ekasmiṃ samuddapaṭṭane kulaghare nibbattitvā nāvaṃ āruyha bhinnanāvo dārucīrāni nivāsetvā lābhasampattiṃ patto,
atk-s0201a:1948_10: gaccha satthāraṃ pañhaṃ pucchā”ti atthakāmāya devatāya codito tathā katvā arahattaphalaṃ patto.
atk-s0201a:1949_0: Eko rājagahe ekissā kuladārikāya kucchimhi uppanno.
atk-s0201a:1949_1: Sā ca paṭhamaṃ mātāpitaro yācitvā pabbajjaṃ alabhamānā kulagharaṃ gatā gabbhasaṇṭhitampi ajānantī sāmikaṃ
atk-s0201a:1949_3: Tassā gabbhininimittaṃ disvā bhikkhuniyo devadattaṃ pucchiṃsu,
atk-s0201a:1949_7: Thero sāvatthinagaravāsīni kulāni visākhañca upāsikaṃ pakkosāpetvā sodhento, –
atk-s0201a:1949_12: taṃ gahetvā rājā pasenadi kosalo posāpesi.
atk-s0201a:1949_13: “Kassapo”ti cassa nāmaṃ katvā aparabhāge alaṅkaritvā satthu santikaṃ netvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0201a:1950_1: Taṃ kira vanaṃ dvinnaṃ buddhānaṃ kāle avijahitanāmaṃ andhavanaṃtveva paññāyati.
atk-s0201a:1950_10: te me dhātuyo ādāya tattha tattha pūjentā saggaparāyaṇā bhavissantī”ti parinibbānakāle,
atk-s0201a:1950_12: Dīghāyukabuddhānaṃ pana suvaṇṇakkhandho viya ekagghanaṃ dhātusarīraṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a:1951_3: kiṃ karissāmā”ti sammantayitvā ekagghanameva cetiyaṃ karissāma,
atk-s0201a:1951_13: ekayojanaṃ hotūti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā iṭṭhakā kīdisā hontūti bāhirante iṭṭhakā rattasuvaṇṇamayā ekagghanā satasahassagghanikā hontu,
atk-s0201a:1951_16: telena udakakiccanti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā cattāri mukhāni catudhā vibhajiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:1952_0: Tattha dhanasampannatāya rājāpi suvaṇṇaṃ nīharāpetvā attanā gahitamukhe kammaṃ ārabhi,
atk-s0201a:1952_4: Tato yasorato nāma eko upāsako tepiṭako bhāṇako anāgāmī ariyasāvako,
atk-s0201a:1952_5: so kammaṃ olīyatīti ñatvā pañca sakaṭasatāni yojāpetvā janapadaṃ gantvā “kassapasammāsambuddho vīsativassasahassāni ṭhatvā parinibbuto.
atk-s0201a:1952_7: yo yaṃ dātuṃ ussahati suvaṇṇaṃ vā hiraññaṃ vā sattaratanaṃ vā haritālaṃ vā manosilaṃ vā,
atk-s0201a:1952_9: Manussā attano attano thāmena hiraññasuvaṇṇādīni adaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:1953_0: Cetiye kammaṃ niṭṭhitanti cetiyaṭṭhānato paṇṇaṃ pahiṇiṃsu –
atk-s0201a:1953_7: Ācariyassa paṇṇato pana cetiyaṭṭhānato paṇṇaṃ paṭhamataraṃ ācariyassa hatthaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:1953_8: So paṇṇaṃ vācetvā cetiyaṃ vandissāmīti ekakova nikkhami.
atk-s0201a:1953_10: Tatrekacce taṃ disvā iminā sakalajambudīpato hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ sampiṇḍitaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1953_11: nidhikumbhī no pavaṭṭamānā āgatāti avasesānaṃ ārocetvā taṃ aggahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:1953_22: mayhaṃ pana nivatthasāṭakamattaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ vittaṃ kākaṇikampi natthīti.
atk-s0201a:1954_3: amhesu kañcideva nagaravīthiyaṃ disvā rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃ ārocetvā anayavyasanaṃ pāpuṇāpeyyā”ti āhaṃsu. Upāsako, “tātā,
atk-s0201a:1954_7: Atha tesu gahetabbo vissajjetabboti vivadantesu gahetabboti laddhikā eva bahutarā hutvā jīvitā voropayiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:1955_0: Tesaṃ balavaguṇe ariyasāvake aparādhena nibbutadīpasikhā viya akkhīni antaradhāyiṃsu. Te,
atk-s0201a:1955_2: kahaṃ bho cakkhū”ti vippalapantā ekacce ñātakehi gehaṃ nītā.
atk-s0201a:1955_3: Ekacce noñātakā anāthāti tattheva aṭaviyaṃ rukkhamūle paṇṇasālāyaṃ vasiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:1955_4: Aṭaviṃ āgatamanussā kāruññena tesaṃ taṇḍulaṃ vā puṭabhattaṃ vā paribbayaṃ vā denti.
atk-s0201a:1955_5: Dārupaṇṇādīnaṃ atthāya gantvā āgatā manussā kuhiṃ gatatthāti vutte andhavanaṃ gatamhāti vadanti.
atk-s0201a:1955_6: Evaṃ dvinnampi buddhānaṃ kāle taṃ vanaṃ andhavanaṃtveva paññāyati.
atk-s0201a:1955_8: Amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sāvatthiyā avidūre jetavanassa piṭṭhibhāge pavivekakāmānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ padhānagharaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0201a:1955_9: tattha āyasmā kumārakassapo tena samayena sekhapaṭipadaṃ pūrayamāno viharati.
atk-s0201a:1956_0: Aññatarā devatāti nāmagottavasena apākaṭā ekā devatāti attho.
atk-s0201a:1956_2: bhagavā ahuñātaññatarassa mahesakkhassa saṃkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiṃ bhāsitā”ti ettha pana abhiññāto sakkopi devarājā aññataroti vutto.
atk-s0201a:1956_3: Devatāti ca idaṃ devānampi devadhītānampi sādhāraṇavacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1956_5: Abhikkantāya rattiyāti ettha abhikkantasaddo khayasundarābhirūpaabbhanumodanādīsu dissati. Tattha –
atk-s0201a:1956_9: bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkha”nti evamādīsu khaye dissati.
atk-s0201a:1956_10: “Ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti evamādīsu sundare.
atk-s0201a:1957_0: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
atk-s0201a:1959_4: Tena abhikkantāya rattiyāti parikkhīṇāya rattiyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:1959_11: “Kadā saññūḷhā pana te gahapati samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇā”ti evamādīsu thutiyaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1959_23: Devatā hi manussalokaṃ āgacchamānā pakativaṇṇaṃ pakatiiddhiṃ pajahitvā oḷārikaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā atirekavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:1959_24: atirekaiddhiṃ māpetvā naṭasamajjādīni gacchantā manussā viya abhisaṅkhatena kāyena āgacchanti.
atk-s0201a:1960_5: “Kevalakappā ca aṅgamagadhā pahūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ ādāya upasaṅkamissantī”ti evamādīsu yebhuyyatā.
atk-s0201a:1960_8: “Āyasmato anuruddhassa bāhiyo nāma saddhivihāriko kevalakappaṃ saṅghabhedāya ṭhito”ti evamādīsu daḷhatthatā.
atk-s0201a:1961_0: Kappasaddo panāyaṃ abhisaddahana- vohāra- kāla- paññatti- chedana- vikappa- lesa-
atk-s0201a:1961_5: yathā taṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti evamādīsu abhisaddahanamattho.
atk-s0201a:1961_8: pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ paribhuñjitu”nti evamādīsu vohāro.
atk-s0201a:1961_16: Tasmā kevalakappaṃ andhavananti ettha anavasesaṃ samantato andhavananti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:1962_1: candimā viya ca sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekapajjotaṃ karitvāti attho.
atk-s0201a:1962_9: Ahaṃ pana asmi tato kālato paṭṭhāya brahmacārī”ti samaṇasaññāvassa samudācarati,
atk-s0201a:1962_14: Yo hi pubbayoge āgatesu pañcasu sahāyesu anuthero catutthadivase anāgāmī ahosīti vutto, ayaṃ so.
atk-s0201a:1962_15: Tadā kira tesu saṅghattherassa arahatteneva saddhiṃ abhiññā āgamiṃsu. So,
atk-s0201a:1962_16: “mayhaṃ kiccaṃ matthakaṃ patta”nti vehāsaṃ uppatitvā anotattadahe mukhaṃ dhovitvā uttarakuruto piṇḍapātaṃ ādāya āgantvā, “imaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0201a:1962_17: piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā appamattā samaṇadhammaṃ karothā”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:1962_22: Tumhe attano upanissayena kiccaṃ matthakaṃ pāpayittha.
atk-s0201a:1963_2: Sopi tatheva piṇḍapātaṃ āharitvā tehi paṭikkhitto yathāphāsukaṃ gantvā āyupariyosāne suddhāvāse nibbatti.
atk-s0201a:1963_3: So suddhāvāse ṭhatvā te sahāye olokento,
atk-s0201a:1963_5: eko adhunā bhagavato santike ariyabhūmiṃ patto,
atk-s0201a:1963_7: “ahaṃ arahā”ti cittaṃ uppādetvā suppārakapaṭṭane vasatīti disvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0201a:1963_10: gaccha bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ suṇāhī”ti uyyojesi.
atk-s0201a:1963_12: “tasmā tiha te bāhiya evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ hotū”ti bhagavatā saṃkhittena ovadito ariyabhūmiṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0201a:1964_1: so kuhinti olokento andhavane sekkhapaṭipadaṃ pūrayamāno viharatīti disvā cintesi –
atk-s0201a:1964_3: gacchantena pana tucchahatthena agantvā kiñci paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā gantuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0201a:1964_4: sahāyo kho pana me nirāmiso pabbatamatthake vasanto mayā ākāse ṭhatvā dinnaṃ piṇḍapātampi aparibhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0201a:1964_6: Dhammapaṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā gamissāmī”ti brahmaloke ṭhitova ratanāvaḷiṃ ganthento viya pannarasa pañhe vibhajitvā
atk-s0201a:1964_7: taṃ dhammapaṇṇākāraṃ ādāya āgantvā sahāyassa avidūre ṭhatvā attano samaṇasaññāsamudācāravasena taṃ anabhivādetvāva,
atk-s0201a:1964_9: Tattha turitālapanavasena bhikkhu bhikkhūti āmeḍitaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1964_10: Yathā vā ekaneva tilakena nalāṭaṃ na sobhati,
atk-s0201a:1964_11: taṃ parivāretvā aññesupi dinnesu phullitamaṇḍitaṃ viya sobhati,
atk-s0201a:1964_12: evaṃ ekeneva padena vacanaṃ na sobhati,
atk-s0201a:1964_13: parivārikapadena saddhiṃ phullitamaṇḍitaṃ viya sobhatīti taṃ parivārikapadavasena vacanaṃ phullitamaṇḍitaṃ viya karontopi evamāha.
atk-s0201a:1965_0: Ayaṃ vammikoti purato ṭhito vammiko nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a:1965_1: desanāvasena pana purato ṭhitaṃ dassento viya ayanti āha.
atk-s0201a:1965_2: Laṅginti satthaṃ ādāya khaṇanto palighaṃ addasa.
atk-s0201a:1965_3: Ukkhipa laṅgiṃ abhikkhaṇa sumedhāti tāta, paṇḍita,
atk-s0201a:1965_4: laṅgī nāma rattiṃ dhūmāyati divā pajjalati.
atk-s0201a:1965_12: Nāganti sumanapupphakalāpasadisaṃ mahāphaṇaṃ tividhasovatthikaparikkhittaṃ ahināgaṃ addasa.
atk-s0201a:1965_13: Mā nāgaṃ ghaṭṭesīti daṇḍakakoṭiyā vā vallikoṭiyā vā paṃsucuṇṇaṃ vā pana khipamāno mā nāgaṃ ghaṭṭayi.
atk-s0201a:1965_14: Namo karohi nāgassāti uparivātato apagamma suddhavatthaṃ nivāsetvā nāgassa namakkāraṃ karohi.
atk-s0201a:1965_15: Nāgena adhisayitaṃ dhanaṃ nāma yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā khādato na khīyati,
atk-s0201a:1965_18: Ito vā pana sutvāti yathā dukkhakkhandhe itoti sāsane nissakaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1965_21: tasmā ito vā panāti mama vā pana santikā sutvāti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0201a:1966_4: vamatīti vantakoti vantussayoti vantasinehasambandhoti catūhi kāraṇehi vammikoti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:1966_5: So hi ahimaṅgusaundūragharagoḷikādayo nānappakāre pāṇake vamatīti vammiko.
atk-s0201a:1966_7: Upacikāhi vamitvā mukhatuṇḍakena ukkhittapaṃsucuṇṇena kaṭippamāṇenapi porisappamāṇenapi ussitoti vammiko.
atk-s0201a:1966_8: Upacikāhi vantakheḷasinehena ābaddhatāya sattasattāhaṃ deve vassantepi na vippakiriyati,
atk-s0201a:1966_9: nidāghepi tato paṃsumuṭṭhiṃ gahetvā tasmiṃ muṭṭhinā pīḷiyamāne sineho nikkhamati,
atk-s0201a:1966_12: “akkhimhā akkhigūthako”tiādinā nayena nānappakārakaṃ asucikalimalaṃ vamatīti vammiko.
atk-s0201a:1966_13: Buddhapaccekabuddhakhīṇāsavā imasmiṃ attabhāve nikantipariyādānena attabhāvaṃ chaḍḍetvā gatāti ariyehi vantakotipi vammiko.
atk-s0201a:1966_14: Yehi cāyaṃ tīhi aṭṭhisatehi ussito nhārusambaddho maṃsāvalepano allacammapariyonaddho chavirañjito satte vañceti,
atk-s0201a:1966_15: taṃ sabbaṃ ariyehi vantamevāti vantussayotipi vammiko.
atk-s0201a:1966_17: cittamassa vidhāvatī”ti evaṃ taṇhāya janitattā ariyehi vanteneva taṇhāsinehena sambaddho ayanti vantasinehena sambaddhotipi vammiko.
atk-s0201a:1966_18: Yathā ca vammikassa anto nānappakārā pāṇakā tattheva jāyanti,
atk-s0201a:1966_22: Iti so tesaṃ sūtigharaṃ vaccakuṭi gilānasālā susānañca hoti.
atk-s0201a:1966_23: Evaṃ khattiyamahāsālādīnampi kāyo ayaṃ gopitarakkhito maṇḍitappasādhito mahānubhāvānaṃ kāyoti acintetvā
atk-s0201a:1966_24: chavinissitā pāṇā cammanissitā pāṇā maṃsanissitā pāṇā nhārunissitā pāṇā aṭṭhinissitā pāṇā aṭṭhimiñjanissitā
atk-s0201a:1966_25: pāṇāti evaṃ kulagaṇanāya asītimattāni kimikulasahassāni antokāyasmiṃyeva jāyanti,
atk-s0201a:1966_29: iti ayampi tesaṃ pāṇānaṃ sūtigharaṃ vaccakuṭi gilānasālā susānañca hotīti “vammiko” tveva saṅkhaṃ gato.
atk-s0201a:1967_0: Mātāpettikasambhavassāti mātito ca pitito ca nibbattena mātāpettikena sukkasoṇitena sambhūtassa.
atk-s0201a:1967_1: Odanakummāsūpacayassāti odanena ceva kummāsena ca upacitassa vaḍḍhitassa.
atk-s0201a:1967_2: Aniccucchādanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhaṃsanadhammassāti ettha ayaṃ kāyo hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccadhammo.
atk-s0201a:1967_5: Daharakāle vā ūrūsu sayāpetvā gabbhavāsena dussaṇṭhitānaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ aṅgānaṃ saṇṭhānasampādanatthaṃ añchanapīḷanādivasena parimaddanadhammo.
atk-s0201a:1967_6: Evaṃ pariharatopi ca bhedanaviddhaṃsanadhammo bhijjati ceva vikirati ca,
atk-s0201a:1967_10: Evaṃ sattahipi padehi cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa uccāvacabhāvo vaḍḍhiparihāni samudayatthaṅgamo kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:1968_1: Dhūmāyanāti ettha ayaṃ dhūmasaddo kodhe taṇhāya vitakke pañcasu kāmaguṇesu dhammadesanāya pakatidhūmeti imesu atthesu vattati.
atk-s0201a:1968_2: “Kodho dhūmo bhasmanimosavajja”nti ettha hi kodhe vattati.
atk-s0201a:1968_4: “Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu bhagavato avidūre dhūmāyanto nisinno hotī”ti ettha vitakke.
atk-s0201a:1971_0: Rajo ca dhūmo ca mayā pakāsitā;
atk-s0201a:1974_0: Tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacananti tathāgato hi sattannaṃ dhammānaṃ bāhitattā brāhmaṇo nāma. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a:1974_4: Rāgo bāhito hoti, doso… moho… māno…
atk-s0201a:1974_8: Imesaṃ bhikkhu sattannaṃ dhammānaṃ bāhitattā brāhmaṇo”ti.
atk-s0201a:1975_0: Paññāya adhivacananti lokiyalokuttarāya paññāya etaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1976_0: Eko kira jānapado brāhmaṇo pātova māṇavakehi saddhiṃ gāmato nikkhamma divasaṃ araññe mante vācetvā sāyaṃ gāmaṃ āgacchati.
atk-s0201a:1976_8: bhinditvā naṃ cattāro koṭṭhāse katvā khipāhī”ti.
atk-s0201a:1976_9: So sādhūti kudālaṃ gahetvā samehi pādehi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya tathā akāsi.
atk-s0201a:1976_16: bhinditvā naṃ cattāro koṭṭhāse katvā khipāhī”ti brāhmaṇena vuttakālo viya,
atk-s0201a:1976_17: “bhikkhu cātumahābhūtikaṃ kāyaṃ cattāro koṭṭhāse katvā pariggaṇhāhī”ti bhagavatā vuttakālo.
atk-s0201a:1976_18: Tassa sādhūti kudālaṃ gahetvā tathākaraṇaṃ viya sekkhassa bhikkhuno,
atk-s0201a:1976_26: ayaṃ vāyodhātū”ti evaṃ catudhātuvavatthānavasena kāyapariggaho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:1977_1: bhikkhūti kasmā bhagavā avijjaṃ laṅgīti katvā dassesīti?
atk-s0201a:1977_2: Yathā hi nagarassa dvāraṃ pidhāya palighe yojite mahājanassa gamanaṃ pacchijjati,
atk-s0201a:1977_9: Pajaha avijjanti ettha kammaṭṭhānauggahaparipucchāvasena avijjāpahānaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1978_1: bhikkhūti ettha uddhumāyikamaṇḍūko nāma no mahanto,
atk-s0201a:1978_3: purāṇapaṇṇantare vā gacchantare vā valliantare vā vasati.
atk-s0201a:1978_4: So daṇḍakoṭiyā vā vallikoṭiyā vā paṃsucuṇṇakena vā ghaṭṭito āyamitvā mahanto parimaṇḍalo beluvapakkappamāṇo
atk-s0201a:1978_5: hutvā cattāro pāde ākāsagate katvā pacchinnagamano hutvā amittavasaṃ yāti,
atk-s0201a:1978_7: Evameva ayaṃ kodho paṭhamaṃ uppajjanto cittāvilamattakova hoti.
atk-s0201a:1978_8: Tasmiṃ khaṇe aniggahito vaḍḍhitvā mukhavikulanaṃ pāpeti.
atk-s0201a:1978_17: “yato ayaṃ kodho paraṃ ghātetvā attānaṃ ghāteti,
atk-s0201a:1978_19: Tattha yathā uddhumāyikāya catūsu pādesu ākāsagatesu gamanaṃ pacchijjati,
atk-s0201a:1978_21: evameva kodhasamaṅgīpuggalo kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:1979_1: yathā puriso sadhano sabhogo kantāraddhānamaggappaṭipanno dvedhāpathaṃ patvā,
atk-s0201a:1979_3: iminā gantabba”nti nicchetuṃ asakkonto tattheva tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a:1979_4: atha naṃ corā uṭṭhahitvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpenti,
atk-s0201a:1979_5: evameva kho mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nisinno bhikkhu buddhādīsu kaṅkhāya uppannāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:1979_6: atha naṃ kilesamārādayo sabbe mārā anayabyasanaṃ pāpenti,
atk-s0201a:1979_11: Pajaha vicikicchanti ettha kammaṭṭhānauggahaparipucchāvasena vicikicchāpahānaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1980_1: yathā rajakehi khāraparissāvanamhi udake pakkhitte eko udakaghaṭo dvepi dasapi vīsatipi ghaṭasatampi paggharatiyeva,
atk-s0201a:1980_3: evameva nīvaraṇasamaṅgino puggalassa abbhantare kusaladhammo na tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a:1980_7: Pajaha pañcanīvaraṇeti ettha vikkhambhanatadaṅgavasena nīvaraṇappahānaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1981_1: yathā kacchapassa cattāro pādā sīsanti pañceva aṅgāni honti,
atk-s0201a:1981_2: evameva sabbepi saṅkhatā dhammā gayhamānā pañceva khandhā bhavanti.
atk-s0201a:1981_6: Pajaha pañcupādānakkhandheti ettha pañcasu khandhesu chandarāgappahānaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1982_1: yathā sūnāya upari maṃsaṃ ṭhapetvā asinā koṭṭenti,
atk-s0201a:1982_2: evamime sattā vatthukāmatthāya kilesakāmehi ghātayamānā vatthukāmānaṃ upari katvā kilesakāmehi kantitā koṭṭitā ca honti.
atk-s0201a:1982_6: Pajaha pañca kāmaguṇeti ettha pañcasu kāmaguṇesu chandarāgappahānaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1983_1: bhikkhūti ettha ayaṃ maṃsapesi nāma bahujanapatthitā khattiyādayo manussāpi naṃ patthenti kākādayo tiracchānāpi.
atk-s0201a:1983_2: Ime hi sattā avijjāya sammattā nandirāgaṃ upagamma vaṭṭaṃ vaḍḍhenti.
atk-s0201a:1983_10: Pajaha nandīrāganti ettha catutthamaggena nandīrāgappahānaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1984_1: khīṇāsavassetaṃ bhikkhuno adhivacananti ettha yenatthena khīṇāsavo nāgoti vuccati,
atk-s0201a:1984_5: danto so bhagavā damathāya dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0201a:1984_6: santo so bhagavā samathāya dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0201a:1984_7: tiṇṇo so bhagavā taraṇāya dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0201a:1984_8: parinibbuto so bhagavā parinibbānāya dhammaṃ desetī”ti evaṃ namakkāraṃ karohīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0201a:1984_9: Iti idaṃ suttaṃ therassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0201a:1984_10: Theropi idameva suttaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patto.
atk-s0201a:1984_11: Ayametassa atthoti ayaṃ etassa pañhassa attho.
atk-s0201a:1984_12: Iti bhagavā ratanarāsimhi maṇikūṭaṃ gaṇhanto viya yathānusandhināva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesīti.
atk-s0201a:1988_6: Taṃ panetaṃ buddhakāle ca cakkavattikāle ca nagaraṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:1988_9: Veḷuvane kalandakanivāpeti veḷuvananti tassa uyyānassa nāmaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1988_10: taṃ kira veḷūhi parikkhittaṃ ahosi aṭṭhārasahatthena ca pākārena,
atk-s0201a:1989_0: Pubbe kira aññataro rājā tattha uyyānakīḷanatthaṃ āgato surāmadena matto divāseyyaṃ upagato supi.
atk-s0201a:1989_2: “sutto rājā”ti pupphaphalādīhi palobhiyamāno ito cito ca pakkāmi,
atk-s0201a:1989_3: atha surāgandhena aññatarasmā susirarukkhā kaṇhasappo nikkhamitvā raññābhimukho āgacchati.
atk-s0201a:1989_5: “rañño jīvitaṃ dammī”ti kāḷakavesena āgantvā kaṇṇamūle saddamakāsi.
atk-s0201a:1989_9: “imāya mama jīvitaṃ dinna”nti kāḷakānaṃ tattha nivāpaṃ paṭṭhapesi,
atk-s0201a:1989_11: Tasmā taṃ tato pabhuti kalandakanivāpanti saṅkhyaṃ gataṃ.
atk-s0201a:1990_2: Taṃ kho panetaṃ neva kosalamahārājādīnaṃ na caṅkībrāhamaṇādīnaṃ na sakkasuyāmasantusitādīnaṃ na asītimahāsāvakādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:1990_5: nandanavanaṃ virocamānā paduminipaṇṇe udakabindu viya akampittha,
atk-s0201a:1992_23: Atha kho attanā ca dasakathāvatthulābhiṃ parañca tattha samādapetāraṃ paṭipattisampannaṃ bhikkhuṃ pucchanto idaṃ –
atk-s0201a:1993_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā suddhodanādīnaṃ ārogyaṃ apucchitvā evarūpaṃ bhikkhumeva pucchati? Piyatāya.
atk-s0201a:1993_1: Buddhānañhi paṭipannakā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upāsakā upāsikāyo ca piyā honti manāpā.
atk-s0201a:1993_8: Dhammagarutāyeva hi bhagavā mahākassapattherassa abhinikkhamanadivase paccuggamanaṃ karonto tigāvutaṃ maggaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:1993_9: Atirekatiyojanasataṃ maggaṃ gantvā gaṅgātīre dhammaṃ desetvā mahākappinaṃ saparisaṃ arahatte patiṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a:1993_10: Ekasmiṃ pacchābhatte pañcacattālīsayojanaṃ maggaṃ gantvā kumbhakārassa nivesane tiyāmarattiṃ dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0201a:1993_14: Anuruddhatthero pācīnavaṃsadāye nisinno mahāpurisavitakkaṃ vitakketīti ñatvā tattha ākāsena gantvā therassa purato oruyha sādhukāramadāsi.
atk-s0201a:1993_15: Koṭikaṇṇasoṇattherassa ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapāpetvā paccūsakāle dhammadesanaṃ ajjhesitvā sarabhaññapariyosāne sādhukāramadāsi.
atk-s0201a:1993_16: Tigāvutaṃ maggaṃ gantvā tiṇṇaṃ kulaputtānaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne gosiṅgasālavane sāmaggirasānisaṃsaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0201a:1993_18: “anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhito ariyasāvako aya”nti vissāsaṃ uppādetvā ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa nivesanaṃ gantvā sahatthā āmisaṃ gahetvā paribhuñji.
atk-s0201a:1994_0: Amhākaṃyeva bhagavā upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya jetavanato bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto cārikaṃ nikkhami.
atk-s0201a:1994_3: Atha naṃ puṇṇā nāma dāsī domanassappattosi sāmīti āha. “Āma je,
atk-s0201a:1994_5: atha me imaṃ temāsaṃ dhammaṃ vā sotuṃ,
atk-s0201a:1994_6: yathādhippāyaṃ vā dānaṃ dātuṃ na labhissāmī”ti cintā uppannāti.
atk-s0201a:1994_10: Sā gantvā dasabalassa pādamūle nipajjitvā “nivattatha bhagavā”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:1994_11: Puṇṇe tvaṃ parapaṭibaddhajīvikā kiṃ me karissasīti.
atk-s0201a:1994_12: Bhagavā mayhaṃ deyyadhammo natthīti tumhepi jānātha,
atk-s0201a:1994_13: tumhākaṃ nivattanapaccayā panāhaṃ tīsu saraṇesu pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhahissāmīti.
atk-s0201a:1994_14: Bhagavā sādhu sādhu puṇṇeti sādhukāraṃ katvā nivattetvā jetavanameva paviṭṭho.
atk-s0201a:1994_16: Seṭṭhi sutvā puṇṇāya kira bhagavā nivattitoti taṃ bhujissaṃ katvā dhītuṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a:1994_19: Athassā satthā āraddhavipassakabhāvaṃ ñatvā imaṃ obhāsagāthaṃ vissajjesi –
atk-s0201a:1997_0: Gāthāpariyosāne arahattaṃ patvā abhiññātā sāvikā ahosīti. Evaṃ dhammagaruno tathāgatā.
atk-s0201a:1998_0: Nandakatthere upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ dhammaṃ desentepi bhagavā anahātova gantvā tiyāmarattiṃ ṭhitakova dhammakathaṃ sutvā desanāpariyosāne sādhukāramadāsi.
atk-s0201a:1998_13: Paṭipannako ca nāma attahitāya paṭipanno no parahitāya,
atk-s0201a:1998_15: no attahitāya ca paṭipanno no parahitāya ca,
atk-s0201a:1998_16: attahitāya ca paṭipanno parahitāya cāti catubbidho hoti.
atk-s0201a:1999_0: Tattha yo sayaṃ dasannaṃ kathāvatthūnaṃ lābhī hoti,
atk-s0201a:1999_1: paraṃ tattha na ovadati na anusāsati āyasmā bākulo viya.
atk-s0201a:1999_2: Ayaṃ attahitāya paṭipanno nāma no parahitāya paṭipanno,
atk-s0201a:1999_3: evarūpaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhagavā na pucchati. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a:2000_1: paraṃ tehi ovadati tena katavattasādiyanatthaṃ upanando sakyaputto viya,
atk-s0201a:2000_2: ayaṃ parahitāya paṭipanno nāma no attahitāya,
atk-s0201a:2001_3: ayaṃ neva attahitāya paṭipanno na parahitāya,
atk-s0201a:2001_5: Assa anto kilesā pharasuchejjā viya mahantāti.
atk-s0201a:2002_0: Yo pana sayaṃ dasannaṃ kathāvatthūnaṃ lābhī,
atk-s0201a:2002_2: ayaṃ attahitāya ceva parahitāya ca paṭipanno nāma sāriputtamoggallānamahākassapādayo asītimahātherā viya,
atk-s0201a:2003_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā puṭṭhānaṃ pana tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhagavā attano jātibhūmiyaṃ ubhayahitāya paṭipannaṃ dasakathāvatthulābhiṃ bhikkhuṃ pucchati,
atk-s0201a:2003_1: ko nu kho tattha evarūpoti na aññamaññaṃ cintanā vā samantanā vā ahosi. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a:2003_2: Āyasmā hi mantāṇiputto tasmiṃ janapade ākāsamajjhe ṭhito cando viya sūriyo viya ca pākaṭo paññāto.
atk-s0201a:2003_3: Tasmā te bhikkhū meghasaddaṃ sutvā ekajjhaṃ sannipatitamoraghaṭā viya ghanasajjhāyaṃ kātuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2003_4: āraddhabhikkhū viya ca attano ācariyaṃ puṇṇattheraṃ bhagavato ārocentā therassa ca guṇaṃ bhāsituṃ appahontehi mukhehi ekappahāreneva puṇṇo nāma, bhante,
atk-s0201a:2005_3: Na hi tassa anto aṇumattāpi pāpikā icchā nāma atthi.
atk-s0201a:2005_5: Apicettha atricchatā pāpicchatā mahicchatā appicchatāti ayaṃ bhedo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2006_0: Tattha sakalābhe atittassa paralābhe patthanā atricchatā nāma.
atk-s0201a:2006_1: Tāya samannāgatassa ekabhājena pakkapūvopi attano patte patito na supakko viya khuddako viya ca khāyati.
atk-s0201a:2006_2: Sveva parassa patte pakkhitto supakko viya mahanto viya ca khāyati.
atk-s0201a:2006_3: Asantaguṇasambhāvanatā pana paṭiggahaṇe ca amattaññutā pāpicchatā nāma, sā,
atk-s0201a:2006_4: “idhekacco assaddho samāno saddhoti maṃ jano jānātū”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme āgatāyeva,
atk-s0201a:2006_6: Santaguṇasambhāvanā pana paṭiggahaṇe ca amattaññutā mahicchatā nāma. Sāpi,
atk-s0201a:2006_7: “idhekacco saddho samāno saddhoti maṃ jano jānātūti icchati,
atk-s0201a:2006_8: sīlavā samāno sīlavāti maṃ jano jānātū”ti iminā nayena āgatāyeva,
atk-s0201a:2009_0: Santaguṇanigūhanatā pana paṭiggahaṇe ca mattaññutā appicchatā nāma,
atk-s0201a:2009_1: tāya samannāgato puggalo attani vijjamānampi guṇaṃ paṭicchādetukāmatāya,
atk-s0201a:2009_2: “saddho samāno saddhoti maṃ jano jānātūti na icchati. Sīlavā,
atk-s0201a:2009_7: khīṇāsavo samāno khīṇāsavoti maṃ jano jānātū”ti na icchati,
atk-s0201a:2010_2: so asokassa dhammarañño vihāramahadivase saṅghatthero ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2010_5: “mādise khīṇāsave rañño saṅgahaṃ akaronte añño ko karissatī”ti pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā saṅghattherassa ukkhittapiṇḍaṃ gaṇhantoyeva ummujji.
atk-s0201a:2010_8: Evaṃ appiccho pana bhikkhu anuppannaṃ lābhaṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0201a:2010_11: yathā yathā hi so attano appicchatāya appaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0201a:2010_12: tathā tathā tassa vatte pasannā manussā bahū denti.
atk-s0201a:2011_2: Tattha catūsu paccayesu appiccho paccayaappiccho nāma,
atk-s0201a:2012_0: Dhutaṅgasamādānassa attani atthibhāvaṃ najānāpetukāmo dhutaṅgaappiccho nāma.
atk-s0201a:2012_2: sosānikamahāsumanatthero kira saṭṭhi vassāni susāne vasi,
atk-s0201a:2014_0: Dutiyo maṃ na jāneyya, aho sosānikuttamo”ti.
atk-s0201a:2015_1: Tesu kaniṭṭho upaṭṭhākena pesitā ucchukhaṇḍikā gahetvā jeṭṭhassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:2015_4: Therassa ca bhattakiccaṃ katvā mukhaṃ vikkhālanakālo ahosi. So alaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2015_8: ucchukhaṇḍikāti paññāsa vassāni ekāsaniko samānopi dhutaṅgaṃ nigūhamāno paribhogaṃ katvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā puna dhutaṅgaṃ adhiṭṭhāya gato.
atk-s0201a:2016_0: Yo pana sāketakatissatthero viya bahussutabhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ na icchati,
atk-s0201a:2016_2: Thero kira khaṇo natthīti uddesaparipucchāsu okāsaṃ akaronto maraṇakkhayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0201a:2016_3: labhissathāti codito gaṇaṃ vissajjetvā kaṇikāravālikasamuddavihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0201a:2016_4: Tattha antovassaṃ theranavamajjhimānaṃ upakāro hutvā mahāpavāraṇāya uposathadivase dhammakathāya janataṃ khobhetvā gato.
atk-s0201a:2017_0: Yo pana sotāpannādīsu aññataro hutvā sotāpannādibhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ na icchati,
atk-s0201a:2017_2: tayo kulaputtā viya ghaṭikārakumbhakāro viya ca.
atk-s0201a:2018_0: Āyasmā pana puṇṇo atricchataṃ pāpicchataṃ mahicchatañca pahāya sabbaso icchāpaṭipakkhabhūtāya alobhasaṅkhātāya
atk-s0201a:2018_1: parisuddhāya appicchatāya samannāgatattā appiccho nāma ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2018_3: atricchatā pāpicchatā mahicchatāti ime dhammā pahātabbā”ti tesu ādīnavaṃ dassetvā evarūpaṃ appicchataṃ samādāya vattitabbanti appicchakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0201a:2018_4: Tena vuttaṃ “attanā ca appiccho appicchakathañca bhikkhūnaṃ kattā”ti.
atk-s0201a:2020_0: Idāni attanā ca santuṭṭhotiādīsu visesatthameva dīpayissāma.
atk-s0201a:2021_0: Idha bhikkhu cīvaraṃ labhati sundaraṃ vā asundaraṃ vā.
atk-s0201a:2021_1: So teneva yāpeti aññaṃ na pattheti,
atk-s0201a:2021_4: Atha yo pakatidubbalo vā hoti ābādhajarābhibhūto vā,
atk-s0201a:2021_6: so sabhāgena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ taṃ parivattetvā lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0201a:2021_9: so paṭṭacīvarādīnaṃ aññataraṃ mahagghacīvaraṃ bahūni vā pana cīvarāni labhitvā idaṃ therānaṃ cirapabbajitānaṃ idaṃ bahussutānaṃ anurūpaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2021_10: idaṃ gilānānaṃ idaṃ appalābhānaṃ hotūti datvā tesaṃ purāṇacīvaraṃ vā saṅkārakūṭādito vā nantakāni uccinitvā
atk-s0201a:2021_11: tehi saṅghāṭiṃ katvā dhārentopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0201a:2022_0: Idha pana bhikkhu piṇḍapātaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā,
atk-s0201a:2022_5: Yo pana attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ labhati,
atk-s0201a:2022_7: so sabhāgassa bhikkhuno taṃ datvā tassa hatthato sappāyabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0201a:2022_10: so taṃ cīvaraṃ viya cirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhigilānānaṃ datvā tesaṃ vā sesakaṃ piṇḍāya vā caritvā missakāhāraṃ bhuñjantopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0201a:2023_0: Idha pana bhikkhu senāsanaṃ labhati manāpaṃ vā amanāpaṃ vā,
atk-s0201a:2023_1: so tena neva somanassaṃ na paṭighaṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0201a:2023_4: Yo pana attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā senāsanaṃ labhati,
atk-s0201a:2023_6: so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa santake sappāyasenāsane vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0201a:2023_8: Aparo mahāpuñño leṇamaṇḍapakūṭāgārādīni bahūni paṇītasenāsanāni labhati,
atk-s0201a:2023_9: so tāni cīvarādīni viya cirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhigilānānaṃ datvā yattha katthaci vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0201a:2023_13: niddābhibhūtassa puna paṭibujjhato pāpavitakkā pātubhavantī”ti paṭisañcikkhitvā tādisaṃ senāsanaṃ pattampi na sampaṭicchati,
atk-s0201a:2023_14: so taṃ paṭikkhipitvā abbhokāsarukkhamūlādīsu vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0201a:2024_0: Idha pana bhikkhu bhesajjaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā,
atk-s0201a:2024_6: Yo pana telena atthiko phāṇitaṃ labhati,
atk-s0201a:2024_7: so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa hatthato telaṃ gahetvā aññadeva vā pariyesitvā tehi bhesajjaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0201a:2024_10: so taṃ cīvaraṃ viya cirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhigilānānaṃ datvā tesaṃ ābhatakena yena kenaci yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0201a:2024_11: Yo pana ekasmiṃ bhājane muttaharītakaṃ ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ catumadhuraṃ, “gaṇha, bhante,
atk-s0201a:2024_12: yadicchasī”ti vuccamāno sacassa tesu aññatarenapi rogo vūpasammati,
atk-s0201a:2024_13: atha muttaharītakaṃ nāma buddhādīhi vaṇṇitanti catumadhuraṃ paṭikkhipitvā muttaharītakeneva bhesajjaṃ karonto paramasantuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0201a:2025_0: Imesaṃ pana paccekaṃ paccayesu tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ santosānaṃ yathāsāruppasantosova aggo.
atk-s0201a:2025_1: Āyasmā puṇṇo ekekasmiṃ paccaye imehi tīhi santosehi santuṭṭho ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2025_2: Santuṭṭhikathañcāti bhikkhūnampi ca imaṃ santuṭṭhikathaṃ kattāva ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2027_0: Pavivittoti kāyapaviveko cittapaviveko upadhipavivekoti imehi tīhi pavivekehi samannāgato.
atk-s0201a:2027_16: Pavivekakathanti bhikkhūnampi ca imaṃ pavivekakathaṃ kattā.
atk-s0201a:2029_1: Savanasaṃsaggo dassanasaṃsaggo samullapanasaṃsaggo sambhogasaṃsaggo kāyasaṃsaggoti pañcavidho saṃsaggo.
atk-s0201a:2029_3: “asukasmiṃ gāme vā nigame vā itthī vā kumārikā vā abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā”ti.
atk-s0201a:2029_4: So taṃ sutvā saṃsīdati visīdati na sakkoti brahmacariyaṃ sandhāretuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2029_5: sikkhādubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā hīnāyāvattatīti evaṃ parehi vā kathīyamānaṃ rūpādisampattiṃ attanā vā hasitalapitagītasaddaṃ
atk-s0201a:2029_6: suṇantassa sotaviññāṇavīthivasena uppanno rāgo savanasaṃsaggo nāma.
atk-s0201a:2029_7: So anitthigandhapaccekabodhisattassa ca pañcaggaḷaleṇavāsītissadaharassa ca vasena veditabbo –
atk-s0201a:2030_0: Daharo kira ākāsena gacchanto girigāmavāsikammāradhītāya pañcahi kumārīhi saddhiṃ padumasaraṃ gantvā
atk-s0201a:2030_1: nhatvā padumāni ca pilandhitvā madhurassarena gāyantiyā saddaṃ sutvā kāmarāgena viddho visesā parihāyitvā
atk-s0201a:2030_3: Idha bhikkhu na heva kho suṇāti,
atk-s0201a:2030_4: apica kho sāmaṃ passati itthiṃ vā kumāriṃ vā abhirūpaṃ dassanīyaṃ pāsādikaṃ paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0201a:2030_5: So taṃ disvā saṃsīdati visīdati na sakkoti brahmacariyaṃ sandhāretuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2030_6: sikkhādubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā hīnāyāvattatīti evaṃ visabhāgarūpaṃ olokentassa pana cakkhuviññāṇavīthivasena uppannarāgo dassanasaṃsaggo nāma.
atk-s0201a:2031_0: Eko kira daharo kāladīghavāpidvāravihāraṃ uddesatthāya gato.
atk-s0201a:2031_1: Ācariyo tassa antarāyaṃ disvā okāsaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0201a:2031_5: So sādhūti sampaṭicchitvā uddese niṭṭhite ācariyaṃ vanditvā gacchanto ācariyo me imasmiṃ gāme carituṃ na deti,
atk-s0201a:2031_6: kiṃ nu kho kāraṇanti cīvaraṃ pārupitvā gāmaṃ pāvisi,
atk-s0201a:2031_7: ekā kuladhītā pītakavatthaṃ nivāsetvā gehe ṭhitā daharaṃ disvā sañjātarāgā uḷuṅkena yāguṃ āharitvā tassa patte pakkhipitvā nivattitvā mañcake nipajji.
atk-s0201a:2031_8: Atha naṃ mātāpitaro kiṃ ammāti pucchiṃsu,
atk-s0201a:2031_11: Mātāpitaro vegena gantvā gāmadvāre daharaṃ patvā vanditvā,
atk-s0201a:2031_21: “na mayhaṃ iminā palibodhena attho”ti anādiyitvāva pakkanto.
atk-s0201a:2032_4: uṭṭhehi khāda ca piva cā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2032_5: Sā anicchantī sattāhaṃ nirāhārā hutvā kālamakāsi.
atk-s0201a:2032_6: Mātāpitaro tassā sarīrakiccaṃ katvā taṃ pītakavatthaṃ dhuravihāre bhikkhusaṅghassa adaṃsu,
atk-s0201a:2032_8: Eko mahallako attano koṭṭhāsaṃ gahetvā kalyāṇīvihāraṃ āgato.
atk-s0201a:2032_9: Sopi daharo cetiyaṃ vandissāmīti tattheva gantvā divāṭṭhāne nisīdi.
atk-s0201a:2032_15: “evarūpāya nāma saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ nālattha”nti rāgagginā daḍḍho tattheva kālamakāsi.
atk-s0201a:2033_0: Aññamaññaṃ ālāpasallāpavasena uppannarāgo pana samullapanasaṃsaggo nāma.
atk-s0201a:2033_2: bhikkhuniyā vā bhikkhussa santakaṃ gahetvā paribhogakaraṇavasena uppannarāgo sambhogasaṃsaggo nāma.
atk-s0201a:2033_4: maricavaṭṭivihāramahe kira bhikkhūnaṃ satasahassaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ navutisahassāni eva ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2033_5: Eko sāmaṇero uṇhayāguṃ gahetvā gacchanto sakiṃ cīvarakaṇṇe ṭhapesi,
atk-s0201a:2033_7: Ekā sāmaṇerī disvā ettha pattaṃ ṭhapetvā yāhīti thālakaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0201a:2033_8: Te aparabhāge ekasmiṃ bhaye uppanne parasamuddaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2033_10: “eko kira sīhaḷabhikkhu āgato”ti sutvā therassa santikaṃ gantvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā nisinnā, – “bhante,
atk-s0201a:2033_14: Ahaṃ sattavassikasāmaṇerīyeva ekassa sāmaṇerassa uṇhayāguṃ gahetvā gacchantassa pattaṭhapanatthaṃ thālakamadāsinti. Thero,
atk-s0201a:2033_16: Te ettakeneva saṃsaggena brahmacariyaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkontā dvepi saṭṭhivassakāle vibbhamiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2034_4: Tatreko daharo hatthaṃ pasārento ekissā daharabhikkhuniyā kāyaṃ chupi.
atk-s0201a:2034_5: Sā taṃ hatthaṃ gahetvā attano urasmiṃ ṭhapesi,
atk-s0201a:2034_6: ettakena saṃsaggena dvepi vibbhamitvā gihibhāvaṃ pattā.
atk-s0201a:2036_0: Imesu pana pañcasu saṃsaggesu bhikkhuno bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ savanadassanasamullapanasambhogakāyaparāmāsā niccampi hontiyeva,
atk-s0201a:2036_1: bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ ṭhapetvā kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sesā kālena kālaṃ honti;
atk-s0201a:2036_2: tathā upāsakaupāsikāhi saddhiṃ sabbepi kālena kālaṃ honti.
atk-s0201a:2037_0: Tattha yaṃ bhikkhuṃ manussāpi āmisena upalāpetvā gahaṇavasena upasaṅkamanti,
atk-s0201a:2037_6: Yassa manussā dakkhiṇeyyavasena cattāro paccaye denti,
atk-s0201a:2037_9: Yassa manussāpi dakkhiṇeyyavasena cattāro paccaye denti,
atk-s0201a:2038_0: Theraṃ kira ekā upāsikā dvādasa vassāni upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0201a:2038_1: Ekadivasaṃ tasmiṃ gāme aggi uṭṭhahitvā gehāni jhāpesi.
atk-s0201a:2038_4: api kiñci bhaṇḍakaṃ arogaṃ kātuṃ asakkhitthā”ti paṭisanthāraṃ akaṃsu. Manussā,
atk-s0201a:2038_7: Upāsikā koṭṭhacchāyāya nisīdāpetvā bhikkhaṃ sampādetvā adāsi.
atk-s0201a:2038_8: There bhattakiccaṃ katvā pakkante manussā āhaṃsu –
atk-s0201a:2038_12: Āyasmā pana mantāṇiputto imehi pañcahi saṃsaggehi catūhipi parisāhi saddhiṃ asaṃsaṭṭho gāhamuttako ceva muttamuttako ca ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2038_14: evaṃ bhikkhūnampi taṃ asaṃsaggakathaṃ kattā ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2039_2: Yo hi bhikkhu gamane uppannakilesaṃ ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti,
atk-s0201a:2039_4: nisajjāya uppannakilesaṃ sayanaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti,
atk-s0201a:2039_6: amittaṃ gīvāya akkamanto viya ca vicarati,
atk-s0201a:2040_5: Thero sayampi sīlādīhi sampanno ahosi bhikkhūnampi sīlādikathaṃ kattā.
atk-s0201a:2040_8: sukhumaṃ atthaṃ parivattetvā jānāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2040_10: Thero pana tāni dasa kathāvatthūni viññāpetīti viññāpako.
atk-s0201a:2040_17: Evaṃ samādapetvā pana tesu kathāvatthūsu ussāhajananavasena bhikkhū samuttejetīti samuttejako.
atk-s0201a:2042_3: yassa satthu sammukhā evaṃ vaṇṇo abbhuggatoti attho.
atk-s0201a:2042_4: Apica apaṇḍitehi vaṇṇakathanaṃ nāma na tathā lābho,
atk-s0201a:2042_6: Gihī hi vā vaṇṇakathanaṃ na tathā lābho,
atk-s0201a:2042_9: vihāraṃ āgatānaṃ yāgubhattaphāṇitādīhi saṅgahaṃ karotī”ti kathento avaṇṇameva katheti.
atk-s0201a:2042_10: “Avaṇṇaṃ kathessāmī”ti “ayaṃ thero mandamando viya abalabalo viya bhākuṭikabhākuṭiko viya natthi iminā saddhiṃ vissāso”ti kathento vaṇṇameva katheti.
atk-s0201a:2042_11: Sabrahmacārīhipi satthu parammukhā vaṇṇakathanaṃ na tathā lābho,
atk-s0201a:2042_12: satthu sammukhā pana atilābhoti imampi atthavasaṃ paṭicca “suladdhalābhā”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:2042_13: Anumassa anumassāti dasa kathāvatthūni anupavisitvā anupavisitvā.
atk-s0201a:2042_14: Tañca satthā abbhanumodatīti tañcassa vaṇṇaṃ evametaṃ appiccho ca so bhikkhu santuṭṭho ca so bhikkhūti anumodati.
atk-s0201a:2042_19: satthārā abbhanumodanaṃ ekoti ime pañca lābhe sandhāya “suladdhalābhā”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:2042_22: Appeva nāma siyā kocideva kathāsallāpoti api nāma koci kathāsamudācāropi bhaveyya.
atk-s0201a:2042_23: Therena kira āyasmā puṇṇo neva diṭṭhapubbo,
atk-s0201a:2042_25: Iti so tassa dassanampi dhammakathampi patthayamāno evamāha.
atk-s0201a:2044_2: Buddhānañhi ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasantānaṃ chāyūdakādivipattiṃ vā apphāsukasenāsanaṃ vā,
atk-s0201a:2044_3: manussānaṃ assaddhādibhāvaṃ vā āgamma anabhirati nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:2044_4: Tesaṃ sampattiyā “idha phāsu viharāmā”ti abhiramitvā ciravihāropi natthi.
atk-s0201a:2044_5: Yattha pana tathāgate viharante sattā saraṇesu vā patiṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0201a:2044_8: tato sotāpattimaggādīnaṃ vā pana tesaṃ upanissayo hoti.
atk-s0201a:2044_9: Tattha buddhā satte tāsu sampattīsu patiṭṭhāpanaajjhāsayena vasanti;
atk-s0201a:2044_14: Cārikā ca nāmesā bhagavato duvidhā hoti turitacārikā ca,
atk-s0201a:2045_0: Tattha dūrepi bodhaneyyapuggalaṃ disvā tassa bodhanatthāya sahasā gamanaṃ turitacārikā nāma.
atk-s0201a:2045_2: Bhagavā hi mahākassapaṃ paccuggacchanto muhuttena tigāvutaṃ maggaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0201a:2046_6: Tato dutiyadivase vīsatisahassakhīṇāsavaparivuto ākāse uppatitvā vīsayojanasatamatthake tassa gocaragāmadvāre otaritvā cīvaraṃ pārupi.
atk-s0201a:2046_7: Kammantaṃ gacchamānā manussā disvā, “satthā, bho, āgato,
atk-s0201a:2046_8: mā kammantaṃ agamitthā”ti vatvā āsanāni paññapetvā yāguṃ datvā pānavattaṃ karontā, “kuhiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0201a:2046_12: Te “amhākaṃ kira kulūpakattherassa dassanatthāya satthā āgato,
atk-s0201a:2046_13: no vata no thero oramattako”ti somanassajātā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2047_0: Atha bhagavato bhattakiccapariyosāne sāmaṇero gāmaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā “upāsakā mahā bhikkhusaṅgho”ti pucchi.
atk-s0201a:2047_4: Satthā tassa pattaṃ hatthena gahetvā, “alaṃ, tissa,
atk-s0201a:2047_6: Tato upajjhāyaṃ āpucchitvā attano pattāsane nisīditvā bhattakiccamakāsi.
atk-s0201a:2047_7: Athassa bhattakiccapariyosāne satthā maṅgalaṃ vatvā nikkhamitvā gāmadvāre ṭhatvā,
atk-s0201a:2047_12: Bhagavā kira sadevakassa lokassa maggadesako samānopi “sakalatigāvute magge sāmaṇeraṃ daṭṭhuṃ lacchāmī”ti taṃ maggadesakamakāsi.
atk-s0201a:2048_0: So attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā bhagavato vattamakāsi.
atk-s0201a:2048_3: caṅkamo”ti pucchitvā tattha gantvā sāmaṇerassa nisīdanapāsāṇe nisīditvā, “tissa,
atk-s0201a:2048_4: imasmiṃ ṭhāne sukhaṃ vasasī”ti pucchi. So āha – “āma, bhante,
atk-s0201a:2048_5: imasmiṃ me ṭhāne vasantassa sīhabyagghahatthimigamorādīnaṃ saddaṃ suṇato araññasaññā uppajjati,
atk-s0201a:2048_9: buddhadāyajjaṃ te dassāmī”ti vatvā sannipatite bhikkhusaṅghe upasampādetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva agamāsīti.
atk-s0201a:2049_0: Yaṃ pana gāmanigamapaṭipāṭiyā devasikaṃ yojanaḍḍhayojanavasena piṇḍapātacariyādīhi lokaṃ anuggaṇhantassa gamanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2049_2: Imaṃ pana cārikaṃ caranto bhagavā mahāmaṇḍalaṃ majjhimamaṇḍalaṃ antimamaṇḍalanti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ maṇḍalānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ carati.
atk-s0201a:2049_10: itaresu dvīsu maṇḍalesu sakkāro mahāmaṇḍale osarati.
atk-s0201a:2049_11: Tatra bhagavā tesu tesu gāmanigamesu ekāhaṃ dvīhaṃ vasanto mahājanaṃ āmisapaṭiggahena anuggaṇhanto dhammadānena
atk-s0201a:2049_12: cassa vivaṭṭūpanissitaṃ kusalaṃ vaḍḍhento navahi māsehi cārikaṃ pariyosāpeti.
atk-s0201a:2050_0: Sace pana antovasse bhikkhūnaṃ samathavipassanā taruṇā hoti,
atk-s0201a:2050_1: mahāpavāraṇāya apavāretvā pavāraṇāsaṅgahaṃ datvā kattikapuṇṇamāya pavāretvā migasirassa paṭhamadivase
atk-s0201a:2050_3: Aññenapi kāraṇena majjhimamaṇḍale cārikaṃ caritukāmo catumāsaṃ vasitvāva nikkhamati.
atk-s0201a:2050_4: Vuttanayeneva itaresu dvīsu maṇḍalesu sakkāro majjhimamaṇḍale osarati.
atk-s0201a:2050_5: Bhagavā purimanayeneva lokaṃ anuggaṇhanto aṭṭhahi māsehi cārikaṃ pariyosāpeti.
atk-s0201a:2051_0: Sace pana catumāsaṃ vuṭṭhavassassāpi bhagavato veneyyasattā aparipakkindriyā honti,
atk-s0201a:2051_1: tesaṃ indriyaparipākaṃ āgamayamāno aparampi ekaṃ māsaṃ vā dviticatumāsaṃ vā tattheva vasitvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro nikkhamati.
atk-s0201a:2051_2: Vuttanayeneva itaresu dvīsu maṇḍalesu sakkāro antomaṇḍale osarati.
atk-s0201a:2051_3: Bhagavā purimanayeneva lokaṃ anuggaṇhanto sattahi vā chahi vā pañcahi vā catūhi vā māsehi cārikaṃ pariyosāpeti.
atk-s0201a:2051_4: Iti imesu tīsu maṇḍalesu yattha katthaci cārikaṃ caranto na cīvarādihetu carati.
atk-s0201a:2051_5: Atha kho ye duggatā bālā jiṇṇā byādhitā,
atk-s0201a:2051_7: Mayi pana cārikaṃ carante mahājano tathāgatadassanaṃ labhissati,
atk-s0201a:2051_12: taṃ tesaṃ bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyāti evaṃ lokānukampāya cārikaṃ carati.
atk-s0201a:2052_0: Apica catūhi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti –
atk-s0201a:2052_5: Aparehipi catūhi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti –
atk-s0201a:2052_9: mahatā dhammavassena catasso parisā santappessāmīti vāti.
atk-s0201a:2052_10: Aparehi pañcahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti –
atk-s0201a:2052_15: Aparehi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti –
atk-s0201a:2052_19: Aparehi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti –
atk-s0201a:2052_27: Tattha yaṃ ekasseva bodhaneyyasattassa atthāya gacchati,
atk-s0201a:2053_1: Taṃ pana paṭisāmento thero na cūḷapattamahāpatta-
atk-s0201a:2053_4: dukūlacīvarādīnaṃ bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā sappitelādīnaṃ vā pana ghaṭe pūrāpetvā gabbhe nidahitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya kuñcikamuddikādīni yojāpesi.
atk-s0201a:2053_5: “Sace na hoti bhikkhu vā sāmaṇero vā ārāmiko vā upāsako vā,
atk-s0201a:2053_6: catūsu pāsāṇesu mañce mañcaṃ āropetvā pīṭhe pīṭhaṃ āropetvā cīvaravaṃse vā cīvararajjuyā vā upari puñjaṃ
atk-s0201a:2053_7: katvā dvāravātapānaṃ thaketvā pakkamitabba”nti vacanato pana nevāsikaṃ bhikkhuṃ āpucchanamattakeneva
atk-s0201a:2054_0: Yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṃ pakkāmīti satthu dassanakāmo hutvā yena disābhāgena sāvatthi tena pakkāmi.
atk-s0201a:2054_1: Pakkamanto ca na suddhodanamahārājassa ārocāpetvā sappitelamadhuphāṇitādīni gāhāpetvā pakkanto.
atk-s0201a:2054_2: Yūthaṃ pahāya nikkhanto pana mattahatthī viya,
atk-s0201a:2054_5: Kasmā panesa pañcasatehi attano antevāsikehi saddhiṃ rājagahaṃ agantvā idāni nikkhantoti?
atk-s0201a:2054_8: Satthā rājagahato pañcacattālīsayojanaṃ āgantvā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati,
atk-s0201a:2054_9: idāni āsanno jātoti sutvā nikkhamīti akāraṇametaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2054_10: Buddhānaṃ santikaṃ gacchanto hi esa yojanasahassampi gaccheyya,
atk-s0201a:2054_11: tadā pana kāyaviveko na sakkā laddhunti.
atk-s0201a:2054_12: Bahūhi saddhiṃ gamanakāle hi ekasmiṃ gacchāmāti vadante eko idheva vasāmāti vadati.
atk-s0201a:2054_13: Ekasmiṃ vasāmāti vadante eko gacchāmāti vadati.
atk-s0201a:2054_14: Tasmā icchiticchitakkhaṇe samāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdituṃ vā phāsukasenāsane kāyavivekaṃ laddhuṃ vā na sakkā hoti,
atk-s0201a:2054_15: ekakassa pana taṃ sabbaṃ sulabhaṃ hotīti tadā agantvā idāni pakkāmi.
atk-s0201a:2055_0: Cārikaṃ caramānoti ettha kiñcāpi ayaṃ cārikā nāma mahājanasaṅgahatthaṃ buddhānaṃyeva labbhati,
atk-s0201a:2055_1: buddhe upādāya pana ruḷhīsaddena sāvakānampi vuccati kilañjādīhi kataṃ bījanampi tālavaṇṭaṃ viya.
atk-s0201a:2055_2: Yena bhagavāti sāvatthiyā avidūre ekasmiṃ gāmake piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco jetavanaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0201a:2055_3: sāriputtattherassa vā mahāmoggallānattherassa vā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā pāde dhovitvā makkhetvā pānīyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2055_4: vā pānakaṃ vā pivitvā thokaṃ vissamitvā satthāraṃ passissāmīti cittampi anuppādetvā ujukaṃ gandhakuṭipariveṇameva agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:2055_5: Therassa hi satthāraṃ daṭṭhukāmassa aññena bhikkhunā kiccaṃ natthi.
atk-s0201a:2055_6: Tasmā rāhulaṃ vā ānandaṃ vā gahetvā okāsaṃ kāretvā satthāraṃ passissāmīti evampi cittaṃ na uppādesi.
atk-s0201a:2056_0: Thero hi sayameva buddhasāsane vallabho rañño saṅgāmavijayamahāyodho viya.
atk-s0201a:2056_1: Yathā hi tādisassa yodhassa rājānaṃ daṭṭhukāmassa aññaṃ sevitvā dassanakammaṃ nāma natthi;
atk-s0201a:2056_4: tassa aññaṃ sevitvā satthudassanakiccaṃ natthīti pāde dhovitvā pādapuñchanamhi puñchitvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0201a:2056_6: Tasmā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā sūcighaṭikaṃ adatvāva darathaṃ paṭippassambhetvā uṭṭhāya nisīdi.
atk-s0201a:2056_7: Thero kavāṭaṃ paṇāmetvā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0201a:2056_8: Dhammiyā kathāyāti bhagavā dhammiṃ kathaṃ kathento cūḷagosiṅgasutte tiṇṇaṃ kulaputtānaṃ sāmaggirasānisaṃsaṃ kathesi;
atk-s0201a:2056_13: upakkilesasutte bhaguttherassa dhammakathaṃ kathento ekībhāve ānisaṃsaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0201a:2056_14: Imasmiṃ pana rathavinīte āyasmato puṇṇassa kathento dasakathāvatthunissayaṃ anantanayaṃ nāma dassesi puṇṇa,
atk-s0201a:2056_16: Paṭisambhidāpattassa sāvakassa velante ṭhatvā mahāsamudde hatthappasāraṇaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2057_0: Yena andhavananti tadā kira pacchābhatte jetavanaṃ ākiṇṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2057_8: “sāyanhasamaye āgantvā mahāthere disvā puna dasabalaṃ passissāmi,
atk-s0201a:2057_11: tato satthāraṃ vanditvā mama vasanaṭṭhānameva gamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2059_1: Abhiṇhaṃ kittayamāno ahosīti punappunaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kittayamāno vihāsi.
atk-s0201a:2059_2: Thero kira tato paṭṭhāya divase divase saṅghamajjhe “puṇṇo kira nāma mantāṇiputto catūhi parisāhi saddhiṃ asaṃsaṭṭho,
atk-s0201a:2059_4: kacci nu kho maṃ adisvāva gamissatī”ti theranavamajjhimānaṃ satikaraṇatthaṃ āyasmato puṇṇassa guṇaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0201a:2059_7: guṇakathāya panassa kathitāya yo ca naṃ bhikkhuṃ passissati;
atk-s0201a:2059_9: Athāyaṃ therasseva saddhivihāriko taṃ āyasmantaṃ mantāṇiputtaṃ pattacīvaramādāya gandhakuṭiṃ pavisantaṃ addasa.
atk-s0201a:2059_10: Kathaṃ pana naṃ esa aññāsīti? Puṇṇa,
atk-s0201a:2059_11: puṇṇāti vatvā kathentassa bhagavato dhammakathāya aññāsi –
atk-s0201a:2059_13: yassa me upajjhāyo abhiṇhaṃ kittayamāno hotī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2059_15: Nisīdanaṃ ādāyāti nisīdanaṃ nāma sadasaṃ vuccati avāyimaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2059_18: Sīsānulokīti yo unnataṭṭhāne piṭṭhiṃ passanto ninnaṭṭhāne sīsaṃ passanto gacchati,
atk-s0201a:2059_21: Thero hi kiñcāpi saṃyatapadasaddatāya accāsanno hutvā gacchantopi padasaddena na bādhati,
atk-s0201a:2059_26: puṇṇāti aphāsukasaddo kātabbo hotīti nisinnaṭṭhānajānanatthaṃ nātidūre hutvā sīsānulokī agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:2060_10: Iti ekaṃ kanakaguhaṃ paviṭṭhā dve sīhā viya,
atk-s0201a:2060_11: ekaṃ vijambhanabhūmiṃ otiṇṇā dve byagghā viya,
atk-s0201a:2060_12: ekaṃ supupphitasālavanaṃ paviṭṭhā dve chaddantanāgarājāno viya,
atk-s0201a:2060_13: ekaṃ simbalivanaṃ paviṭṭhā dve supaṇṇarājāno viya,
atk-s0201a:2060_14: ekaṃ naravāhanayānaṃ abhiruḷhā dve vessavaṇā viya,
atk-s0201a:2060_15: ekaṃ paṇḍukambalasilaṃ abhinisinnā dve sakkā viya,
atk-s0201a:2060_16: ekavimānabbhantaragatā dve hāritamahābrahmāno viya ca te dvepi brāhmaṇajaccā dvepi suvaṇṇavaṇṇā dvepi
atk-s0201a:2060_17: samāpattilābhino dvepi abhinīhārasampannā dvepi paṭisambhidāpattā mahākhīṇāsavā ekaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ anupaviṭṭhā
atk-s0201a:2061_2: kiṃ amhākaṃ bhagavato santike āyasmatā brahmacariyaṃ vussatīti?
atk-s0201a:2061_3: Idaṃ āyasmā sāriputto tassa bhagavati brahmacariyavāsaṃ jānantopi kathāsamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0201a:2061_4: Purimakathāya hi appatiṭṭhitāya pacchimakathā na jāyati,
atk-s0201a:2061_7: Athassa pañhavissajjanaṃ sotukāmo āyasmā sāriputto “kiṃ nu kho āvuso sīlavisuddhatthaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2061_10: Āyasmā pana puṇṇo yasmā catupārisuddhisīlādīsu ṭhitassāpi brahmacariyavāso matthakaṃ na pāpuṇāti, tasmā,
atk-s0201a:2062_0: Kimatthaṃ carahāvusoti yadi sīlavisuddhiādīnaṃ atthāya brahmacariyaṃ na vussati,
atk-s0201a:2062_6: paccayūpādānaṃ nāma avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti evaṃ vuttapaccayā.
atk-s0201a:2062_7: Tattha gahaṇūpādānavādino ācariyā anupādāparinibbānanti catūsu upādānesu aññatarenāpi kañci dhammaṃ aggahetvā
atk-s0201a:2062_9: Tañhi na ca upādānasampayuttaṃ hutvā kañci dhammaṃ upādiyati,
atk-s0201a:2062_12: Paccayavasena anuppannaṃ asaṅkhataṃ amatadhātumeva anupādāparinibbānanti kathenti.
atk-s0201a:2062_16: Appaccayaparinibbānaṃ pattassa hi brahmacariyavāso matthakaṃ patto nāma hoti,
atk-s0201a:2062_18: Atha naṃ anuyuñjanto āyasmā sāriputto “kiṃ nu kho, āvuso,
atk-s0201a:2063_1: Theropi sabbaparivattesu tatheva paṭikkhipitvā pariyosāne dosaṃ dassento sīlavisuddhiṃ ce,
atk-s0201a:2063_4: Saupādānaṃyeva samānaṃ anupādāparinibbānaṃ paññapeyyāti saṅgahaṇadhammameva niggahaṇadhammaṃ sappaccayadhammameva
atk-s0201a:2063_6: Ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyaṃ pana sappaccayadhammameva appaccayadhammaṃ saṅkhatadhammameva asaṅkhatadhammanti paññapeyyāti ayameva attho gahetabbo.
atk-s0201a:2063_9: So hi catupārisuddhisīlamattassāpi abhāvato sabbaso aññatra imehi dhammehi.
atk-s0201a:2063_10: Tena hīti yena kāraṇena ekacce paṇḍitā upamāya atthaṃ jānanti,
atk-s0201a:2063_11: tena kāraṇena upamaṃ te karissāmīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2065_1: Satta rathavinītānīti vinītaassājāniyayutte satta rathe. Yāvadeva,
atk-s0201a:2065_13: cittavisuddhiyaṃ ṭhitassa hi sīlavisuddhikiccaṃ kataṃ nāma hotīti.
atk-s0201a:2066_1: rājā pasenadi kosalo viya hi jarāmaraṇabhīruko yogāvacaro daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:2066_4: rañño sākete vaḍḍhiāvahassa sīghaṃ gantvā pāpuṇitabbassa accāyikassa kiccassa uppādakālo viya yogino
atk-s0201a:2066_7: paṭhamaṃ rathavinītaṃ āruḷhakālo viya sīlavisuddhiyaṃ ṭhitakālo,
atk-s0201a:2066_8: paṭhamarathavinītādīhi dutiyādīni āruḷhakālo viya sīlavisuddhiādīhi cittavisuddhiādīsu ṭhitakālo.
atk-s0201a:2066_9: Sattamena rathavinītena sākete antepuradvāre oruyha uparipāsāde ñātimittagaṇaparivutassa surasabhojanaparibhogakālo
atk-s0201a:2066_10: viya yogino ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā sabbakilese khepetvā dhammavarapāsādaṃ āruyha paropaṇṇāsakusaladhammaparivārassa
atk-s0201a:2066_11: nibbānārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā nirodhasayane nisinnassa lokuttarasukhānubhavanakālo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:2067_0: Iti āyasmantaṃ puṇṇaṃ dasakathāvatthulābhiṃ dhammasenāpatisāriputtatthero satta visuddhiyo pucchi.
atk-s0201a:2067_2: Evaṃ pucchanto pana dhammasenāpati kiṃ jānitvā pucchi,
atk-s0201a:2067_4: Titthakusalo vā pana hutvā visayasmiṃ pucchi,
atk-s0201a:2067_8: Titthakusalo vā pana hutvā visayasmiṃ vissajjesi,
atk-s0201a:2067_10: Jānitvā titthakusalo hutvā visaye pucchīti hi vadamāno dhammasenāpatiṃyeva vadeyya.
atk-s0201a:2067_11: Jānitvā titthakusalo hutvā visaye vissajjesīti vadamāno puṇṇattheraṃyeva vadeyya.
atk-s0201a:2068_0: Visuddhīsu hi ekā sīlavisuddhi cattāri kathāvatthūni hutvā āgatā appicchakathā santuṭṭhikathā asaṃsaggakathā,
atk-s0201a:2068_2: Ekā cittavisuddhi tīṇi kathāvatthūni hutvā āgatā –
atk-s0201a:2068_8: Kathāvatthūsu pana ekā paññākathā pañca visuddhiyo hutvā āgatā –
atk-s0201a:2068_16: Tasmā sāriputtatthero satta visuddhiyo pucchanto na aññaṃ pucchi,
atk-s0201a:2068_18: Puṇṇattheropi satta visuddhiyo vissajjento na aññaṃ vissajjesi,
atk-s0201a:2068_20: Iti ubhopete jānitvā titthakusalā hutvā visayeva pañhaṃ pucchiṃsu ceva vissajjesuṃ cāti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2069_1: Ko nāmo āyasmāti na thero tassa nāmaṃ na jānāti.
atk-s0201a:2069_3: Kathañca panāyasmantanti idaṃ pana thero sammodamāno āha.
atk-s0201a:2069_8: Anumassa anumassāti dasa kathāvatthūni ogāhetvā anupavisitvā.
atk-s0201a:2069_11: Vatthacumbaṭakaṃ sīse katvā āyasmantaṃ tattha nisīdāpetvā pariharantāpi sabrahmacārī dassanāya labheyyuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2069_12: evaṃ laddhadassanampi tesaṃ lābhāyevāti aṭṭhānaparikappena abhiṇhadassanassa upāyaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0201a:2069_13: Evaṃ apariharantena hi pañhaṃ vā pucchitukāmena dhammaṃ vā sotukāmena “thero kattha ṭhito kattha nisinno”ti pariyesantena caritabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2069_14: Evaṃ pariharantā pana icchiticchitakkhaṇeyeva sīsato oropetvā mahārahe āsane nisīdāpetvā sakkā honti pañhaṃ vā pucchituṃ dhammaṃ vā sotuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2070_0: Sāriputtoti ca pana manti sāriyā brāhmaṇiyā puttoti ca pana evaṃ maṃ sabrahmacārī jānanti.
atk-s0201a:2070_2: Iti ekapadeneva āyasmā puṇṇo sāriputtattheraṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ āhacca ṭhapento viya ukkhipi.
atk-s0201a:2070_3: Therassa hi imasmiṃ ṭhāne ekantadhammakathikabhāvo pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2070_4: Amaccañhi purohitaṃ mahantoti vadamāno rājasadisoti vadeyya,
