atk-s0201a:2258_4: Tisso peḷāyo ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vivaritvā tato pañcasamugganīharaṇaṃ viya tīṇi ariyasaccāni ṭhapetvā dukkhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2258_6: Cattāro samugge ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vivaritvā tato pañcakaraṇḍanīharaṇaṃ viya cattāro arūpakkhandhe ṭhapetvā
atk-s0201a:2259_1: Cattāro karaṇḍe ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vivaritvā pidhānaṃ passe ṭhapetvā hatthūpagapādūpagādipiḷandhanadānaṃ viya
atk-s0201a:2259_2: tīṇi mahābhūtāni upādārūpañca ṭhapetvā ekaṃ pathavīdhātuṃ vibhajantassa bāhiraṃ tāva pidhānaṃ viya ṭhapetvā
atk-s0201a:2259_3: ajjhattikāya pathavīdhātuyā nānāsabhāvato vīsatiyā ākārehi dassanatthaṃ “katamā cāvuso ajjhattikā pathavīdhātū”tiādivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2260_0: Tassa pana rājaputtassa tehi catūhi karaṇḍehi catūhi samuggehi tīhi ca peḷāhi pacchā anupubbena nīharitvā
atk-s0201a:2260_1: piḷandhanadānaṃ viya therassāpi itaresañca tiṇṇaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādārūpānañca catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānañca
atk-s0201a:2260_2: tiṇṇaṃ ariyasaccānañca pacchā anupubbena bhājetvā dassanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2260_15: udariyaṃ karīsanti idaṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa kulaputtassa ajjhattikapathavīdhātuvasena tāva kammaṭṭhānaṃ vibhattaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2260_16: Ettha pana manasikāraṃ ārabhitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ gahetukāmena yaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2260_21: “ayampi acetanā abyākatā suññā thaddhā pathavīdhātu evā”ti manasi kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2260_22: Yaṃ vā panaññampīti idaṃ itaresu tīsu koṭṭhāsesu anugatāya pathavīdhātuyā gahaṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2260_23: Yā ceva kho pana ajjhattikā pathavīdhātūti yā ca ayaṃ vuttappakārā ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu.
atk-s0201a:2260_24: Yā ca bāhirāti yā ca vibhaṅge,
atk-s0201a:2260_25: “ayo lohaṃ tipu sīsa”ntiādinā nayena āgatā bāhirā pathavīdhātu.
atk-s0201a:2261_0: Ettāvatā therena ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu nānāsabhāvato vīsatiyā ākārehi vitthārena dassitā,
atk-s0201a:2261_2: Yasmiñhi ṭhāne sattānaṃ ālayo nikanti patthanā pariyuṭṭhānaṃ gahaṇaṃ parāmāso balavā hoti,
atk-s0201a:2261_3: tattha tesaṃ ālayādīnaṃ uddharaṇatthaṃ buddhā vā buddhasāvakā vā vitthārakathaṃ kathenti.
atk-s0201a:2261_6: Yathā hi kassako khettaṃ kasamāno yattha mūlasantānakānaṃ balavatāya naṅgalaṃ laggati,
atk-s0201a:2261_7: tattha goṇe ṭhapetvā paṃsuṃ viyūhitvā mūlasantānakāni chetvā chetvā uddharanto bahuṃ vāyāmaṃ karoti.
atk-s0201a:2261_9: tattha balavaṃ payogaṃ katvā goṇe piṭṭhiyaṃ paharamāno kasatiyeva,
atk-s0201a:2262_0: Pathavīdhāturevesāti duvidhāpesā thaddhaṭṭhena kakkhaḷaṭṭhena pharusaṭṭhena ekalakkhaṇā pathavīdhātuyeva,
atk-s0201a:2262_1: āvusoti ajjhattikaṃ bāhirāya saddhiṃ yojetvā dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2262_4: tasmā sā bāhirāya saddhiṃ ekasadisā acetanāyevāti gaṇhantassa sukhapariggaho hoti.
atk-s0201a:2262_6: Yathā dantena goṇena saddhiṃ yojito adanto katipāhameva visūkāyati vipphandati,
atk-s0201a:2262_8: Evaṃ ajjhattikāpi bāhirāya saddhiṃ ekasadisāti gaṇhantassa katipāhameva acetanābhāvo na upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0201a:2262_9: atha na cirenevassā acetanābhāvo pākaṭo hoti.
atk-s0201a:2262_10: Taṃ netaṃ mamāti taṃ ubhayampi na etaṃ mama,
atk-s0201a:2262_12: na eso me attāti evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2262_15: tasmā aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti evaṃ daṭṭhabbanti attho.
atk-s0201a:2263_2: Bāhiraāpodhātuvasena bāhirāya pathavīdhātuyā vināsaṃ dassetvā tato visesatarena upādinnāya sarīraṭṭhakapathavīdhātuyā vināsadassanatthaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2263_4: Antarahitā tasmiṃ samaye bāhirā pathavīdhātu hotīti tasmiṃ samaye koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷe khārodakena
atk-s0201a:2263_5: vilīyamānā udakānugatā hutvā sabbā pabbatādivasena saṇṭhitā pathavīdhātu antarahitā hoti.
atk-s0201a:2266_6: iti sabbehipi imehi padehi aniccalakkhaṇameva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2266_10: taṃ anattāti tīṇipi lakkhaṇāni āgatāneva honti.
atk-s0201a:2266_12: tattha dvīhākārehi imassa kāyassa parittaṭṭhititā veditabbā ṭhitiparittatāya ca sarasaparittatāya ca.
atk-s0201a:2269_0: Idaṃ etasseva parittaṭṭhitidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Evaṃ ṭhitiparittatāya parittaṭṭhititā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:2271_0: Taṇhupādinnassāti taṇhāya ādinnagahitaparāmaṭṭhassa ahanti vā mamanti vā asmīti vā.
atk-s0201a:2271_1: Atha khvāssa notevettha hotīti atha kho assa bhikkhuno evaṃ tīṇi lakkhaṇāni āropetvā passantassa ettha
atk-s0201a:2271_2: ajjhattikāya pathavīdhātuyā ahanti vātiādi tividho taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāho noteva hoti,
atk-s0201a:2271_5: evaṃ tejodhātuvāyodhātuvasenapi bāhirāya pathavīdhātuyā antaradhānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2272_1: āvusoti idha tassa dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa bhikkhuno sotadvāre pariggahaṃ paṭṭhapento balaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2272_4: evañca evañca taṃ karissāmāti vācāya paribhāsanti.
atk-s0201a:2272_8: So evanti so dhātukammaṭṭhāniko evaṃ sampajānāti.
atk-s0201a:2272_9: Uppannā kho me ayanti sampativattamānuppannabhāvena ca samudācāruppannabhāvena ca uppannā.
atk-s0201a:2272_11: phasso aniccoti sotasamphasso hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccoti passati.
atk-s0201a:2272_22: Ayañhi sotadvāramhi ārammaṇe āpāthagate mūlapariññāāgantukatāvakālikavasena pariggahaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a:2273_0: Evaṃ katapariggahassa hi dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa balavavipassakassa sacepi cakkhudvārādīsu ārammaṇe āpāthagate ayoniso āvajjanaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0201a:2273_1: voṭṭhabbanaṃ patvā ekaṃ dve vāre āsevanaṃ labhitvā cittaṃ bhavaṅgameva otarati,
atk-s0201a:2273_4: Aparassa rāgādivasena ekaṃ vāraṃ javanaṃ javati,
atk-s0201a:2273_5: javanapariyosāne pana rāgādivasena evaṃ me javanaṃ javitanti āvajjato ārammaṇaṃ pariggahitameva hoti,
atk-s0201a:2273_7: Aparassa ekavāraṃ evaṃ āvajjato puna dutiyavāraṃ rāgādivasena javanaṃ javatiyeva,
atk-s0201a:2273_8: dutiyavārāvasāne pana evaṃ me javanaṃ javitanti āvajjato ārammaṇaṃ pariggahitameva hoti,
atk-s0201a:2274_0: Evaṃ sotadvāre pariggahitavasena dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa balaṃ dassetvā idāni kāyadvāre dīpento tañce,
atk-s0201a:2274_2: Aniṭṭhārammaṇañhi patvā dvīsu vāresu kilamati sotadvāre ca kāyadvāre ca.
atk-s0201a:2274_3: Tasmā yathā nāma khettassāmī puriso kudālaṃ gahetvā khettaṃ anusañcaranto yattha vā tattha vā mattikapiṇḍaṃ
atk-s0201a:2274_4: adatvā dubbalaṭṭhānesuyeva kudālena bhūmiṃ bhinditvā satiṇamattikapiṇḍaṃ deti.
atk-s0201a:2274_5: Evameva mahāthero anāgate sikkhākāmā padhānakammikā kulaputtā imesu dvāresu saṃvaraṃ paṭṭhapetvā khippameva
atk-s0201a:2274_6: jātijarāmaraṇassa antaṃ karissantīti imesuyeva dvīsu dvāresu gāḷhaṃ katvā saṃvaraṃ desento imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a:2275_6: Evaṃ buddhaṃ anussaratotiādīsu itipi so bhagavātiādinā nayena anussarantopi buddhaṃ anussarati,
atk-s0201a:2275_7: vuttaṃ kho panetaṃ bhagavatāti anussarantopi anussaratiyeva.
atk-s0201a:2275_8: Svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammotiādinā nayena anussarantopi dhammaṃ anussarati,
atk-s0201a:2275_11: kakacokantanaṃ adhivāsayamānassa bhikkhuno guṇaṃ anussaramānopi anussaratiyeva.
atk-s0201a:2276_0: Upekkhā kusalanissitā na saṇṭhātīti idha vipassanupekkhā adhippetā.
atk-s0201a:2276_2: sā panesā kiñcāpi khīṇāsavassa iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu ārammaṇesu arajjanādivasena pavattati,
atk-s0201a:2276_3: ayaṃ pana bhikkhu vīriyabalena bhāvanāsiddhiyā attano vipassanaṃ khīṇāsavassa chaḷaṅgupekkhāṭhāne ṭhapetīti vipassanāva chaḷaṅgupekkhā nāma jātā.
atk-s0201a:2277_3: taṃ sabbaṃ saddhiṃ bhāvanānayena visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2277_9: uddhane āropitaudakaṃ viya khayaṃ vināsaṃ pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0201a:2278_2: Tejo eva vā tejobhāvaṃ gatanti tejogataṃ.
atk-s0201a:2278_3: Purime āpogatepi pacchime vāyogatepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a:2278_7: Yena ca jīrīyatīti yena ayaṃ kāyo jīrati,
atk-s0201a:2278_9: Yena ca pariḍayhatīti yena kuppitena ayaṃ kāyo dayhati,
atk-s0201a:2278_10: so ca puggalo dayhāmi dayhāmīti kandanto satadhotasappigosītacandanādilepañca tālavaṇṭavātañca paccāsīsati.
atk-s0201a:2278_11: Yena ca asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchatīti yena taṃ asitaṃ vā odanādi,
atk-s0201a:2278_14: sāyitaṃ vā ambapakkamadhuphāṇitādi sammā paripākaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0201a:2278_18: taṃ sabbaṃ saddhiṃ bhāvanānayena visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2279_9: tejosaṃvaṭṭakāle pana koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaṃ jhāpetvā chārikāmattampi na tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a:2279_11: Aggiṃ gavesantīti evarūpaṃ sukhumaṃ upādānaṃ gahetvā aggiṃ pariyesanti,
atk-s0201a:2280_1: Vāyodhātuniddese uddhaṅgamā vātāti uggārahikkārādipavattakā uddhaṃ ārohanavātā.
atk-s0201a:2280_5: Aṅgamaṅgānusārinoti dhamanījālānusārena sakalasarīre aṅgamaṅgāni anusaṭā samiñjanapasāraṇādinibbattakavātā.
atk-s0201a:2280_10: taṃ sabbaṃ saddhiṃ bhāvanānayena visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2281_0: Gāmampi vahatīti sakalagāmampi cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ kurumānā ādāya gacchati,
atk-s0201a:2282_8: Ākāso parivāritoti etāni kaṭṭhādīni anto ca bahi ca parivāretvā ākāso ṭhitoti attho.
atk-s0201a:2282_9: Agāraṃtveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti agāranti paṇṇattimattaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2282_10: Kaṭṭhādīsu pana visuṃ visuṃ rāsikatesu kaṭṭharāsivallirāsītveva vuccati.
atk-s0201a:2282_11: Evameva khoti evameva aṭṭhiādīni anto ca bahi ca parivāretvā ṭhito ākāso,
atk-s0201a:2282_12: tāneva aṭṭhiādīni paṭicca rūpaṃtveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0201a:2282_14: Yathā kaṭṭhādīni paṭicca gehanti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ agāraṃ khattiyagehaṃ brāhmaṇagehanti vuccati,
atk-s0201a:2282_16: na hettha koci satto vā jīvo vā vijjati.
atk-s0201a:2283_2: Heṭṭhā upādārūpaṃ cattāro ca arūpino khandhā tīṇi ca ariyasaccāni na kathitāni,
atk-s0201a:2283_3: idāni tāni kathetuṃ ayaṃ desanā āraddhāti.
atk-s0201a:2283_4: Tattha cakkhuṃ aparibhinnanti cakkhupasāde niruddhepi upahatepi pittasemhalohitehi palibuddhepi cakkhu cakkhuviññāṇassa paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:2283_6: cakkhuviññāṇassa pana paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ aparibhinnaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2283_8: Tajjo samannāhāroti taṃ cakkhuñca rūpe ca paṭicca bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭetvā uppajjanamanasikāro,
atk-s0201a:2283_10: Taṃ rūpānaṃ anāpāthagatattāpi aññāvihitassapi na hoti,
atk-s0201a:2284_0: Yaṃ tathābhūtassātiādīsu dvāravasena cattāri saccāni dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2284_3: Rūpanti cakkhuviññāṇassa na rūpajanakattā cakkhuviññāṇakkhaṇe tisamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2284_12: Yo paṭiccasamuppādaṃ passatīti yo paccaye passati.
atk-s0201a:2284_13: So dhammaṃ passatīti so paṭiccasamuppannadhamme passati,
atk-s0201a:2284_20: iti tīṇi saccāni pāḷiyaṃ āgatāneva maggasaccaṃ āharitvā gahetabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2284_21: yā imesu tīsu ṭhānesu diṭṭhi saṅkappo vācā kammanto ājīvo vāyāmo sati samādhi bhāvanāpaṭivedho,
atk-s0201a:2284_23: Bahukataṃ hotīti ettāvatāpi bahuṃ bhagavato sāsanaṃ kataṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2285_0: Manodvāre pana ajjhattiko mano nāma bhavaṅgacittaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2285_1: Taṃ niruddhampi āvajjanacittassa paccayo bhavituṃ asamatthaṃ mandathāmagatameva pavattamānampi paribhinnaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:2285_2: Āvajjanassa pana paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ aparibhinnaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2285_4: Neva tāva tajjassāti idaṃ bhavaṅgasamayeneva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2285_15: Iti mahāthero heṭṭhā ekadesameva sammasanto āgantvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhatvā heṭṭhā parihīnadesanaṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0201a:2285_16: taṃtaṃdvāravasena bhājetvā dassento yathānusandhināva suttantaṃ niṭṭhapesīti.
atk-s0201a:2289_2: Tattha acirapakkanteti saṅghaṃ bhinditvā ruhiruppādakammaṃ katvā nacirapakkante saliṅgeneva pāṭiyekke jāte.
atk-s0201a:2290_2: ekacco kulaputtoti kiñcāpi asukakulaputtoti na niyāmito,
atk-s0201a:2290_3: devadattaṃyeva pana sandhāya idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2290_4: So hi asambhinnāya mahāsammatapaveṇiyā okkākavaṃse jātattā jātikulaputto.
atk-s0201a:2290_12: Apaññātāti dvinnaṃ janānaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhāne na paññāyanti,
atk-s0201a:2290_15: purato vā pacchato vā gacchantaṃ na labhanti.
atk-s0201a:2291_0: Sārena sārakaraṇīyanti rukkhasārena kattabbaṃ akkhacakkayuganaṅgalādikaṃ yaṃkiñci.
atk-s0201a:2291_1: Sākhāpalāsaṃ aggahesi brahmacariyassāti maggaphalasārassa sāsanabrahmacariyassa cattāro paccayā sākhāpalāsaṃ nāma,
atk-s0201a:2291_3: Tena ca vosānaṃ āpādīti teneva ca alamettāvatā sāro me pattoti vosānaṃ āpanno.
atk-s0201a:2292_2: dibbacakkhu ca pañcannaṃ abhiññānaṃ matthake ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2292_4: Ajānaṃ apassaṃ viharantīti kiñci sukhumaṃ rūpaṃ ajānantā antamaso paṃsupisācakampi apassantā viharanti.
atk-s0201a:2293_3: Cattāro ca ariyamaggā cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni,
atk-s0201a:2293_5: ayaṃ asamayavimokkho”ti evaṃ vutte navalokuttaradhamme ārādheti sampādeti paṭilabhati.
atk-s0201a:2293_6: Lokiyasamāpattiyo hi appitappitakkhaṇeyeva paccanīkadhammehi vimuccanti, tasmā,
atk-s0201a:2293_8: Cattāri ca jhānāni catasso ca arūpāvacarasamāpattiyo,
atk-s0201a:2293_11: sakiṃ vimuttāni hi maggaphalāni vimuttāneva honti.
atk-s0201a:2293_12: Nibbānaṃ sabbakilesehi accantaṃ vimuttamevāti ime nava dhammā asamayavimokkhoti vuttā.
atk-s0201a:2294_4: Etaṃ sāranti etaṃ arahattaphalaṃ brahmacariyassa sāraṃ.
atk-s0201a:2294_5: Etaṃ pariyosānanti etaṃ arahattaphalaṃ brahmacariyassa pariyosānaṃ, esā koṭi,
atk-s0201a:2294_6: na ito paraṃ pattabbaṃ atthīti yathānusandhināva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesīti.
atk-s0201a:2298_5: Saṅghinotiādīsu pabbajitasamūhasaṅkhāto saṅgho etesaṃ atthīti saṅghino.
atk-s0201a:2298_10: appicchatāya vatthampi na nivāsentī”tiādinā nayena samuggato yaso etesaṃ atthīti yasassino.
atk-s0201a:2298_12: Sādhusammatāti ime sādhu sundarā sappurisāti evaṃ sammatā.
atk-s0201a:2298_17: So kira aññatarassa kulassa ekūnadāsasataṃ pūrayamāno jāto,
atk-s0201a:2298_23: So paṇṇena vā tiṇena vā paṭicchādetumpi ajānanto jātarūpeneva ekaṃ gāmaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0201a:2298_26: natthi iminā sadiso”ti pūvabhattādīni gahetvā upasaṅkamanti.
atk-s0201a:2298_27: So “mayhaṃ sāṭakaṃ anivatthabhāvena idaṃ uppanna”nti tato paṭṭhāya sāṭakaṃ labhitvāpi na nivāsesi,
atk-s0201a:2298_29: Tassa santike aññepi pañcasatā manussā pabbajiṃsu,
atk-s0201a:2299_2: Taṃ kira sakaddamāya bhūmiyā telaghaṭaṃ gahetvā gacchantaṃ, “tāta,
atk-s0201a:2299_4: So pamādena khalitvā patitvā sāmikassa bhayena palāyituṃ āraddho.
atk-s0201a:2299_6: Sopi sāṭakaṃ chaḍḍetvā acelako hutvā palāyi,
atk-s0201a:2300_4: tato paṭikiṭṭhataraṃ vatthaṃ nāma natthi. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a:2300_11: sīte sīto uṇhe uṇho dubbaṇṇo duggandho dukkhasamphasso”ti.
atk-s0201a:2301_6: uṇhodakaṃ vā kañjiyaṃ vā labhitvā karoti,
atk-s0201a:2301_8: “sīlaṃ me bhinna”nti vālikathūpaṃ katvā sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhāya gacchati,
atk-s0201a:2302_3: kilesagaṇṭharahitā mayanti evaṃ vāditāya laddhanāmavasena nigaṇṭho.
atk-s0201a:2302_8: sace nesaṃ sā paṭiññā niyyānikā sabbe abbhaññaṃsu. No ce,
atk-s0201a:2302_10: Tasmā kiṃ tesaṃ paṭiññā niyyānikā na niyyānikāti,
atk-s0201a:2302_12: Atha bhagavā nesaṃ aniyyānikabhāvakathanena atthābhāvato alanti paṭikkhipitvā upamāya atthaṃ pavedento dhammameva desetuṃ, dhammaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2303_2: Na chandaṃ janetīti kattukamyatāchandaṃ na janayati.
atk-s0201a:2303_3: Na vāyamatīti vāyāmaṃ parakkamaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0201a:2304_2: vivicceva kāmehīti kathaṃ ime paṭhamajjhānādidhammā ñāṇadassanena uttaritarā jātāti?
atk-s0201a:2304_7: Iti bhagavā idampi suttaṃ yathānusandhināva niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a:2312_2: Tattha nātike viharatīti nātikā nāma ekaṃ taḷākaṃ nissāya dvinnaṃ cūḷapitimahāpitiputtānaṃ dve gāmā,
atk-s0201a:2312_5: Ekasmiṃ kira samaye bhagavā mahājanasaṅgahaṃ karonto vajjiraṭṭhe cārikaṃ caramāno nātikaṃ anuppatto.
atk-s0201a:2312_6: Nātikavāsino manussā bhagavato mahādānaṃ datvā dhammakathaṃ sutvā pasannahadayā,
atk-s0201a:2312_7: “satthu vasanaṭṭhānaṃ karissāmā”ti mantetvā iṭṭhakāheva bhittisopānatthambhe vāḷarūpādīni dassento pāsādaṃ
atk-s0201a:2312_8: katvā sudhāya limpitvā mālākammalatākammādīni niṭṭhāpetvā bhummattharaṇamañcapīṭhādīni paññapetvā satthu
atk-s0201a:2312_10: Aparāparaṃ panettha manussā bhikkhusaṅghassa rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānamaṇḍapacaṅkamādīni kārayiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2313_0: Gosiṅgasālavanadāyeti tattha ekassa jeṭṭhakarukkhassa khandhato gosiṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ hutvā viṭapaṃ uṭṭhahi,
atk-s0201a:2313_1: taṃ rukkhaṃ upādāya sabbampi taṃ vanaṃ gosiṅgasālavananti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ.
atk-s0201a:2313_7: Tadā hi te laddhassādā laddhapatiṭṭhā adhigatapaṭisambhidā khīṇāsavā hutvā sāmaggirasaṃ anubhavamānā tattha vihariṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2314_0: Yena gosiṅgasālavanadāyo tenupasaṅkamīti dhammasenāpatimahāmoggallānattheresu vā asītimahāsāvakesu vā,
atk-s0201a:2314_1: antamaso dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaānandattherampi kañci anāmantetvā sayameva pattacīvaraṃ ādāya anīkā nissaṭo hatthī viya,
atk-s0201a:2314_9: “ahaṃ ime kulaputte paggaṇhitvā ukkaṃsitvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā dhammaṃ nesaṃ desessāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2314_12: “anāgate kulaputtā sammāsambuddho samaggavāsaṃ vasantānaṃ santikaṃ sayaṃ gantvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā dhammaṃ kathetvā tayo kulaputte paggaṇhi,
atk-s0201a:2314_13: ko nāma samaggavāsaṃ na vaseyyāti samaggavāsaṃ vasitabbaṃ maññamānā khippameva dukkhassantaṃ karissantī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2314_16: so ca nesaṃ dhammagarubhāvo rathavinīte āvikatova.
atk-s0201a:2314_17: Iti imasmā dhammagarubhāvatopi dhammaṃ paggaṇhissāmīti agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:2315_1: So taṃ araññaṃ yathā icchiticchitappadesena manussā pavisitvā tattha pupphaṃ vā phalaṃ vā niyyāsaṃ vā dabbasambhāraṃ vā na haranti,
atk-s0201a:2315_2: evaṃ vatiyā parikkhittassa tassa araññassa yojite dvāre nisīditvā taṃ araññaṃ rakkhati, pāleti.
atk-s0201a:2315_4: Attakāmarūpāti attano hitaṃ kāmayamānasabhāvā hutvā viharanti.
atk-s0201a:2315_5: Yo hi imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvāpi vejjakammadūtakammapahiṇagamanādīnaṃ vasena ekavīsatianesanāhi jīvikaṃ kappeti,
atk-s0201a:2315_7: Yo pana imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvā ekavīsatianesanaṃ pahāya catupārisuddhisīle patiṭṭhāya buddhavacanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2315_8: uggaṇhitvā sappāyadhutaṅgaṃ adhiṭṭhāya aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu cittaruciyaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gāmantaṃ
atk-s0201a:2315_9: pahāya araññaṃ pavisitvā samāpattiyo nibbattetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ kurumāno viharati,
atk-s0201a:2316_0: Mā tesaṃ aphāsumakāsīti tesaṃ mā aphāsukaṃ akāsīti bhagavantaṃ vāresi.
atk-s0201a:2316_6: kadāci ayampi evaṃ karonto imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ samaggavāsaṃ bhindeyya.
atk-s0201a:2316_7: Pāsādiko ca panesa suvaṇṇavaṇṇo surasagiddho maññe,
atk-s0201a:2316_8: gatakālato paṭṭhāya paṇītadāyakānaṃ attano upaṭṭhākānañca vaṇṇakathanādīhi imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ appamādavihāraṃ bhindeyya.
atk-s0201a:2316_9: Vasanaṭṭhānāni cāpi etesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ nibaddhāni paricchinnāni tisso ca paṇṇasālā tayo caṅkamā tīṇi divāṭṭhānāni tīṇi mañcapīṭhāni.
atk-s0201a:2316_10: Ayaṃ pana samaṇo mahākāyo vuḍḍhataro maññe bhavissati.
atk-s0201a:2316_11: So akāle ime kulaputte senāsanā vuṭṭhāpessati.
atk-s0201a:2317_2: Kiñcāpi hi tathāgatassa paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya dasasahassacakkavāḷakampanādīni pāṭihāriyāni pavattiṃsu,
atk-s0201a:2317_3: araññavāsino pana dubbalamanussā sakammappasutā tāni sallakkhetuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0201a:2317_4: Sammāsambuddho ca nāma yadā anekabhikkhusahassaparivāro byāmappabhāya asītianubyañjanehi dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇasiriyā
atk-s0201a:2317_6: tadā ko esoti apucchitvāva jānitabbo hoti.
atk-s0201a:2317_7: Tadā pana bhagavā sabbampi taṃ buddhānubhāvaṃ cīvaragabbhena paṭicchādetvā valāhakagabbhena paṭicchanno
atk-s0201a:2317_8: puṇṇacando viya sayameva pattacīvaramādāya aññātakavesena agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:2318_0: Etadavocāti thero kira mā samaṇāti dāyapālassa kathaṃ sutvāva cintesi –
atk-s0201a:2318_3: ayañca dāyapālo pabbajitena viya saddhiṃ katheti,
atk-s0201a:2318_4: ko nu kho bhavissatī”ti divāṭṭhānato vuṭṭhāya dvāre ṭhatvā maggaṃ olokento bhagavantaṃ addasa.
atk-s0201a:2318_5: Bhagavāpi therassa saha dassaneneva sarīrobhāsaṃ muñci,
atk-s0201a:2318_6: asītianubyañjanavirājitā byāmappabhā pasāritasuvaṇṇapaṭo viya virocittha. Thero,
atk-s0201a:2318_7: “ayaṃ dāyapālo phaṇakataṃ āsivisaṃ gīvāya gahetuṃ hatthaṃ pasārento viya loke aggapuggalena saddhiṃ kathentova na jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2318_8: aññatarabhikkhunā viya saddhiṃ kathetī”ti nivārento etaṃ, “mā,
atk-s0201a:2319_0: Tenupasaṅkamīti kasmā bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ akatvā upasaṅkami?
atk-s0201a:2319_4: samaggavāso nāma na bhavissatī”ti piyamitte gahetvāva paccuggamanaṃ karissāmi.
atk-s0201a:2319_7: tehi saddhiṃ paccuggamanaṃ kātukāmo sayaṃ akatvāva upasaṅkami.
atk-s0201a:2319_8: Keci pana tesaṃ therānaṃ paṇṇasāladvāre caṅkamanakoṭiyā bhagavato āgamanamaggo hoti,
atk-s0201a:2319_9: tasmā thero tesaṃ saññaṃ dadamānova gatoti.
atk-s0201a:2319_11: Pāde pakkhālesīti vikasitapadumasannibhehi jālahatthehi maṇivaṇṇaṃ udakaṃ gahetvā suvaṇṇavaṇṇesu piṭṭhipādesu
atk-s0201a:2319_13: Buddhānaṃ kāye rajojallaṃ nāma na upalimpati,
atk-s0201a:2319_17: Amhehi abhihaṭena udakena bhagavā pāde pakkhālesi,
atk-s0201a:2319_18: paribhogaṃ akāsīti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ balavasomanassavasena cittaṃ pīṇitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2319_20: Āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ bhagavā etadavocāti so kira tesaṃ vuḍḍhataro.
atk-s0201a:2320_1: Tassa saṅgahe kate sesānaṃ katova hotīti theraññeva etaṃ kacci vo anuruddhātiādivacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0201a:2320_11: sampatte vo disvā manussā uḷuṅkayāguṃ vā kaṭacchubhikkhaṃ vā dātabbaṃ maññantīti bhikkhācāravattaṃ pucchati. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a:2320_12: Paccayena akilamantena hi sakkā samaṇadhammo kātuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2320_17: manussā tumhākaṃ araññe vasantānaṃ adatvā kassa aññassa dātabbaṃ maññissanti,
atk-s0201a:2320_18: tumhe pana etaṃ bhuñjitvā kiṃ nu kho migapotakā viya aññamaññaṃ saṅghaṭṭentā viharatha,
atk-s0201a:2320_19: udāhu sāmaggibhāvo vo atthī”ti sāmaggirasaṃ pucchanto,
atk-s0201a:2321_0: Tattha khīrodakībhūtāti yathā khīrañca udakañca aññamaññaṃ saṃsandati,
atk-s0201a:2321_3: kacci evaṃ sāmaggivasena ekattūpagatacittuppādā viharathāti pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2321_4: Piyacakkhūhīti mettacittaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā olokanacakkhūni piyacakkhūni nāma.
atk-s0201a:2321_5: Kacci tathārūpehi cakkhūhi aññamaññaṃ sampassantā viharathāti pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2321_9: Yathā kathaṃ panāti ettha yathāti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2321_13: taṃ me kāraṇaṃ brūthāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2321_15: Āvi ceva raho cāti sammukhā ceva parammukhā ca.
atk-s0201a:2322_3: Yañhi sahavasantesu ekena mañcapīṭhaṃ vā dārubhaṇḍaṃ vā mattikābhaṇḍaṃ vā bahi dunnikkhittaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2322_4: taṃ disvā kenidaṃ vaḷañjitanti avaññaṃ akatvā attanā dunnikkhittaṃ viya gahetvā paṭisāmentassa paṭijaggitabbayuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:2322_5: vā pana ṭhānaṃ paṭijaggantassa sammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:2322_6: Ekasmiṃ pakkante tena dunnikkhittaṃ senāsanaparikkhāraṃ tatheva nikkhipantassa paṭijaggitabbayuttaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2322_7: vā pana paṭijaggantassa parammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:2322_8: Sahavasantassa pana tehi saddhiṃ madhuraṃ sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ paṭisanthārakathaṃ sāraṇīyakathaṃ dhammīkathaṃ
atk-s0201a:2322_9: sarabhaññaṃ sākacchaṃ pañhapucchanaṃ pañhavissajjananti evamādikaraṇe sammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:2322_10: Theresu pana pakkantesu mayhaṃ piyasahāyo nandiyatthero kimilatthero evaṃ sīlasampanno,
atk-s0201a:2322_11: evaṃ ācārasampannotiādiguṇakathanaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:2322_12: Mayhaṃ piyamitto nandiyatthero kimilatthero avero hotu,
atk-s0201a:2322_13: abyāpajjo sukhī hotūti evaṃ samannāharato pana sammukhāpi parammukhāpi mettaṃ manokammaṃ hotiyeva.
atk-s0201a:2323_1: kāyāti kāyañhi piṭṭhaṃ viya mattikā viya ca omadditvā ekato kātuṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0201a:2323_2: Ekañca pana maññe cittanti cittaṃ pana no hitaṭṭhena nirantaraṭṭhena aviggahaṭṭhena samaggaṭṭhena ekamevāti dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2323_3: Kathaṃ panetaṃ sakaṃ cittaṃ nikkhipitvā itaresaṃ cittavasena vattiṃsūti?
atk-s0201a:2323_9: patte malaṃ uṭṭhitaṃ pacituṃ vaṭṭatīti vutte itare mayhaṃ cīvaraṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ dhovitabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2323_10: mayhaṃ paribhaṇḍaṃ kātabbanti avatvā araññaṃ pavisitvā dārūni āharitvā chinditvā pattakaṭāhe paribhaṇḍaṃ katvā tato paraṃ cīvaraṃ vā dhovanti,
atk-s0201a:2323_13: mama paṇṇasālā uklāpā paribhaṇḍaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti paṭhamataraṃ ārocitepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a:2324_2: anuruddhāti bhagavā heṭṭhā na ca mayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0201a:2324_3: piṇḍakena kilamimhāti vutte na sādhukāramadāsi. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a:2324_4: Ayañhi kabaḷīkāro āhāro nāma imesaṃ sattānaṃ apāyalokepi devamanussalokepi āciṇṇasamāciṇṇova.
atk-s0201a:2324_6: apāyaloke devamanussalokepi ime sattā paṭiviruddhā eva,
atk-s0201a:2324_8: kadācideva hotīti samaggavāsassa dullabhattā idha bhagavā sādhukāramadāsi.
atk-s0201a:2324_9: Idāni tesaṃ appamādalakkhaṇaṃ pucchanto kacci pana vo,
atk-s0201a:2324_14: Piṇḍāya paṭikkamatīti gāme piṇḍāya caritvā paccāgacchati.
atk-s0201a:2324_15: Avakkārapātinti atirekapiṇḍapātaṃ apanetvā ṭhapanatthāya ekaṃ samuggapātiṃ dhovitvā ṭhapeti.
atk-s0201a:2325_0: Yo pacchāti te kira therā na ekatova bhikkhācāraṃ pavisanti,
atk-s0201a:2325_2: Pātova sarīrappaṭijagganaṃ katvā vattappaṭipattiṃ pūretvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā kālaparicchedaṃ katvā phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdanti.
atk-s0201a:2325_3: Tesu yo paṭhamataraṃ nisinno attano kālaparicchedavasena paṭhamataraṃ uṭṭhāti;
atk-s0201a:2325_4: so piṇḍāya caritvā paṭinivatto bhattakiccaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā jānāti –
atk-s0201a:2325_7: Atha pattaṃ pidahitvā āsanapaññāpanādīni katvā yadi patte paṭivisamattameva hoti,
atk-s0201a:2325_11: Katabhattakicco pattaṃ dhovitvā vodakaṃ katvā thavikāya osāpetvā pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0201a:2325_15: So sace patte bhattaṃ pamāṇameva hoti, bhuñjati.
atk-s0201a:2325_19: avakkārapātiyaṃ pakkhipitvā pamāṇameva bhuñjitvā purimatthero viya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0201a:2325_23: Sopi dutiyatthero viya bhuñjitvā katabhattakicco pattaṃ dhovitvā vodakaṃ katvā thavikāya osāpetvā āsanāni ukkhipitvā paṭisāmeti;
atk-s0201a:2325_24: pānīyaghaṭe vā paribhojanīyaghaṭe vā avasesaṃ udakaṃ chaḍḍetvā ghaṭe nikujjitvā avakkārapātiyaṃ sace avasesabhattaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2325_25: taṃ vuttanayena jahitvā pātiṃ dhovitvā paṭisāmeti;
atk-s0201a:2325_27: Tato kacavaraṃ chaḍḍetvā sammajjaniṃ ukkhipitvā upacikāhi muttaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā pattacīvaramādāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0201a:2325_28: Idaṃ therānaṃ bahivihāre araññe bhattakiccakaraṇaṭṭhāne bhojanasālāyaṃ vattaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2326_0: Yo passatītiādi pana nesaṃ antovihāre vattanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2326_7: Te kira pānīyaghaṭādīsu yaṃkiñci tucchakaṃ gahetvā pokkharaṇiṃ gantvā anto ca bahi ca dhovitvā udakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2326_8: parissāvetvā tīre ṭhapetvā aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ hatthavikārena āmantenti,
atk-s0201a:2326_9: odissa vā anodissa vā saddaṃ na karonti.
atk-s0201a:2326_16: tato dvīhi kattabbakamme tatiyassa kammacchedo bhaveyya.
atk-s0201a:2326_17: Saṃyatapadasaddo pana hutvā aparassa bhikkhuno divāṭṭhānasantikaṃ gantvā tena diṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā hatthasaññaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a:2326_19: tato dve janā hatthena hatthaṃ saṃsibbantā dvīsu hatthesu ṭhapetvā upaṭṭhapenti.
atk-s0201a:2327_0: Pañcāhikaṃ kho panāti cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyanti idaṃ tāva pakatidhammassavanameva,
atk-s0201a:2327_1: taṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā pañcame pañcame divase dve therā nātivikāle nhāyitvā anuruddhattherassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0201a:2327_2: Tattha tayopi nisīditvā tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ aññamaññaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanti,
atk-s0201a:2327_6: Ettāvatā therena bhagavatā appamādalakkhaṇaṃ pucchitena pamādaṭṭhānesuyeva appamādalakkhaṇaṃ vissajjitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2327_17: Tasmā thero amhākaṃ ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ muñcitvā pamādakālo nāma natthīti dassento pamādaṭṭhānesuyeva appamādalakkhaṇaṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0201a:2328_1: Athassa bhagavā sādhukāraṃ datvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ pucchanto puna atthi pana votiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2329_1: Evaṃ paṭhamajjhānādhigame byākate dutiyajjhānādīni pucchanto etassa pana votiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2329_5: Pacchimapañhe pana lokuttarañāṇadassanavasena adhigataṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ pucchanto alamariyañāṇadassanavisesoti āha.
atk-s0201a:2329_7: Tattha yasmā vedayitasukhato avedayitasukhaṃ santataraṃ paṇītataraṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2329_8: tasmā aññaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ uttaritaraṃ vā paṇītataraṃ vā na samanupassāmāti āha.
atk-s0201a:2330_3: tena tesaṃ paṭivedhatthāya kiñci kathetabbaṃ natthi.
atk-s0201a:2330_4: Sāmaggirasena pana ayañca ayañca ānisaṃsoti sāmaggirasānisaṃsameva nesaṃ bhagavā kathesi.
atk-s0201a:2330_6: Te kira bhagavato pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā thokaṃ agamaṃsu,
atk-s0201a:2330_11: Kiṃ nu kho mayaṃ āyasmatoti bhagavantaṃ nissāya pabbajjādīni adhigantvāpi attano guṇakathāya aṭṭiyamānā adhigamappicchatāya āhaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2330_13: Cetasā ceto paricca viditoti ajja me āyasmanto lokiyasamāpattiyā vītināmesuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2330_14: ajja lokuttarāyāti evaṃ cittena cittaṃ paricchinditvā viditaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2330_18: ajja ayyo kimilatthero imāya ca imāya ca samāpattiyā vītināmesīti evamārocesunti attho.
atk-s0201a:2330_19: Pañhābhipuṭṭhenāti tampi mayā sayaṃ viditanti vā devatāhi ārocitanti vā ettakeneva mukhaṃ me sajjanti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā apuṭṭheneva me na kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2330_20: Bhagavatā pana pañhābhipuṭṭhena pañhaṃ abhipucchitena satā byākataṃ,
atk-s0201a:2330_21: tatra me kiṃ na rocathāti āha.
atk-s0201a:2331_2: atho serīsako sahā”ti evaṃ āgato aṭṭhavīsatiyā yakkhasenāpatīnaṃ abbhantaro eko devarājā.
atk-s0201a:2331_4: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti so kira vessavaṇena pesito etaṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchanto bhagavantaṃ sayaṃ pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0201a:2331_5: gahetvā giñjakāvasathato gosiṅgasālavanassa antare disvā bhagavā attanā pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā gosiṅgasālavane
atk-s0201a:2331_8: Mayāpi tassā desanāya bhāginā bhavitabbanti adissamānena kāyena satthu padānupadiko gantvā avidūre ṭhatvā dhammaṃ sutvā satthari gacchantepi na gato, –
atk-s0201a:2331_9: “ime therā kiṃ karissantī”ti dassanatthaṃ pana tattheva ṭhito.
atk-s0201a:2331_10: Atha te dve there anuruddhattheraṃ paliveṭhente disvā, –
atk-s0201a:2331_11: “ime therā bhagavantaṃ nissāya pabbajjādayo sabbaguṇe adhigantvāpi bhagavatova maccharāyanti,
atk-s0201a:2331_15: pathavito yāva brahmalokā etesaṃ guṇe pakāsessāmī”ti cintetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0201a:2332_2: vajjiraṭṭhavāsino bhagavantañca ime ca tayo kulaputte passituṃ labhanti,
atk-s0201a:2332_8: Saddaṃ sutvāti so kira attano yakkhānubhāvena mahantaṃ saddaṃ katvā sakalaṃ vajjiraṭṭhaṃ ajjhottharanto taṃ vācaṃ nicchāresi.
atk-s0201a:2332_9: Tena cassa tesu rukkhapabbatādīsu adhivatthā bhummā devatā saddaṃ assosuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2332_16: “amhākaṃ kulato nikkhamitvā ime kulaputtā pabbajitā evaṃ sīlavanto guṇavanto ācārasampannā kalyāṇadhammā”ti
atk-s0201a:2332_17: evaṃ tañcepi kulaṃ ete tayo kulaputte pasannacittaṃ anussareyyāti evaṃ sabbattha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:2336_4: “sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme”ti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ gocaragāmaṃ dassetvā pacchā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2336_5: Imasmiṃ pana mahāgosiṅgasutte bhagavato gocaragāmo anibandho,
atk-s0201a:2336_11: Therehi sāvakehi saddhinti pātimokkhasaṃvarādīhi thirakārakeheva dhammehi samannāgatattā therehi,
atk-s0201a:2336_15: Tatthāyasmā sāriputto attano sīlādīhi guṇehi buddhasāsane abhiññāto.
atk-s0201a:2336_16: Cakkhumantānaṃ gaganamajjhe ṭhito sūriyo viya cando viya,
atk-s0201a:2336_17: samuddatīre ṭhitānaṃ sāgaro viya ca pākaṭo paññāto.
atk-s0201a:2336_18: Na kevalañcassa imasmiṃ sutte āgataguṇavaseneva mahantatā veditabbā,
atk-s0201a:2336_19: ito aññesaṃ dhammadāyādasuttaṃ anaṅgaṇasuttaṃ sammādiṭṭhisuttaṃ sīhanādasuttaṃ rathavinītaṃ mahāhatthipadopamaṃ
atk-s0201a:2336_20: mahāvedallaṃ cātumasuttaṃ dīghanakhaṃ anupadasuttaṃ sevitabbāsevitabbasuttaṃ saccavibhaṅgasuttaṃ piṇḍapātapārisuddhi
atk-s0201a:2336_21: sampasādanīyaṃ saṅgītisuttaṃ dasuttarasuttaṃ pavāraṇāsuttaṃ susimasuttaṃ therapañhasuttaṃ mahāniddeso
atk-s0201a:2336_22: paṭisambhidāmaggo therasīhanādasuttaṃ abhinikkhamanaṃ etadagganti imesampi suttānaṃ vasena therassa mahantatā
atk-s0201a:2336_27: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ sāriputto”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2337_0: Mahāmoggallānopi sīlādiguṇehi ceva imasmiṃ sutte āgataguṇehi ca thero viya abhiññāto pākaṭo mahā.
atk-s0201a:2337_2: cūḷataṇhāsaṅkhayasuttaṃ māratajjaniyasuttaṃ pāsādakampanaṃ sakalaṃ iddhipādasaṃyuttaṃ nandopanandadamanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2337_3: yamakapāṭihāriyakāle devalokagamanaṃ vimānavatthu petavatthu therassa abhinikkhamanaṃ etadagganti imesampi
atk-s0201a:2337_8: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ iddhimantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahāmoggallāno”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2338_0: Mahākassapopi sīlādiguṇehi ceva imasmiṃ sutte āgataguṇehi ca thero viya abhiññāto pākaṭo mahā.
atk-s0201a:2338_1: Apicassa cīvaraparivattanasuttaṃ jiṇṇacīvarasuttaṃ candopamaṃ sakalaṃ kassapasaṃyuttaṃ mahāariyavaṃsasuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:2338_2: therassa abhinikkhamanaṃ etadagganti imesampi vasena mahantabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2338_6: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhutavādānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākassapo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2339_0: Anuruddhattheropi sīlādiguṇehi ceva imasmiṃ sutte āgataguṇehi ca thero viya abhiññāto pākaṭo mahā.
atk-s0201a:2339_1: Apicassa cūḷagosiṅgasuttaṃ naḷakapānasuttaṃ anuttariyasuttaṃ upakkilesasuttaṃ anuruddhasaṃyuttaṃ mahāpurisavitakkasuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:2339_2: therassa abhinikkhamanaṃ etadagganti imesampi vasena mahantabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2339_6: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ yadidaṃ anuruddho”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2340_0: Āyasmatā ca revatenāti ettha pana dve revatā khadiravaniyarevato ca kaṅkhārevato ca.
atk-s0201a:2340_4: akappiyā muggā”ti evaṃ kaṅkhābahulo pana thero idha revatoti adhippeto.
atk-s0201a:2340_5: Sopi sīlādiguṇehi ceva imasmiṃ sutte āgataguṇehi ca thero viya abhiññāto pākaṭo mahā.
atk-s0201a:2340_10: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ jhāyīnaṃ yadidaṃ kaṅkhārevato”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2341_0: Ānandattheropi sīlādiguṇehi ceva imasmiṃ sutte āgataguṇehi ca thero viya abhiññāto pākaṭo mahā.
atk-s0201a:2341_1: Apicassa sekkhasuttaṃ bāhitikasuttaṃ āneñjasappāyaṃ gopakamoggallānaṃ bahudhātukaṃ cūḷasuññataṃ mahāsuññataṃ
atk-s0201a:2341_2: acchariyabbhutasuttaṃ bhaddekarattaṃ mahānidānaṃ mahāparinibbānaṃ subhasuttaṃ cūḷaniyalokadhātusuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:2341_3: abhinikkhamanaṃ etadagganti imesampi vasena mahantabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2341_7: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2342_0: Aññehi ca abhiññātehi abhiññātehīti na kevalañca eteheva,
atk-s0201a:2342_1: aññehi ca mahāguṇatāya pākaṭehi abhiññātehi bahūhi therehi sāvakehi saddhiṃ bhagavā gosiṅgasālavanadāye viharatīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2342_2: Āyasmā hi sāriputto sayaṃ mahāpañño aññepi bahū mahāpaññe bhikkhū gahetvā tadā dasabalaṃ parivāretvā vihāsi.
atk-s0201a:2342_7: āyasmā ānando sayaṃ bahussuto aññepi bahū bahussute bhikkhū gahetvā tadā dasabalaṃ parivāretvā vihāsi,
atk-s0201a:2342_8: evaṃ tadā ete ca aññe ca abhiññātā mahātherā tiṃsasahassamattā bhikkhū dasabalaṃ parivāretvā vihariṃsūti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:2343_1: Yenāyasmā mahākassapo tenupasaṅkamīti thero kira paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito pacchimalokadhātuṃ olokento vanante
atk-s0201a:2343_2: kīḷantassa mattakhattiyassa kaṇṇato patamānaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ viya,
atk-s0201a:2343_4: maṇināgadantato patamānaṃ satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ viya ca atthaṃ gacchamānaṃ paripuṇṇapaṇṇāsayojanaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ addasa.
atk-s0201a:2343_5: Tadanantaraṃ pācīnalokadhātuṃ olokento nemiyaṃ gahetvā parivattayamānaṃ rajatacakkaṃ viya,
atk-s0201a:2343_7: sapakkhe papphoṭetvā gaganatale pakkhandamānaṃ setahaṃsaṃ viya ca meghavaṇṇāya samuddakucchito uggantvā
atk-s0201a:2343_10: Tasmiñhi samaye sālarukkhā mūlato paṭṭhāya yāva aggā sabbapāliphullā dukūlapārutā viya,
atk-s0201a:2343_13: tattha tattha nipatantena pupphareṇunā lākhārasena siñcamānaṃ viya ca ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2343_14: Bhamaramadhukaragaṇā kusumareṇumadamattā upagāyamānā viya vanantaresu vicaranti.
atk-s0201a:2343_17: “kāya nu kho ajja ratiyā vītināmessāmī”ti cintesi,
atk-s0201a:2343_20: “ajja mayhaṃ jeṭṭhabhātikassa dhammasenāpatittherassa santikaṃ gantvā dhammaratiyā vītināmessāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2343_21: Gacchanto pana ekakova agantvā “mayhaṃ piyasahāyaṃ mahākassapattheraṃ gahetvā gamissāmī”ti nisinnaṭṭhānato
atk-s0201a:2343_22: vuṭṭhāya cammakhaṇḍaṃ papphoṭetvā yenāyasmā mahākassapo tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0201a:2344_0: Evamāvusoti kho āyasmā mahākassapoti theropi yasmā piyadhammassavanova ariyasāvako,
atk-s0201a:2344_1: tasmā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā gacchāvuso, tvaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2344_2: mayhaṃ sīsaṃ vā rujjati piṭṭhi vāti kiñci lesāpadesaṃ akatvā tuṭṭhahadayova,
atk-s0201a:2344_4: Paṭissutvā ca nisinnaṭṭhānato vuṭṭhāya cammakhaṇḍaṃ papphoṭetvā mahāmoggallānaṃ anubandhi.
atk-s0201a:2344_5: Tasmiṃ samaye dve mahātherā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhitāni dve candamaṇḍalāni viya,
atk-s0201a:2344_10: Anuruddhattheropi tasmiṃ samaye divāṭṭhāne nisinno dve mahāthere sāriputtattherassa santikaṃ gacchante
atk-s0201a:2344_11: disvā pacchimalokadhātuṃ olokento sūriyaṃ vanantaṃ pavisantaṃ viya,
atk-s0201a:2344_12: pācīnalokadhātuṃ olokento candaṃ vanantato uggacchantaṃ viya,
atk-s0201a:2344_13: sālavanaṃ olokento sabbapāliphullameva sālavanañca disvā ajja uposathadivaso,
atk-s0201a:2344_14: ime ca me jeṭṭhabhātikā dhammasenāpatissa santikaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0201a:2344_16: ahampi dhammassavanassa bhāgī bhavissāmīti nisinnaṭṭhānato vuṭṭhāya cammakhaṇḍaṃ papphoṭetvā mahātherānaṃ padānupadiko hutvā nikkhami.
atk-s0201a:2344_18: “atha kho āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno āyasmā ca mahākassapo āyasmā ca anuruddho yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkamiṃsū”ti.
atk-s0201a:2345_1: Evaṃ upasaṅkamante pana te mahāthere āyasmā ānando attano divāṭṭhāne nisinnoyeva disvā,
atk-s0201a:2345_5: mayhaṃ piyasahāyampi revatattheraṃ gahetvā gamissāmī”ti sabbaṃ mahāmoggallānassa mahākassapassa anuruddhassa
atk-s0201a:2345_7: Iti te dve janā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhitā dve candā viya,
atk-s0201a:2345_12: Disvāna āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavocāti dūratova disvā anukkamena kathāupacāraṃ sampattametaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2345_15: āvusoti ettha duvidhaṃ rāmaṇeyyakaṃ vanarāmaṇeyyakaṃ puggalarāmaṇeyyakañca.
atk-s0201a:2345_16: Tattha vanaṃ nāma nāgasalaḷasālacampakādīhi sañchannaṃ hoti bahalacchāyaṃ pupphaphalūpagaṃ vividharukkhaṃ udakasampannaṃ gāmato nissaṭaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2348_0: Vanaṃ pana sacepi ujjaṅgale hoti nirudakaṃ viralacchāyaṃ kaṇṭakasamākiṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2349_0: “Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, ninne vā yadi vā thale;
atk-s0201a:2351_1: Tadā hi gosiṅgasālavanaṃ sabbapāliphullaṃ hoti kusumagandhasugandhaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2351_2: sadevake cettha loke aggapuggalo sammāsambuddho tiṃsasahassamattehi abhiññātabhikkhūhi saddhiṃ viharati.
atk-s0201a:2352_1: abbhaṃ mahikā dhūmo rajo rāhūti imehi pañcahi upakkilesehi virahitāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2352_3: mūlato paṭṭhāya yāva aggā apupphitaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:2352_4: Dibbā maññe gandhā sampavantīti dibbā mandārapupphakoviḷārapāricchattakacandanacuṇṇagandhā viya samantā pavāyanti,
atk-s0201a:2353_1: āvuso ānandāti ānandatthero tesaṃ pañcannaṃ therānaṃ saṅghanavakova.
atk-s0201a:2353_4: Te hi dve therā aññamaññaṃ mamāyiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2353_6: “mayā kattabbaṃ satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ karotī”ti ānandattheraṃ mamāyi.
atk-s0201a:2353_7: Ānandatthero bhagavato sāvakānaṃ aggoti sāriputtattheraṃ mamāyi,
atk-s0201a:2353_8: kuladārake pabbājetvā sāriputtattherassa santike upajjhaṃ gaṇhāpesi.
atk-s0201a:2353_10: Evaṃ ekamekena attano pattacīvaraṃ datvā pabbājetvā upajjhaṃ gaṇhāpitāni pañca bhikkhusatāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2353_11: Āyasmā ānando paṇītāni cīvarādīnipi labhitvā therasseva deti.
atk-s0201a:2354_2: kathaṃ nu kho dhammaratanaṃ pūjitaṃ nāma hotī”ti?
atk-s0201a:2354_12: Thero taṃ gahetvā bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:2354_16: idaṃ panāhaṃ āyasmato sāriputtassa dātukāmoti. Dehi, ānandāti.
atk-s0201a:2355_0: Apica anumatipucchā nāmesā khuddakato paṭṭhāya pucchitabbā hoti.
atk-s0201a:2355_11: Ettāvatāpi ayaṃ dhammadesanā sikhāppattā vepullappattā na bhavissati,
atk-s0201a:2355_12: atha mayaṃ sabbepi dasabalaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchissāma,
atk-s0201a:2355_14: Ettāvatā ayaṃ dhammadesanā sikhāppattā vepullappattā bhavissati.
atk-s0201a:2355_15: Yathā hi janapadamhi uppanno aṭṭo gāmabhojakaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0201a:2355_21: raññā vinicchitakālato paṭṭhāya aṭṭo aparāparaṃ na sañcarati,
atk-s0201a:2355_24: atha mayaṃ sabbepi dasabalaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchissāma,
atk-s0201a:2355_26: Ettāvatā ayaṃ dhammadesanā sikhāppattā vepullappattā bhavissati.
atk-s0201a:2355_27: Evaṃ anumatipucchaṃ pucchanto thero paṭhamaṃ ānandattheraṃ pucchi.
atk-s0201a:2356_0: Bahussuto hotīti bahu assa sutaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2356_1: navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ pāḷianusandhipubbāparavasena uggahitaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2356_3: Yassa hi ito gahitaṃ ito palāyati,
atk-s0201a:2356_5: parisamajjhe ekaṃ suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā kathetuṃ vā vācetuṃ vā na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:2356_7: Yassa pana uggahitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahitakālasadisameva hoti,
atk-s0201a:2356_8: dasapi vīsatipi vassāni sajjhāyaṃ akarontassa na nassati,
atk-s0201a:2356_11: Yathā hi sutaṃ hadayamañjūsāya sannicitaṃ silāyaṃ lekhā viya,
atk-s0201a:2356_12: suvaṇṇaghaṭe pakkhittasīhavasā viya ca ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a:2356_15: Ekaccassa hi uggahitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ dhātaṃ paguṇaṃ niccalitaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0201a:2356_16: asukasuttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā kathehīti vutte sajjhāyitvā saṃsanditvā samanuggāhitvā jānissāmīti vadati.
atk-s0201a:2356_18: asukasuttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā kathehīti vutte uddharitvā tameva katheti.
atk-s0201a:2357_4: yassa vācāya sajjhāyitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ manasā cintentassa tattha tattha pākaṭaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2357_5: Mahādīpaṃ jāletvā ṭhitassa rūpagataṃ viya paññāyati.
atk-s0201a:2357_8: Diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti atthato ca kāraṇato ca paññāya suppaṭividdhā.
atk-s0201a:2357_9: Parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehīti ettha padameva atthassa byañjanato padabyañjanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2357_10: taṃ akkharapāripūriṃ katvā dasavidhabyañjanabuddhiyo aparihāpetvā vuttaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0201a:2357_12: Apica yo bhikkhu parisati dhammaṃ desento suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā nikkhapitvā aññaṃ upārambhakaraṃ suttaṃ āharati,
atk-s0201a:2357_15: evamidaṃ gahetvā ettha khipanto ekapasseneva pariharanto kālaṃ ñatvā vuṭṭhahati.
atk-s0201a:2357_18: Yo pana suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā nikkhipitvā bahi ekapadampi agantvā pāḷiyā anusandhiñca pubbāparañca amakkhento
atk-s0201a:2357_19: ācariyehi dinnanaye ṭhatvā tulikāya paricchindanto viya,
atk-s0201a:2358_0: Anuppabandhehīti ettha yo bhikkhu dhammaṃ kathento suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā ārabhitvā āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya turitaturito araṇiṃ manthento viya,
atk-s0201a:2358_2: pāḷiyā anusandhipubbāparesu gahitaṃ gahitameva aggahitaṃ aggahitameva ca katvā purāṇapaṇṇantaresu caramānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2358_3: godhaṃ uṭṭhapento viya tattha tattha paharanto osāpento ohāya gacchati.
atk-s0201a:2358_4: Yopi dhammaṃ kathento kālena sīghaṃ kālena dandhaṃ kālena mahāsaddaṃ kālena khuddakasaddaṃ karoti.
atk-s0201a:2358_11: imesaṃ sabbesampi kathā appabandhā nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:2358_12: Yo pana suttaṃ ārabhitvā ācariyehi dinnanaye ṭhito acchinnadhāraṃ katvā nadīsotaṃ viya pavatteti,
atk-s0201a:2358_13: ākāsagaṅgato bhassamānaṃ udakaṃ viya nirantaraṃ kathaṃ pavatteti,
atk-s0201a:2358_17: Evarūpenāti evarūpena bahussutena bhikkhunā tathārūpeneva bhikkhusatena bhikkhusahassena vā saṅghāṭikaṇṇena vā saṅghāṭikaṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2358_18: pallaṅkena vā pallaṅkaṃ āhacca nisinnena gosiṅgasālavanaṃ sobheyya.
atk-s0201a:2359_0: 334. Paṭisallānaṃ assa ārāmoti paṭisallānārāmo. Paṭisallāne ratoti paṭisallānarato.
atk-s0201a:2360_3: ākaṅkhamāno pana thero anekānipi cakkavāḷasahassāni voloketiyeva.
atk-s0201a:2360_4: Uparipāsādavaragatoti sattabhūmakassa vā navabhūmakassa vā pāsādavarassa upari gato.
atk-s0201a:2360_5: Sahassaṃ nemimaṇḍalānaṃ volokeyyāti pāsādapariveṇe nābhiyā patiṭṭhitānaṃ nemivaṭṭiyā nemivaṭṭiṃ āhacca
atk-s0201a:2360_6: ṭhitānaṃ nemimaṇḍalānaṃ sahassaṃ vātapānaṃ vivaritvā olokeyya,
atk-s0201a:2360_10: evaṃ ayampi dibbacakkhuko bhikkhu dibbena cakkhunā atikkantamānusakena sahassaṃ lokānaṃ voloketi.
atk-s0201a:2360_11: Tassa pāsāde ṭhitapurisassa cakkanābhiyo viya cakkavāḷasahasse sinerusahassaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2362_2: Sahetukañhi sakāraṇaṃ katvā pañhaṃ pucchituṃ vissajjitumpi asakkonto saṃsādeti nāma.
atk-s0201a:2363_0: 338. Yāya vihārasamāpattiyāti yāya lokiyāya vihārasamāpattiyā, yāya lokuttarāya vihārasamāpattiyā.
atk-s0201a:2364_1: Sādhu sādhu sāriputtāti ayaṃ sādhukāro ānandattherassa dinno.
atk-s0201a:2364_4: Yathā taṃ ānandovāti yathā ānandova sammā byākaraṇamāno byākareyya,
atk-s0201a:2364_9: “aho vata sāsane sabrahmacārī bahussutā bhaveyyu”nti. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a:2364_12: Bahussuto uggahitabuddhavacanaṃ āvajjitvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne sīlaṃ kathitaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2364_15: imasmiṃ maggaphalanibbānānīti sīlassa āgataṭṭhāne sīlaṃ pūretvā,
atk-s0201a:2364_16: samādhissa āgataṭṭhāne samādhiṃ pūretvā vipassanāya āgataṭṭhāne vipassanāgabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā maggaṃ bhāvetvā phalaṃ sacchikaroti.
atk-s0201a:2364_18: “aho vata sabrahmacārī ekaṃ vā dve vā tayo vā cattāro vā pañca vā nikāye uggahetvā āvajjantā sīlādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:2364_19: āgataṭṭhānesu sīlādīni paripūretvā anukkamena maggaphalanibbānāni sacchikareyyu”nti.
atk-s0201a:2365_3: “aho vata sabrahmacārī ekikā nisīditvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2366_3: “aho vata sabrahmacārī ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbena cakkhunā anekesu cakkavāḷasahassesu cavamāne ca upapajjamāne
atk-s0201a:2366_4: ca satte disvā vaṭṭabhayena cittaṃ saṃvejetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā lokuttaradhammaṃ sacchikareyyu”nti.
atk-s0201a:2367_3: “aho vata sabrahmacārī dhutavādā hutvā dhutaṅgānubhāvena paccayataṇhaṃ milāpetvā aparepi nānappakāre
atk-s0201a:2367_4: kilese dhunitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā lokuttaradhammaṃ sacchikareyyu”nti.
atk-s0201a:2368_2: sukhumaṃ pana cittantaraṃ khandhantaraṃ dhātvantaraṃ āyatanantaraṃ jhānokkantikaṃ ārammaṇokkantikaṃ aṅgavavatthānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2368_3: ārammaṇavavatthānaṃ aṅgasaṅkanti ārammaṇasaṅkanti ekatovaḍḍhanaṃ ubhatovaḍḍhananti ābhidhammikadhammakathikasseva pākaṭaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2368_13: “aho vata sabrahmacārī ābhidhammikā hutvā sukhumesu ṭhānesu ñāṇaṃ otāretvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā lokuttaradhammaṃ sacchikareyyu”nti.
atk-s0201a:2369_2: paññavāyeva ca cittaṃ attano vase vattetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:2369_4: Duppañño hi uppannassa cittassa vase vattetvā ito cito ca vipphanditvāpi katipāheneva gihibhāvaṃ patvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0201a:2369_6: “aho vata sabrahmacārī acittavasikā hutvā cittaṃ attano vase vattetvā sabbānassa visevitavipphanditāni
atk-s0201a:2369_7: bhañjitvā īsakampi bahi nikkhamituṃ adentā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā lokuttaradhammaṃ sacchikareyyu”nti.
atk-s0201a:2370_4: yasmā saṅghārāmassa nāma bahussutabhikkhūhipi sobhanakāraṇaṃ atthi,
atk-s0201a:2370_13: Apica mamapi suṇāthāti apica mamapi vacanaṃ suṇātha.
atk-s0201a:2370_14: Na tāvāhaṃ imaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bhindissāmīti na tāva ahaṃ imaṃ caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya ābhujitaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bhindissāmi,
atk-s0201a:2370_16: Idaṃ kira bhagavā paripākagate ñāṇe rajjasiriṃ pahāya katābhinikkhamano anupubbena bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha
atk-s0201a:2370_17: caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya aparājitapallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā daḷhasamādāno hutvā nisinno tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2370_18: bhinditvā paccūsasamaye dasasahassilokadhātuṃ unnādento sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhi,
atk-s0201a:2370_20: Apica pacchimaṃ janataṃ anukampamānopi paṭipattisāraṃ puthujjanakalyāṇakaṃ dassento evamāha.
atk-s0201a:2370_29: mayaṃ bhagavato ajjhāsayaṃ gaṇhissāmā’ti pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya
atk-s0201a:2370_30: daḷhasamādānā hutvā ‘arahattaṃ appatvā imaṃ pallaṅkaṃ na bhindissāmā’ti samaṇadhammaṃ kātabbaṃ maññissanti,
atk-s0201a:2370_31: te evaṃ paṭipannā katipāheneva jātijarāmaraṇassa antaṃ karissantī”ti,
atk-s0201a:2370_32: imaṃ pacchimaṃ janataṃ anukampamāno paṭipattisāraṃ puthujjanakalyāṇakaṃ dassento evamāha.
atk-s0201a:2370_37: evarūpena bhikkhunā nippariyāyeneva gosiṅgasālavanaṃ sobheyyāti yathānusandhināva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesīti.
atk-s0201a:2374_5: Tattha pāḷiṃ vatvā ekekapadassa atthakathanaṃ ekanāḷikā nāma.
atk-s0201a:2374_9: paṇḍitaṃ bhikkhuṃ dassetvāti catukkaṃ bandhitvā kathanaṃ caturassā nāma.
atk-s0201a:2374_13: paṇḍitaṃ bhikkhuṃ dassetvā pariyosānagamananti ayaṃ nisinnavattikā nāma.
atk-s0201a:2375_7: Na rūpaññū hotīti gaṇanato vā vaṇṇato vā rūpaṃ na jānāti.
atk-s0201a:2375_8: Gaṇanato na jānāti nāma attano gunnaṃ sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vāti saṅkhyaṃ na jānāti.
atk-s0201a:2375_9: So gāvīsu haṭāsu vā palātāsu vā gogaṇaṃ gaṇetvā,
atk-s0201a:2375_10: ajja ettikā na dissantīti dve tīṇi gāmantarāni vā aṭaviṃ vā vicaranto na pariyesati,
atk-s0201a:2375_11: aññesaṃ gāvīsu attano gogaṇaṃ paviṭṭhāsupi gogaṇaṃ gaṇetvā,
atk-s0201a:2375_12: “imā ettikā gāvo na amhāka”nti yaṭṭhiyā pothetvā na nīharati,
atk-s0201a:2375_15: “ayaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ amhākaṃ dhenuṃ gaṇhātī”ti tajjetvā attano gāviyo gahetvā gacchanti.
atk-s0201a:2375_22: ettikā kabarā ettikā nīlā”ti na jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2376_0: Na lakkhaṇakusalo hotīti gāvīnaṃ sarīre kataṃ dhanusattisūlādibhedaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2376_1: so gāvīsu haṭāsu vā palātāsu vā ajja asukalakkhaṇā ca asukalakkhaṇā ca gāvo na dissanti…pe…
atk-s0201a:2377_0: Na āsāṭikaṃ hāretāti gunnaṃ khāṇukaṇṭakādīhi pahaṭaṭṭhānesu vaṇo hoti.
atk-s0201a:2377_3: Tāni daṇḍena apanetvā bhesajjaṃ dātabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2377_10: gāvo gelaññābhibhūtā neva yāvadatthaṃ tiṇāni khādituṃ,
atk-s0201a:2378_0: Na vaṇaṃ paṭicchādetā hotīti gunnaṃ vuttanayeneva sañjāto vaṇo bhesajjaṃ datvā vākena vā cīrakena vā bandhitvā paṭicchādetabbo hoti.
atk-s0201a:2378_5: Evaṃ gāvo gelaññābhibhūtā neva yāvadatthaṃ tiṇāni khādituṃ…pe…
atk-s0201a:2379_0: Na dhūmaṃ kattā hotīti antovasse ḍaṃsamakasādīnaṃ ussannakāle gogaṇe vajaṃ paviṭṭhe tattha tattha dhūmo kātabbo hoti,
atk-s0201a:2379_2: Gogaṇo sabbarattiṃ ḍaṃsādīhi upadduto niddaṃ alabhitvā punadivase araññe tattha tattha rukkhamūlādīsu nipajjitvā niddāyati,
atk-s0201a:2380_0: Na titthaṃ jānātīti titthaṃ samanti vā visamanti vā sagāhanti vā niggāhanti vā na jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2380_2: Tāsaṃ visamatitthe pāsāṇādīni akkamantīnaṃ pādā bhijjanti,
atk-s0201a:2380_3: sagāhaṃ gambhīraṃ titthaṃ otiṇṇā kumbhīlādayo gāhā gaṇhanti.
atk-s0201a:2381_0: Na pītaṃ jānātīti pītampi apītampi na jānāti.
atk-s0201a:2381_4: imāya na laddho”ti evaṃ pītāpītaṃ jānitabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2381_5: Ayaṃ pana divasabhāgaṃ araññe gogaṇaṃ rakkhitvā pānīyaṃ pāyessāmīti nadiṃ vā taḷākaṃ vā gahetvā gacchati.
atk-s0201a:2381_6: Tattha mahāusabhā ca anuusabhā ca balavagāviyo ca dubbalāni ceva mahallakāni ca gorūpāni siṅgehi vā phāsukāhi
atk-s0201a:2381_7: vā paharitvā attano okāsaṃ katvā ūruppamāṇaṃ udakaṃ pavisitvā yathākāmaṃ pivanti.
atk-s0201a:2381_8: Avasesā okāsaṃ alabhamānā tīre ṭhatvā kalalamissakaṃ udakaṃ pivanti,
atk-s0201a:2381_10: Atha ne gopālako piṭṭhiyaṃ paharitvā puna araññaṃ paveseti,
atk-s0201a:2381_11: tattha apītagāviyo pipāsāya sukkhamānā yāvadatthaṃ tiṇāni khādituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0201a:2382_0: Na vīthiṃ jānātīti “ayaṃ maggo samo khemo,
atk-s0201a:2382_1: ayaṃ visamo sāsaṅko sappaṭibhayo”ti na jānāti.
atk-s0201a:2382_2: So samaṃ khemaṃ maggaṃ vajjetvā gogaṇaṃ itaraṃ maggaṃ paṭipādeti,
atk-s0201a:2382_3: tattha gāvo sīhabyagghādīnaṃ gandhena coraparissayena vā abhibhūtā bhantamigasappaṭibhāgā gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0201a:2383_0: Na gocarakusalo hotīti gopālakena hi gocarakusalena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2383_2: ekadisāya gogaṇaṃ cāretvā punadivase tattha na cāretabbo.
atk-s0201a:2383_3: Mahatā hi gogaṇena ciṇṇaṭṭhānaṃ bheritalaṃ viya suddhaṃ hoti nittiṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2383_5: Tasmā pañcame vā sattame vā divase puna tattha cāretuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0201a:2383_8: Ayaṃ pana imaṃ pañcāhikavāraṃ vā sattāhikavāraṃ vā na jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2384_0: Anavasesadohī ca hotīti paṇḍitagopālakena yāva vacchakassa maṃsalohitaṃ saṇṭhāti,
atk-s0201a:2384_1: tāva ekaṃ dve thane ṭhapetvā sāvasesadohinā bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2384_4: saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto kampamāno mātu purato patitvā kālaṅkaroti.
atk-s0201a:2384_6: “mayhaṃ puttako attano mātukhīraṃ pātumpi na labhatī”ti puttasokena na yāvadatthaṃ tiṇāni khādituṃ,
atk-s0201a:2385_1: Gāvo pariṇayanti yathāruciṃ gahetvā gacchantīti gopariṇāyakā.
atk-s0201a:2385_2: Na atirekapūjāyāti paṇḍito hi gopālako evarūpe usabhe atirekapūjāya pūjeti,
atk-s0201a:2385_7: rattiṃ dīpaṃ jāletvā celavitānassa heṭṭhā sayāpeti.
atk-s0201a:2385_8: Ayaṃ pana tato ekasakkārampi na karoti,
atk-s0201a:2385_9: usabhā atirekapūjaṃ alabhamānā gogaṇaṃ na rakkhanti,
atk-s0201a:2386_3: “cattāri mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpa”nti evaṃ vuttarūpaṃ dvīhākārehi na jānāti gaṇanato vā samuṭṭhānato vā.
atk-s0201a:2386_17: kabaḷīkāro āhāro”ti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatā pañcavīsati rūpakoṭṭhāsāti na jānāti.
atk-s0201a:2386_18: Seyyathāpi so gopālako gaṇanato gunnaṃ rūpaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2386_20: So gaṇanato rūpaṃ ajānanto rūpaṃ pariggahetvā arūpaṃ vavatthapetvā rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvā paccayaṃ sallakkhetvā
atk-s0201a:2386_21: lakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2386_22: So yathā tassa gopālakassa gogaṇo na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0201a:2386_23: evaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane sīlasamādhivipassanāmaggaphalanibbānehi na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0201a:2386_24: yathā ca so gopālako pañcahi gorasehi paribāhiro hoti,
atk-s0201a:2387_6: Seyyathāpi so gopālako vaṇṇato gunnaṃ rūpaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2387_8: So samuṭṭhānato rūpaṃ ajānanto rūpaṃ pariggahetvā arūpaṃ vavatthapetvā…pe…
atk-s0201a:2388_1: kammalakkhaṇo paṇḍitoti evaṃ vuttaṃ kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ paṇḍitabālalakkhaṇanti na jānāti.
atk-s0201a:2388_2: So evaṃ ajānanto bāle vajjetvā paṇḍite na sevati,
atk-s0201a:2388_3: bāle vajjetvā paṇḍite asevanto kappiyākappiyaṃ kusalākusalaṃ sāvajjānavajjaṃ garukalahukaṃ satekicchaatekicchaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ na jānāti;
atk-s0201a:2388_4: taṃ ajānanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2388_5: So yathā tassa gopālakassa gogaṇo na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0201a:2388_6: evaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane yathāvuttehi sīlādīhi na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0201a:2388_7: gopālako viya ca pañcahi gorasehi pañcahi dhammakkhandhehi paribāhiro hoti.
atk-s0201a:2389_0: Na āsāṭikaṃ hāretā hotīti uppannaṃ kāmavitakkanti evaṃ vutte kāmavitakkādike na vinodeti,
atk-s0201a:2389_1: so imaṃ akusalavitakkaṃ āsāṭikaṃ ahāretvā vitakkavasiko hutvā vicaranto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:2390_0: Na vaṇaṃ paṭicchādetā hotīti cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā nimittaggāhī hotītiādinā nayena sabbārammaṇesu nimittaṃ
atk-s0201a:2390_1: gaṇhanto yathā so gopālako vaṇaṃ na paṭicchādeti,
atk-s0201a:2390_3: So vivaṭadvāro vicaranto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0201a:2391_0: Na dhūmaṃ kattā hotīti so gopālako dhūmaṃ viya dhammadesanādhūmaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0201a:2391_1: dhammakathaṃ vā sarabhaññaṃ vā upanisinnakathaṃ vā anumodanaṃ vā na karoti.
atk-s0201a:2391_2: Tato naṃ manussā bahussuto guṇavāti na jānanti,
atk-s0201a:2391_3: te guṇāguṇaṃ ajānantā catūhi paccayehi saṅgahaṃ na karonti.
atk-s0201a:2391_4: So paccayehi kilamamāno buddhavacanaṃ sajjhāyaṃ kātuṃ vattapaṭipattiṃ pūretuṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0201a:2392_0: Na titthaṃ jānātīti titthabhūte bahussutabhikkhū na upasaṅkamati,
atk-s0201a:2392_5: imasmiṃ ṭhāne attho kiṃ dīpetī”ti evaṃ na paripucchati na paripañhati,
atk-s0201a:2392_7: Tassa te evaṃ aparipucchato avivaṭañceva na vivaranti,
atk-s0201a:2392_11: Anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhāṭhāniyesu dhammesūti anekavidhāsu kaṅkhāsu ekaṃ kaṅkhampi na paṭivinodenti.
atk-s0201a:2392_12: Kaṅkhā eva hi kaṅkhāṭhāniyā dhammā nāma.
atk-s0201a:2392_13: Tattha ekaṃ kaṅkhampi na nīharantīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2392_14: So evaṃ bahussutatitthaṃ anupasaṅkamitvā sakaṅkho kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2392_15: Yathā ca so gopālako titthaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2392_16: evaṃ ayampi bhikkhu dhammatitthaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2392_20: Te avisaye puṭṭhā kathetuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0201a:2392_21: so attanā sakaṅkho kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0201a:2393_0: Na pītaṃ jānātīti yathā so gopālako pītāpītaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2393_1: evaṃ dhammūpasañhitaṃ pāmojjaṃ na jānāti na labhati,
atk-s0201a:2393_2: savanamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthuṃ nissāya ānisaṃsaṃ na vindati,
atk-s0201a:2393_7: so sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ asuṇanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0201a:2394_0: Na vīthiṃ jānātīti so gopālako maggāmaggaṃ viya, –
atk-s0201a:2394_1: “ayaṃ lokiyo ayaṃ lokuttaro”ti ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ yathābhūtaṃ na pajānāti.
atk-s0201a:2394_2: Ajānanto lokiyamagge abhinivisitvā lokuttaraṃ nibbattetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0201a:2395_0: Na gocarakusalo hotīti so gopālako pañcāhikavāre sattāhikavāre viya cattāro satipaṭṭhāne,
atk-s0201a:2395_1: “ime lokiyā ime lokuttarā”ti yathābhūtaṃ na pajānāti.
atk-s0201a:2395_2: Ajānanto sukhumaṭṭhānesu attano ñāṇaṃ carāpetvā lokiyasatipaṭṭhāne abhinivisitvā lokuttaraṃ nibbattetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0201a:2396_0: Anavasesadohī ca hotīti paṭiggahaṇe mattaṃ ajānanto anavasesaṃ duhati.
atk-s0201a:2396_1: Niddesavāre panassa abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavārentīti abhiharitvā pavārenti.
atk-s0201a:2396_2: Ettha dve abhihārā vācābhihāro ca paccayābhihāro ca.
atk-s0201a:2396_3: Vācābhihāro nāma manussā bhikkhussa santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0201a:2396_6: Paccayābhihāro nāma vatthādīni vā telaphāṇitādīni vā gahetvā bhikkhussa santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0201a:2396_9: Tatra bhikkhu mattaṃ na jānātīti bhikkhu tesu paccayesu pamāṇaṃ na jānāti, –
atk-s0201a:2396_12: attano thāmo veditabbo”ti rathavinīte vuttanayena pamāṇayuttaṃ aggahetvā yaṃ āharanti,
atk-s0201a:2396_14: Manussā vippaṭisārino na puna abhiharitvā pavārenti.
atk-s0201a:2396_15: So paccayehi kilamanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0201a:2397_0: Te na atirekapūjāya pūjetā hotīti so gopālako mahāusabhe viya te there bhikkhū imāya āvi ceva raho ca mettāya kāyakammādikāya atirekapūjāya na pūjeti.
atk-s0201a:2397_2: “ime amhesu garucittīkāraṃ na karontī”ti navake bhikkhū dvīhi saṅgahehi na saṅgaṇhanti,
atk-s0201a:2397_3: na āmisasaṅgahena cīvarena vā pattena vā pattapariyāpannena vā vasanaṭṭhānena vā.
atk-s0201a:2397_5: Pāḷiṃ vā aṭṭhakathaṃ vā dhammakathābandhaṃ vā guyhaganthaṃ vā na sikkhāpenti.
atk-s0201a:2397_6: Navakā therānaṃ santikā sabbaso ime dve saṅgahe alabhamānā imasmiṃ sāsane patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0201a:2397_7: Yathā tassa gopālakassa gogaṇo na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0201a:2397_9: Yathā ca so gopālako pañcahi gorasehi paribāhiro hoti,
atk-s0201a:2401_3: Tasmiṃ kira māpiyamāne rattiṃ gaṅgāsotato maccho thalaṃ patto.
atk-s0201a:2401_4: Manussā celāni telapātiyaṃ temetvā ukkā katvā macchaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2401_5: Nagare niṭṭhite tassa nāmaṃ karonte amhehi nagaraṭṭhānassa gahitadivase celukkāhi maccho gahitoti ukkacelā-
atk-s0201a:2401_7: Bhikkhū āmantesīti yasmiṃ ṭhāne nisinnassa sabbā gaṅgā pākaṭā hutvā paññāyati,
atk-s0201a:2401_8: tādise vālikussade gaṅgātitthe sāyanhasamaye mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nisīditvā mahāgaṅgaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ sandamānaṃ olokento, –
atk-s0201a:2401_9: “atthi nu kho imaṃ gaṅgaṃ nissāya koci pubbe vaḍḍhiparihāniṃ patto”ti āvajjitvā,
atk-s0201a:2401_10: pubbe ekaṃ bālagopālakaṃ nissāya anekasatasahassā gogaṇā imissā gaṅgāya āvaṭṭe patitvā samuddameva paviṭṭhā,
atk-s0201a:2401_11: aparaṃ pana paṇḍitagopālakaṃ nissāya anekasatasahassagogaṇassa sotthi jātā vaḍḍhi jātā ārogyaṃ jātanti addasa.
atk-s0201a:2401_12: Disvā imaṃ kāraṇaṃ nissāya bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ desessāmīti cintetvā bhikkhū āmantesi.
atk-s0201a:2402_4: Uttaraṃ tīraṃ suvidehānanti gaṅgāya orime tīre magadharaṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2402_6: gāvo magadharaṭṭhato videharaṭṭhaṃ netvā rakkhissāmīti uttaraṃ tīraṃ patāresi.
atk-s0201a:2402_12: Tena hi gopālakena gāvo otārentena gaṅgāya orimatīre samatitthañca visamatitthañca oloketabbaṃ assa,
atk-s0201a:2402_13: majjhe gaṅgāya gunnaṃ vissamaṭṭhānatthaṃ dve tīṇi vālikatthalāni sallakkhetabbāni assu.
atk-s0201a:2402_15: imasmā titthā bhaṭṭhā imaṃ titthaṃ gaṇhissanti,
atk-s0201a:2402_17: Ayaṃ pana bālagopālako orimatīre gunnaṃ otaraṇatitthaṃ samaṃ vā visamaṃ vā anoloketvāva majjhe gaṅgāya
atk-s0201a:2402_18: gunnaṃ vissamaṭṭhānatthaṃ dve tīṇi vālikatthalānipi asallakkhetvāva paratīre cattāri pañca uttaraṇatitthāni
atk-s0201a:2402_20: Athassa mahāusabho javanasampannatāya ceva thāmasampannatāya ca tiriyaṃ gaṅgāya sotaṃ chetvā pārimaṃ
atk-s0201a:2402_24: Gāvo mahāusabho nivatto mayampi nivattissāmāti nivattā.
atk-s0201a:2402_25: Mahato gogaṇassa nivattaṭṭhāne udakaṃ chijjitvā majjhe gaṅgāya āvaṭṭaṃ uṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a:2402_27: Ekopi goṇo arogo nāma nāhosi. Tenāha –
atk-s0201a:2403_0: Akusalā imassa lokassāti idha loke khandhadhātāyatanesu akusalā achekā,
atk-s0201a:2404_1: Evaṃ kaṇhapakkhaṃ niṭṭhapetvā sukkapakkhaṃ dassento bhūtapubbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2404_3: Tattha balavagāvoti dantagoṇe ceva dhenuyo ca.
atk-s0201a:2404_9: Mātugoravakena vuyhamānoti mātā purato purato huṃhunti goravaṃ katvā saññaṃ dadamānā urena udakaṃ chindamānā gacchati,
atk-s0201a:2404_10: vacchako tāya goravasaññāya dhenuyā vā urena chinnodakena gacchamāno “mātugoravakena vuyhamāno”ti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:2405_1: Mārassa sotaṃ chetvāti arahattamaggena mārassa taṇhāsotaṃ chetvā.
atk-s0201a:2405_2: Pāraṃ gatāti mahāusabhā nadīpāraṃ viya saṃsārapāraṃ nibbānaṃ gatā.
atk-s0201a:2405_3: Pāraṃ agamaṃsūti mahāusabhānaṃ pāraṅgatakkhaṇe gaṅgāya sotassa tayo koṭṭhāse atikkamma ṭhitā mahāusabhe
atk-s0201a:2405_4: pāraṃ patte disvā tesaṃ gatamaggaṃ paṭipajjitvā pāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2405_5: Pāraṃ gamissantīti catumaggavajjhānaṃ kilesānaṃ tayo koṭṭhāse khepetvā ṭhitā idāni arahattamaggena avasesaṃ
atk-s0201a:2405_6: taṇhāsotaṃ chetvā balavagāvo viya nadīpāraṃ saṃsārapāraṃ nibbānaṃ gamissantīti.
atk-s0201a:2406_9: Evarūpaṃ satthāraṃ labhitvā tumhe pattāyeva nāmāti attho.
atk-s0201a:2410_2: Tattha mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyanti mahāvanaṃ nāma sayaṃjātaṃ aropimaṃ saparicchedaṃ mahantaṃ vanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2410_3: Kapilavatthusāmantā pana mahāvanaṃ himavantena saha ekābaddhaṃ aparicchedaṃ hutvā mahāsamuddaṃ āhacca ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2410_6: Kūṭāgārasālā pana mahāvanaṃ nissāya kate ārāme kūṭāgāraṃ antokatvā haṃsavaṭṭakacchannena katā sabbākārasampannā
atk-s0201a:2411_0: Saccako nigaṇṭhaputtoti pubbe kira eko nigaṇṭho ca nigaṇṭhī ca pañca pañca vādasatāni uggahetvā,
atk-s0201a:2411_1: vādaṃ āropessāmāti jambudīpe vicarantā vesāliyaṃ samāgatā.
atk-s0201a:2411_17: idheva vasathā”ti gehaṃ datvā baliṃ paṭṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2411_24: mātāpitūhi uggahitāni pañca pañca vādasatāni uggahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2411_26: “amhākaṃ ammā kule dārikā nāma hiraññasuvaṇṇādīni datvā kulagharaṃ pesitapubbā nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:2411_27: Yo pana agāriko tāsaṃ vādaṃ maddituṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:2411_34: “ayaṃ jambudīpo nāma jambuyā paññāyatī”ti jambusākhaṃ gahetvā cārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2411_36: tassa dvāre paṃsupuñje vā vālikapuñje vā jambudhajaṃ ṭhapetvā, –
atk-s0201a:2411_38: so imaṃ maddatū”ti vatvā gāmaṃ pavisanti.
atk-s0201a:2411_39: Evaṃ gāmena gāmaṃ vicarantiyo sāvatthiṃ pāpuṇitvā tatheva gāmadvāre jambudhajaṃ ṭhapetvā sampattamanussānaṃ ārocetvā antonagaraṃ paviṭṭhā.
atk-s0201a:2412_0: Tena samayena bhagavā sāvatthiṃ nissāya jetavane viharati.
atk-s0201a:2412_1: Athāyasmā sāriputto gilāne pucchanto ajaggitaṭṭhānaṃ jagganto attano kiccamahantatāya aññehi bhikkhūhi
atk-s0201a:2412_2: divātaraṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisanto gāmadvāre jambudhajaṃ disvā, –
atk-s0201a:2412_11: vādaṃ āropetukāmā jetavane therassa santikaṃ gacchathāti vadeyyāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:2412_12: Te therassa vacanaṃ sutvā jambudhajaṃ madditvā chaḍḍesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2412_17: Paribbājikā puna gāmaṃ pavisitvā ekekaṃ vīthiṃ gahetvā, –
atk-s0201a:2412_18: “buddhasāvako kira sāriputto nāma amhehi saddhiṃ vādaṃ karissati,
atk-s0201a:2413_1: “amhākaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne mātugāmassa āgamanaṃ nāma aphāsuka”nti vihāramajjhe nisīdi.
atk-s0201a:2413_9: tumhe pana mātugāmā nāma paṭhamaṃ pucchathāti āha.
atk-s0201a:2413_10: Tā catassopi catūsu disāsu ṭhatvā mātāpitūnaṃ santike uggahitaṃ vādasahassaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2413_11: Thero khaggena kumudanāḷaṃ chindanto viya pucchitaṃ pucchitaṃ nijjaṭaṃ niggaṇṭhiṃ katvā kathesi,
atk-s0201a:2413_17: ahaṃ pana ekaṃ yeva pañhaṃ pucchissāmi,
atk-s0201a:2414_0: Thero ayaṃ pana kulaputte pabbājetvā paṭhamaṃ sikkhāpetabbapañhoti vatvā, –
atk-s0201a:2414_7: mayhaṃ tumhe ekaṃ pañhampi kathetuṃ na sakkotha,
atk-s0201a:2414_8: evaṃ sante kassa jayo kassa parājayoti? Tumhākaṃ, bhante, jayo,
atk-s0201a:2414_13: Tumhe mātugāmā nāma amhākaṃ santike pabbajituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0201a:2414_14: amhākaṃ pana sāsanaṃ gahetvā bhikkhuniupassayaṃ gantvā pabbajathāti.
atk-s0201a:2414_15: Tā sādhūti therassa sāsanaṃ gahetvā bhikkhunisaṅghassa santikaṃ gantvā pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2414_16: Pabbajitā ca pana appamattā ātāpiniyo hutvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2415_3: tato bahutarañca bāhirasamayaṃ uggahetvā katthaci agantvā rājadārake sippaṃ sikkhāpento tattheva vesāliyaṃ vasati,
atk-s0201a:2415_4: paññāya atipūritattā kucchi me bhijjeyyāti bhīto ayapaṭṭena kucchiṃ parikkhipitvā carati,
atk-s0201a:2416_3: Sādhusammato bahujanassāti yaṃ yaṃ nakkhattacārena ādisati,
atk-s0201a:2416_5: tasmā ayaṃ sādhuladdhiko bhaddakoti evaṃ sammato mahājanassa.
atk-s0201a:2416_6: Vādena vādaṃ samāraddhoti kathāmaggena dosaṃ āropito.
atk-s0201a:2416_8: Jaṅghāvihāraṃ anucaṅkamamānoti tato tato licchavirājagehato taṃ taṃ gehaṃ gamanatthāya anucaṅkamamāno.
atk-s0201a:2417_3: Parassa hi samayaṃ ñatvā āropito vādo svāropito nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:2417_4: Ayaṃ pana samaṇassa gotamassa sāvako paññāyati assajitthero;
atk-s0201a:2417_6: etāhaṃ pucchitvā kathaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā samaṇassa gotamassa vādaṃ āropessāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2417_10: Thero pana yasmā dukkhanti vutte upārambhassa okāso hoti,
atk-s0201a:2417_21: uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya dukkhameva jirāpentā āhiṇḍathā”ti dosaṃ āropeyya,
atk-s0201a:2417_22: tasmā paravādissa pariyāyakathaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a:2418_2: Yena te licchavī tenupasaṅkamīti evaṃ kirassa ahosi –
atk-s0201a:2418_3: “ahaṃ pubbe samayaṃ ajānanabhāvena samaṇassa gotamassa vādaṃ na āropesiṃ,
atk-s0201a:2418_4: idāni panassa mahāsāvakena kathitaṃ samayaṃ jānāmi,
atk-s0201a:2418_5: ime ca mama antevāsikā pañcasatā licchavī sannipatitā.
atk-s0201a:2418_6: Etehi saddhiṃ gantvā samaṇassa gotamassa vādaṃ āropessāmī”ti tasmā upasaṅkami.
atk-s0201a:2418_11: tatra mayā kiṃ sakkā kātunti idāneva piṭṭhiṃ parivattento āha.
atk-s0201a:2418_18: Vālaṃ kaṇṇe gahetvāti surāparissāvanatthavikaṃ dhovitukāmo kasaṭanidhunanatthaṃ ubhosu kaṇṇesu gahetvā.
atk-s0201a:2418_22: Sāṇadhovikaṃ nāmāti ettha manussā sāṇasāṭakakaraṇatthaṃ sāṇavāke gahetvā muṭṭhiṃ muṭṭhiṃ bandhitvā udake pakkhipanti.
atk-s0201a:2418_24: Atha manussā ambilayāgusurādīni ādāya tattha gantvā sāṇamuṭṭhiṃ gahetvā,
atk-s0201a:2418_25: dakkhiṇato vāmato sammukhā cāti tīsu phalakesu sakiṃ dakkhiṇaphalake,
atk-s0201a:2418_27: sakiṃ sammukhaphalake paharantā ambilayāgusurādīni bhuñjantā pivantā khādantā dhovanti.
atk-s0201a:2418_29: Rañño nāgo taṃ kīḷaṃ disvā gambhīraṃ udakaṃ anupavisitvā soṇḍāya udakaṃ gahetvā sakiṃ kumbhe sakiṃ piṭṭhiyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2418_30: sakiṃ ubhosu passesu sakiṃ antarasatthiyaṃ pakkhipanto kīḷittha.
atk-s0201a:2418_31: Tadupādāya taṃ kīḷitajātaṃ sāṇadhovikaṃ nāma vuccati,
atk-s0201a:2418_35: yo bhagavato vādaṃ āropessatīti yo saccako nigaṇṭhaputto bhagavato vādaṃ āropessati,
atk-s0201a:2418_36: so kiṃ bhavamāno kiṃ yakkho bhavamāno udāhu indo,
atk-s0201a:2418_37: udāhu brahmā bhavamāno bhagavato vādaṃ āropessati?
atk-s0201a:2418_38: Na hi sakkā pakatimanussena bhagavato vādaṃ āropetunti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0201a:2419_1: Tena kho pana samayenāti yasmiṃ samaye saccako ārāmaṃ pāvisi, tasmiṃ.
atk-s0201a:2419_7: Tādisānañhi pacchābhattaṃ caṅkamitvā nhatvā sarīraṃ utuṃ gaṇhāpetvā nisajja samaṇadhammaṃ karontānaṃ cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2419_8: Yena te bhikkhūti so kira kuhiṃ samaṇo gotamoti pariveṇato pariveṇaṃ gantvā pucchitvā pavisissāmīti vilokento
atk-s0201a:2419_9: araññe hatthī viya caṅkame caṅkamamāne paṃsukūlikabhikkhū disvā tesaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:2419_13: bhoti katarasmiṃ āvāse vā maṇḍape vāti attho. Esa,
atk-s0201a:2419_15: bhagavāti tadā kira bhagavā paccūsakāle mahākaruṇā samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā dasasahassacakkavāḷe sabbaññutaññāṇajālaṃ
atk-s0201a:2419_17: “sve saccako nigaṇṭhaputto mahatiṃ licchaviparisaṃ gahetvā mama vādaṃ āropetukāmo āgamissatī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2419_18: Tasmā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro vesāliyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto
atk-s0201a:2419_19: mahāparisāya nisīdituṃ sukhaṭṭhāne nisīdissāmīti gandhakuṭiṃ apavisitvā mahāvane aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle
atk-s0201a:2419_21: Te bhikkhū bhagavato vattaṃ dassetvā āgatā,
atk-s0201a:2419_22: saccakena puṭṭhā dūre nisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ dassentā,
atk-s0201a:2420_0: Mahatiyā licchaviparisāya saddhinti heṭṭhā pañcamattehi licchavisatehi parivutoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2420_2: antovesāliyaṃ pana saccako pañcamattāni licchavirājasatāni gahetvā,
atk-s0201a:2420_3: “vādatthiko bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamanto”ti sutvā dvinnaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ sossāmāti yebhuyyena manussā nikkhantā,
atk-s0201a:2420_4: evaṃ sā parisā mahatī aparicchinnagaṇanā ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2420_17: ahaṃ asukassa putto datto nāma mitto nāma idha āgatoti vadantā nāmaṃ sāventi nāma.
atk-s0201a:2420_19: ahaṃ vāsiṭṭho nāma kaccāno nāma idha āgatoti vadantā gottaṃ sāventi nāma.
atk-s0201a:2420_20: Ete kira daliddā jiṇṇakulaputtā parisamajjhe nāmagottavasena pākaṭā bhavissāmāti evaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2420_25: atha vissāse sati ekaṃ dve bhikkhā adātuṃ na yutta”nti tato attānaṃ mocentā tuṇhī nisīdanti.
atk-s0201a:2420_26: Andhabālā aññāṇatāyeva avakkhittamattikāpiṇḍo viya yattha katthaci tuṇhībhūtā nisīdanti.
atk-s0201a:2421_1: Kiñcideva desanti kañci okāsaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2421_2: athassa bhagavā pañhapucchane ussāhaṃ janento āha – puccha,
atk-s0201a:2421_9: sabbaṃ te vissajjessāmī”ti sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavāresi asādhāraṇaṃ paccekabuddhaaggasāvamahāsāvakehi.
atk-s0201a:2422_0: “Puccha vāsava maṃ pañhaṃ, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi;
atk-s0201a:2423_0: Tassa tasseva pañhassa, ahaṃ antaṃ karomi te” iti. vā,
atk-s0201a:2424_0: “Tena hi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, sake āsane nisīditvā puccha yadākaṅkhasī”ti vā,
atk-s0201a:2426_0: Katāvakāsā pucchavho, yaṃ kiñci manasicchathā”ti. vā,
atk-s0201a:2427_0: “Puccha maṃ sabhiya pañhaṃ, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi;
atk-s0201a:2428_0: Tassa tasseva pañhassa, ahaṃ antaṃ karomi te” iti. vā –
atk-s0201a:2429_2: yaṃ bhagavā buddhabhūmiṃ patvā etaṃ pavāraṇaṃ pavāreyya.
atk-s0201a:2439_1: sambhavajātake ca sakalajambudīpaṃ tikkhattuṃ vicaritvā pañhānaṃ antakaraṃ adisvā suciratena brāhmaṇena pañhaṃ puṭṭho okāse kārite,
atk-s0201a:2439_2: jātiyā sattavasso rathikāyaṃ paṃsuṃ kīḷanto pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā antaravīthiyaṃ nisinnova –
atk-s0201a:2441_0: Rājā ca kho taṃ jānāti, yadi kāhati vā na vā”ti. –
atk-s0201a:2443_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā sabbaññupavāraṇāya pavāritāya attamano pañhaṃ pucchanto,
atk-s0201a:2444_9: tattha kiṃ mayā sakkā kātu”nti evaṃ nigaṇṭhassa vacanokāso mā hotūti heṭṭhā assajittherena kathitaniyāmeneva kathento,
atk-s0201a:2444_21: āhara taṃ upamaṃ visatthoti bhagavā avoca.
atk-s0201a:2444_23: Rūpattāyaṃ purisapuggaloti rūpaṃ attā assāti rūpattā,
atk-s0201a:2444_25: Rūpe patiṭṭhāyāti tasmiṃ attāti gahitarūpe patiṭṭhahitvā.
atk-s0201a:2444_26: Puññaṃ vā apuññaṃ vā pasavatīti kusalaṃ vā akusalaṃ vā paṭilabhati.
atk-s0201a:2444_29: Ime pañcakkhandhā imesaṃ sattānaṃ pathavī viya patiṭṭhā,
atk-s0201a:2444_30: te imesu pañcasu khandhesu patiṭṭhāya kusalākusalakammaṃ nāma āyūhanti.
atk-s0201a:2444_31: Tumhe evarūpaṃ vijjamānameva attānaṃ paṭisedhento pañcakkhandhā anattāti dīpethāti ativiya sakāraṇaṃ katvā upamaṃ āhari.
atk-s0201a:2444_33: sabbaññubuddhato añño tassa kathaṃ chinditvā vāde dosaṃ dātuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:2444_34: Duvidhā hi puggalā buddhaveneyyā ca sāvakaveneyyā ca.
atk-s0201a:2444_36: Buddhaveneyye pana sāvakā vinetuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0201a:2444_39: tasmā etassa vādaṃ chinditvā añño dosaṃ dātuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:2444_40: Tenassa bhagavā sayameva vāde dosadassanatthaṃ nanu tvaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2445_4: Handāhaṃ imaṃ vādaṃ mahājanassāpi matthake pakkhipāmī”ti,
atk-s0201a:2445_10: Bhagavā pana nigaṇṭhato sataguṇenapi sahassaguṇenapi satasahassaguṇenapi vādīvarataro,
atk-s0201a:2445_12: “ayaṃ nigaṇṭho attānaṃ mocetvā mahājanassa matthake vādaṃ pakkhipati,
atk-s0201a:2445_18: nāyaṃ janatā mama vādaṃ āropetuṃ āgatā,
atk-s0201a:2445_19: tvaṃyeva sakalaṃ vesāliṃ saṃvaṭṭitvā mama vādaṃ āropetuṃ āgato,
atk-s0201a:2446_1: Iti bhagavā nigaṇṭhassa vādaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā, tena hi,
atk-s0201a:2446_7: Ghātetāyaṃ vā ghātetunti ghātārahaṃ ghātetabbayuttakaṃ ghātetuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2446_8: Jāpetāyaṃ vā jāpetunti dhanajānirahaṃ jāpetabbayuttaṃ jāpetuṃ jiṇṇadhanaṃ kātuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2446_9: Pabbājetāyaṃ vā pabbājetunti sakaraṭṭhato pabbājanārahaṃ pabbājetuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2446_11: Vattituñca arahatīti vattati ceva vattituñca arahati.
atk-s0201a:2446_13: Iti nigaṇṭho attano vādabhedanatthaṃ āhaṭakāraṇameva attano māraṇatthāya āvudhaṃ tikhiṇaṃ karonto viya visesetvā dīpeti,
atk-s0201a:2446_15: Evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotūti mama rūpaṃ evaṃvidhaṃ hotu,
atk-s0201a:2446_16: pāsādikaṃ abhirūpaṃ alaṅkatappaṭiyattaṃ suvaṇṇatoraṇaṃ viya susajjitacittapaṭo viya ca manāpadassananti.
atk-s0201a:2446_17: Evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosīti mama rūpaṃ evaṃvidhaṃ mā hotu,
atk-s0201a:2447_0: Tuṇhī ahosīti nigaṇṭho imasmiṃ ṭhāne viraddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā,
atk-s0201a:2447_1: “samaṇo gotamo mama vādaṃ bhindanatthāya kāraṇaṃ āhari,
atk-s0201a:2447_7: tvaṃ mama rūpe vaso vattatīti vadasi,
atk-s0201a:2447_9: kasmā tvaṃ yathā ime licchavirājāno tāvatiṃsadevasadisehi attabhāvehi virocanti abhirūpā pāsādikā,
atk-s0201a:2447_14: tvaṃ pubbe vattati me rūpasmiṃ vasoti vatvā idāni paṭikkhipasī’ti vādaṃ āropessati.
atk-s0201a:2447_16: na vattatīti vuttepi eko doso”ti tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2447_19: Yasmā pana yāvatatiyaṃ bhagavatā pucchite abyākarontassa sattadhā muddhā phalati,
atk-s0201a:2447_20: buddhā ca nāma sattānaṃyeva atthāya kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramīnaṃ pūritattā sattesu balavaanuddayā honti.
atk-s0201a:2447_21: Tasmā yāvatatiyaṃ apucchitvā atha kho bhagavā saccakaṃ nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0201a:2448_2: Yakkhoti na yo vā so vā yakkho,
atk-s0201a:2448_10: bhayānakāni akkhināsādīnīti evaṃ virūparūpaṃ māpetvā ṭhito.
atk-s0201a:2448_14: pare ca me na ājāneyyu”nti evaṃ dhammadesanāya appossukkabhāvaṃ āpanne bhagavati sakko mahābrahmunā saddhiṃ āgantvā,
atk-s0201a:2448_19: Tasmā “ajja saccakaṃ tāsetvā pañhaṃ vissajjāpessāmī”ti āgato.
atk-s0201a:2449_1: saccako ca nigaṇṭhaputtoti yadi hi taṃ aññepi passeyyuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2449_3: “samaṇo gotamo saccakaṃ attano vāde anotarantaṃ ñatvā yakkhaṃ āvāhetvā dassesi,
atk-s0201a:2449_5: Tasmā bhagavā ceva passati saccako ca.
atk-s0201a:2449_6: Tassa taṃ disvāva sakalasarīrato sedā mucciṃsu,
atk-s0201a:2449_8: So “aññepi nu kho passantī”ti olokento kassaci lomahaṃsamattampi na addasa. Tato –
atk-s0201a:2449_13: paṭhamaṃ yakkhaṃ adisvā samaṇena gotamena vādasaṅghāṭe khittova yakkhaṃ passasī’ti vadeyyu”nti cintetvā –
atk-s0201a:2449_14: “na dāni me idha aññaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ atthi,
atk-s0201a:2450_1: Manasi karitvāti manamhi katvā paccavekkhitvā upadhāretvā.
atk-s0201a:2450_2: Evaṃ me vedanā hotūti kusalāva hotu,
atk-s0201a:2450_4: Evaṃ me saññā hotūti kusalāva hotu,
atk-s0201a:2450_8: Mā ahosīti ettha pana vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2450_10: Samanupassitunti “etaṃ mama esohamasmi eso me attā”ti evaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena passituṃ. No hidaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2450_13: Iti bhagavā yathā nāma cheko ahituṇḍiko sappadaṭṭhavisaṃ teneva sappena puna ḍaṃsāpetvā ubbāheyya,
atk-s0201a:2450_14: evaṃ tassaṃyeva parisati saccakaṃ nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ teneva mukhena pañcakkhandhā aniccā dukkhā anattāti vadāpesi.
atk-s0201a:2450_15: Dukkhaṃ allīnoti imaṃ pañcakkhandhadukkhaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhīhi allīno.
atk-s0201a:2450_17: Dukkhaṃ etaṃ mamātiādīsu pañcakkhandhadukkhaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena samanupassatīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2450_18: Parijāneyyāti aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti tīraṇapariññāya parito jāneyya.
atk-s0201a:2451_2: Akukkukajātanti pupphaggahaṇakāle anto aṅguṭṭhappamāṇo eko ghanadaṇḍako nibbattati,
atk-s0201a:2451_7: Bhāsitā kho pana teti idaṃ bhagavā tassa mukharabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā niggaṇhanto āha.
atk-s0201a:2451_8: So kira pubbe pūraṇādayo cha satthāro upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2451_10: Atha nesaṃ parisamajjhe mahantaṃ vippakāraṃ āropetvā uṭṭhāya jayaṃ pavedento gacchati.
atk-s0201a:2451_11: So sammāsambuddhampi tatheva viheṭhessāmīti saññāya upasaṅkamitvā –
atk-s0201a:2452_0: “Ambho ko nāma yaṃ rukkho, sinnapatto sakaṇṭako;
atk-s0201a:2454_0: Ayaṃ khadiraṃ āhacca asārakarukkhaparicito mudutuṇḍasakuṇo viya sabbaññutaññāṇasāraṃ āhacca ñāṇatuṇḍabhedaṃ
atk-s0201a:2454_2: Tadassa parisamajjhe pakāsento bhāsitā kho pana tetiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2454_3: Natthi etarahīti upādinnakasarīre sedo nāma natthīti na vattabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2454_5: Suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ kāyaṃ vivarīti na sabbaṃ kāyaṃ vivari.
atk-s0201a:2454_6: Buddhā nāma gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcitvā paṭicchannasarīrā parisati dhammaṃ desenti.
atk-s0201a:2454_7: Atha bhagavā galavāṭakasammukhaṭṭhāne cīvaraṃ gahetvā caturaṅgulamattaṃ otāresi.
atk-s0201a:2454_8: Otāritamatte pana tasmiṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇā rasmiyo puñjapuñjā hutvā suvaṇṇaghaṭato rattasuvaṇṇarasadhārā viya,
atk-s0201a:2454_9: rattavaṇṇavalāhakato vijjulatā viya ca nikkhamitvā suvaṇṇamurajasadisaṃ mahākhandhaṃ uttamasiraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ kurumānā ākāse pakkhandiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2454_12: Mahājano hi samaṇo gotamo mayhaṃ sedo natthīti vadati,
atk-s0201a:2454_13: saccakassa tāva nigaṇṭhaputtassa yantāruḷhassa viya sedā paggharanti.
atk-s0201a:2454_14: Samaṇo pana gotamo ghanadupaṭṭacīvaraṃ pārupitvā nisinno,
atk-s0201a:2454_15: anto sedassa atthitā vā natthitā vā kathaṃ sakkā ñātunti kaṅkhaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0201a:2455_4: Abhabbo taṃ pokkharaṇiṃ puna otaritunti sabbesaṃ aḷānaṃ bhaggattā pacchinnagamano otarituṃ abhabbo,
atk-s0201a:2455_10: vādādhippāyo hutvā vādaṃ āropessāmīti ajjhāsayena upasaṅkamituṃ abhabbo;
atk-s0201a:2455_13: Dummukhassa kirassa upamāharaṇakāle sesa licchavikumārāpi cintesuṃ –
atk-s0201a:2455_14: “iminā nigaṇṭhena amhākaṃ sippuggahaṇaṭṭhāne ciraṃ avamāno kato,
atk-s0201a:2455_15: ayaṃ dāni amittassa piṭṭhiṃ passituṃ kālo.
atk-s0201a:2455_16: Mayampi ekekaṃ upamaṃ āharitvā pāṇippahārena patitaṃ muggarena pothento viya tathā naṃ karissāma,
atk-s0201a:2455_17: yathā na puna parisamajjhe sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ sakkhissatī”ti,
atk-s0201a:2455_18: te opammāni karitvā dummukhassa kathāpariyosānaṃ āgamayamānā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2455_20: ime sabbeva gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā oṭṭhehi calamānehi ṭhitā;
atk-s0201a:2455_22: puna mayā parisamajjhe sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na sakkā bhavissati,
atk-s0201a:2455_23: handāhaṃ dummukhaṃ apasādetvā yathā aññassa okāso na hoti,
atk-s0201a:2455_24: evaṃ kathāvāraṃ pacchinditvā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pañhaṃ pucchissāmīti tasmā etadavoca.
atk-s0201a:2456_4: esā amhākañceva aññesañca puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ vācā tiṭṭhatu.
atk-s0201a:2456_5: Vilāpaṃ vilapitaṃ maññeti etañhi vacanaṃ vilapitaṃ viya hoti,
atk-s0201a:2456_7: Atha vā tiṭṭhatesāti ettha kathāti āharitvā vattabbā.
atk-s0201a:2456_8: Vācāvilāpaṃ vilapitaṃ maññeti ettha panidaṃ vācānicchāraṇaṃ vilapitamattaṃ maññe hotīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2457_6: Yasmā panettha passatīti vuttattā sekkhabhūmi dassitā.
atk-s0201a:2457_7: Tasmā uttari asekkhabhūmiṃ pucchanto dutiyaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi,
atk-s0201a:2457_18: Buddho so bhagavāti so bhagavā sayampi cattāri saccāni buddho.
atk-s0201a:2458_5: Natveva bhavantaṃ gotamanti bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ āsajja kassaci attano vādaṃ anupahataṃ sakalaṃ ādāya pakkamituṃ thāmo natthīti dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2458_6: Na hi bhagavā hatthiādayo viya kassaci jīvitantarāyaṃ karoti.
atk-s0201a:2458_7: Ayaṃ pana nigaṇṭho imā tisso upamā na bhagavato ukkaṃsanatthaṃ āhari,
atk-s0201a:2458_9: Yathā hi rājā kañci paccatthikaṃ ghātetvā evaṃ nāma sūro evaṃ thāmasampanno puriso bhavissatīti paccatthikaṃ thomentopi attānameva thometi.
atk-s0201a:2458_12: hatthiṃ pabhinnantiādīhi bhagavantaṃ ukkaṃsentopi mayameva sūrā mayaṃ paṇḍitā mayaṃ bahussutāyeva evaṃ pabhinnahatthiṃ viya,
atk-s0201a:2458_14: phaṇakataāsīvisaṃ viya ca vādatthikā sammāsambuddhaṃ upasaṅkamimhāti attānaṃyeva ukkaṃseti.
atk-s0201a:2458_15: Evaṃ attānaṃ ukkaṃsetvā bhagavantaṃ nimantayamāno adhivāsetu metiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2458_17: Svātanāyāti yaṃ me tumhesu kāraṃ karoto sve bhavissati puññañca pītipāmojjañca,
atk-s0201a:2458_19: Adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvenāti bhagavā kāyaṅgaṃ vā vācaṅgaṃ vā acopetvā abbhantareyeva khantiṃ dhārento tuṇhībhāvena adhivāsesi.
atk-s0201a:2458_20: Saccakassa anuggahakaraṇatthaṃ manasāva sampaṭicchīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2459_1: Yamassa patirūpaṃ maññeyyāthāti te kira licchavī tassa pañcathālipākasatāni niccabhattaṃ āharanti.
atk-s0201a:2459_2: Tadeva sandhāya esa sve tumhe yaṃ assa samaṇassa gotamassa patirūpaṃ kappiyanti maññeyyātha,
atk-s0201a:2459_4: samaṇassa hi gotamassa tumhe paricārakā kappiyākappiyaṃ yuttāyuttaṃ jānāthāti vadati.
atk-s0201a:2459_17: onittaṃ nānābhūtaṃ pattaṃ pāṇito assāti onittapattapāṇī.
atk-s0201a:2459_19: hatthe ca pattañca dhovitvā ekamante pattaṃ nikkhipitvā nisinnanti attho.
atk-s0201a:2459_20: Ekamantaṃ nisīdīti bhagavantaṃ evaṃbhūtaṃ ñatvā ekasmiṃ okāse nisīdīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2459_24: Taṃ dāyakānaṃ sukhāya hotūti taṃ imesaṃ licchavīnaṃ sukhatthāya hotu.
atk-s0201a:2459_25: Idaṃ kira so ahaṃ pabbajito nāma,
atk-s0201a:2459_26: pabbajitena ca na yuttaṃ attano dānaṃ niyyātetunti tesaṃ niyyātento evamāha.
