atk-s0201a:2459_27: Atha bhagavā yasmā licchavīhi saccakassa dinnaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2459_32: Iti bhagavā nigaṇṭhassa matena vināyeva attano dinnaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ nigaṇṭhassa niyyātesi,
atk-s0201a:2463_2: Tattha ekaṃ samayanti ca tena kho pana samayenāti ca pubbaṇhasamayanti ca tīhi padehi ekova samayo vutto.
atk-s0201a:2463_3: Bhikkhūnañhi vattapaṭipattiṃ katvā mukhaṃ dhovitvā pattacīvaramādāya cetiyaṃ vanditvā kataraṃ gāmaṃ pavisissāmāti vitakkamāḷake ṭhitakālo nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:2463_4: Bhagavā evarūpe samaye rattadupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ ekaṃsaṃ pārupitvā
atk-s0201a:2463_7: “ekaṃ samayanti ca tena kho pana samayenāti ca pubbaṇhasamaya”nti ca vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2463_12: “pubbepāhaṃ apaṇḍitatāya sakalaṃ vesāliparisaṃ gahetvā samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ gantvā parisamajjhe maṅku jāto.
atk-s0201a:2463_13: Idāni tathā akatvā ekakova gantvā vādaṃ āropessāmi.
atk-s0201a:2463_17: andhakāre naccaṃ viya na koci jānissatī”ti niddāpañhaṃ nāma gahetvā iminā vādajjhāsayena upasaṅkami.
atk-s0201a:2464_0: Anukampaṃ upādāyāti saccakassa nigaṇṭhaputtassa anukampaṃ paṭicca.
atk-s0201a:2464_4: Tasmā bhagavantaṃ yācitvā paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ catugguṇaṃ paññapetvā nisīdatu bhagavāti āha.
atk-s0201a:2464_5: “Kāraṇaṃ ānando vadatī”ti sallakkhetvā nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsane.
atk-s0201a:2464_6: Bhagavantaṃ etadavocāti yaṃ pana pañhaṃ ovaṭṭikasāraṃ katvā ādāya āgato taṃ ṭhapetvā passena tāva pariharanto etaṃ santi,
atk-s0201a:2465_2: bho gotamāti te samaṇabrāhmaṇā sarīre uppannaṃ sārīrikaṃ dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ phusanti labhanti,
atk-s0201a:2465_7: Kāyanvayaṃ hotīti kāyānugataṃ hoti kāyassa vasavatti.
atk-s0201a:2465_10: iti nigaṇṭho asantaṃ abhūtaṃ yaṃ natthi, tadevāha.
atk-s0201a:2465_12: samādhiyuttassa ca puggalassa ūrukkhambhādayo nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a:2465_15: “yatheva ‘bhūtapubbanti vatvā ūrukkhambhopi nāma bhavissatī’tiādīni vadato anāgatarūpaṃ na sameti,
atk-s0201a:2466_4: tasmiṃ kho pana samaye bhikkhū pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmetvā attano attano rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu paṭisallānaṃ upagacchanti.
atk-s0201a:2466_5: So te paṭisallīne disvā cittabhāvanāmattaṃ ete anuyuñjanti,
atk-s0201a:2467_1: Atha naṃ bhagavā anuyuñjanto kinti pana te,
atk-s0201a:2467_20: Ācayāpacayo hotīti vaḍḍhi ca avaḍḍhi ca hoti,
atk-s0201a:2467_23: kāyabhāvanā pana na paññāyatīti dīpetvā cittabhāvanaṃ pucchanto,
atk-s0201a:2468_1: Kuto pana tvanti yo tvaṃ evaṃ oḷārikaṃ dubbalaṃ kāyabhāvanaṃ na jānāsi?
atk-s0201a:2468_2: So tvaṃ kuto saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ cittabhāvanaṃ jānissasīti.
atk-s0201a:2468_4: “abuddhavacanaṃ nāmetaṃ pada”nti bījaniṃ ṭhapetvā pakkamituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a:2468_7: imassa cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa ācayopi apacayopi ādānampi nikkhepanampī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2468_9: “oḷārikaṃ kāyaṃ pariggaṇhantassa uppannavipassanā oḷārikāti vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2469_2: Sukhāya vedanāya nirodhā uppajjati dukkhā vedanāti na anantarāva uppajjati,
atk-s0201a:2469_4: Yasmā pana sukhe aniruddhe dukkhaṃ nuppajjati,
atk-s0201a:2469_7: Ubhatopakkhanti sukhaṃ ekaṃ pakkhaṃ dukkhaṃ ekaṃ pakkhanti evaṃ ubhatopakkhaṃ hutvā.
atk-s0201a:2470_1: Uppannāpi sukhā vedanā cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a:2470_3: Uppannāpi dukkhā vedanā cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a:2470_10: Vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nisinnassa hi addhāne gacchante gacchante tattha tattha aggiuṭṭhānaṃ viya hoti,
atk-s0201a:2470_12: matthakato usumavaṭṭiuṭṭhānaṃ viya hotīti cittaṃ haññati vihaññati vipphandati.
atk-s0201a:2470_15: Uppanne pana kāyike vā cetasike vā dukkhe taṃ dukkhaṃ vikkhambhetvā samāpattiṃ samāpannassa samāpattikkhaṇe dukkhaṃ dūrāpagataṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2470_26: “uppannāpi sukhā vedanā cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a:2470_28: Uppannāpi dukkhā vedanā cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a:2471_0: 370. Āsajja upanīyāti guṇe ghaṭṭetvā ceva upanetvā ca. Taṃ vata meti taṃ vata mama cittaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2472_8: uppannāya panassā ahaṃ cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhātuṃ na demi.
atk-s0201a:2472_9: Idānissa tamatthaṃ pakāsetuṃ upari pasādāvahaṃ dhammadesanaṃ desetukāmo mūlato paṭṭhāya mahābhinikkhamanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a:2472_14: alamidaṃ padhānāyāti idaṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā pāsarāsisutte vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2473_11: Ñāṇāya dassanāya anuttarāya sambodhāyāti sabbaṃ lokuttaramaggavevacanameva.
atk-s0201a:2474_1: allaṃ sakhīraṃ udumbarakaṭṭhaṃ viya hi kilesakāmena vatthukāmato anissaṭapuggalā.
atk-s0201a:2474_3: manthanenāpi aggino anabhinibbattanaṃ viya kilesakāmena vatthukāmato anissaṭānaṃ opakkamikāhi vedanāhi lokuttaramaggassa anadhigamo.
atk-s0201a:2474_4: Amanthanenāpi aggino anabhinibbattanaṃ viya tesaṃ puggalānaṃ vināpi opakkamikāhi vedanāhi lokuttaramaggassa anadhigamo.
atk-s0201a:2475_2: Thale nikkhittanti pabbatathale vā bhūmithale vā nikkhittaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2475_4: sukkhakoḷāpakaṭṭhaṃ viya hi kilesakāmena vatthukāmato nissaṭapuggalā,
atk-s0201a:2475_5: ārakā udakā thale nikkhittabhāvo viya kilesakāmena atintatā.
atk-s0201a:2475_6: Manthanenāpi aggino abhinibbattanaṃ viya kilesakāmena vatthukāmato nissaṭānaṃ abbhokāsikanesajjikādivasena
atk-s0201a:2475_8: Aññassa rukkhassa sukkhasākhāya saddhiṃ ghaṃsanamatteneva aggino abhinibbattanaṃ viya vināpi opakkamikāhi
atk-s0201a:2475_10: Ayaṃ upamā bhagavatā attano atthāya āhaṭā.
atk-s0201a:2476_3: Kiṃ pana bhagavā dukkaraṃ akatvā buddho bhavituṃ na samatthoti?
atk-s0201a:2476_8: Pāsāde nisinnoyeva hi paveṇiāgataṃ rajjaṃ labhitvāpi khattiyo na tathāpamudito hoti,
atk-s0201a:2476_9: yathā balakāyaṃ gahetvā saṅgāme dve tayo sampahāre datvā amittamathanaṃ katvā pattarajjo.
atk-s0201a:2476_10: Evaṃ pattarajjassa hi rajjasiriṃ anubhavantassa parisaṃ oloketvā attano parakkamaṃ anussaritvā,
atk-s0201a:2476_11: “asukaṭṭhāne asukakammaṃ katvā asukañca asukañca amittaṃ evaṃ vijjhitvā evaṃ paharitvā imaṃ rajjasiriṃ
atk-s0201a:2476_13: Evamevaṃ bhagavāpi sadevakassa lokassa parakkamaṃ dassessāmi,
atk-s0201a:2476_14: so hi maṃ parakkamo ativiya hāsessati,
atk-s0201a:2477_1: pacchimā hi janatā sammāsambuddho kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūretvāpi padhānaṃ padahitvāva sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ patto,
atk-s0201a:2477_2: kimaṅgaṃ pana mayanti padhānavīriyaṃ kattabbaṃ maññissati;
atk-s0201a:2477_3: evaṃ sante khippameva jātijarāmaraṇassa antaṃ karissatīti pacchimaṃ janataṃ anukampamāno akāsiyeva.
atk-s0201a:2479_3: Sīsavedanā hontīti kutoci nikkhamituṃ alabhamānehi vātehi samuṭṭhāpitā balavatiyo sīsavedanā honti.
atk-s0201a:2479_5: Devatāti bodhisattassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ paṇṇasālapariveṇasāmantā ca adhivatthā devatā.
atk-s0201a:2480_0: Tadā kira bodhisattassa adhimatte kāyadāhe uppanne mucchā udapādi.
atk-s0201a:2480_4: “arahanto nāma evarūpā honti matakasadisā”ti laddhiyā vadanti.
atk-s0201a:2480_13: mama puttassa bodhiṃ apatvā kālaṅkiriyā nāma natthīti.
atk-s0201a:2481_0: Aparabhāge sammāsambuddhassa dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā anupubbena rājagahaṃ gantvā kapilavatthuṃ anuppattassa
atk-s0201a:2481_1: suddhodanamahārājā pattaṃ gahetvā pāsādaṃ āropetvā yāgukhajjakaṃ datvā antarābhattasamaye etamatthaṃ ārocesi –
atk-s0201a:2481_7: supinappaṭiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya acchariyāni passanto kiṃ saddahissasi?
atk-s0201a:2481_10: pubbe pana mayhaṃ aparipakke ñāṇe bodhicariyaṃ carantassa dhammapālakumārakālepi sippaṃ uggahetuṃ gatassa,
atk-s0201a:2481_16: mahārājāti imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā bhagavā mahādhammapālajātakaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0201a:2482_1: Mā kho tvaṃ mārisāti sampiyāyamānā āhaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2483_5: paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharitāti rañño kira vappamaṅgaladivaso nāma hoti,
atk-s0201a:2483_7: Nagaravīthiyo sodhāpetvā puṇṇaghaṭe ṭhapāpetvā dhajapaṭākādayo ussāpetvā sakalanagaraṃ devavimānaṃ viya alaṅkaronti.
atk-s0201a:2483_8: Sabbe dāsakammakarādayo ahatavatthanivatthā gandhamālādipaṭimaṇḍitā rājakule sannipatanti.
atk-s0201a:2483_10: Tasmiṃ pana divase ekena ūnaṃ aṭṭhasataṃ yojenti.
atk-s0201a:2483_11: Sabbanaṅgalāni saddhiṃ balibaddarasmiyottehi jāṇussoṇissa ratho viya rajataparikkhittāni honti.
atk-s0201a:2483_14: Rājā mahāparivārena nikkhamanto puttaṃ gahetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:2484_0: Kammantaṭṭhāne eko jamburukkho bahalapattapalāso sandacchāyo ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2484_1: Tassa heṭṭhā kumārassa sayanaṃ paññapetvā upari suvaṇṇatārakakhacitaṃ vitānaṃ bandhāpetvā sāṇipākārena
atk-s0201a:2484_2: parikkhipāpetvā ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā rājā sabbālaṅkāraṃ alaṅkaritvā amaccagaṇaparivuto naṅgalakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:2484_4: Amaccā ekenūnaaṭṭhasatarajatanaṅgalāni gahetvā ito cito ca kasanti.
atk-s0201a:2484_8: bodhisattaṃ parivāretvā nisinnā dhātiyo rañño sampattiṃ passissāmāti antosāṇito bahi nikkhantā.
atk-s0201a:2484_9: Bodhisatto ito cito ca olokento kañci adisvā vegena uṭṭhāya pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ānāpāne pariggahetvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattesi.
atk-s0201a:2484_12: tassa pana rukkhassa parimaṇḍalā hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:2484_13: Dhātiyo ayyaputto ekakoti vegena sāṇiṃ ukkhipitvā anto pavisamānā bodhisattaṃ sayane pallaṅkena nisinnaṃ
atk-s0201a:2484_14: tañca pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā gantvā rañño ārocayiṃsu –
atk-s0201a:2484_16: evaṃ nisinno aññesaṃ rukkhānaṃ chāyā nivattā,
atk-s0201a:2484_18: Rājā vegenāgantvā pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā, “idaṃ te, tāta,
atk-s0201a:2484_23: Siyā nu kho eso maggo bodhāyāti bhaveyya nu kho etaṃ ānāpānassatipaṭhamajjhānaṃ bujjhanatthāya maggoti.
atk-s0201a:2484_25: ānāpānassatipaṭhamajjhānaṃ pana bhavissatīti evaṃ ekaṃ dve vāre uppannasatiyā anantaraṃ uppannaviññāṇaṃ satānusāriviññāṇaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2484_26: Yaṃ taṃ sukhanti yaṃ taṃ ānāpānassatipaṭhamajjhānasukhaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2485_3: Āvatto bāhullāyāti rasagiddho hutvā paṇītapiṇḍapātādīnaṃ atthāya āvatto.
atk-s0201a:2485_4: Nibbijja pakkamiṃsūti ukkaṇṭhitvā dhammaniyāmeneva pakkantā bodhisattassa sambodhiṃ pattakāle kāyavivekassa okāsadānatthaṃ dhammatāya gatā.
atk-s0201a:2485_5: Gacchantā ca aññaṭṭhānaṃ agantvā bārāṇasimeva agamaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2485_6: Bodhisatto tesu gatesu addhamāsaṃ kāyavivekaṃ labhitvā bodhimaṇḍe aparājitapallaṅke nisīditvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhi.
atk-s0201a:2487_1: Abhijānāmi kho panāhanti ayaṃ pāṭiyekko anusandhi.
atk-s0201a:2487_11: tathāgate anekasatāya parisāya dhammaṃ desente kupito samaṇo gotamoti ekopi vattā natthi,
atk-s0201a:2487_12: paresaṃ bodhanatthāya paṭivijjhanatthāya eva tathāgato dhammaṃ desetīti dassento imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a:2488_2: tathāgato hi yasmiṃ khaṇe parisā sādhukāraṃ deti,
atk-s0201a:2488_3: tasmiṃ khaṇe pubbābhogena paricchinditvā phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati,
atk-s0201a:2488_4: sādhukārasaddassa nigghose avicchinneyeva samāpattito vuṭṭhāya ṭhitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0201a:2488_5: buddhānañhi bhavaṅgaparivāso lahuko hotīti assāsavāre passāsavāre samāpattiṃ samāpajjanti.
atk-s0201a:2488_6: Yena sudaṃ niccakappanti yena suññena phalasamādhinā niccakālaṃ viharāmi,
atk-s0201a:2488_7: tasmiṃ samādhinimitte cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi samādahāmīti dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2489_1: Evaṃ bhagavato ekaggacittataṃ sampaṭicchitvā idāni attano ovaṭṭikasāraṃ katvā ānītapañhaṃ pucchanto abhijānāti
atk-s0201a:2489_2: kho pana bhavaṃ gotamo divā supitāti āha.
atk-s0201a:2489_3: Yathā hi sunakho nāma asambhinnakhīrapakkapāyasaṃ sappinā yojetvā udarapūraṃ bhojitopi gūthaṃ disvā akhāditvā gantuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0201a:2489_6: evamevaṃ imassapi satthā asambhinnakhīrapakkapāyasasadisaṃ abhinikkhamanato paṭṭhāya yāva āsavakkhayā pasādanīyaṃ dhammadesanaṃ deseti.
atk-s0201a:2489_7: Etassa pana evarūpaṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā satthari pasādamattampi na uppannaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2489_8: tasmā ovaṭṭikasāraṃ katvā ānītapañhaṃ apucchitvā gantuṃ asakkonto evamāha.
atk-s0201a:2489_9: Tattha yasmā thinamiddhaṃ sabbakhīṇāsavānaṃ arahattamaggeneva pahīyati,
atk-s0201a:2489_11: Tathā hi kamaluppalādīni ekasmiṃ kāle vikasanti,
atk-s0201a:2489_15: Evaṃ upādinnakassa kāyassa darathoyeva darathavasena bhavaṅgasotañca idha niddāti adhippetaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2490_4: Abhinanditvā anumoditvāti alanti cittena sampaṭicchanto abhinanditvā vācāyapi pasaṃsanto anumoditvā.
atk-s0201a:2490_5: Bhagavatā imassa nigaṇṭhassa dve suttāni kathitāni.
atk-s0201a:2490_8: iti aḍḍhatiye bhāṇavāre sutvāpi ayaṃ nigaṇṭho neva abhisamayaṃ patto,
atk-s0201a:2490_15: mayhaṃ pana parinibbānato samadhikānaṃ dvinnaṃ vassasatānaṃ accayena tambapaṇṇidīpe sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhahissati.
atk-s0201a:2490_16: Tatrāyaṃ kulaghare nibbattitvā sampatte kāle pabbajitvā tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0201a:2490_17: saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā kāḷabuddharakkhito nāma mahākhīṇāsavo bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2490_18: Idaṃ disvā anāgate vāsanatthāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0201a:2491_0: Sopi tattheva tambapaṇṇidīpamhi sāsane patiṭṭhite devalokato cavitvā dakkhiṇagirivihārassa bhikkhācāragāme
atk-s0201a:2491_1: ekasmiṃ amaccakule nibbatto pabbajjāsamatthayobbane pabbajitvā tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā gaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2491_3: Athassa upajjhāyo saddhivihārikaṃ codessāmīti tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā āgatena tena saddhiṃ mukhaṃ datvā kathāmattampi na akāsi.
atk-s0201a:2491_4: So paccūsasamaye vuṭṭhāya therassa santikaṃ gantvā, – “tumhe, bhante,
atk-s0201a:2491_5: mayi ganthakammaṃ katvā tumhākaṃ santikaṃ āgate mukhaṃ datvā kathāmattampi na karittha,
atk-s0201a:2491_8: buddharakkhita ettakeneva ‘pabbajjākiccaṃ me matthakaṃ patta’nti saññaṃ karosī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2491_10: Gaṇaṃ vinodetvā tvaṃ papañcaṃ chinditvā cetiyapabbatavihāraṃ gantvā samaṇadhammaṃ karohīti.
atk-s0201a:2491_11: So upajjhāyassa ovāde ṭhatvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā puññavā rājapūjito hutvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro cetiyapabbatavihāre vasi.
atk-s0201a:2492_0: Tasmiñhi kāle tissamahārājā uposathakammaṃ karonto cetiyapabbate rājaleṇe vasati.
atk-s0201a:2492_5: Theropi ekasmiṃ dhammassavanadivase bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro kaṇṭakacetiyaṅgaṇaṃ āruyha cetiyaṃ vanditvā kāḷatimbarurukkhamūle aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:2492_6: Atha naṃ eko piṇḍapātikatthero kāḷakārāmasuttante pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0201a:2492_16: Patvā ca aññātakaveseneva parisante ṭhatvā tiyāmarattiṃ ṭhitakova dhammaṃ sutvā therassa,
atk-s0201a:2492_22: Dukkaraṃ te mahārāja, katanti. Nayidaṃ, bhante, dukkaraṃ,
atk-s0201a:2492_23: yadi pana me ayyassa dhammakathaṃ āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya ekapadepi aññavihitabhāvo ahosi,
atk-s0201a:2492_24: tambapaṇṇidīpassa patodayaṭṭhinitudanamattepi ṭhāne sāmibhāvo nāma me mā hotūti sapathamakāsi.
atk-s0201a:2493_20: kiṃ nu kho tassa sakuṇassa ākāse pakkhapasāraṇaṭṭhānaṃ bahu,
atk-s0201a:2493_21: avaseso ākāso appoti? Kiṃ, bhante, vadatha,
atk-s0201a:2493_30: Ayaṃ me duggatapaṇṇākāro imasmiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe imaṃ tiyojanasatikaṃ rajjaṃ ayyassa demāti. Tumhehi, mahārāja,
atk-s0201a:2493_32: mayaṃ pana amhākaṃ dinnaṃ rajjaṃ tumhākaṃyeva dema,
atk-s0201a:2497_2: Tattha pubbārāme migāramātupāsādeti pubbārāmasaṅkhāte vihāre migāramātuyā pāsāde.
atk-s0201a:2497_3: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbīkathāatīte satasahassakappamatthake ekā upāsikā padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā
atk-s0201a:2497_4: buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa satasahassaṃ dānaṃ datvā bhagavato pādamūle nipajjitvā,
atk-s0201a:2497_6: Sā kappasatasahassaṃ devesu ceva manussesu ca saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle bhaddiyanagare meṇḍakaseṭṭhiputtassa
atk-s0201a:2497_7: dhanañjayassa seṭṭhino gahe sumanadeviyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0201a:2497_10: tadā pañcahi dārikāsatehi saddhiṃ bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ katvā paṭhamadassanamhiyeva sotāpannā ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2497_11: Aparabhāge sāvatthiyaṃ migāraseṭṭhiputtassa puṇṇavaḍḍhanakumārassa gehaṃ gatā,
atk-s0201a:2498_0: Patikulaṃ gacchantiyā cassā pitā mahālatāpiḷandhanaṃ nāma kārāpesi.
atk-s0201a:2498_1: Tasmiṃ piḷandhane catasso vajiranāḷiyo upayogaṃ agamaṃsu,
atk-s0201a:2498_5: iti etehi ca aññehi ca sattavaṇṇehi ratanehi niṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:2498_6: Taṃ sīse paṭimukkaṃ yāva pādapiṭṭhiyā bhassati,
atk-s0201a:2498_7: pañcannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhārayamānāva naṃ itthī dhāretuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2498_8: Sā aparabhāge dasabalassa aggupaṭṭhāyikā hutvā taṃ pasādhanaṃ vissajjetvā navahi koṭīhi bhagavato vihāraṃ
atk-s0201a:2498_12: Sā “suddhapāsādova na sobhatī”ti taṃ parivāretvā pañca dvikūṭagehasatāni,
atk-s0201a:2499_0: Mātugāmattabhāve ṭhitāya visākhāya viya aññissā buddhasāsane dhanapariccāgo nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a:2499_1: purisattabhāve ṭhitassa ca anāthapiṇḍikassa viya aññassa buddhasāsane dhanapariccāgo nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:2499_2: So hi catupaññāsakoṭiyo vissajjetvā sāvatthiyā dakkhiṇabhāge anurādhapurassa mahāvihārasadise ṭhāne jetavanamahāvihāraṃ nāma kāresi. Visākhā,
atk-s0201a:2499_3: sāvatthiyā pācīnabhāge uttamadevīvihārasadise ṭhāne pubbārāmaṃ nāma kāresi.
atk-s0201a:2499_4: Bhagavā imesaṃ dvinnaṃ kulānaṃ anukampāya sāvatthiṃ nissāya viharanto imesu dvīsu vihāresu nibaddhavāsaṃ vasi.
atk-s0201a:2499_7: etasmiṃ pana samaye bhagavā pubbārāme viharati.
atk-s0201a:2500_2: Saṃkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimutto hotīti taṇhāsaṅkhaye nibbāne taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vimuttacittatāya taṇhāsaṅkhayavimutto
atk-s0201a:2500_5: taṃ me khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ saṃkhittena desethāti pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2500_14: Seṭṭho devamanussānanti devānañca manussānañca seṭṭho uttamo.
atk-s0201a:2500_16: khippametassa saṅkhepeneva paṭipattiṃ kathethāti bhagavantaṃ yācati.
atk-s0201a:2501_0: Ayaṃ kira uyyānakīḷaṃ āṇāpetvā catūhi mahārājūhi catūsu disāsu ārakkhaṃ gāhāpetvā dvīsu devalokesu devasaṅghena
atk-s0201a:2501_1: parivuto aḍḍhatiyāhi nāṭakakoṭīhi saddhiṃ erāvaṇaṃ āruyha uyyānadvāre ṭhito imaṃ pañhaṃ sallakkhesi –
atk-s0201a:2501_2: “kittakena nu kho taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttassa khīṇāsavassa saṅkhepato āgamaniyapubbabhāgapaṭipadā hotī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2501_5: sacāhaṃ imaṃ pañhaṃ anuggaṇhitvāva uyyānaṃ pavisissāmi,
atk-s0201a:2501_6: chadvārikehi ārammaṇehi nimmathito na puna imaṃ pañhaṃ sallakkhessāmi,
atk-s0201a:2501_8: satthu santikaṃ gantvā imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchitvā uggahitapañho uyyāne kīḷissāmī”ti hatthikkhandhe antarahito bhagavato santike pāturahosi.
atk-s0201a:2501_9: Tepi cattāro mahārājāno ārakkhaṃ gahetvā ṭhitaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhitā,
atk-s0201a:2501_10: paricārikadevasaṅghāpi nāṭakānipi erāvaṇopi nāgarājā tattheva uyyānadvāre aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0201a:2502_0: Sabbe dhammā nālaṃ abhinivesāyāti ettha sabbe dhammā nāma pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanāni aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo.
atk-s0201a:2502_1: Te sabbepi taṇhādiṭṭhivasena abhinivesāya nālaṃ na pariyattā na samatthā na yuttā, kasmā?
atk-s0201a:2502_3: Te hi niccāti gahitāpi aniccāva sampajjanti,
atk-s0201a:2502_7: Abhijānātīti aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti ñātapariññāya abhijānāti.
atk-s0201a:2502_9: Yaṃkiñci vedananti antamaso pañcaviññāṇasampayuttampi yaṃkiñci appamattakampi vedanaṃ anubhavati.
atk-s0201a:2502_10: Iminā bhagavā sakkassa devānamindassa vedanāvasena nibbattetvā arūpapariggahaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2502_11: Sace pana vedanākammaṭṭhānaṃ heṭṭhā na kathitaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0201a:2502_22: Tasmā “aniccānupassī viharatī”ti aniccato anupassanto viharatīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0201a:2503_0: Virāgānupassīti ettha dve virāgā khayavirāgo ca accantavirāgo ca.
atk-s0201a:2503_7: nirodhopi hi khayanirodho ca accantanirodho cāti duvidhoyeva.
atk-s0201a:2503_9: so ca pariccāgavossaggo pakkhandanavossaggoti duvidho hoti.
atk-s0201a:2503_11: sā hi tadaṅgavasena kilese ca khandhe ca vossajjati.
atk-s0201a:2503_13: so hi nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇato pakkhandati.
atk-s0201a:2503_17: Tasmā kilese ca khandhe ca pariccajatīti pariccāgavossaggo,
atk-s0201a:2503_18: nirodhe nibbānadhātuyā cittaṃ pakkhandatīti pakkhandanavossaggoti ubhayampetaṃ magge sameti.
atk-s0201a:2503_19: Tadubhayasamaṅgīpuggalo imāya paṭinissaggānupassanāya samannāgatattā paṭinissaggānupassī nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:2503_21: Na kiñci loke upādiyatīti kiñci ekampi saṅkhāragataṃ taṇhāvasena na upādiyati na gaṇhāti na parāmasati.
atk-s0201a:2503_22: Anupādiyaṃ na paritassatīti aggaṇhanto taṇhāparitassanāya na paritassati.
atk-s0201a:2503_25: Iti bhagavā sakkassa devānamindassa saṃkhittena khīṇāsavassa pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ pucchito sallahukaṃ katvā saṃkhitteneva khippaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0201a:2504_1: Avidūre nisinno hotīti anantare kūṭāgāre nisinno hoti.
atk-s0201a:2504_5: kiṃ nu kho esa jānitvā anumodi,
atk-s0201a:2504_8: Thero kira na bhagavato pañhavissajjanasaddaṃ assosi,
atk-s0201a:2504_11: Sakko kira devarājā mahatā saddena anumodi.
atk-s0201a:2504_12: Atha kasmā na bhagavato saddaṃ assosīti?
atk-s0201a:2504_14: Buddhānañhi dhammaṃ kathentānaṃ ekābaddhāya cakkavāḷapariyantāyapi parisāya saddo suyyati,
atk-s0201a:2504_15: pariyantaṃ pana muñcitvā aṅgulimattampi bahiddhā na niccharati. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a:2504_17: Tadā bhagavā migāramātupāsāde sattaratanamaye kūṭāgāre sirigabbhamhi nisinno hoti,
atk-s0201a:2504_21: tasmā thero na bhagavato saddaṃ assosi,
atk-s0201a:2505_0: Pañcahi tūriyasatehīti pañcaṅgikānaṃ tūriyānaṃ pañcahi satehi.
atk-s0201a:2505_1: Pañcaṅgikaṃ tūriyaṃ nāma ātataṃ vitataṃ ātatavitataṃ susiraṃ ghananti imehi pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0201a:2505_2: Tattha ātataṃ nāma cammapariyonaddhesu bheriādīsu ekatalatūriyaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2505_9: Paricāretīti taṃ sampattiṃ anubhavanto tato tato indriyāni cāreti.
atk-s0201a:2505_11: parivāretvā vajjamānehi pañcahi tūriyasatehi samannāgato hutvā dibbasampattiṃ anubhavatī.
atk-s0201a:2505_14: Yatheva hi idāni saddhā rājāno garubhāvaniyaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā –
atk-s0201a:2505_15: “asuko nāma ayyo āgacchati, mā, tātā, gāyatha,
atk-s0201a:2505_21: imaṃ pariyāyamakāsīti evarūpaṃ loke pakatiyā piyasamudāhāravacanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2505_22: lokiyā hi cirassaṃ āgatampi anāgatapubbampi manāpajātiyaṃ āgataṃ disvā, –
atk-s0201a:2505_25: kathaṃ te idhāgamanamaggo ñāto maggamūḷhosī”tiādīni vadanti.
atk-s0201a:2505_27: Thero hi kālena kālaṃ devacārikaṃ gacchatiyeva.
atk-s0201a:2505_29: Yadidaṃ idhāgamanāyāti yo ayaṃ idhāgamanāya vāro, taṃ, bhante,
atk-s0201a:2505_31: Idamāsanaṃ paññattanti yojanikaṃ maṇipallaṅkaṃ paññapāpetvā evamāha.
atk-s0201a:2506_1: Bahukiccā bahukaraṇīyāti ettha yesaṃ bahūni kiccāni,
atk-s0201a:2506_4: Appeva sakena karaṇīyenāti sakaraṇīyameva appaṃ mandaṃ, na bahu,
atk-s0201a:2506_6: pathavito paṭṭhāya hi kapparukkhamātugāmādīnaṃ atthāya aṭṭā sakkassa santike chijjanti,
atk-s0201a:2506_9: Devānañhi dhītā ca puttā ca aṅke nibbattanti,
atk-s0201a:2506_11: tāsaṃ maṇḍanapasādhanakārikā devadhītā sayanaṃ parivāretvā nibbattanti,
atk-s0201a:2506_15: te “mama santakā tava santakā”ti nicchetuṃ asakkontā aṭṭaṃ karonti,
atk-s0201a:2506_23: taṃ ubhinnaṃ kalahupacchedanatthaṃ attano santakaṃ karoti.
atk-s0201a:2507_0: Yaṃ no khippameva antaradhāyatīti yaṃ amhākaṃ sīghameva andhakāre rūpagataṃ viya na dissati. Iminā – “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0201a:2507_1: taṃ pañhavissajjanaṃ na sallakkhemī”ti dīpeti. Thero –
atk-s0201a:2507_2: “kasmā nu kho ayaṃ yakkho asallakkhaṇabhāvaṃ dīpeti,
atk-s0201a:2507_5: Chadvārikehi ārammaṇehi nimmathīyamānā attano bhuttābhuttabhāvampi pītāpītabhāvampi na jānanti,
atk-s0201a:2507_9: tasmā ‘idāneva loke aggapuggalassa santike pañhaṃ uggahetvā āgato,
atk-s0201a:2507_10: idāneva nāṭakānaṃ antaraṃ paviṭṭhoti evaṃ maṃ thero tajjeyyā’ti bhayena evamāhā”ti.
atk-s0201a:2507_12: na ariyasāvakassa evarūpaṃ kohaññaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0201a:2507_15: Thero tassa somanassasaṃvegaṃ janayitvā tamaṃ nīhari,
atk-s0201a:2508_0: Idāni sakko pubbe attano evaṃ bhūtakāraṇaṃ therassa ārocetuṃ bhūtapubbantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2508_5: Sakko kira anantare attabhāve magadharaṭṭhe macalagāme magho nāma māṇavo ahosi,
atk-s0201a:2508_9: Ekadivasaṃ attanova paññāya upaparikkhitvā gāmamajjhe mahājanassa sannipatitaṭṭhāne kacavaraṃ ubhayato apabbahitvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ atiramaṇīyamakāsi,
atk-s0201a:2508_12: Gāmato ca nikkhamitvā gāvutampi aḍḍhayojanampi tigāvutampi yojanampi vicaritvā tehi sahāyehi saddhiṃ visamaṃ samaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0201a:2508_13: Te sabbepi ekacchandā tattha tattha setuyuttaṭṭhānesu setuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2508_15: Magho satta vatapadāni pūretvā kāyassa bhedā saddhiṃ sahāyehi tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatti.
atk-s0201a:2509_1: Sabbe te devānaṃ samānāyukā samānavaṇṇā ca honti,
atk-s0201a:2509_2: te sakkaṃ saparisaṃ disvā adhunā nibbattā navakadevaputtā āgatāti mahāpānaṃ sajjayiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2509_4: “amhehi kusalaṃ karontehi na parehi saddhiṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0201a:2509_5: tumhe gaṇḍapānaṃ mā pivittha pītamattameva karothā”ti.
atk-s0201a:2509_7: Bālaasurā gaṇḍapānaṃ pivitvā mattā niddaṃ okkamiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2509_8: Sakko devānaṃ saññaṃ datvā te pādesu gāhāpetvā sinerupāde khipāpesi,
atk-s0201a:2509_16: Te gaṇhatha nanti vatvā sineruṃ pariharamānā deve vuṭṭhe vammikapādato vammikamakkhikā viya abhiruhiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2509_23: Tasmiṃ pana saṅgāme devānaṃ jayo ahosi,
atk-s0201a:2509_25: Sakko asure palāpetvā pañcasu ṭhānesu ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a:2509_26: Evaṃ ārakkhaṃ datvā vedikapāde vajirahatthā indapaṭimāyo ṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a:2509_27: Asurā kālena kālaṃ uṭṭhahitvā tā paṭimāyo disvā,
atk-s0201a:2510_1: Vessavaṇo ca mahārājāti so kira sakkassa vallabho,
atk-s0201a:2510_5: Pavisiṃsūti pavisitvā pana upaḍḍhapihitāni dvārāni katvā olokayamānā aṭṭhaṃsu. Idampi,
atk-s0201a:2510_11: rajatatthambhe maṇitthambhe pavāḷatthambhe lohitaṅgatthambhe masāragallatthambhe muttatthambhe sattaratanatthambhe,
atk-s0201a:2510_12: tesaṃyeva suvaṇṇādimaye ghaṭake vāḷarūpakāni ca passāti evaṃ thambhapantiyo ādiṃ katvā rāmaṇeyyakaṃ dassento evamāha.
atk-s0201a:2510_13: Yathā taṃ pubbekatapuññassāti yathā pubbe katapuññassa upabhogaṭṭhānena sobhitabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2510_15: Atibāḷhaṃ kho ayaṃ yakkho pamatto viharatīti attano pāsāde nāṭakaparivārena sampattiyā vasena ativiya matto.
atk-s0201a:2511_1: Āpokasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā pāsādapatiṭṭhitokāsaṃ udakaṃ hotūti iddhiṃ adhiṭṭhāya pāsādakaṇṇike pādaṅguṭṭhakena pahari.
atk-s0201a:2511_2: So pāsādo yathā nāma udakapiṭṭhe ṭhapitapattaṃ mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ aṅguliyā pahaṭaṃ aparāparaṃ kampati calati na santiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a:2511_4: thambhapiṭṭhasaṅghāṭakaṇṇikagopānasiādīni karakarāti saddaṃ muñcantāni patituṃ viya āraddhāni.
atk-s0201a:2511_8: aho abbhutanti evaṃ sañjātaacchariyaabbhutā ceva sañjātatuṭṭhino ca ahesuṃ uppannabalavasomanassā.
atk-s0201a:2511_11: kañcanabhittiyaṃ ṭhapitamaṇināgadantehi viya uddhaggehi lomehi ākiṇṇasarīranti attho.
atk-s0201a:2511_12: Lomahaṃso ca nāmesa somanassenapi hoti domanassenapi,
atk-s0201a:2511_14: Thero hi sakkassa somanassavegena saṃvejetuṃ taṃ pāṭihāriyamakāsi.
atk-s0201a:2512_1: mārisāti idānissa yasmā therena somanassasaṃvegaṃ janayitvā tamaṃ vinoditaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2512_5: tvaṃ kuhiṃ gatosīti vutte mayhaṃ satthu santikanti vadesi,
atk-s0201a:2512_10: Sabrahmacārī me esoti ettha kiñcāpi thero anagāriyo abhinīhārasampanno aggasāvako,
atk-s0201a:2512_14: Aho nūna te so bhagavā satthāti sabrahmacārī tāva te evaṃmahiddhiko,
atk-s0201a:2512_15: so pana te bhagavā satthā aho nūna mahiddhikoti satthu iddhipāṭihāriyadassane jātābhilāpā hutvā evamāhaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2517_2: Tattha diṭṭhigatanti alagaddūpamasutte laddhimattaṃ diṭṭhigatanti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2517_16: paralokato imaṃ lokaṃ sandhāvati saṃsaratī”ti sassatadassanaṃ uppannaṃ. Tenāha –
atk-s0201a:2518_3: vinā paccayaṃ natthi viññāṇassa sambhavo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2518_4: Tasmā ayaṃ bhikkhu buddhena akathitaṃ katheti,
atk-s0201a:2518_8: ariyapathe tiriyaṃ nipatitvā mahājanassa ahitāya dukkhāya paṭipanno.
atk-s0201a:2518_9: Yathā nāma rañño rajje mahācoro uppajjamāno mahājanassa ahitāya dukkhāya uppajjati,
atk-s0201a:2518_10: evaṃ jinasāsane coro hutvā mahājanassa ahitāya dukkhāya uppannoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2518_12: Tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti ayaṃ parisaṃ labhitvā sāsanampi antaradhāpeyya,
atk-s0201a:2518_14: tāvadeva naṃ diṭṭhigatā vivecemāti sutasutaṭṭhānatoyeva aṭṭhatvā anisīditvā upasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2519_1: Katamaṃ taṃ sāti viññāṇanti sāti yaṃ tvaṃ viññāṇaṃ sandhāya vadesi,
atk-s0201a:2519_3: vado vedeyyo tatra tatra kalyāṇapāpakānaṃ kammānaṃ vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedetīti, bhante,
atk-s0201a:2519_5: yo cāyaṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ kusalākusalakammānaṃ vipākaṃ paccanubhoti. Idaṃ, bhante, viññāṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2519_7: Kassa nu kho nāmāti kassa khattiyassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā vessasuddagahaṭṭhapabbajitadevamanussānaṃ vā aññatarassa.
atk-s0201a:2520_1: Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesīti kasmā āmantesi?
atk-s0201a:2520_4: na ca moghapurisoti vuttamatteneva maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo na hoti.
atk-s0201a:2520_6: ‘atilahuṃ kho tvaṃ moghapurisa bāhullāya āvatto’ti bhagavā moghapurisavādena ovadi.
atk-s0201a:2520_7: Thero aparabhāge ghaṭento vāyamanto cha abhiññā sacchākāsi.
atk-s0201a:2520_8: Ahampi tathārūpaṃ vīriyaṃ paggaṇhitvā maggaphalāni nibbattessāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2520_9: Athassa bhagavā chinnapaccayo ayaṃ sāsane aviruḷhadhammoti dassento bhikkhū āmantesi.
atk-s0201a:2520_11: Atha kho bhagavāti ayampi pāṭiyekko anusandhi.
atk-s0201a:2520_15: Na hi tathāgatā saupanissayasseva dhammaṃ desenti,
atk-s0201a:2520_17: Ahaṃ buddhassa santikā sugatovādaṃ labhitvā saggasampattūpagaṃ kusalaṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2520_20: tuyhaṃ ovādaṃ vā anusāsaniṃ vā demī”ti sugatovādaṃ paṭippassambhento imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a:2521_1: Idāni viññāṇassa sappaccayabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ yaṃ yadeva,
atk-s0201a:2521_3: Tattha manañca paṭicca dhamme cāti sahāvajjanena bhavaṅgamanañca tebhūmakadhamme ca paṭicca.
atk-s0201a:2521_7: Yathā hi kaṭṭhaṃ paṭicca jalamāno aggi upādānapaccaye satiyeva jalati,
atk-s0201a:2521_10: evameva cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppannaṃ viññāṇaṃ tasmiṃ dvāre cakkhurūpaālokamanasikārasaṅkhāte paccayamhi satiyeva uppajjati,
atk-s0201a:2521_14: Iti bhagavā nāhaṃ viññāṇappavatte dvārasaṅkantimattampi vadāmi,
atk-s0201a:2521_15: ayaṃ pana sāti moghapuriso bhavasaṅkantiṃ vadatīti sātiṃ niggahesi.
atk-s0201a:2522_1: Evaṃ viññāṇassa sappaccayabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni pana pañcannampi khandhānaṃ sappaccayabhāvaṃ dassento,
atk-s0201a:2522_3: Tattha bhūtamidanti idaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ nibbattaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2522_7: Tadāhārasambhavanti taṃ panetaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ āhārasambhavaṃ paccayasambhavaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2522_8: sati paccaye uppajjati evaṃ passathāti pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2522_10: Bhūtamidaṃ nossūti bhūtaṃ nu kho idaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2522_12: Tadāhārasambhavaṃ nossūti taṃ bhūtaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ paccayasambhavaṃ nu kho,
atk-s0201a:2522_15: Nirodhadhammaṃ nossūti taṃ dhammaṃ nirodhadhammaṃ nu kho,
atk-s0201a:2522_17: Sammappaññāya passatoti idaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ nibbattanti yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇato vipassanāpaññāya sammā passantassa.
atk-s0201a:2522_18: Paññāya sudiṭṭhanti vuttanayeneva vipassanāpaññāya suṭṭhu diṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2522_19: Evaṃ ye ye taṃ pucchaṃ sallakkhesuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2522_20: tesaṃ tesaṃ paṭiññaṃ gaṇhanto pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ sappaccayabhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2523_0: Idāni yāya paññāya tehi taṃ sappaccayaṃ sanirodhaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2523_1: tattha nittaṇhabhāvaṃ pucchanto imaṃ ce tumhetiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2523_7: Dhanāyethāti dhanaṃ viya icchantā gedhaṃ āpajjeyyātha.
atk-s0201a:2523_9: Nittharaṇatthāya no gahaṇatthāyāti yo so mayā caturoghanittharaṇatthāya kullūpamo dhammo desito,
atk-s0201a:2524_6: Yathā pana eko imaṃ jānāsīti vutto,
atk-s0201a:2524_9: mātu mātarampī”ti evaṃ paveṇivasena jānanto suṭṭhu jānāti nāma.
atk-s0201a:2524_10: Evamevaṃ bhagavā na kevalaṃ khandhamattameva jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2524_11: khandhānaṃ paccayampi tesampi paccayānaṃ paccayanti evaṃ sabbapaccayaparamparaṃ jānāti. So taṃ,
atk-s0201a:2524_12: buddhabalaṃ dīpento idāni paccayaparamparaṃ dassetuṃ, ime ca,
atk-s0201a:2524_18: dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotīti ettha pana paṭiccasamuppādakathā vitthāretabbā bhaveyya,
atk-s0201a:2525_1: Imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotīti imasmiṃ avijjādike paccaye sati idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2525_2: Imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatīti imassa avijjādikassa paccayassa uppādā idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0201a:2525_6: Evaṃ vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni vivaṭṭaṃ dassento,
atk-s0201a:2525_8: Tattha avijjāya tvevāti avijjāya eva tu.
atk-s0201a:2525_11: evaṃ niruddhānaṃ pana saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhā viññāṇanirodho hoti,
atk-s0201a:2525_12: viññāṇādīnañca nirodhā nāmarūpādīni niruddhāniyeva hontīti dassetuṃ saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodhotiādiṃ
atk-s0201a:2525_13: vatvā evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2527_1: Evaṃ vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathetvā idāni imaṃ dvādasaṅgapaccayavaṭṭaṃ saha vipassanāya maggena jānantassa yā paṭidhāvanā pahīyati,
atk-s0201a:2527_2: tassā abhāvaṃ pucchanto api nu tumhe,
atk-s0201a:2527_4: Tattha evaṃ jānantāti evaṃ sahavipassanāya maggena jānantā.
atk-s0201a:2528_3: evaṃ jānantā evaṃ passantā evaṃ vadeyyātha,
atk-s0201a:2528_7: Aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddiseyyāthāti ayaṃ satthā amhākaṃ kiccaṃ sādhetuṃ na sakkotīti api nu evaṃsaññino hutvā aññaṃ bāhirakaṃ satthāraṃ uddiseyyātha.
atk-s0201a:2528_8: Puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇānanti evaṃsaññino hutvā puthūnaṃ titthiyasamaṇānaṃ ceva brāhmaṇānañca.
atk-s0201a:2528_9: Vatakotūhalamaṅgalānīti vatasamādānāni ca diṭṭhikutūhalāni ca diṭṭhasutamutamaṅgalāni ca.
atk-s0201a:2528_10: Tāni sārato paccāgaccheyyāthāti etāni sāranti evaṃsaññino hutvā paṭiāgaccheyyātha.
atk-s0201a:2528_11: Evaṃ nissaṭṭhāni ca puna gaṇheyyāthāti attho.
atk-s0201a:2528_14: Sāmaṃ viditanti sayaṃ vibhāvitaṃ pākaṭaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0201a:2528_17: tumhe iminā sandiṭṭhikādisabhāvena dhammena nibbānaṃ upanītā,
atk-s0201a:2528_20: Idametaṃ paṭicca vuttanti etaṃ vacanamidaṃ tumhehi sāmaṃ ñātādibhāvaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2529_3: Nanu heṭṭhā vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena desanā matthakaṃ pāpitāti?
atk-s0201a:2529_7: tassa sammohaṭṭhānaṃ viddhaṃsetvā pākaṭaṃ karissāmī”ti imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a:2529_10: iti vaṭṭamūlaṃ avijjaṃ vivaṭṭamūlañca buddhuppādaṃ dassetvāpi,
atk-s0201a:2529_11: “puna ekavāraṃ vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena desanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpessāmī”ti imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a:2529_15: Katthaci hi gabbhoti mātukucchi vutto. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a:2531_0: Abbhuṭṭhitova so yāti, sa gacchaṃ na nivattatī”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:2532_3: aññā itthikā nava vā dasa vā māse gabbhaṃ kucchinā pariharitvā vijāyantī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2533_1: Mātā ca utunī hotīti idaṃ utusamayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2533_2: Mātugāmassa kira yasmiṃ okāse dārako nibbattati,
atk-s0201a:2533_3: tattha mahatī lohitapīḷakā saṇṭhahitvā bhijjitvā paggharati,
atk-s0201a:2533_5: suddhe vatthumhi mātāpitūsu ekavāraṃ sannipatitesu yāva satta divasāni khettameva hoti.
atk-s0201a:2533_6: Tasmiṃ samaye hatthaggāhaveṇiggāhādinā aṅgaparāmasanenapi dārako nibbattatiyeva.
atk-s0201a:2533_8: Paccupaṭṭhito hotīti na mātāpitūnaṃ sannipātaṃ olokayamāno samīpe ṭhito paccupaṭṭhito nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:2533_9: Kammayantayantito pana eko satto tasmiṃ okāse nibbattanako hotīti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0201a:2533_10: Saṃsayenāti “arogo nu kho bhavissāmi ahaṃ vā,
atk-s0201a:2533_11: putto vā me”ti evaṃ mahantena jīvitasaṃsayena.
atk-s0201a:2533_13: bhikkhaveti tadā kira mātulohitaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ sampattaṃ puttasinehena paṇḍaraṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2533_18: ākāse vā daṇḍakaṃ gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ vā sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā heṭṭhupariyabhāvena parivattanakīḷananti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2533_19: Ciṅgulakaṃ vuccati tālapaṇṇādīhi kataṃ vātappahārena paribbhamanacakkaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2534_6: Yatthassa te pāpakāti yassaṃ phalasamāpattiyaṃ ete nirujjhanti,
atk-s0201a:2534_11: Ajjhosāya tiṭṭhatīti taṇhāajjhosānagahaṇena gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a:2534_14: “Ahaṃ dukkhito mama dukkha”nti gaṇhanto abhinandati nāma.
atk-s0201a:2534_16: Tadupādānanti sāva taṇhā gahaṇaṭṭhena upādānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2534_19: idañhi bhagavatā puna ekavāraṃ dvisandhi tisaṅkhepaṃ paccayākāravaṭṭaṃ dassitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2535_4: Tattha appamāṇacetasoti appamāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ ceto assāti appamāṇacetaso,
atk-s0201a:2535_11: taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttidesanaṃ tumhe niccakālaṃ dhāreyyātha mā pamajjeyyātha.
atk-s0201a:2535_12: Desanā hi ettha vimuttipaṭilābhahetuto vimuttīti vuttā.
atk-s0201a:2535_15: iti imasmiṃ mahātaṇhājāle taṇhāsaṅghāṭe ca imaṃ sātiṃ bhikkhuṃ kevaṭṭaputtaṃ paṭimukkaṃ dhāretha.
atk-s0201a:2539_2: Tattha aṅgesūti aṅgā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā,
atk-s0201a:2539_3: tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīsaddena “aṅgā”ti vuccati,
atk-s0201a:2539_5: Assapuraṃ nāma aṅgānaṃ nigamoti assapuranti nagaranāmena laddhavohāro aṅgānaṃ janapadassa eko nigamo,
atk-s0201a:2540_1: Tasmiṃ kira nigame manussā saddhā pasannā buddhamāmakā dhammamāmakā saṅghamāmakā,
atk-s0201a:2540_3: pubbaṇhasamayaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ piṇḍāya pavisantaṃ disvā bījanaṅgalādīni gahetvā khettaṃ gacchantāpi,
atk-s0201a:2540_4: pharasuādīni gahetvā araññaṃ pavisantāpi tāni upakaraṇāni nikkhipitvā bhikkhusaṅghassa nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2540_5: āsanasālaṃ vā maṇḍapaṃ vā rukkhamūlaṃ vā sammajjitvā āsanāni paññapetvā arajapānīyaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0201a:2540_6: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā yāgukhajjakādīni datvā katabhattakiccaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ uyyojetvā tato tāni
atk-s0201a:2540_7: upakaraṇāni ādāya khettaṃ vā araññaṃ vā gantvā attano kammāni karonti,
atk-s0201a:2540_8: kammantaṭṭhānepi nesaṃ aññā kathā nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:2540_9: Cattāro maggaṭṭhā cattāro phalaṭṭhāti aṭṭha puggalā ariyasaṅgho nāma;
atk-s0201a:2540_12: evarūpāya paṭipattiyā samannāgatā lajjino pesalā uḷāraguṇā”ti bhikkhusaṅghasseva vaṇṇaṃ kathenti.
atk-s0201a:2540_14: sayanigharaṃ pavisitvā nisinnāpi bhikkhusaṅghasseva vaṇṇaṃ kathenti.
atk-s0201a:2540_15: Bhagavā tesaṃ manussānaṃ nipaccakāraṃ disvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ piṇḍapātāpacāyane niyojetvā etadavoca.
atk-s0201a:2541_0: Ye dhammā samaṇakaraṇā ca brāhmaṇakaraṇā cāti ye dhammā samādāya paripūritā samitapāpasamaṇañca bāhitapāpabrāhmaṇañca karontīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2541_7: adhipaññāsikkhāsamādāna”nti ettha pana samaṇena kattabbadhammā vuttā.
atk-s0201a:2541_10: Evaṃ no ayaṃ amhākanti ettha noti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2541_24: Iti bhagavā iminā ettakena ṭhānena hirottappādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathesi. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a:2541_26: Sace hi koci acirapabbajito bālabhikkhu evaṃ vadeyya –
atk-s0201a:2541_28: ko nu kho tesaṃ samādāya vattane ānisaṃso”ti?
atk-s0201a:2541_31: ime hi dhammā samādāya paripūritā samitapāpasamaṇaṃ nāma bāhitapāpabrāhmaṇaṃ nāma karonti,
atk-s0201a:2541_34: pabbajjaṃ avañjhaṃ saphalaṃ saudrayaṃ karontīti vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0201a:2541_36: Vitthārato pana vaṇṇakathā satipaṭṭhāne vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:2542_2: ottappati ottappitabbenā”ti evaṃ vitthāritāya hiriyā ceva ottappena ca.
atk-s0201a:2542_10: Apica ime dve dhammā lokaṃ pālanato lokapāladhammā nāmāti kathitā. Yathāha – “dveme,
atk-s0201a:2542_19: dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ na pāleyyuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2545_0: Mahācundattherassa pana kilesasallekhanapaṭipadāti katvā dassitā. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a:2545_9: tibbaṃ me hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ bhavissati theresu navesu majjhimesūti.
atk-s0201a:2546_0: Yasmā pana ettāvatā sāmaññattho matthakaṃ patto nāma hoti,
atk-s0201a:2546_1: tasmā aparepi samaṇakaraṇadhamme dassetuṃ siyā kho pana,
atk-s0201a:2546_22: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne maggampi phalampi ekato katvā sāmaññattho kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2547_1: Parisuddho no kāyasamācāroti ettha kāyasamācāro parisuddho aparisuddhoti duvidho.
atk-s0201a:2547_2: Yo hi bhikkhu pāṇaṃ hanati adinnaṃ ādiyati,
atk-s0201a:2547_6: Yo pana pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā paraṃ potheti viheṭheti,
atk-s0201a:2547_9: Imasmiṃ sutte ubhayampetaṃ akathetvā paramasallekho nāma kathito.
atk-s0201a:2547_10: Yo hi bhikkhu pānīyaghaṭe vā pānīyaṃ pivantānaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2547_11: patte vā bhattaṃ bhuñjantānaṃ kākānaṃ nivāraṇavasena hatthaṃ vā daṇḍaṃ vā leḍḍuṃ vā uggirati,
atk-s0201a:2547_17: Na ca chiddavāti sadā ekasadiso antarantare chiddarahito.
atk-s0201a:2548_7: Yo pana gahapatikāti vā dāsāti vā pessāti vā ādīhi khuṃsento vadati,
atk-s0201a:2548_10: Imasmiṃ sutte ubhayampetaṃ akathetvā paramasallekho nāma kathito.
atk-s0201a:2548_11: Yo hi bhikkhu daharena vā sāmaṇerena vā, “kacci, bhante,
atk-s0201a:2548_15: upajjhāyo te vikkāyikasākabhaṇḍikaṃ ukkhipitvā gato bhavissatī”tiādinā nayena hasādhippāyopi evarūpaṃ kathaṃ katheti,
atk-s0201a:2549_1: Manosamācāre yo bhikkhu abhijjhālu byāpannacitto micchādiṭṭhiko hoti,
atk-s0201a:2549_7: Imasmiṃ sutte ubhayampetaṃ akathetvā paramasallekho nāma kathito.
atk-s0201a:2549_8: Yo pana bhikkhu kāmavitakkaṃ vā byāpādavitakkaṃ vā vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ vā vitakketi,
atk-s0201a:2550_1: Ājīvasmiṃ yo bhikkhu ājīvahetu vejjakammaṃ pahiṇagamanaṃ gaṇḍaphālanaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a:2550_7: Imasmiṃ sutte ubhayampetaṃ akathetvā paramasallekho nāma kathito.
atk-s0201a:2550_9: “sve vā punadivase vā bhavissatī”ti sannidhikārakaṃ paribhuñjati,
atk-s0201a:2550_10: yo vā pana nimbaṅkurādīni disvā sāmaṇere vadati –
atk-s0201a:2550_12: sāmaṇerā thero khāditukāmoti kappiyaṃ katvā denti,
atk-s0201a:2550_13: dahare pana sāmaṇere vā pānīyaṃ pivatha,
atk-s0201a:2550_15: te thero pānīyaṃ pivitukāmoti pānīyasaṅkhaṃ dhovitvā denti,
atk-s0201a:2550_16: tampi paribhuñjantassa ājīvo aparisuddho nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:2552_1: Jāgariyamanuyuttāti rattindivaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā ekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse niddāya okāsaṃ datvā pañca koṭṭhāse jāgariyamhi yuttā payuttā.
atk-s0201a:2552_8: kāmabhogī sattā vāmena passena sentī”ti ayaṃ kāmabhogiseyyā,
atk-s0201a:2552_9: tesu hi yebhuyyena dakkhiṇapassena sayāno nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:2553_3: petā hi appamaṃsalohitattā aṭṭhisaṅghātajaṭitā ekena passena sayituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0201a:2554_2: sīho migarājā naṅguṭṭhaṃ antarasatthimhi anupakkhipitvā dakkhiṇena passena setī”ti ayaṃ sīhaseyyā.
atk-s0201a:2554_3: Tejussadattā hi sīho migarājā dve purimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhāne pacchimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhapetvā naṅguṭṭhaṃ antarasatthimhi
atk-s0201a:2554_4: pakkhipitvā purimapādapacchimapādanaṅguṭṭhānaṃ ṭhitokāsaṃ sallakkhetvā dvinnaṃ purimapādānaṃ matthake
atk-s0201a:2554_6: Divasampi sayitvā pabujjhamāno na utrāsanto pabujjhati.
atk-s0201a:2554_7: Sīsaṃ pana ukkhipitvā purimapādānaṃ ṭhitokāsaṃ sallakkheti.
atk-s0201a:2554_8: Sace kiñci ṭhānaṃ vijahitvā ṭhitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2554_10: na sūrabhāvassa ca anurūpa”nti anattamano hutvā tattheva sayati,
atk-s0201a:2554_12: Avijahitvā ṭhite pana “tuyhaṃ jātiyā sūrabhāvassa ca anurūpamida”nti haṭṭhatuṭṭho uṭṭhāya sīhavijambhitaṃ
atk-s0201a:2554_13: vijambhitvā kesarabhāraṃ vidhunitvā tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā gocarāya pakkamati.
atk-s0201a:2554_20: jāṇunā vā jāṇumhi saṅghaṭṭiyamāne abhiṇhaṃ vedanā uppajjati,
atk-s0201a:2556_3: Tattha iṇaṃ ādāyāti vaḍḍhiyā dhanaṃ gahetvā.
atk-s0201a:2556_5: Yathā tesaṃ kākaṇikamattopi pariyanto nāma nāvasissati,
atk-s0201a:2556_9: So hi aṇaṇomhīti āvajjanto balavapāmojjaṃ labhati,
atk-s0201a:2557_0: Visabhāgavedanuppattiyā kakaceneva catuiriyāpathaṃ chindanto ābādhatīti ābādho,
atk-s0201a:2557_8: tassa hi arogomhīti āvajjayato tadubhayaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2557_12: Na cassa kiñci bhogānaṃ vayoti kākaṇikamattampi bhogānaṃ vayo na bhaveyya.
atk-s0201a:2557_16: attano ruciyā kiñci kātuṃ na labhati.
atk-s0201a:2557_19: Na yena kāmaṃ gamoti yena disābhāgenassa kāmo hoti.
atk-s0201a:2558_0: Ime pañca nīvaraṇe appahīneti ettha bhagavā appahīnaṃ kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ iṇasadisaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2558_3: yo hi paresaṃ iṇaṃ gahetvā vināseti.
atk-s0201a:2558_4: So tehi iṇaṃ dehīti vuccamānopi pharusaṃ vuccamānopi bajjhamānopi pahariyamānopi kiñci paṭibāhituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:2558_9: so tena pharusaṃ vuccamānopi bajjhamānopi pahariyamānopi sabbaṃ titikkhati.
atk-s0201a:2558_10: Titikkhakāraṇañhissa so kāmacchando hoti gharasāmikehi vadhīyamānānaṃ itthīnaṃ viyāti.
atk-s0201a:2559_0: Yathā pana pittarogāturo madhusakkarādīsupi dinnesu pittarogāturatāya tesaṃ rasaṃ na vindati,
atk-s0201a:2559_2: Evamevaṃ byāpannacitto hitakāmehi ācariyupajjhāyehi appamattakampi ovadīyamāno ovādaṃ na gaṇhāti,
atk-s0201a:2559_3: “ati viya me tumhe upaddavethā”tiādīni vatvā vibbhamati.
atk-s0201a:2560_0: Yathā pana nakkhattadivase bandhanāgāre baddho puriso nakkhattassa neva ādiṃ,
atk-s0201a:2560_6: aho gīta”ntiādīni sutvāpi paṭivacanaṃ na deti.
atk-s0201a:2560_9: Evamevaṃ thinamiddhābhibhūto bhikkhu vicittanayepi dhammassavane pavattamāne neva tassa ādiṃ,
atk-s0201a:2560_15: aho upamā”ti dhammassavanassa vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇamānānaṃ sutvāpi paṭivacanaṃ na deti.
atk-s0201a:2561_4: hatthapādaṃ vā te chindāmi kaṇṇanāsaṃ vā”ti vutto sīghaṃ gacchatiyeva,
atk-s0201a:2561_5: nakkhattassa ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ anubhavituṃ na labhati. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a:2561_7: Evamevaṃ vinaye appakataññunā vivekatthāya araññaṃ paviṭṭhenāpi kismiñcideva antamaso kappiyamaṃsepi
atk-s0201a:2561_8: akappiyamaṃsasaññāya uppannāya vivekaṃ pahāya sīlavisodhanatthaṃ vinayadharassa santike gantabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2562_0: Yathā pana kantāraddhānamaggapaṭipanno puriso corehi manussānaṃ viluttokāsaṃ pahatokāsañca disvā daṇḍakasaddenapi
atk-s0201a:2562_6: So kicchena kasirena khemantabhūmiṃ pāpuṇāti vā,
atk-s0201a:2562_8: Evamevaṃ yassa aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vicikicchā uppannā hoti.
atk-s0201a:2562_10: na nu kho buddho”tiādinā nayena vicikicchanto adhimuccitvā saddhāya gaṇhituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2562_11: Asakkonto maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā na pāpuṇātīti yathā kantāraddhānamagge “corā atthi natthī”ti punappunaṃ
atk-s0201a:2562_12: āsappanaparisappanaṃ apariyogāhanaṃ chambhitatta cittassa uppādento khemantapattiyā antarāyaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a:2562_13: evaṃ vicikicchāpi “buddho nu kho na buddho”tiādinā nayena punappunaṃ āsappanaparisappanaṃ apariyogāhanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2562_14: chambhitattaṃ cittassa uppādayamānā ariyabhūmippattiyā antarāyaṃ karotīti kantāraddhānamaggo viya daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0201a:2563_5: yathā hi puriso iṇaṃ ādāya kammante payojetvā samiddhakammanto,
atk-s0201a:2563_6: “idaṃ iṇaṃ nāma palibodhamūla”nti cintetvā savaḍḍhikaṃ iṇaṃ niyyātetvā paṇṇaṃ phālāpeyya.
atk-s0201a:2563_7: Athassa tato paṭṭhāya neva koci dūtaṃ peseti,
atk-s0201a:2563_14: “ayaṃ kāmacchando nāma palibodhamūla”nti satipaṭṭhāne vuttanayeneva cha dhamme bhāvetvā kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ pajahati.
atk-s0201a:2563_15: Tassevaṃ pahīnakāmacchandassa yathā iṇamuttassa purisassa iṇasāmike disvā neva bhayaṃ na chambhitattaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2563_16: Evameva paravatthumhi neva saṅgo na bandho hoti.
atk-s0201a:2563_17: Dibbānipi rūpāni passato kileso na samudācarati.
atk-s0201a:2564_0: Yathā pana so pittarogāturo puriso bhesajjakiriyāya taṃ rogaṃ vūpasametvā tato paṭṭhāya madhusakkarādīnaṃ rasaṃ vindati.
atk-s0201a:2564_2: “ayaṃ byāpādo nāma anatthakārako”ti cha dhamme bhāvetvā byāpādanīvaraṇaṃ pajahati.
atk-s0201a:2564_3: So evaṃ pahīnabyāpādo yathā pittarogavimutto puriso madhusakkarādīni madhurāni sampiyāyamāno paṭisevati.
atk-s0201a:2564_4: Evamevaṃ ācārapaṇṇattiādīni sikkhāpiyamāno sirasā sampaṭicchitvā sampiyāyamāno sikkhati.
atk-s0201a:2565_0: Yathā so nakkhattadivase bandhanāgāraṃ pavesito puriso aparasmiṃ nakkhattadivase,
atk-s0201a:2565_1: “pubbepi ahaṃ pamādadosena baddho taṃ nakkhattaṃ nānubhavāmi,
atk-s0201a:2565_2: idāni appamatto bhavissāmī”ti yathāssa paccatthikā okāsaṃ na labhanti.
atk-s0201a:2565_6: “idaṃ thinamiddhaṃ nāma mahāanatthakara”nti cha dhamme bhāvetvā thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ pajahati.
atk-s0201a:2565_7: So evaṃ pahīnathinamiddho yathā bandhanā mutto puriso sattāhampi nakkhattassa ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ anubhavati.
atk-s0201a:2565_8: Evamevaṃ bhikkhu dhammanakkhattassa ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ anubhavanto saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0201a:2566_0: Yathā pana dāso kañcideva mittaṃ upanissāya sāmikānaṃ dhanaṃ datvā attānaṃ bhujissaṃ katvā tato paṭṭhāya yaṃ icchati,
atk-s0201a:2566_3: “idaṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ nāma mahāanatthakara”nti cha dhamme bhāvetvā uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pajahati.
atk-s0201a:2566_4: So evaṃ pahīnuddhaccakukkucco yathā bhujisso puriso yaṃ icchati,
atk-s0201a:2566_6: Na taṃ koci balakkārena tato nivatteti.
atk-s0201a:2566_8: na naṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ balakkārena tato nivatteti.
atk-s0201a:2567_0: Yathā balavā puriso hatthasāraṃ gahetvā sajjāvudho saparivāro kantāraṃ paṭipajjeyya.
atk-s0201a:2567_2: So sotthinā taṃ kantāraṃ nittharitvā khemantaṃ patto haṭṭhatuṭṭho assa.
atk-s0201a:2567_4: “ayaṃ vicikicchā nāma anatthakārikā”ti cha dhamme bhāvetvā vicikicchaṃ pajahati.
atk-s0201a:2567_5: So evaṃ pahīnavicikiccho yathā balavā sajjāvudho saparivāro puriso nibbhayo core tiṇaṃ viya agaṇetvā sotthinā nikkhamitvā khemantabhūmiṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0201a:2567_6: Evamevaṃ duccaritakantāraṃ nittharitvā paramakhemantabhūmiṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0201a:2568_7: Sabbāvato kāyassāti assa bhikkhuno sabbakoṭṭhāsavato kāyassa.
atk-s0201a:2568_8: Kiñci upādinnakasantatipavattiṭṭhāne chavimaṃsalohitānugataṃ aṇumattampi ṭhānaṃ paṭhamajjhānasukhena aphuṭṭhaṃ nāma na hoti.
atk-s0201a:2568_9: Dakkhoti cheko paṭibalo nhānīyacuṇṇāni kātuñceva yojetuñca sannetuñca.
atk-s0201a:2568_15: Sanneyyāti vāmahatthena kaṃsathālaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇena hatthena pamāṇayuttaṃ udakaṃ siñcitvā siñcitvā parimaddanto piṇḍaṃ kareyya.
atk-s0201a:2568_18: Santarabāhirāti saddhiṃ antopadesena ceva bahipadesena ca,
atk-s0201a:2568_20: Na ca pagghariṇīti na bindu bindu udakaṃ paggharati,
atk-s0201a:2568_21: sakkā hoti hatthenapi dvīhipi tīhipi aṅgulīhi gahetuṃ ovaṭṭikampi kātunti attho.
atk-s0201a:2569_11: Sītā vāridhārā ubbhijjitvāti sītaṃ vāri taṃ udakarahadaṃ pūrayamānaṃ ubbhijjitvā.
atk-s0201a:2569_12: Heṭṭhā uggacchanaudakañhi uggantvā uggantvā bhijjantaṃ udakaṃ khobheti.
atk-s0201a:2569_13: Catūhi disāhi pavisanaudakaṃ purāṇapaṇṇatiṇakaṭṭhadaṇḍakādīhi udakaṃ khobheti.
atk-s0201a:2569_15: Sannisinnameva pana hutvā iddhinimmitamiva uppajjamānaṃ udakaṃ imaṃ padesaṃ pharati,
atk-s0201a:2570_3: Ettha ca setarattanīlesu yaṃkiñci uppalaṃ uppalameva,
atk-s0201a:2570_9: Antonimuggaposīnīti udakatalassa anto nimuggāniyeva hutvā posīni,
atk-s0201a:2571_1: Catutthajjhānasukhaupamāyaṃ parisuddhena cetasā pariyodātenāti ettha nirupakkilesaṭṭhena parisuddhaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2571_6: Imissā hi upamāya vatthaṃ viya karajakāyo.
atk-s0201a:2571_8: Tasmā yathā sunhātassa purisassa parisuddhaṃ vatthaṃ sasīsaṃ pārupitvā nisinnassa sarīrato utu sabbameva vatthaṃ pharati,
atk-s0201a:2571_10: Evaṃ catutthajjhānasukhena bhikkhuno karajakāyassa na koci okāso aphuṭo hotīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:2571_13: Yathā hi katthaci odātavatthe kāyaṃ apphusantepi taṃsamuṭṭhānena utunā sabbatthakameva kāyo phuṭṭho hoti.
atk-s0201a:2571_14: Evaṃ catutthajjhānasamuṭṭhitena sukhumarūpena sabbatthakameva bhikkhuno karajakāyo phuṭo hotīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:2572_1: Pubbenivāsañāṇaupamāyaṃ taṃdivasaṃ katakiriyā pākaṭā hotīti taṃdivasaṃ gatagāmattayameva gahitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2572_2: Tattha gāmattayaṃ gatapuriso viya pubbenivāsañāṇalābhī daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:2572_3: Tayo gāmā viya tayo bhavā daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0201a:2572_4: Tassa purisassa tīsu gāmesu taṃdivasaṃ katakiriyāya āvibhāvo viya pubbenivāsāya cittaṃ abhinīharitvā
atk-s0201a:2572_5: nisinnassa bhikkhuno tīsu bhavesu katakiriyāya āvibhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:2573_5: ito pana gehā nikkhamitvā etaṃ gehaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2573_6: etasmā vā nikkhamitvā imaṃ gehaṃ pavisanavasenapi daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0201a:2573_7: Tattha dve agārā sadvārā viya cutipaṭisandhiyo,
atk-s0201a:2573_9: cakkhumato purisassa dvinnaṃ gehānaṃ antare ṭhatvā passato dve agāre pavisanakanikkhamanakapurisānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2573_10: pākaṭakālo viya dibbacakkhulābhino ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā olokentassa cavanakaupapajjanakasattānaṃ pākaṭakālo.
atk-s0201a:2574_8: Yathā pana antarantarā ṭhitāsupi nisinnāsupi vijjamānāsupi,
atk-s0201a:2574_9: “etā gāvo carantī”ti carantiyo upādāya itarāpi carantīti vuccanti.
atk-s0201a:2574_10: Evaṃ tiṭṭhantameva sakkharakathalaṃ upādāya itarampi dvayaṃ tiṭṭhantanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2574_11: Itarañca dvayaṃ carantaṃ upādāya sakkharakathalampi carantanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2574_12: Tattha cakkhumato purisassa tīre ṭhatvā passato sippisambukādīnaṃ vibhūtakālo viya āsavānaṃ khayāya cittaṃ
atk-s0201a:2574_13: nīharitvā nisinnassa bhikkhuno catunnaṃ saccānaṃ vibhūtakālo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:2575_1: Idāni sattahākārehi saliṅgato saguṇato khīṇāsavassa nāmaṃ gaṇhanto,
atk-s0201a:2575_13: Catumaggañāṇasaṅkhātehi vedehi akusaladhammānaṃ gatattā vedagū hoti,
atk-s0201a:2580_1: Samaṇamalānantiādīsu ete dhammā uppajjamānā samaṇe maline karonti malaggahite,
atk-s0201a:2580_6: Ete uppajjitvā samaṇe kasaṭe niroje karonti milāpenti,
atk-s0201a:2580_10: Matajaṃ nāmāti manussā tikhiṇaṃ ayaṃ ayena sughaṃsitvā taṃ ayacuṇṇaṃ maṃsena saddhiṃ madditvā koñcasakuṇe khādāpenti.
atk-s0201a:2580_14: Atha tesaṃ kucchiṃ phāletvā naṃ udakena dhovitvā cuṇṇaṃ gahetvā maṃsena saddhiṃ madditvā puna khādāpentīti
atk-s0201a:2580_15: evaṃ satta vāre khādāpetvā gahitena ayacuṇṇena āvudhaṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a:2580_16: Susikkhitā ca naṃ ayakārā bahuhatthakammamūlaṃ labhitvā karonti.
atk-s0201a:2581_6: Pariyāyabhattikassāti māsavārena vā aḍḍhamāsavārena vā bhuñjantassa.
atk-s0201a:2581_8: Imasmiñhi sāsane cīvaradharo bhikkhu saṅghāṭikoti na vuccati.
atk-s0201a:2581_16: Saṅghāṭikaṃ kareyyunti saṅghāṭikaṃ vatthaṃ nivāsetvā ca pārupitvā ca saṅghāṭikaṃ kareyyuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2582_4: Pamuditassa pītīti tuṭṭhassa sakalasarīraṃ khobhayamānā pīti jāyati.
atk-s0201a:2582_7: Sukhaṃ vedetīti kāyikampi cetasikampi sukhaṃ vediyati.
atk-s0201a:2582_8: Cittaṃ samādhiyatīti iminā nekkhammasukhena sukhitassa cittaṃ samādhiyati,
atk-s0201a:2582_10: So mettāsahagatena cetasāti heṭṭhā kilesavasena āraddhā desanā pabbate vuṭṭhavuṭṭhi viya nadiṃ yathānusandhinā brahmavihārabhāvanaṃ otiṇṇā.
atk-s0201a:2582_17: Āsavānaṃ khayā samaṇo hotīti sabbakilesānaṃ samitattā paramatthasamaṇo hotīti.
atk-s0201a:2590_2: Tattha kosalesūti kosalā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā.
atk-s0201a:2590_3: Tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīsaddena kosalāti vuccati,
atk-s0201a:2590_6: yasmā pubbe mahāpanādaṃ rājakumāraṃ nānānāṭakāni disvā sitamattampi akarontaṃ sutvā rājā āha –
atk-s0201a:2590_9: Tato naṅgalānipi chaḍḍetvā mahājanakāye sannipatite manussā sātirekāni sattavassāni nānākīḷikāyo dassetvā naṃ hasāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2590_12: Atha te manussā attano attano vasanokāsābhimukhā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2590_13: Te paṭipathe mittasuhajjādayo disvā paṭisanthāraṃ karontā, “kacci, bho, kusalaṃ, kacci, bho,
atk-s0201a:2590_15: Tasmā taṃ “kusalaṃ kusala”nti vacanaṃ upādāya so padeso kosalāti vuccatīti.
atk-s0201a:2591_1: Mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhinti sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā satasahassaṃ vāti evaṃ aparicchinnena mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ.
atk-s0201a:2591_2: Brāhmaṇagāmoti brāhmaṇānaṃ samosaraṇagāmopi brāhmaṇagāmoti vuccati brāhmaṇānaṃ bhogagāmopi.
atk-s0201a:2591_7: tasmā tassa avidūre buddhānaṃ anucchaviko eko vanasaṇḍo bhavissati,
atk-s0201a:2591_13: na nesaṃ koci savanantarāyo ahosīti ayamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2592_12: Kenaci pārijuññena anabhibhūto aparikkhīṇaṃyeva taṃ kulaṃ pahāya saddhāpabbajitoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2592_15: tassa kho pana bhoto gotamassāti attho.
atk-s0201a:2592_20: Abbhuggatoti sadevakaṃ lokaṃ ajjhottharitvā uggato. Kinti?
atk-s0201a:2593_4: Iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2593_8: pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvāti imehi tāva kāraṇehi so bhagavā arahanti veditabbotiādinā nayena mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā
atk-s0201a:2593_9: sabbāneva etāni padāni visuddhimagge buddhānussatiniddese vitthāritānīti tato tesaṃ vitthāro gahetabbo.
atk-s0201a:2594_0: Sādhu kho panāti sundaraṃ kho pana;
atk-s0201a:2594_2: Tathārūpānaṃ arahatanti yathārūpo so bhavaṃ gotamo,
atk-s0201a:2594_3: evarūpānaṃ anekehipi kappakoṭisatasahassehi dullabhadassanānaṃ byāmappabhāparikkhittehi asītianubyañjanaratanapaṭimaṇḍitehi
atk-s0201a:2594_6: Dassanaṃ hotīti pasādasommāni akkhīni ummīletvā dassanamattampi sādhu hoti.
atk-s0201a:2594_7: Sace pana aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatena brahmassarena dhammaṃ desentassa ekaṃ padampi sotuṃ labhissāma,
atk-s0201a:2595_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti sabbakiccāni pahāya tuṭṭhamānasā āgamaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2595_1: Etadavocunti duvidhā hi pucchā agārikapucchā anagārikapucchā ca.
atk-s0201a:2595_3: kiṃ akusala”nti iminā nayena agārikapucchā āgatā. “Ime kho, bhante,
atk-s0201a:2595_5: Ime pana attano anurūpaṃ agārikapucchaṃ pucchantā etaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2595_9: Tesaṃ bhagavā yathā na sakkonti sallakkhetuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2595_12: Kasmā pana bhagavā yathā na sallakkhenti,
atk-s0201a:2595_18: mayampi kathentā evameva katheyyāmāti vattāro bhavanti.
atk-s0201a:2595_19: Tena nesaṃ bhagavā yathā na sakkonti sallakkhetuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2595_21: Tato sallakkhetuṃ asakkontehi vitthāradesanaṃ yācito vitthārena desetuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2596_9: Adhammacariyā ca sā visamacariyā cāti adhammacariyāvisamacariyā.
atk-s0201a:2596_13: Lohitapāṇīti paraṃ jīvitā voropentassa pāṇī lohitena lippanti.
atk-s0201a:2596_16: Hatappahate niviṭṭhoti hate ca parassa pahāradāne,
atk-s0201a:2597_0: Yaṃ taṃ parassāti yaṃ taṃ parassa santakaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2597_1: Paravittūpakaraṇanti tasseva parassa vittūpakaraṇaṃ tuṭṭhijananaṃ parikkhārabhaṇḍakaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2597_3: Araññagataṃ vāti araññe rukkhaggapabbatamatthakādīsu vā ṭhapitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2597_4: Adinnanti tehi parehi kāyena vā vācāya vā adinnaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2598_0: Māturakkhitātiādīsu yaṃ pitari naṭṭhe vā mate vā ghāsacchādanādīhi paṭijaggamānā,
atk-s0201a:2598_4: Sabhāgakulāni pana kucchigatesupi gabbhesu katikaṃ karonti –
atk-s0201a:2598_11: tassa ettako daṇḍo”ti evaṃ gāmaṃ vā gehaṃ vā vīthiṃ vā uddissa ṭhapitadaṇḍā,
atk-s0201a:2598_14: “esā me bhariyā bhavissatī”ti saññāya tassā upari kenaci mālāguṇaṃ khipantena mālāguṇamattenāpi parikkhittā hoti.
atk-s0201a:2598_15: Tathārūpāsu cārittaṃ āpajjitā hotīti evarūpāsu itthīsu sammādiṭṭhisutte vuttamicchācāralakkhaṇavasena vītikkamaṃ kattā hoti.
atk-s0201a:2599_8: Attahetu vā parahetu vāti attano vā parassa vā hatthapādādihetu vā dhanahetu vā.
atk-s0201a:2599_9: Āmisakiñcikkhahetu vāti ettha āmisanti lābho adhippeto.
atk-s0201a:2599_10: Kiñcikkhanti yaṃ vā taṃ vā appamattakaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2599_12: Sampajānamusā bhāsitā hotīti jānantoyeva musāvādaṃ kattā hoti.
atk-s0201a:2600_0: Imesaṃ bhedāyāti yesaṃ itoti vuttānaṃ santike sutaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2600_2: Amūsaṃ bhedāyāti yesaṃ amutrāti vuttānaṃ santike sutaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2600_4: Iti samaggānaṃ vā bhedakāti evaṃ samaggānaṃ vā dvinnaṃ sahāyakānaṃ bhedaṃ kattā.
atk-s0201a:2600_5: Bhinnānaṃ vā anuppadātāti suṭṭhu kataṃ tayā,
atk-s0201a:2600_6: taṃ pajahantena katipāheneva te mahantaṃ anatthaṃ kareyyāti evaṃ bhinnānaṃ puna asaṃsandanāya anuppadātā upatthambhetā kāraṇaṃ dassetāti attho.
atk-s0201a:2600_9: Vagge disvā vā sutvā vā nandatīti vagganandī.
atk-s0201a:2600_10: Vaggakaraṇiṃ vācanti yā vācā samaggepi satte vagge karoti bhindati,
atk-s0201a:2601_0: Aṇḍakāti yathā sadose rukkhe aṇḍakāni uṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0201a:2601_3: Yathā nāma pūtikarukkho kakkaso hoti paggharitacuṇṇo,
atk-s0201a:2601_8: Parābhisajjanīti kuṭilakaṇṭakasākhā viya mammesu vijjhitvā paresaṃ abhisajjanī gantukāmānampi gantuṃ adatvā lagganakārī.
atk-s0201a:2601_10: Asamādhisaṃvattanikāti appanāsamādhissa vā upacārasamādhissa vā asaṃvattanikā.
atk-s0201a:2602_6: Anidhānavati vācanti hadayamañjūsāyaṃ nidhetuṃ ayuttaṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti.
atk-s0201a:2602_7: Akālenāti vattabbakālassa pubbe vā pacchā vā ayuttakāle vattā hoti.
atk-s0201a:2602_10: suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā nikkhipitvā tassa upalabbhaṃ vā upamaṃ vā vatthuṃ vā āharitvā bāhirakathaṃyeva katheti.
atk-s0201a:2602_12: “Suttaṃ nu kho katheti jātakaṃ nu kho,
atk-s0201a:2602_13: nassa antaṃ vā koṭiṃ vā passāmā”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0201a:2602_20: nikkhittaṃ nikkhittamattameva katvā passeneva pariharanto gacchati.
atk-s0201a:2602_21: Yo pana bahumpi bhaṇanto etadatthamidaṃ vuttanti āharitvā jānāpetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:2603_2: Abhijjhāya olokitamattakena cettha kammapathabhedo na hoti.
atk-s0201a:2604_4: Mā vā ahesunti kiñcipi mā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2605_2: Natthi dinnanti dinnassa phalābhāvaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0201a:2605_8: Phalaṃ vipākoti yaṃ phalanti vā vipākoti vā vuccati,
atk-s0201a:2605_10: Natthi ayaṃ lokoti paraloke ṭhitassa ayaṃ loko natthi.
atk-s0201a:2605_11: Natthi paro lokoti idha loke ṭhitassapi paraloko natthi,
atk-s0201a:2605_13: Natthi mātā natthi pitāti tesu sammāpaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattīnaṃ phalābhāvavasena vadati.
atk-s0201a:2605_14: Natthi sattā opapātikāti cavitvā upapajjanakasattā nāma natthīti vadati.
atk-s0201a:2605_15: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentīti ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya sayaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā pavedenti,
atk-s0201a:2606_1: Pāṇātipātaṃ pahāyātiādayo satta kammapathā cūḷahatthipade vitthāritā.
atk-s0201a:2607_3: Ābhānaṃ devānanti ābhā nāma visuṃ natthi,
atk-s0201a:2607_5: Parittābhānantiādi pana ekato aggahetvā tesaṃyeva bhedato gahaṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2607_7: Iti bhagavā āsavakkhayaṃ dassetvā arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a:2608_1: Tissannaṃ tāva jhānabhūmīnaṃ vasena nava brahmalokā,
atk-s0201a:2608_2: pañca suddhāvāsā catūhi ārūpehi saddhiṃ navāti aṭṭhārasa,
atk-s0201a:2608_4: te asaññaṃ pakkhipitvā vīsati brahmalokā honti,
atk-s0201a:2608_5: evaṃ chahi kāmāvacarehi saddhiṃ chabbīsati devalokā nāma.
atk-s0201a:2608_6: Tesaṃ sabbesampi bhagavatā dasakusalakammapathehi nibbatti dassitā.
atk-s0201a:2609_0: Tattha chasu tāva kāmāvacaresu tiṇṇaṃ sucaritānaṃ vipākeneva nibbatti hoti.
atk-s0201a:2609_1: Uparidevalokānaṃ pana ime kammapathā upanissayavasena kathitā.
atk-s0201a:2609_4: Sīle patiṭṭhāya kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ nibbattati;
atk-s0201a:2609_6: rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhito pañcasu suddhāvāsesu nibbattati;
atk-s0201a:2609_7: rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā arūpāvacarasamāpattiṃ nibbattetvā catūsu arūpesu nibbattati;
atk-s0201a:2609_8: rūpārūpajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0201a:2609_9: Asaññabhavo pana bāhirakānaṃ tāpasaparibbājakānaṃ āciṇṇoti idha na niddiṭṭho.
atk-s0201a:2613_5: Kevalañhi idha adhammacārī visamacārīti evaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanā katā.
atk-s0201a:2617_5: Duppañño duppaññoti ettha paññāya duṭṭhaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a:2617_8: kittakena nu kho evaṃ vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2618_1: Pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ aññātaṃ hoti adiṭṭhaṃ atulitaṃ atīritaṃ avibhūtaṃ avibhāvitaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2618_2: tassa ñāṇāya dassanāya tulanāya tīraṇāya vibhūtāya vibhāvanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2619_1: Pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ ñātaṃ hoti diṭṭhaṃ tulitaṃ tīritaṃ vibhūtaṃ vibhāvitaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2619_2: aññehi paṇḍitehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2621_2: rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vāti? Aniccaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2621_3: bhante”ti evarūpā anumatiṃ gahetvā dhammadesanākāle pucchā anumatipucchā nāma.
atk-s0201a:2622_3: katame cattāro”ti evarūpā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sayameva pucchitvā sayameva vissajjetukāmassa pucchā kathetukamyatāpucchā nāma.
atk-s0201a:2623_0: Thero hi attano divāṭṭhāne nisīditvā sayameva pañhaṃ samuṭṭhapetvā sayaṃ vinicchinanto idaṃ suttaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya matthakaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0201a:2623_1: Ekacco hi pañhaṃ samuṭṭhāpetuṃyeva sakkoti na nicchetuṃ;
atk-s0201a:2623_7: Mahāpaññaṃ nissāya hi imasmiṃ sāsane sāriputtatthero,
atk-s0201a:2623_12: ayameva āyasmāti sambahulā therā visesaṭṭhānaṃ adhigatā.
atk-s0201a:2623_13: Na hi sakkā yāya vā tāya vā appamattikāya paññāya samannāgatena bhikkhunā sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakaṃ pāpuṇituṃ,
atk-s0201a:2623_14: mahāpaññena pana sakkāti mahāpaññatāya sāriputtatthero taṃ ṭhānaṃ adhigato.
atk-s0201a:2623_19: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ sāriputto”ti.
atk-s0201a:2624_0: Tathā na sakkā yāya vā tāya vā appamattikāya paññāya samannāgatena bhikkhunā bhagavatā saṃkhittena bhāsitassa
atk-s0201a:2624_1: sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā samānetvā vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajetuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2624_2: mahāpaññena pana sakkāti mahāpaññatāya mahākaccānatthero tattha paṭibalo jāto,
atk-s0201a:2624_6: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākaccāno”ti.
atk-s0201a:2625_0: Tathā na sakkā yāya vā tāya vā appamattikāya paññāya samannāgatena bhikkhunā dhammakathaṃ kathentena
atk-s0201a:2625_1: dasa kathāvatthūni āharitvā satta visuddhiyo vibhajantena dhammakathaṃ kathetuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2625_2: mahāpaññena pana sakkāti mahāpaññatāya puṇṇatthero catuparisamajjhe alaṅkatadhammāsane cittabījaniṃ gahetvā
atk-s0201a:2625_3: nisinno līḷāyanto puṇṇacando viya dhammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0201a:2625_7: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ yadidaṃ puṇṇo mantāṇiputto”ti.
atk-s0201a:2626_0: Tathā yāya vā tāya vā appamattikāya paññāya samannāgato bhikkhu dhammaṃ kathento ito vā etto vā anukkamitvā yaṭṭhikoṭiṃ gahetvā andho viya,
atk-s0201a:2626_1: ekapadikaṃ daṇḍakasetuṃ āruḷho viya ca gacchati.
atk-s0201a:2626_2: Mahāpañño pana catuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ nikkhipitvā upamā ca kāraṇāni ca āharitvā tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ gahetvā heṭṭhupariyaṃ karonto kathesi.
atk-s0201a:2626_3: Mahāpaññatāya pana kumārakassapatthero catuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ nikkhipitvā upamā ca kāraṇāni ca āharitvā
atk-s0201a:2626_4: tehi saddhiṃ yojento jātassare pañcavaṇṇāni kusumāni phullāpento viya sinerumatthake vaṭṭisahassaṃ telapadīpaṃ
atk-s0201a:2626_5: jālento viya tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ heṭṭhupariyaṃ karonto kathesi.
atk-s0201a:2626_9: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cittakathikānaṃ yadidaṃ kumārakassapo”ti.
atk-s0201a:2627_0: Tathā yāya vā tāya vā appamattikāya paññāya samannāgato bhikkhu catūhi māsehi catuppadikampi gāthaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2627_1: Mahāpañño pana ekapade ṭhatvā padasatampi padasahassampi gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a:2627_2: Ānandatthero pana mahāpaññatāya ekapaduddhāre ṭhatvā sakiṃyeva sutvā puna apucchanto saṭṭhi padasahassāni
atk-s0201a:2627_3: pannarasa gāthāsahassāni valliyā pupphāni ākaḍḍhitvā gaṇhanto viya ekappahāreneva gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a:2627_5: suvaṇṇaghaṭe pakkhittasīhavasā viya ca gahitākāreneva tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a:2627_9: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ gatimantānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando,
atk-s0201a:2628_0: Na hi sakkā yāya vā tāya vā appamattikāya paññāya samannāgatena bhikkhunā catupaṭisambhidāpabhedassa matthakaṃ pāpuṇituṃ.
atk-s0201a:2628_1: Mahāpaññena pana sakkāti mahāpaññatāya mahākoṭṭhitatthero adhigamaparipucchāsavanapubbayogānaṃ vasena anantanayussadaṃ paṭisambhidāpabhedaṃ patto.
atk-s0201a:2628_5: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākoṭṭhito”ti.
atk-s0201a:2629_0: Iti thero mahāpaññatāya pañhaṃ samuṭṭhāpetumpi nicchetumpīti ubhayampi sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2629_1: So divāṭṭhāne nisīditvā sayameva sabbapañhe samuṭṭhapetvā sayaṃ vinicchinanto idaṃ suttaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya matthakaṃ pāpetvā,
atk-s0201a:2629_4: tato ayaṃ dvinnampi amhākaṃ ekamatiyā ekajjhāsayena ca ṭhapitā atigarukā bhavissati pāsāṇacchattasadisā,
atk-s0201a:2629_6: maggagamanatthikānaṃ sahassayuttaājaññaratho viya bahupakārā bhavissatī”ti diṭṭhasaṃsandanatthaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0201a:2630_5: ito uddhaṃ natthīti dukkhasaccaṃ yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇato na pajānāti.
atk-s0201a:2630_6: Ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti ito dukkhaṃ samudetīti pavattidukkhapabhāvikā taṇhā samudayasaccanti yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇato na pajānāti.
atk-s0201a:2630_7: Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhoti idaṃ dukkhaṃ ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo ca idaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ patvā nirujjhatīti ubhinnaṃ
atk-s0201a:2630_8: appavatti nibbānaṃ nirodhasaccanti yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇato na pajānāti.
atk-s0201a:2630_9: Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti ayaṃ paṭipadā dukkhanirodhaṃ gacchatīti maggasaccaṃ yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇato na pajānātīti.
atk-s0201a:2630_11: Saṅkhepato panettha catusaccakammaṭṭhāniko puggalo kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2631_0: Ayañhi ācariyasantike cattāri saccāni savanato uggaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a:2631_4: dukkhasaccaṃ parijānanto samudayasaccaṃ pajahanto nirodhapāpano maggo maggasaccanti evaṃ uggahetvā abhinivisati.
atk-s0201a:2632_0: Dukkhasaccaṃ nāma rūpādayo pañcakkhandhāti vavatthapetvā dhātukammaṭṭhānavasena otaritvā,
atk-s0201a:2632_1: “cattāri mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya rūpaṃ rūpa”nti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0201a:2632_2: Tadārammaṇā vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ nāmanti evaṃ yamakatālakkhandhaṃ bhindanto viya “dveva ime dhammā nāmarūpa”nti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0201a:2632_3: Taṃ panetaṃ na ahetukaṃ sahetukaṃ sappaccayaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2632_4: ko cassa paccayo avijjādayo dhammāti evaṃ paccaye ceva paccayuppannadhamme ca vavatthapetvā “sabbepi
atk-s0201a:2632_5: dhammā hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā”ti aniccalakkhaṇaṃ āropeti,
atk-s0201a:2632_7: avasavattanākārena anattāti tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā sammasanto lokuttaramaggaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0201a:2633_16: Etassa pana pariggaṇhantasseva maggo tīsu saccesu pariññādikiccaṃ sādhentova nirodhaṃ ārammaṇato paṭivijjhatīti.
atk-s0201a:2634_0: Tasmā paññavāti vuccatīti ettha heṭṭhimakoṭiyā sotāpanno,
atk-s0201a:2634_2: Yo pana tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ pāḷito ca atthato ca anusandhito ca pubbāparato ca uggahetvā heṭṭhupariyaṃ karonto vicarati,
atk-s0201a:2634_8: Atha yo tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā sammasanto ajja ajjeva arahattanti carati,
atk-s0201a:2635_1: Yena viññāṇena saṅkhāre sammasitvā esa paññavā nāma jāto,
atk-s0201a:2635_2: tassa āgamanavipassanā viññāṇaṃ kammakārakacittaṃ pucchāmīti pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2635_5: Iminā thero “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmīti pajānātī”tiādinā nayena āgatavedanāvasena arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0201a:2636_2: Ettha ca thero maggapaññañca vipassanāviññāṇañcāti ime dve lokiyalokuttaradhamme missetvā bhūmantaraṃ
atk-s0201a:2636_3: bhinditvā samayaṃ ajānanto viya pucchatīti na veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2636_5: vipassanāpaññāya ca vipassanāviññāṇeneva saddhiṃ saṃsaṭṭhabhāvaṃ pucchatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2636_6: Theropissa tamevatthaṃ vissajjento ime dhammā saṃsaṭṭhātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2636_7: Tattha na ca labbhā imesaṃ dhammānanti imesaṃ lokiyamaggakkhaṇepi lokuttaramaggakkhaṇepi ekato uppannānaṃ dvinnaṃ dhammānaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2636_8: Vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvāti visuṃ visuṃ katvā vinivaṭṭetvā,
atk-s0201a:2636_9: ārammaṇato vā vatthuto vā uppādato vā nirodhato vā nānākaraṇaṃ dassetuṃ na sakkāti attho.
atk-s0201a:2636_10: Tesaṃ tesaṃ pana dhammānaṃ visayo nāma atthi.
atk-s0201a:2636_11: Lokiyadhammaṃ patvā hi cittaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2637_3: udāhu dutiya tatiya catuttha maggapañña”nti na evaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2637_14: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”ti ca evaṃ cittavaseneva paññāpeti.
atk-s0201a:2637_15: Lokuttaraṃ pucchanto pana kiṃ phasso tvaṃ bhikkhu,
atk-s0201a:2639_0: Yathā hi cattāro seṭṭhiputtā rājāti rājapañcamesu sahāyesu nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmāti vīthiṃ otiṇṇesu ekassa
atk-s0201a:2639_1: seṭṭhiputtassa gehaṃ gatakāle itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0201a:2639_5: Dutiyassa tatiyassa catutthassa gehaṃ gatakāle itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0201a:2639_9: Atha sabbapacchā rañño gehaṃ gatakāle kiñcāpi rājā sabbattha issarova,
atk-s0201a:2639_13: Evamevaṃ kho saddhāpañcamakesu indriyesu tesu sahāyesu ekato vīthiṃ otarantesu viya ekārammaṇe uppajjamānesupi
atk-s0201a:2639_14: yathā paṭhamassa gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0201a:2639_16: evaṃ sotāpattiyaṅgāni patvā adhimokkhalakkhaṇaṃ saddhindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2639_18: Yathā dutiyassa gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0201a:2639_20: evaṃ sammappadhānāni patvā paggahaṇalakkhaṇaṃ vīriyindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2639_22: Yathā tatiyassa gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0201a:2639_24: evaṃ satipaṭṭhānāni patvā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ satindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2639_26: Yathā catutthassa gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0201a:2639_28: evaṃ jhānavimokkhe patvā avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ samādhindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2639_30: Sabbapacchā rañño gehaṃ gatakāle pana yathā itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0201a:2639_32: evameva ariyasaccāni patvā pajānanalakkhaṇaṃ paññindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2640_0: Iti paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ agge ṭhapito mahākoṭṭhitatthero lokiyadhammaṃ pucchanto cittaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ cittaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā pucchi;
atk-s0201a:2640_1: lokuttaradhammaṃ pucchanto paññaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ paññaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā pucchi.
atk-s0201a:2641_1: pajānātīti yaṃ catusaccadhammamidaṃ dukkhantiādinā nayena maggapaññā pajānāti.
atk-s0201a:2641_2: Taṃ vijānātīti maggaviññāṇampi tatheva taṃ vijānāti.
atk-s0201a:2641_3: Yaṃ vijānātīti yaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ aniccantiādinā nayena vipassanāviññāṇaṃ vijānāti.
atk-s0201a:2641_4: Taṃ pajānātīti vipassanāpaññāpi tatheva taṃ pajānāti.
atk-s0201a:2641_5: Tasmā ime dhammāti tena kāraṇena ime dhammā.
atk-s0201a:2642_0: Paññā bhāvetabbāti idaṃ maggapaññaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2642_1: Taṃsampayuttaṃ pana viññāṇaṃ tāya saddhiṃ bhāvetabbameva hoti.
atk-s0201a:2642_2: Viññāṇaṃ pariññeyyanti idaṃ vipassanāviññāṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2642_3: Taṃsampayuttā pana paññā tena saddhiṃ parijānitabbāva hoti.
atk-s0201a:2643_4: Sukhampi vedetīti sukhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ vedeti anubhavati.
atk-s0201a:2643_11: rūpaṃ sukhaṃ sukhānupatitaṃ sukhāvakkantaṃ anavakkantaṃ dukkhena,
atk-s0201a:2643_18: saṃkilissantī”ti iminā hi mahālisuttapariyāyena idha ārammaṇaṃ sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ adukkhamasukhanti kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2643_19: Apica purimaṃ sukhaṃ vedanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā aparā sukhā vedanā vedeti;
atk-s0201a:2643_20: purimaṃ dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā aparā dukkhā vedanā vedeti;
atk-s0201a:2643_21: purimaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā aparā adukkhamasukhā vedanā vedetīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:2643_23: na añño koci veditā nāma atthīti vuttametaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2644_5: Nīlakampi sañjānātīti nīlapupphe vā vatthe vā parikammaṃ katvā upacāraṃ vā appanaṃ vā pāpento sañjānāti.
atk-s0201a:2644_6: Imasmiñhi atthe parikammasaññāpi upacārasaññāpi appanāsaññāpi vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a:2645_2: viññāṇanti imāni tīṇi gahetvā paññā kasmā na gahitāti?
atk-s0201a:2645_4: Paññāya hi gahitāya paññāya sampayuttāva vedanādayo labbhanti,
atk-s0201a:2645_6: Taṃ pana aggahetvā imesu gahitesu paññāya sampayuttā ca vippayuttā ca antamaso dve pañcaviññāṇadhammāpi labbhanti.
atk-s0201a:2645_7: Yathā hi tayo purisā suttaṃ suttanti vadeyyuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2645_9: Tesu purimā tayo takkagatampi paṭṭivaṭṭakādigatampi yaṃkiñci bahuṃ suttaṃ labhanti antamaso makkaṭakasuttampi.
atk-s0201a:2645_12: Heṭṭhato vā paññā viññāṇena saddhiṃ sampayogaṃ labhāpitā vissaṭṭhattāva idha na gahitāti vadanti.
atk-s0201a:2645_16: Yaṃ sañjānātīti yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ saññā sañjānāti,
atk-s0201a:2646_0: Idāni sañjānāti vijānāti pajānātīti ettha viseso veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2646_5: aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti lakkhaṇapaṭivedhaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2646_8: ussakkitvā pana maggapātubhāvaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2647_0: Yathā hi heraññikaphalake kahāpaṇarāsimhi kate ajātabuddhi dārako gāmikapuriso mahāheraññikoti tīsu janesu
atk-s0201a:2647_1: oloketvā ṭhitesu ajātabuddhi dārako kahāpaṇānaṃ cittavicittacaturassamaṇḍalabhāvameva jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2647_2: idaṃ manussānaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ ratanasammatanti na jānāti.
atk-s0201a:2647_5: “Ayaṃ kūṭo ayaṃ cheko ayaṃ karato ayaṃ saṇho”ti pana na jānāti.
atk-s0201a:2647_7: jānanto ca pana naṃ rūpaṃ disvāpi jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2647_11: hatthena garukalahukabhāvaṃ upadhāretvāpi asukagāme katotipi jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2647_14: Evamevaṃ saññā ajātabuddhidārakassa kahāpaṇadassanaṃ viya nīlādivasena ārammaṇamattameva sañjānāti.
atk-s0201a:2647_15: Viññāṇaṃ gāmikapurisassa kahāpaṇadassanaṃ viya nīlādivasena ārammaṇampi sañjānāti,
atk-s0201a:2647_17: Paññā mahāheraññikassa kahāpaṇadassanaṃ viya nīlādivasena ārammaṇampi sañjānāti,
atk-s0201a:2648_3: nāgasena bhagavatā dukkaraṃ katanti? Dukkaraṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0201a:2648_5: imesaṃ arūpīnaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekārammaṇe pavattamānānaṃ vavatthānaṃ akkhātaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2648_15: vasātelanti imāni pañca telāni ekacāṭiyaṃ pakkhipitvā divasaṃ yamakamanthehi manthetvā tato idaṃ tilatelaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2648_16: idaṃ sāsapatelanti ekekassa pāṭiyekkaṃ uddharaṇaṃ nāma dukkaraṃ,
atk-s0201a:2648_18: Bhagavā pana sabbaññutaññāṇassa suppaṭividdhattā dhammissaro dhammarājā imesaṃ arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ ekārammaṇe pavattamānānaṃ vavatthānaṃ akkhāsi.
atk-s0201a:2648_21: idaṃ yamunāyā”ti evaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ udakauddharaṇenāpi ayamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2649_2: Tattha nissaṭenāti atthe sati pañcahi indriyehīti nissakkavacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2649_5: pañcahi indriyehi nissaritvā manodvāre pavattena pañcahi vā indriyehi tassa vatthubhāvaṃ anupagamanatāya pariccattenāti.
atk-s0201a:2649_9: “Yaṃkiñci neyyaṃ nāma atthi dhamma”ntiādīsu hi jānitabbaṃ neyyanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2649_10: Ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ neyyanti kathaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānacittena arūpāvacarasamāpatti neyyāti?
atk-s0201a:2649_11: Rūpāvacaracatutthajjhāne ṭhitena arūpāvacarasamāpattiṃ nibbattetuṃ sakkā hoti.
atk-s0201a:2649_16: Tattha hi kalāpato nayato sammasanaṃ labbhati,
atk-s0201a:2649_17: dhammasenāpatisadisassāpi hi bhikkhuno pāṭiyekkaṃ abhiniveso na jāyati.
atk-s0201a:2649_20: hutvā paṭiventī”ti kalāpato nayato sammasitvā vissajjesīti.
atk-s0201a:2649_21: Bhagavā pana sabbaññutaññāṇassa hatthagatattā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyampi paropaññāsa dhamme pāṭiyekkaṃ aṃguddhāreneva uddharitvā,
atk-s0201a:2650_0: Paññācakkhunā pajānātīti dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhena cakkhubhūtāya paññāya pajānāti.
atk-s0201a:2650_1: Tattha dve paññā samādhipaññā vipassanāpaññā ca.
atk-s0201a:2650_8: Sā panesā lokiyāpi abhiññatthā ca pariññatthā ca vikkhambhanato pahānatthā.
atk-s0201a:2650_9: Lokuttarāpi abhiññatthā ca pariññatthā ca samucchedato pahānatthā.
atk-s0201a:2650_10: Tattha lokiyā kiccato asammohato ca pajānāti,
atk-s0201a:2651_1: Sammādiṭṭhiyā uppādāyāti vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiyā ca maggasammādiṭṭhiyā ca.
atk-s0201a:2651_4: Tattha sāvakesu api dhammasenāpatino dve paccayā laddhuṃ vaṭṭantiyeva.
atk-s0201a:2651_5: Thero hi kappasatasahassādhikaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ pāramiyo pūretvāpi attano dhammatāya aṇumattampi kilesaṃ pajahituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0201a:2651_6: “Ye dhammā hetuppabhavā”ti assajittherato imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvāvassa paṭivedho jāto.
atk-s0201a:2652_2: Phalakkhaṇe nibbattā cetovimutti phalaṃ assāti cetovimuttiphalā.
atk-s0201a:2652_3: Tadeva cetovimuttisaṅkhātaṃ phalaṃ ānisaṃso assāti cetovimuttiphalānisaṃsā.
atk-s0201a:2652_16: sattavidhaṃ anupassanaṃ bhāventassa arahattamaggo uppajjitvā phalaṃ deti.
atk-s0201a:2653_0: Yathā hi madhuraṃ ambapakkaṃ paribhuñjitukāmo ambapotakassa samantā udakakoṭṭhakaṃ thiraṃ katvā bandhati.
atk-s0201a:2653_1: Ghaṭaṃ gahetvā kālena kālaṃ udakaṃ āsiñcati.
atk-s0201a:2653_3: Yā hoti samīpe valli vā sukkhadaṇḍako vā kipillikapuṭo vā makkaṭakajālaṃ vā,
atk-s0201a:2653_5: Khaṇittiṃ gahetvā kālena kālaṃ mūlāni parikhaṇati.
atk-s0201a:2653_6: Evamassa appamattassa imāni pañca kāraṇāni karoto so ambo vaḍḍhitvā phalaṃ deti.
atk-s0201a:2653_8: Rukkhassa samantato koṭṭhakabandhanaṃ viya hi sīlaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2653_11: samīpe valliādīnaṃ haraṇaṃ viya kammaṭṭhāne khalanapakkhalanacchedanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2653_12: kālena kālaṃ khaṇittiṃ gahetvā mūlakhaṇanaṃ viya sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ bhāvanā.
atk-s0201a:2653_13: Tehi pañcahi kāraṇehi anuggahitassa ambarukkhassa madhuraphaladānakālo viya imassa bhikkhuno imehi pañcahi
atk-s0201a:2654_6: Tattha kāmabhavoti kāmabhavūpagaṃ kammaṃ kammābhinibbattā upādinnakkhandhāpīti ubhayamekato katvā kāmabhavoti āha.
atk-s0201a:2654_11: Tatrātatrābhinandanāti rūpābhinandanā saddābhinandanāti evaṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ abhinandanā,
atk-s0201a:2654_17: vaṭṭaṃ vattatīti vaṭṭaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassesi.
atk-s0201a:2654_24: Padīpujjalanena andhakāravigamo viya vijjuppādena avijjā niruddhāva hoti.
atk-s0201a:2654_26: Punabbhavābhinibbatti na hotīti evaṃ āyatiṃ punabbhavassa abhinibbatti na hoti,
atk-s0201a:2654_28: vaṭṭaṃ na vattatīti vivaṭṭaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassesi.
atk-s0201a:2655_2: Ubhatobhāgavimutto bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpajjati.
atk-s0201a:2655_5: Nirodhaṃ samāpajjanakena bhikkhunā aṅgavavatthānaṃ koṭṭhāsaparicchedo nāma jānitabbo,
atk-s0201a:2655_6: idaṃ jhānaṃ pañcaṅgikaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ duvaṅgikanti aṅgavavatthānaṃ koṭṭhāsaparicchedaṃ pucchissāmīti pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2655_11: avikkhepalakkhaṇā cittekaggatāti ime pañca dhammā vattanti.
atk-s0201a:2655_13: Nirodhaṃ samāpajjanakena bhikkhunā upakārānupakārāni aṅgāni jānitabbāni,
atk-s0201a:2656_1: Idāni viññāṇanissaye pañca pasāde pucchanto pañcimāni,
atk-s0201a:2656_4: Aññamaññassāti cakkhu sotassa sotaṃ vā cakkhussāti evaṃ ekekassa gocaravisayaṃ na paccanubhoti.
atk-s0201a:2656_5: Sace hi nīlādibhedaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ samodhānetvā sotindriyassa upaneyya,
atk-s0201a:2656_8: Cakkhuviññāṇañhi vināpi mukhena attano dhammatāya evaṃ vadeyya –
atk-s0201a:2656_10: vassasatampi vassasahassampi paridhāvamāno aññatra mayā kuhiṃ etassa jānanakaṃ labhissasi,
atk-s0201a:2656_13: yadi vā nīlaṃ yadi vā pītakaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2656_17: Evametāni aññamaññassa gocaraṃ visayaṃ na paccanubhonti nāma.
atk-s0201a:2656_21: Mano ca nesanti manodvārikajavanamano vā pañcadvārikajavanamano vā etesaṃ gocaravisayaṃ rajjanādivasena anubhoti.
atk-s0201a:2656_23: ettha rajjanaṃ vā dussanaṃ vā muyhanaṃ vā natthi.
atk-s0201a:2656_24: Etasmiṃ pana dvāre javanaṃ rajjati vā dussati vā muyhati vā.
atk-s0201a:2657_1: pañca kira dubbalabhojakā rājānaṃ sevitvā kicchena kasirena ekasmiṃ pañcakulike gāme parittakaṃ āyaṃ labhiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2657_2: Tesaṃ tattha macchabhāgo maṃsabhāgo yuttikahāpaṇo vā,
