atk-s0201a:2892_1: Nibbānato hi añño dhammo sapabhataro vā jotivantataro vā parisuddhataro vā paṇḍarataro vā natthi.
atk-s0201a:2892_4: Puratthimadisādīsu hi asukadisāya nāma nibbānaṃ natthīti na vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2892_7: Nibbānassa kira yathā mahāsamuddassa yato yato otaritukāmā honti,
atk-s0201a:2892_10: Evamevaṃ aṭṭhatiṃsāya kammaṭṭhānesu yena yena mukhena nibbānaṃ otaritukāmā honti,
atk-s0201a:2892_14: Taṃ pathaviyā pathavattenāti taṃ nibbānaṃ pathaviyā pathavīsabhāvena tato paresaṃ āpādīnaṃ āpādisabhāvena ca ananubhūtaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2892_15: Iti yaṃ tumhādisānaṃ visayabhūtaṃ sabbatebhūmakadhammajātaṃ tassa sabbattena taṃ viññāṇaṃ anidassanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2893_0: Tato brahmā gahitagahitaṃ satthārā vissajjāpito kiñci gahetabbaṃ adisvā laḷitakaṃ kātukāmo handa carahi te, mārisa,
atk-s0201a:2893_3: Sace visahasīti yadi sakkosi mayhaṃ antaradhāyituṃ,
atk-s0201a:2893_6: Nevassu me sakkoti antaradhāyitunti mayhaṃ antaradhāyituṃ neva sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2893_12: Satthā tassa mūlapaṭisandhiṃ gantuṃ na adāsi.
atk-s0201a:2893_13: Mūlapaṭisandhiṃ vā agantvāpi yena tamena attānaṃ antaradhāpetvā adissamānako bhaveyya,
atk-s0201a:2893_23: brahme tvaṃ antarahitomhī”ti saññaṃ uppādesi nāmāti.
atk-s0201a:2894_5: antaradhāyāmī”ti evaṃ vutte taṃ antaradhāyituṃ asakkontaṃ disvā ahaṃ etadavocaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2894_7: Samaṇassa gotamassa imasmiṃ ṭhāne atthibhāvo vā natthibhāvo vā kathaṃ sakkā jānitunti evaṃ brahmagaṇassa
atk-s0201a:2895_0: Tattha bhavevāhaṃ bhayaṃ disvāti ahaṃ bhave bhayaṃ disvāyeva.
atk-s0201a:2895_1: Bhavañca vibhavesinanti imañca kāmabhavāditividhampi sattabhavaṃ vibhavesinaṃ vibhavaṃ gavesamānaṃ pariyesamānampi punappunaṃ bhaveyeva disvā.
atk-s0201a:2895_2: Bhavaṃ nābhivadinti taṇhādiṭṭhivasena kiñci bhavaṃ na abhivadiṃ,
atk-s0201a:2895_4: Nandiñca na upādiyinti bhavataṇhaṃ na upagañchiṃ,
atk-s0201a:2895_6: Iti cattāri saccāni pakāsento satthā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0201a:2895_7: Desanāpariyosāne desanānusārena vipassanāgabbhaṃ gāhāpetvā dasamattāni brahmasahassāni maggaphalāmatapānaṃ piviṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2896_0: Acchariyabbhutacittajātāti acchariyajātā abbhutajātā tuṭṭhijātā ca ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2896_1: Samūlaṃ bhavaṃ udabbahīti bodhimaṇḍe attano tāya tāya desanāya aññesampi bahūnaṃ devamanussānaṃ samūlakaṃ bhavaṃ udabbahi,
atk-s0201a:2897_1: Tasmiṃ pana samaye māro pāpimā kodhābhibhūto hutvā,
atk-s0201a:2897_2: “mayi vicaranteyeva samaṇena gotamena dhammakathaṃ kathetvā dasamattāni brahmasahassāni mama vasaṃ ativattitānī”ti
atk-s0201a:2897_6: Tattha sace tvaṃ evaṃ anubuddhoti sace tvaṃ evaṃ attanāva cattāri saccāni anubuddho.
atk-s0201a:2897_7: Mā sāvake upanesīti gihisāvake vā pabbajitasāvake vā taṃ dhammaṃ mā upanayasi.
atk-s0201a:2897_8: Hīne kāye patiṭṭhitāti catūsu apāyesu patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0201a:2897_12: Anuppanne hi buddhuppāde kulaputtā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā kassaci kiñci avicāretvā ekacarā hutvā samāpattiyo nibbattetvā brahmaloke uppajjiṃsu,
atk-s0201a:2897_14: Anakkhātaṃ kusalañhi mārisāti paresaṃ anakkhātaṃ anovadanaṃ dhammakathāya akathanaṃ kusalaṃ etaṃ seyyo.
atk-s0201a:2897_21: Brahmuno ca abhinimantanatāyāti bakabrahmuno ca idañhi, mārisa,
atk-s0201a:2897_22: niccantiādinā nayena saha kāyakena brahmaṭṭhānena nimantanavacanena.
atk-s0201a:2897_24: Imassa veyyākaraṇassa brahmanimantanikaṃtveva adhivacanaṃ saṅkhā samaññā paññatti jātā.
atk-s0201a:2901_2: Tattha koṭṭhamanupaviṭṭhoti kucchiṃ pavisitvā antānaṃ anto anupaviṭṭho,
atk-s0201a:2901_4: Garugaro viyāti garukagaruko viya thaddho pāsāṇapuñjasadiso.
atk-s0201a:2901_5: Māsācitaṃ maññeti māsabhattaṃ bhuttassa kucchi viya māsapūritapasibbako viya tintamāso viya cāti attho.
atk-s0201a:2901_6: Vihāraṃ pavisitvāti sace āhāradosena esa garubhāvo,
atk-s0201a:2901_7: abbhokāse caṅkamituṃ na sappāyanti caṅkamā orohitvā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā pakatipaññatte āsane nisīdi.
atk-s0201a:2901_9: “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti āvajjamāno attanoyeva upāyena manasi akāsi.
atk-s0201a:2901_10: Sace pana thero attano sīlaṃ āvajjetvā,
atk-s0201a:2901_11: “yaṃ hiyyo vā pare vā parasuve vā paribhuttaṃ avipakkamatthi,
atk-s0201a:2901_13: sabbaṃ jīratu phāsukaṃ hotū”ti hatthena kucchiṃ parāmasissa,
atk-s0201a:2901_15: Thero pana tathā akatvā yoniso manasi akāsi.
atk-s0201a:2901_16: Mā tathāgataṃ vihesesīti yathā hi puttesu vihesitesu mātāpitaro vihesitāva honti,
atk-s0201a:2901_19: evaṃ tathāgatasāvake vihesite tathāgato vihesitova hoti. Tenāha –
atk-s0201a:2902_2: mukhena uggantvā paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā bahipaṇṇasālāya kavāṭaṃ nissāya aṭṭhāsīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2903_1: Bhūtapubbāhaṃ pāpimāti kasmā idaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi?
atk-s0201a:2903_3: “ākāsaṭṭhakadevatānaṃ tāva manussagandho yojanasate ṭhitānaṃ ābādhaṃ karoti.
atk-s0201a:2903_6: Ayaṃ pana māro nāgariko paricokkho mahesakkho ānubhāvasampanno devarājā samāno mama kucchiyaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0201a:2903_7: antānaṃ anto pakkāsayokāse nisinno ativiya paduṭṭho bhavissati.
atk-s0201a:2903_8: Evarūpaṃ nāma jegucchaṃ paṭikūlaṃ okāsaṃ pavisitvā nisīdituṃ sakkontassa kimaññaṃ akaraṇīyaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0201a:2903_10: tvaṃ mama ñātikoti pana vutte mudubhāvaṃ anāpajjamāno nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a:2903_11: handassa ñātikoṭiṃ paṭivijjhitvā mudukeneva naṃ upāyena vissajjessāmī”ti cintetvā imaṃ desanamārabhi.
atk-s0201a:2904_0: So me tvaṃ bhāgineyyo hosīti so tvaṃ tasmiṃ kāle mayhaṃ bhāgineyyo hosi.
atk-s0201a:2904_2: Devalokasmiṃ pana mārassa pitu vaṃso pitāmahassa vaṃso rajjaṃ karonto nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a:2904_5: Añño eko attanā katena kammena tasmiṃ ṭhāne adhipati hutvā nibbattati.
atk-s0201a:2904_6: Iti ayaṃ māropi tadā tato cavitvā puna kusalaṃ katvā imasmiṃ kāle tasmiṃ adhipatiṭṭhāne nibbattoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2905_6: Aggiṃ datvā pakkamiṃsūti ettakena sarīraṃ pariyādānaṃ gamissatīti citakassa pamāṇaṃ sallakkhetvā catūsu disāsu aggiṃ datvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2905_8: therassa udakaleṇaṃ pavisitvā nisinnakālo viya ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2905_9: Cīvarāni papphoṭetvāti samāpattito vuṭṭhāya vigatadhūme kiṃsukavaṇṇe aṅgāre maddamāno cīvarāni vidhunitvā.
atk-s0201a:2906_6: Yathā taṃ dūsī māroti yathā etesaṃ dūsī māro.
atk-s0201a:2906_9: Muṇḍakātiādīsu muṇḍe muṇḍāti samaṇe ca samaṇāti vattuṃ vaṭṭeyya,
atk-s0201a:2906_10: ime pana hīḷentā muṇḍakā samaṇakāti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2907_0: Jhāyinosmā jhāyinosmāti jhāyino mayaṃ jhāyino mayanti.
atk-s0201a:2907_4: Mūsikaṃ maggayamānoti sāyaṃ gocaratthāya susirarukkhato nikkhantaṃ rukkhasākhāya mūsikaṃ pariyesanto.
atk-s0201a:2907_5: So kira upasantūpasanto viya niccalova tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a:2907_9: Sandhisamalasaṅkaṭireti sandhimhi ca samale ca saṅkaṭire ca.
atk-s0201a:2907_14: Sandhisamalasaṅkaṭireti sandhimhi vā samale vā saṅkaṭire vā.
atk-s0201a:2907_15: Sopi hi baddhagatto viya niccalo jhāyati.
atk-s0201a:2908_0: Nirayaṃ upapajjantīti sace māro manussānaṃ sarīre adhimuccitvā evaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0201a:2908_3: Sarīre pana anadhimuccitvā visabhāgavatthuṃ vippaṭisārārammaṇaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0201a:2908_4: tadā kira so bhikkhū khippaṃ gahetvā macche ajjhottharante viya,
atk-s0201a:2908_7: sunakhehi saddhiṃ araññe migavaṃ carante viya,
atk-s0201a:2908_13: Manussā araññagatāpi vanagatāpi vihāragatāpi vippaṭisārārammaṇaṃ passitvā āgantvā aññesaṃ kathenti –
atk-s0201a:2908_17: Evaṃ te manussā diṭṭhadiṭṭhaṭṭhāne sīlavante akkosantā apuññaṃ pasavitvā apāyapūrakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2909_2: Pharitvā vihariṃsūti na kevalaṃ pharitvā vihariṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2909_3: Kakusandhassa pana bhagavato ovāde ṭhatvā ime cattāro brahmavihāre nibbattetvā jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2910_1: Āgatiṃ vā gatiṃ vāti paṭisandhivasena āgamanaṭṭhānaṃ vā,
atk-s0201a:2910_3: Siyā cittassa aññathattanti somanassavasena aññathattaṃ bhaveyya.
atk-s0201a:2910_4: Saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantīti idhāpi purimanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2910_5: Yathā hi pubbe vippaṭisārakaraṃ ārammaṇaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0201a:2910_7: So kira tadā manussānaṃ dassanaṭṭhāne bhikkhū ākāse gacchante viya,
atk-s0201a:2910_11: ākāse cīvaraṃ pasāretvā kāyaṃ utuṃ gaṇhāpente viya,
atk-s0201a:2910_13: taruṇasāmaṇere ākāse ṭhatvā pupphāni ocinante viya katvā dassesi.
atk-s0201a:2910_14: Manussā araññagatāpi vanagatāpi vihāragatāpi pabbajitānaṃ taṃ paṭipattiṃ disvā āgantvā aññesaṃ kathenti –
atk-s0201a:2910_18: Tato manussā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ catūhi paccayehi sakkarontā bahuṃ puññaṃ katvā saggapathapūrakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2911_3: asubhānupassino kāye viharathāti bhagavā sakalajambudīpaṃ āhiṇḍanto antamaso dvinnampi tiṇṇampi bhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā –
atk-s0201a:2912_2: bhikkhuno cetasā bahulaṃ viharato methunadhammasamāpattiyā cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati,
atk-s0201a:2913_2: bhikkhuno cetasā bahulaṃ viharato rasataṇhāya cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati,
atk-s0201a:2914_2: bhikkhuno cetasā bahulaṃ viharato lokacitresu cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati,
atk-s0201a:2915_2: bhikkhuno cetasā bahulaṃ viharato lābhasakkārasiloke cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati,
atk-s0201a:2915_3: upekkhā vā pāṭikulyatā vā saṇṭhātī”ti evaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā –
atk-s0201a:2916_3: āhāre paṭikūlasaññino sabbaloke anabhiratisaññino sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccānupassinoti.
atk-s0201a:2916_5: Tepi bhikkhū imesu catūsu kammaṭṭhānesu kammaṃ karontā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā sabbāsave khepetvā arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0201a:2916_6: imānipi cattāri kammaṭṭhānāni rāgasantāni dosamohasantāni rāgapaṭighātāni dosamohapaṭighātāni cāti.
atk-s0201a:2917_1: Sakkharaṃ gahetvāti antomuṭṭhiyaṃ tiṭṭhanapamāṇaṃ pāsāṇaṃ gahetvā.
atk-s0201a:2917_4: otāraṃ alabhanto idāni sahatthā upakkamitukāmo aññatarassa kumārassa sarīre adhimuccitvā evarūpaṃ pāsāṇaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0201a:2918_2: Sakkharā panassa sīsakaṭāhaṃ abhinditvā aṭṭhiṃ āhacceva nivattā.
atk-s0201a:2918_3: Nāgāpalokitaṃ apalokesīti pahārasaddaṃ sutvā yathā nāma hatthināgo ito vā etto vā apaloketukāmo gīvaṃ
atk-s0201a:2918_6: Yathā hi mahājanassa aṭṭhīni koṭiyā koṭiṃ āhacca ṭhitāni,
atk-s0201a:2918_9: Buddhānaṃ pana saṅkhalikāni viya ekābaddhāni hutvā ṭhitāni,
atk-s0201a:2918_10: tasmā pacchato apalokanakāle na sakkā hoti gīvaṃ parivattetuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2918_11: Yathā pana hatthināgo pacchābhāgaṃ apaloketukāmo sakalasarīreneva parivattati,
atk-s0201a:2918_13: Tasmā bhagavā yantena parivattitā suvaṇṇapaṭimā viya sakalasarīreneva nivattitvā apalokesi,
atk-s0201a:2918_17: ayaṃ dūsī māro pāpaṃ karonto neva pamāṇaṃ aññāsi,
atk-s0201a:2919_0: Sahāpalokanāyāti kakusandhassa bhagavato apalokaneneva saha taṅkhaṇaññeva.
atk-s0201a:2919_1: Tamhā ca ṭhānā cavīti tamhā ca devaṭṭhānā cuto,
atk-s0201a:2919_3: Cavamāno hi na yattha katthaci ṭhito cavati,
atk-s0201a:2919_5: “sahāpalokanāyā”ti ca vacanato na bhagavato apalokitattā cutoti veditabbo,
atk-s0201a:2919_7: Uḷāre pana mahāsāvake viraddhattā kudāriyā pahaṭaṃ viyassa āyu tattheva chijjitvā gatanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2919_8: Tayo nāmadheyyā hontīti tīṇi nāmāni honti.
atk-s0201a:2919_9: Chaphassāyatanikoti chasu phassāyatanesu pāṭiyekkāya vedanāya paccayo.
atk-s0201a:2920_2: Saṅkunā saṅku hadaye samāgaccheyyāti ayasūlena saddhiṃ ayasūlaṃ hadayamajjhe samāgaccheyya.
atk-s0201a:2920_3: Tasmiṃ kira niraye upapannānaṃ tigāvuto attabhāvo hoti,
atk-s0201a:2920_5: Athassa hi nirayapālā tālakkhandhapamāṇāni ayasūlāni ādittāni sampajjalitāni sajotibhūtāni sayameva gahetvā punappunaṃ nivattamānā, –
atk-s0201a:2920_6: “iminā te ṭhānena cintetvā pāpaṃ kata”nti pūvadoṇiyaṃ pūvaṃ koṭṭento viya hadayamajjhaṃ koṭṭetvā,
atk-s0201a:2920_7: paṇṇāsa janā pādābhimukhā paṇṇāsa janā sīsābhimukhā koṭṭetvā gacchanti,
atk-s0201a:2920_8: evaṃ gacchantā pañcahi vassasatehi ubho ante patvā puna nivattamānā pañcahi vassasatehi hadayamajjhaṃ āgacchanti.
atk-s0201a:2921_1: Sā kira mahāniraye vedanāto dukkhatarā hoti,
atk-s0201a:2921_3: evaṃ mahānirayadukkhato ussade vipākavuṭṭhānavedanā dukkhatarāti vadanti.
atk-s0201a:2921_5: sūlena paharantassa pahāro ṭhānaṃ na labhati parigalati,
atk-s0201a:2922_3: Īdiso nirayo āsīti imasmiṃ ṭhāne nirayo devadūtasuttena dīpetabbo. Kaṇha-
atk-s0201a:2922_6: Majjhe sarassāti mahāsamuddassa majjhe udakaṃ vatthuṃ katvā nibbattavimānāni kappaṭṭhitikāni honti,
atk-s0201a:2922_8: pabbatamatthake jalitanaḷaggikkhandho viya ca nesaṃ acciyo jotanti,
atk-s0201a:2922_10: tesu vimānesu nīlabhedādivasena nānattavaṇṇā accharā naccanti.
atk-s0201a:2922_11: Yo etamabhijānātīti yo etaṃ vimānavatthuṃ jānātīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2922_14: Yo vejayantaṃ pāsādanti idaṃ cūḷataṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttisuttena dīpetabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2922_15: Sakkaṃ so paripucchatīti idampi teneva dīpetabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2923_0: Brahmaloke pabhassaranti brahmaloke mahāmoggallānamahākassapādīhi sāvakehi saddhiṃ tassa tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nisinnassa bhagavato obhāsaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2923_1: Ekasmiñhi samaye bhagavā brahmaloke sudhammāya devasabhāya sannipatitvā, –
atk-s0201a:2923_2: “atthi nu kho koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃmahiddhiko.
atk-s0201a:2923_3: Yo idha āgantuṃ sakkuṇeyyā”ti cintentasseva brahmagaṇassa cittamaññāya tattha gantvā brahmagaṇassa matthake
atk-s0201a:2923_4: nisinno tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā mahāmoggallānādīnaṃ āgamanaṃ cintesi.
atk-s0201a:2923_5: Tepi gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā paccekaṃ disāsu nisīdiṃsu,
atk-s0201a:2924_3: Ye ca bhūmisayā narāti bhūmisayā narā nāma aparagoyānakā ca uttarakurukā ca.
atk-s0201a:2924_8: Āsaṃ mā akāsi bhikkhūsūti bhikkhū vihesemīti etaṃ āsaṃ mā akāsi.
